name: Pleasant 1 bedroom apartment in Harlem Brownstone
summary: Pleasant one bedroom apt in Harlem Brownstone. Perfect for couples or single who want to be in serene relaxed semi-chic environment but not pay Manhattan hotel price. Conveniently 15 min away from midtown Manhattan on A or D express subway trains.
space: Located in Harlem Brownstone One bedroom (queen size bed) Living room (my fave) w/ 65 inch tv in 4K image quality Breakfast table and chairs Kitchen w / pull out counter top for cooking or storing food Bathroom w/ shower tub and sink One open and available closet located in bedroom for guests Close to grocery stores, delis, Chinese food and juice bars 15 min away from midtown manhattan Close to Jackie Robinson Park

name: Cozy flat with city view on Soho, Central
summary: Very bright and cozy flat located in the middle of Soho with an amazing view on the ICC!  Very convenient, you will find nice local and must see spot (PMQ, Man Mo Temple, escalator), local street market and shopping street. Though centrally located, the flat is calm. If you are feeling to go out for dinner or for a drink, just walk 2mn and you will be right there!
space: You have an easy access to all amenities: shops, restaurants, tourist spots.  It allows you to visit Central and even to go to the peak by foot. The flat is bright and with a wonderful view on Hong Kong's top high buildings!  The best spot of the flat is the view from the room. Perfect with the night lights!
description: Very bright and cozy flat located in the middle of Soho with an amazing view on the ICC!  Very convenient, you will find nice local and must see spot (PMQ, Man Mo Temple, escalator), local street market and shopping street. Though centrally located, the flat is calm. If you are feeling to go out for dinner or for a drink, just walk 2mn and you will be right there! You have an easy access to all amenities: shops, restaurants, tourist spots.  It allows you to visit Central and even to go to the peak by foot. The flat is bright and with a wonderful view on Hong Kong's top high buildings!  The best spot of the flat is the view from the room. Perfect with the night lights! Building with elevator and a doorman that opens you anytime.  Access to living room, 1 bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. Perfect for a couple! Available by text anytime, (Hidden by Airbnb) in case you need some advice or have any problem We are closed to: - Bars & Restaurants - PMQ - Aberdeen street (just in front of our bui
neighborhood_overview: We are closed to: - Bars & Restaurants - PMQ - Aberdeen street (just in front of our building) - Man Mo Temple (5mn walk) - Sun Yat sen museum (5mn walk) - The Hong Kong famous escalator that brings you from Central to Mid-Levels (800 meters long!) - Transportation: near Caine Road where you have several buses and mini bus You can grab a Taxi in front of the building
notes: We provide linens and towels. And tea and coffee  1 bottle of water will be in the fridge for your use  If you have any special request, please let us know!
transit: Transportation is very convenient and cheap! You can find easily your way with Citymapper App
access: Building with elevator and a doorman that opens you anytime.  Access to living room, 1 bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. Perfect for a couple!
interaction: Available by text anytime, (Hidden by Airbnb) in case you need some advice or have any problem

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Kevin house is a lovely apartmet with breath-taking view of the Hong Kong skyline. Apartment has all facilities for a comfortable stay. Clean , well organized, new apartment in a upscale residential building. Higly reccomended.

We had problems connecting to the wifi, and the wifi can't be rebooted since they are using the neighbor's connection and there's no TV in the venue. Other than that, the place is great and the host was great on replying to queries.
Great place with great views of the city!
Excellent Host.  great place and location.

This place has a central location but aside from the hustle. Pretty close to MTR (about 10 minutes walk), the escalators and Lan Kwai Fong area. The apartment is cozy and clean, has everything you need and with a nice view on the skyscrapers. I'd like to mention the bed: it was very soft and comfortable. The host was always in touch and helped us to solve the hot water issue although it was New Year.

Finding an airbnb in HK can be a bit challenging. Which is why I felt lucky to stumble upon Kevin/Princes's listing in the Sheung Wan/Central district of HK Island. This district is located right in the midst of a bustling area of the city where it is very international 24 hours a day. The Bnb itself shined with value with plenty of square footage, amenities such as high speed wif and a breathtaking view out of every window. If you're lucky enough to reserve this listing for the duration of your stay in HK, you may be hard pressed to find a better value.
Great place, great bed. Secure. Great area. Lots of nightlife and restaurants, bars all around. Easy access to Airport Express HK station too. Thanks Kevin!
Great place. Met Princess and Kevin upon our arrival. They both gave great tips for our stay. Answered all questions and their apartment was top notch. Awesome view!
This is a beautiful flat and very centrally located. Perfect for weekend away, Kévin and Princes were very helpful - 100% recommend this flat for a stay in Hong Kong.
Outstanding hospitality, communication and arrangements by the hosts!

Me and my son stayed in Kévin’s place over the weekend. The location is really good, close to nice restaurants and cafés. The view from the bed is almost surreal, at least for us not being used to waking up 27 floors up from the ground. Great views in two directions. There is a doorman 24/7 who is very kind and welcoming. Make sure you stop for food and drinks at Little Bao down on the street, great place! I would stay here again if I travel to Hong Kong again!
Awesome place

When you read reviews and descriptions that everything is so close...well this flat is pretty darn accurate. So close to bars, 7-11, amazing shopping (PMQ) , and 20min walk to the peak tram. This place is perfect to experience a day in the life of Hong Kong with all the tourist stomping grounds at your door step. For have never been to HK, this flat made it so easy to navigate through the city. The view is amazing and pretty spectacular. Watch the LED light show on a skyscraper while lying in bed. Felt like my own home and I will definitely come back. Communication with Kevin and Princes was so quick and they accommodated me with my late flight. Smooth check-in. There’s a reason why this place is always booked, because it’s place you should be!
Clean apartment, everything you need. Good location. Wish I could have stayed longer to enjoy this view!! Kevin is easily reachable.
Very cozy and well located apt.  Great host.  Prompt communication and ready to act to assure guests satisfaction.
It is a very nice apartment, excellent location and brilliant view. We had a great time there!

Cozy place, good for a single business traveler. Kevin is a great host, and responded quickly to my texts. Located close to a lot of good restaurants and bars. Keep in mind that this area requires some uphill walking/stairs in order to get around, so its not the best for people with any mobility issues.
Great location and cozy home! Easy communication and check-in process as well.
Great place with amazing views, good location, responsive hosts with prompt communication. All in all, I had a great stay.

Nice location and the view.
The host is so kind.

name: Modern Studio in Kennedy Town!
summary: Our wonderful 11th Floor open studio flat is located in Kennedy Town, near fantastic little restaurants and shops and just a couple of minutes walk from HKU MTR station.
space: Our wonderful 11th Floor open studio flat is located in Kennedy Town, near fantastic little restaurants and shops and just a couple of minutes walk from HKU MTR station.
description: Our wonderful 11th Floor open studio flat is located in Kennedy Town, near fantastic little restaurants and shops and just a couple of minutes walk from HKU MTR station. Our wonderful 11th Floor open studio flat is located in Kennedy Town, near fantastic little restaurants and shops and just a couple of minutes walk from HKU MTR station. Guests have access to: - FREE, FAST Wifi - Air Conditioning  - Well-stocked kitchen with lots of herbs, spices and sauces to inspire you - Hairdryer - Iron/Ironing board - Small but diverse selection of books for your reading pleasure - Speakers for plugging in iPods/Laptops - Electric Adapters - Clean Towels, Bedsheets, Pillows, Toilet Paper, Soap, Shampoo etc. We will try to meet you when you arrive to hand over keys but will probably be out of town during your stay. However we are very easily reachable online and will generally respond immediately to any questions. Kennedy Town is a quiet yet increasingly hip neighbourhood. A fantastic mix of "old"
neighborhood_overview: Kennedy Town is a quiet yet increasingly hip neighbourhood. A fantastic mix of "old" and "new" Hong Kong, it's conveniently located near central Hong Kong Island, but the lack of huge crowds makes it a perfect place to retreat from the hustle and bustle. It boasts a great variety of restaurants and bars - Spanish, Mexican, Japanese, Italian, Vietnamese, and more. We're also lucky to be close to the harbour, and evening walks along the Kennedy Town Praya are highly recommended!
notes: We're generally very flexible hosts and early check-in/late check-out can usually be arranged. We try to accommodate any requests you may have - just ask!
transit: Getting around is super convenient as the brand new HKU MTR station has just opened, two minutes walk from our flat! There are also a number of buses to all over Hong Kong Island and Kowloon. A leisurely walk to Central through Sheung Wan and Soho would take about 45 minutes.
access: Guests have access to: - FREE, FAST Wifi - Air Conditioning  - Well-stocked kitchen with lots of herbs, spices and sauces to inspire you - Hairdryer - Iron/Ironing board - Small but diverse selection of books for your reading pleasure - Speakers for plugging in iPods/Laptops - Electric Adapters - Clean Towels, Bedsheets, Pillows, Toilet Paper, Soap, Shampoo etc.
interaction: We will try to meet you when you arrive to hand over keys but will probably be out of town during your stay. However we are very easily reachable online and will generally respond immediately to any questions.
house_rules: As we won't be charging any cleaning fee, we'd highly appreciate if guests could keep the place in good condition during their stay. While we don't allow smoking in the flat, smokers can smoke on the building's rooftop.

host.host_about: I am from Thailand and I live in Hong Kong with my husband (from New Zealand).

address.street: Hong Kong, Kennedy Town, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Namasri's place is like an oasis in Sheung Wan. In the upper floors of an old building, you enter in a modern style flat where you immediately feel like at home. The whole flate is newly renoved and fully furnished and procures everything you need to have a perfect stay.
The place is easily reachable by bus from Central (it tooks us around 10 mn from the bus station).
Namasri and Jake are very friendly and very convenient for check-in / check-out. I would definetely recommand this place if you want a cosy place close to Central.

Luke and Namasri we're awesome hosts!! Perfect apartment with perfect transport links, loads of amenities around the apartment, in central island! she left me loads of tips and guides to move around the HK which was awesome! Perfect communication with a very flexible check out! Will deffo look to book this place again in future! I recommended at 100% for everyone if you like very nice studio to discover Hong Kong!

Great apartment in a very convenient location. Everything was nice and clean when we arrived. The place came with a lot of useful things like electrical adapters, hairdryer, toiletries, fresh towels, etc. which is great if you want to pack light and don't bring too many things with you. Since Namasri was traveling herself during our stay she arranged an alternative way to pick up the key and left us very useful advice on how to get around. There are also some travel guides and other books about hiking or eating that you may borrow. Would stay there again any time!

Namasri was a great host - very quick to reply to any emails. She also gave an excellent description of how to get to her place from the airport. The neighbourhood was full of interesting sights and we found some lovely places to eat very close by (like Waffling Beans and Grassroots Pantry). The apartment was clean and very quiet, and it looks exactly as pictured. The apartment building itself was not quite what we expected. The only downside to the apartment was the shower. The shower head was too low and we couldn't get it raised to the right height so we had to shower using the hand held option, which wasn't ideal. Other than that everything was great.

When we arrived in HK, Namasri was out of town, but the process of getting the key and checking in was very smooth. Kennedy town turned out to be a surprisingly nice area to live - it's quiet at night, feels safe, lots of dining options, we especially liked those traditional local cafes nearby. Transportation wise, it's very convenient, especially after the HKU MTR station just opened on the last few days of our stay. For anyone who wants to have a true Hong Kong experience, I highly recommended this area.

In terms of the studio, the bedroom is actually quite spacious in HK standard, but the bathroom is much smaller than I imagined. I can move around OK (I'm 157cm, 100lbs), but it was very challenging for my boyfriend.

Cozy place, away from the relative bustle of HK. Luke and Namasri were super nice, quick to respond and met me at the local subway to view the apartment in advance. They left us coffee, towels and offered their books and spices for cooking. The place was very clean on arrival and space was made for our luggage. Wi-Fi was A1. HKU station is a 3 minute walk away, groceries and amenities just as close. 
The heater/AC was tricky to control but a good experience overall.

Namasri and Luke both greeted us when we arrived and were very friendly! The place is just as how we see it on airbnb! Namasri got back to me right away when I messaged her and notified us heads up of anything related to the apartment.  The area is very convenient with good food around! Close to mtr station though be prepared for a long walk to the mtr exit!! (but its all indoors with aircon!) Overall a very good place!! :)
Great

Namasri was a great host, quick to respond to all my emails. When I arrived, Namasri and Luke was out of town, they gave me clear intruction of how to get the key and check-in so the process was very smooth. The building wasnt quite what I expected but the flat itself was very clear and cosy, the bathroom was a little bit small to move around. In terms of the area, it is quite at night, safe, lots of restaurants around which are pretty good ones too. It was very easy to get around from kennedy town either by bus or by mtr. Great location!
Namasri is very friendly and helpful, communication was smooth. The apartment is lovely and has all the necessities.

name: Williamsburg Bedroom w/Private Terrace!
summary: A bright private bedroom with your own terrace, in the heart of Williamsburg.  The apartment is a 3BR/2BA duplex with a massive private roof deck with views of Manhattan.  The bedroom has a Full-size bed, dresser, suitcase stand, shelf under the window, and giant glass door going out to the terrace. There is a screen-door too so you can leave the glass door open and sleep with a breeze at night.  We welcome you into our home! Come stay!
space: This listing is for one person only - Sorry, we do not host more than one guest in this room. The building: We're in a recently-built brick apartment building with only one neighbor on our floor. The apartment has more reviews under the other listing on my profile – Same apartment, different room as this listing: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/959871
description: A bright private bedroom with your own terrace, in the heart of Williamsburg.  The apartment is a 3BR/2BA duplex with a massive private roof deck with views of Manhattan.  The bedroom has a Full-size bed, dresser, suitcase stand, shelf under the window, and giant glass door going out to the terrace. There is a screen-door too so you can leave the glass door open and sleep with a breeze at night.  We welcome you into our home! Come stay! This listing is for one person only - Sorry, we do not host more than one guest in this room. The building: We're in a recently-built brick apartment building with only one neighbor on our floor. The apartment has more reviews under the other listing on my profile – Same apartment, different room as this listing: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/959871 You'll have access to a shared living room, bathroom and roof deck. There is also a fully equipped kitchen at your disposal with dishwasher, microwave, stovetop/oven, and space in the cabinets for you to use.
neighborhood_overview: We're on a quiet corner but surrounded by quintessential Brooklyn bars, stores, and restaurants in every direction– the busy Bedford avenue stretch of Williamsburg is a block away (whole foods just opened there too...) 3 great movie theaters are nearby, as well as the famous Smorgasburg weekend food fest in the warmer months. We have a great 24/7 bodega on the corner at Roebling Street.
notes: The rooftop deck is shared by everyone in the apartment, including you! So feel free to go up and hang out whenever.
transit: We are a 7-minute walk from both the Marcy Ave (JMZ) and Bedford (L) subway stations, just one stop into Manhattan on either train. It's a 10-minute walk to the parks on the water and 5 minutes to the pedestrian walkway over the bridge. A cycling store on the corner rents bikes and the cycling pathway over the bridge is two blocks away.
access: You'll have access to a shared living room, bathroom and roof deck. There is also a fully equipped kitchen at your disposal with dishwasher, microwave, stovetop/oven, and space in the cabinets for you to use. There is also closet space just outside your door, if you need, and coin-operated laundry machines in the basement.
interaction: Franny and I are both friendly and love getting to know people, though we aim to give you your space as a guest. Both of us have busy lives and travel often so it can be pretty quiet around the apartment. If we are around, we are more than happy to offer advice, share our favorite spots in the neighborhood, and point you in the right direction.  Franny and I are both social people so we have friends over to hang on the roof deck sometimes when the weather is nice out.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Born and raised in sunny Florida. I attended Wesleyan University before moving to New York City. Over the past eight years, I have lived in Williamsburg, Financial District, Cobble Hill, and now back in Williamsburg. The neighborhood has changed a lot but I love it.

reviews.comments: Great location, great host everything was very easy. The room has its own quite balcony with a great view and sunshine all afternoon, the appartements os very very clean and there is a huge rooftop too with hamac, sun and barbecue! The host is very sweet and makes everything very easy and the bed is very confortable. About the neighborhood it's the best neighborhood of New York : more quiet than Manhattan, but one stop from Manhattan, less than 5 and 10minutes by walking from J,M, Z train or L train. Plus many things are happening in the neighborhood for locals or for some tourists too. You have a great park to go for running or just for having fun and you can go see the river by 5 minutes walking. It was an amazing stay, thank you!
Great space for a solo traveller. Nice guys, great location.
You literally can’t get a hotel this nice and definitely not in this price range. Super friendly people super great location and wonderful room.
Nice Apartment! I had a great stay!

Perfect spot! Derek was attentive and helped if I ever had any questions, a great host. The room is clean and just as it's described on the listing, also the location of the place is perfect, with great access to public transport. Highly recommend.
Derek’s place is awesome! super close to both M and L - 20 mins into town. Derek was great and helped make my trip to NY awesome!
Great neighbourhood, location and value for money. Highly recommended. Derek and Harris will make you feel welcome.

Cozy flat in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.... good for a short stay in NYC. The flat is close to subway lines that make it easy to join midtown Manhattan in 10/15 minutes. Derek is quite busy but always available for suggestions and help. Appreciated.

The place is very good. The bedroom and the apartment are very comfortable and clean.
Williamsburg is a very nice area with a lot of restaurants and bars close to the apartment. Probably the best area of Brooklyn. And 30 minutes from Manhattan. 
Derek was great host. He's a cool guy, as well as his roommate Harris. Even thought I didn't share too much with them because they and I worked most of the time, the few times I got to spent with them they were nice, great to talk to and always keen to help and make you feel comfortable in their home. I would go again to their place if I need to stay in Brooklyn in a future occasion.

Both the house and the room are just like you can see in the pictures plus this home is quite cozy. Derek is a great host, always available even from the other end of the country.
I'd definitely recommend this place, host and neighborhood.
Great place to stay.  Nice neighborhood and close to the metro.

Derek's place is located in the Williamsburg, Brooklyn, which is a very special art area and it has lots of good restaurants and coffee shops.  You also can access the subway station very easily.  Derek is a very nice person, he extended my stay for free when my flight has been changed. If I visit New York again, I will definitely choose his place again!
Easy access to Manhattan
A great place in a great part of Brooklyn, only a short stop away from Manhattan as well! Close to Bedford Ave, and Derek and Harris are great guys.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice place with evening sun balcony!

Derek's place is lovely, it was like being a short-term flatmate during my stay there. The housemates were really welcoming and helpful. The location is great for those who want to spend a lot of time in Brooklyn and it's not too far from the bridge if you'd like to pop over to Manhattan. Highly recommend this as a place to stay in the city and would definitely come back.

Had the most amazing time in this ai (Website hidden by Airbnb) location is ideal and close to everything in Williamsburg and not far from LES at all! The hosts went above and beyond to make our stay special and comfortable! Rooftop was amazing - saw the best sunsets here!! Would definitely come back the next time I’m in Brooklyn!
Great apartment.

Derek's place is in a great neighborhood, very close to Manhattan and multiple subways. The room is comfy, clean, there is a fan in the room and AC in the apartment. The balcony was especially great ! Francesca & Derek were very helpful.
Incredible place with awesome Hosts!
便利な駅とも近くで活動拠点にして動くのにとても良かったです

Dereks place was GREAT. I loved all about it: Location (nice restaurants and shops nearby),  my room (with private balkony), the whole apartment (huge, with roof top terrasse) and the accessbility to the subway (5 min walk). Everything was exactly like it is presented online. The communication was excellent. Derek answered RIGHT AWAY, ALWAYS! Both hosts were very welcoming, asking if help is needed. I enjoyed chatting with the hosts. Everything was uncomplicated and realiable. I highly recommend it and would enjoy coming back sometime again! Thanks a lot!
Derek and Francesca’s place is in a great location, really easy to get around Brooklyn and only one subway stop to Manhattan.

This was my first Airbnb experience and it definitely set high expectations for stays to come. I loved how personable Francesca was and enjoyed the hospitality and personality of both her and Derek. Only one thing was out of place, but otherwise the private patio, bed, and overall space were fantastic. Hope to book again in the future if ever in need.
Nice place! Nice to have a private terrace. Derek was very flexible and let me check in early. Good location too!

My favorite place I’ve stayed in all of New York! Derek’s place is in a stellar location, with anything you can think of within walking distance. Also the subway rides from both J and L tracks will take you pretty much anywhere you need to go. They keep the apartment super clean. Both Derek and Harris were awesome people, both offered awesome suggestions for restaurants, sight seeing, and night life. When I make another trip to NYC, I know where I’m staying for sure.
Great location in the heart of Williamsburg, walking distance to two big Subway stations and plethora of bars, restaurants and shopping available close by. Manhattan a short ride on the Subway.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Derek, l’emplacement est parfait pour pouvoir accéder rapidement à Manhattan et découvrir Williamsburg à pied. Le quartier est top, plein de restaurants, boutiques où il fait bon flâner. 
La communication avec les hôtes était facile, ils ont été très arrangeants avec notre arrivée et départ ! Je recommande !

Great location, nice and safe neighborhood, the apartment is close to the train so it is really easy and quick to go to Manhattan. The room is confortable, the bed is so good and in general the apartment is cozy. Derek and Francesca are so friendly and cool, they always answered all my questions and even they invited me to join their thanksgiving dinner with their friends :) If I’ll return to NYC in the future, I’ll stay in Derek’s place for sure.

Derek and Francesca are attentive, helpful and laid back hosts who let you get one with your stay with ease. On checking out I was able to leave my bag until the evening as well. Francesca was very quick to respond to any questions and the room is a perfect size for long or short stays, with a balcony and nice view. Area is great with bodegas, thrift stores and restaurants really close by. It’s a perfect distance from manhattan and coming back to a quieter area is a relief after the rush  of times square. Will definitely be coming back.
L線Bedford 駅は､最近人気のWilliamsburg の中心ｴﾘｱで､可愛いお店や､ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝ､ﾊﾞｰがたくさんあります｡治安も､住んでる住民の雰囲気もとてもいいです｡ﾎｽﾄのﾃﾞﾚｸさんとﾌﾗﾝｼｽさんも､とても素敵な方々で､質問をすると､色々気さくに教えてくれます｡おｽｽﾒです｡
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: The Porto Concierge - Boavista's Dance
summary: Practical and conveniently located 4 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 8 people comfortably. 5 minute walking distance to Casa da Musica metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.
description: Practical and conveniently located 4 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 8 people comfortably. 5 minute walking distance to Casa da Musica metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.
house_rules: Also I would like to inform that Portuguese immigration services, SEF, require that all non-portugese guests fill a form with some personal details such as passport number, nationality, etc.. This form will be sent through a certified program or given to you on the check in.

reviews.comments: Comfortable apartment in a strategic position not far from the city center.

El piso era viejo y mal cuidado, se nota que han invertido lo justo en camas y 4 sillas. Al llegar nos lo encontramos sucio y con el aseo inundado, nos dijeron que lo arreglarían y se desentendieron totalmente. Nos pasamos todas las vacaciones usando toda la familia el único baño operativo. La ubicación  es algo alejada del centro.

Nuno's apartment is very clean and quite large, as it has four bedrooms with comfortable beds. That's a fine place to stay in with a friends or big family. Check-in was organised by Porto Concierge and went really smoothly. Special thanks to Porto Concierge for a bottle of wine, for answering all our questions, and for returning my daughter's phone left at their office!

Para empezar tuvimos que ir a una oficina a buscar las llaves, había mucho jaleo y mucha gente con bolsas grandes de ikea que parecía que iban a donar ropa que ya no usaban, parece que era La Oficina de los apartamentos turísticos que tenían, eran las 11, pero  nuno nos dijo q a las 12 podíamos ir al apartamento porque tenían que limpiarlo, aceptamos y cuando llegamos la chica de la limpieza aún no terminaba, estaba estresada y fue muy mal educada con nosotros, se enfadó y hizo varias llamadas de las cuales no tenemos idea de lo que decía, pero desde luego daba gritos muy enfadada, nos dijo que nos fuéramos para que ella pueda acabar tranquila y que necesitaba dos horas, puestos a no tener que lidiar con su mal carácter decidimos salir del apartamento y volver al cabo de dos horas, por suerte para nosotros no estaba ya... de nuno no volví a saber nada hasta que me escribió para preguntarme a qué hora me iría el día siguiente, cero hospitalidad, cero anfitrión, cero recibimiento... aún así esto no fue motivo para no disfrutar nuestro viaje!!! Por lo demás el apartamento era bastante real que en más fotos y muy cómodo.

Lot of Traffic noise due to old windows toward the street. And the  guys where delayed  more than 1 hour we where waiting in front of the building and couldtn get in contact with the guys. Finally we came inside then the cleaning team has not been there so it was dirty used beeds beer cans used towels bed linen etc. so i had to wait another 2 hours before i could use the apartment . that was not nice after  a long day of traveling
O espaço é bem grande, são 4 quartos com 4 camas de casal, acomoda muito bem 8 pessoas. O valor é super acessível então vale a pena alugar em grupo e rachar.
Great place ! Nuno is a good host and tried to help us the best way. Very quickly in his answers ! The appartment is near the city center, around 15 minutes. Thanks Nuno !
It's a nice flat. The location is good even though you have to walk a bit to the metro and quite a bit to the historic center. I liked that there was a restaurant in the same building.

Great welcoming! Great location, by walk to city centre and Train station Sao Bento aprox 30min. Great local tips, local vine as a gift, amazing local map and tips for young people , many rooms at apartment, kitchen stuff to cook, late check in (I am very thankfull).  Very satisfied , suggest. Had awesome time at Porto those days :)
Everything was like it was supposed to be! We got a little welcoming gift, and the place was located on a shopping area. It was easy to communicate with our receivers and we had no problems at all!
Apartamento espaçoso e equipe de atendimento muito atenciosa e cortes.
Muy buena zona para pasar unos dias en Oporto. Lo malo es que es zona azul para aparcar.
Casa ideal para famílias ou grupos grandes, apesar de há noite haver algum barulho da vizinhança ou do restaurante. Fomos muito bem recebidos, e a casa é bastante espaçosa.
It was a very clean and well appointed apartment.
Very good location, nice sized apartment. Very organised and helpful hosts

Infelizmente, para esse apartamento minha experiência não foi boa. Os itens anunciados não tinham no apartamento, não existiam. Dizia ter elevador, e não tinha. Eram dois lances de escada. No nosso caso, eramos 5, mas o espaço dizia comportar 8 com 4 quartos e 4 camas de casal. Faltou um de cada na minha conta. E por fim, havia apenas 1 casa de banho quando se dizia 2. No que posso dizer do anfitrião, foram simpáticos e sempre me atenderam, eu tive um atraso no check in, devido a uma outra reunião, e eles foram compreensíveis.

Ideal for big groups of people (there are 2 showers), the position was very strategic and Nuno was very helpful and let us postpone the time of our check out to match it with our train.
It was only a bit cold but they gave us heaters.
Un bon séjour, malgré quelques nuisances sonores dans certaines chambres (proximité à la route)
Everything was very good, the apartment was very clean and comfortable, the location also good... Its very near of good restaurants. Recommended

All went well and the appartment is as described. Good service and reactivity from the owner.
There is bus stop very close and metro not so far. 
We specially enjoyed "Mercado do Bom Sucesso" which is very close and with many different things to eat and to drink, confortable for a breakfast or a last coffee.
There is only one dark point. From the small room with window behind the house, you can ear strong noise during night at around 1AM coming from the internal courtyard (from restaurant I guess).
Espaço agradável para grupos!! Um pouco barulhento

Appartement bien situé MAIS très très bruyant, pas propre, mal équipé (pas un plat, pas une passoire, 7 fourchettes pour un appartement de 8 personnes...).
Une salle d'eau avec une douche de 49cm de large et un WC qui ne fonctionne pas. Les volets se ferment mal et laissent passer le jour. Nous avons essayé de contacter Nuno mais nos mails sont restés sans réponse.

Bisher hatte ich bei AIRBNB immer sehr viel Glück mit den Unterkünften gehabt. Diesmal hatten wir leider Pech. 
Diese Unterkunft würde ich nicht nochmal buchen. Kurz vor Antritt der Reise war die Wohnung nicht mehr im Angebot, was mich wunderte. Man hatte mich beruhigt, aber jetzt kenne ich wohl den Grund. Gegen den Gastgeber Nuno kann man nichts sagen. Aber... Vielleicht sind meine Ansprüche was die Sauberkeit und den Zustand der Einrichtung betrifft zu hoch angesetzt. Das Wohnzimmer ist klein und ok. Die Schlafzimmer waren sauber und auch ok, aber keine Möglichkeit Kleidung abzulegen oder aufzuhängen. Dies gilt auch für die Bäder. Das große Bad hat schon bessere Zeiten gesehen. (Farbe an der Decke blättert ab und....) Das kleine Bad hat eine halbe Duschwanne (eine durchgeschnittene Duschwanne :) und ein WC mit kaputten Schwimmer. Dies scheint schon länger so zu sein. Mein Mann hat es täglich wieder gängig gemacht. Und nun die Küche: Das Geschirr war sauber, aber alles andere ........ Die Oberflächen in den Schränken lösen sich zum Teil ab und die Fronten im Griffbereich sowie die Griffe selbst waren regelrecht dreckig. Alles andere war auch nur oberflächlich sauber. Kochen wollte ich da nicht. Was die Lautstärke betrifft, waren wir ja vorgewarnt....... Straßenlärm in den  Zimmer nach vorne  und das Zimmer zum Hof bekam den Aufräumlärm vom Restaurant um Mitternacht zu hören. Für Leute denen Sauberkeit und Ausstattung nicht so wichtig sind, ist die Wohnung sicher super.       
Ich schreibe so detailliert, weil ich die Wohnung nie gebucht hätte, wenn ich das alles gewusst hätte. Auch wenn der Preis relativ niedrig war, habe ich etwas Besseres  erwartet. Es wäre eine wunderbare Unterkunft, wenn sie renoviert würde und sauber wäre. Wir haben das Beste draus gemacht, denn Porto ist auf jeden Fall eine Reise wert.

Appartement bien situé et fonctionnel avec 4 chambres et 4 grands lits. Ok pour 7 à 8 personnes. Bien équipé et propre. Supermarché ouvert 7js /7 jusqu’à 22h à 2 mn.
Très bon accueil de la part de The porto concierge
Prévoir des boules quies car logement mal insonorisé (bruits de la rue et du restaurant situé en dessous)

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended
Appartement op een prima locatie. Kan een upgrade gebruiken qua badkamers! Verder prima voor deze prijs.

The apartment inside is nice and spacious. Less outside. Check-in was delayed because the host arrived one hour late. There were problems with the other tenants due to the noise caused by previous guests.
Todo iba muy bien. Hasta que no salía agua caliente de la ducha y tuvimos que ducharnos con agua fría...

We had seven guests stay at this four bedroom apartment for two nights. We were only given one set of keys for 2 families and was not easy when we requested another set, poor, slow and sometimes very rude communication with the agency.

We found that it was very basic and not well appointed for a comfortable stay for seven people, there was no kettle to make a cup of tea and the second shower was to small to use.
The location was about 2km from the centre of Porto’s old town.

The instructions before arrival were very simple to understand and accomodating. Dealing with an agency rather than an owner itself was quite a different experience.
Все супер, большие, красивые апартаменты!
Exactly as pictured, great spot

Great area, the metro is close and there is a very nice market and other restaurants 5 mins away walking distance. Very friendly host. The apparent was poorly equipped, only the super basics. Only one key, so difficult for groups. Worth it for the price but not more.
Wonderful place, wonderful hostess, the place is big
Great value for money, good location. The street was a bit noisy at night.
grand appartement, bien situé, manque accessoires de cuisine, et mauvaise isolation phonique avec la rue

The stay at the apartment was just about what we expected. We were very happy to have seperate bedrooms, since we were a few couples. The location was very good (next to a supermarket and not too far from the city centre). They even leave a bottle of wine for guests. 
The only downside was the cleanliness in the kitchen (dirty dishes).
Un apartamento muy cómodo, una buena localización y un anfitrión muy simpático

O apartamento é grande e tem uma excelente localização, porém minha experiência foi muito negativa devido ao intenso calor, excessivo barulho e a falta limpeza do apartamento. Minhas sugestões de melhoria foram enviadas ao Nuno de forma privada  para que aplique algumas melhorias aos próximos hóspedes, pois pode ter sido um problema pontual durante a minha hospedagem.
Mieszkanie o przyzwoitym standardzie. Bardzo dobrze skomunikowane: metro, autobusy. ładna okolica: restauracje, sklepy, park. Doskonały punkt. żeby wybrać się na plażę lub do centrum.
Everything was fine. The host welcomed us very nice. our plane had a delay and we arrived very late, but we could have stayed. Thank you very much for that. thank you also for the welcome wine:)
Não tinha talheres para 8 pessoas mas estava bem localizado e era um espaço espaçoso
Good value for money
Simple

Bon rapport qualité-prix. 
Cet appartement facilement accessible en bus reste un peu loin du coeur de la ville. 
Propreté des sols à améliorer.
ideale per gruppi numerosi. La posizione sopra ad un ristorante il Convivio che ha ottimo cibo a prezzi molto contenuti vi solleva dal pensare alla cucina.
Appartement spatieux, basic en terme de décoration, mais mauvaise insinorisation (fenetre)

Não recomendo!
Atraso no check-in, Chegamos no local  e não estava pronto para entrar, o pessoal da limpeza estava limpando ainda, e "daquele jeito" em 10 minutos "limparam" o apartamento todo. Tivemos que esperar para entrar!
Itens do anuncio não encontrado, 2 dos quartos não tinha aquecedor, não tinha toalhas de rosto, papel higiênico,  guardanapos e a cozinha faltava sanduicheira e maquina de café que estava quebrada, entrei em contato com o responsável pelo apartamento o mesmo ficou de me levar no mesmo dia, Estou até hoje esperando rsrs....

Das 5 hospedagens que fiquei na Europa essa foi a pior experiencia, Não recomendo !
O apartamento é bem como parece nas fotos. Um pouco longe do centro.
Appartement correct pour ce petit budget. Il manque un peu de meuble et décoration. L'équipement de la cuisine est faible.
excellent value

Das Apartment ist sauber und einfach, aber funktional eingerichtet. Es besteht aus einem Wohnzimmer, einer Küche, zwei Badezimmern und vier Schlafzimmern, die jeweils mit Doppelbetten ausgestattet sind. Die Lage ist gut inkl. diverser Möglichkeiten, den in Porto sehr gut organisierten öffentlichen Nahverkehr zu nutzen. Es gibt in der Nähe einige Buslinien sowie etwa 10 min zu Fuß entfernt eine Metrostation mit direkter Anbindung an die Altstadt. Das Konzerthaus ist ebenfalls 10 min zu Fuß entfernt, das Stadion von Boavista Porto 20 bis 25 min.
Der Service von "The Porto Concierge" ist gut: Bei unserer Ankunft wartete bereits ein Mitarbeiter am Apartment, um es uns aufzuschließen, den Schlüssel zu übergeben und uns Tipps zu geben. Zusätzlich gab es zur Begrüßung eine Flasche portugiesischen Rotwein. Im Apartment gibt es W-LAN. Im gut 10 min entfernten Büro von "The Porto Concierge" konnten wir am Tag vor unserer Abreise kostenlos unsere Flugpässe für den Rückflug ausdrucken lassen. - Insgesamt ist die Unterkunft empfehlenswert.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

The best thing about the apartment is the situation and the beds are very comfortable.

The worst is not to solve the problems that appear during the stay:

1. Lack of heating devices. There were not enough radiators for all the rooms. We asked that they bring blankets if they could not bring more radiators.
There was no answer or explanation.

2. Two leaks appeared during the stay.
One in the sink drain in the kitchen and the other in the sink drain in the small bathroom. Neither was solved or answered the various messages that requested it.


In summary, although the apartment is very austere, that we already saw with the photos, the worst thing is that they do not solve the problems that arise during a stay and above do not answer the messages.
lovely city and very handy location to visit ot
Nice place, everything was clean. Metro (tube) is near
Nice place but a bit too cold in the winter. Would recommend

name: Stunning Summer House - Perfect for Families
summary: This stunning beachside home is the perfect  summer escape for families and traveler that want to escape the busy everyday life.  The bright and spacious 3 bedroom house with garden offers you plenty of room to enjoy. Close to the city, eastern suburbs, swimming beaches 400 mtr away , organic cafe 10 mtr from the home ,many more other cafe's, shopping and airport, the best thing about Sans Souci is the holiday feel that makes all worries disappear. ( Sans Souci is french for ` without worries`).
space: Once you enter the house you will find plenty of light, space and a modern and stylish interior. The open plan kitchen, dining and living area are located on the ground level.  The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to prepare delicious meals for you friends and family.  The TV room is perfect for relaxed movie nights or lazy Sundays. You will find 3 spacious bedrooms with double beds and a modern bathroom with bathtub and shower.

We will lock one bedr
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is quite and family friendly. Nestled on the Southern most tip of the St. George Peninsula, it is surrounded by water and features some of the finest boating clubs in NSW.  You will find some of the best eateries and just great living in this bay side area and Sans Souci is generally referred to as The Peninsula. Ramsgate Beach Shopping Village atmosphere is a great place for a coffee stop over lunch and dinner.  The extensive bike tracks, the beach and the parks make this location perfect for active outdoor activities with the family.
notes: 'It’s worth noting Sydney does have a tropical climate, and so there may be a few bugs about in any property you stay in - nothing that would negatively impact your stay though!'
access: Guest have access to full house. We will lock one bedroom on the ground level to keep our personal belongings.
interaction: Please message me via Airbnb or mail.
house_rules: - - - No parties - - If guests lock themselves out of the property OR they do not place keys in the lockbox at checkout, an $80 fee will apply. If a guest loses a set of keys during their stay, a $300 fee will apply for replacements. - - Please respect the neighbours, and do not make significant noise or play loud music.  - - Please be respectful of personal belongings in the home.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very nice property, it is well cleaned and very spacious. The area what we stayed in is a very nice area and we had very friendly neighbours
Tracey's place was fantastic. It's a very spacious and beautiful home.

Communication was very difficult because she only can speak Chinese and doesn't understand english. The kitchen was very dirty, e.g. the dishes or the microwave. There was no oven.

name: House Near Espinho/Santa Maria Feira
summary: -5 min to the city center and to the mall (there's also a small market at the end of the road). -5 min to the biggest medieval fair in Europe (2-13 August).   -10 min to the city castle and 5 min to the central hospital. - 15 min away from the beach. - 5 min walking to train station  - 30 min to Porto  - 30 min to Aveiro  -30 min from Porto's airport  Thanks
space: - Casa muito agradável bem localizada, perto da cidade de Santa Maria da Feira. Aliando as vantagens da proximidade a uma cidade com bastantes motivos de interesse, á tranquilidade de um espaço com pomares de fruto e estufas de flores A varanda tem vista para um pomar de kiwis tornando agradável a estada neste espaço . Propriedade com estufas de flores , é possível a sua visita gratuitamente em que posso fazer uma visita guiada. Todos os quartos têm Tv cabo e internet. É possível fumar mas apenas na varanda.

reviews.comments: Gran familia,nos atendieron y nos ayudaron a movernos por allí.la casa es muy cómoda.a 5 minutos de Perlim (se ve en dos tardes,consigan pulsera) y a 10 del zoo de aves (se ve en 1 hora) Relax en la casa.Gracias Pedro
Bom acolhimento lugar calmo e perfeito, recomendo a 100%

Lovely apartment on a Portuguese family farm. Pedro and his mother were great hosts, friendly and generous. The spaces were clean and comfortable, and we felt very welcome to make ourselves at home. Good location and off-street parking. We definitely recommend this airbnb and would stay again!

name: Habitación individual Eixample
summary: Habitación individual muy agradable en piso familiar. Estaremos encantados en conocerte.
space: Un ambiente familiar y muy tranquilo. La habitación tiene una cama de soltero, con ventana interior y armario.
description: Habitación individual muy agradable en piso familiar. Estaremos encantados en conocerte. Un ambiente familiar y muy tranquilo. La habitación tiene una cama de soltero, con ventana interior y armario. Internet, baño, cocina, amplio salón y balcón. En todo lo que sea necesario. El Barrio de Eixample es precioso y increíble. Estarás a poucos passos de la sagrada família, bares, restaurantes, cerca de lo emblemático paseo de gracia y del barrio de gracia. Lo pasarás muy bien. Metro línea amarilla L4 y línea azul L5. Estación de metro Verdaguer  Y muchas líneas de autobuses

host.host_about: Hola somos Jose y Cláudia Maria una pareja tranquila, joven y muy divertida. Nos gusta viajar, conocer gente y sitios nuevos.

name: Magnifique chambre à louer au coeur du Plateau
summary: Durant ton séjour au manoir, tu auras la chance de cohabiter avec Dodo, Erikes, Laurie et Cian dans une coloc internationale où l'on aime manger ensemble, profiter des festivités de la ville et faire des escapades le week-end! L'ambiance de l'appart est très conviviale de même que le super quartier! Parc Lafontaine et Laurier, bars, restos, métro Mont-Royal et Laurier, épiceries, pharmacies et plus tous à moins de 15 minutes à pieds! L'idéal pour un(e) jeune voyageur en visite!
space: L'immeuble construit dans les années 1800 (mais très bien rénové) a conservé le cachet d'époque. Vous serez charmé par les fenêtre antiques à vitraux et les moulures boisées qui font de l'appartement un endroit chaleureux. En plus d'une façade impressionnante, le manoir possède trois terrasses (une à l'avant, une sur le côté ainsi qu'une semi-interne) où vous pourrez assurément passer de moments inoubliables!

neighborhood_overview: Plateau life!
notes: S'il vous plaît, laissez l'endroit propre à votre départ (la chambre surtout) et respectez ceux qui vous entourerons, car ils sont formidables et pourraient devenir vos amis pour la vie!
transit: Métro Laurier, Sherbrooke et Mont-Royal tous à moins de 10 minutes Bus: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) et plus  BIXI: everywhere!
access: C'est une coloc conviviale, mais le respect est important! Vous aurez accès à toutes les pièces communes. Donc, à moins d'y être invité, nous vous demanderons de ne pas entrer dans la chambre des autres colocataires!
interaction: Je serai joignable par courriel lors de votre séjour au besoin. Si désiré, je pourrai vous laisser de la documentation touristique et des conseils de la part d'une vraie locale! (Où aller, quoi faire etc.)

name: 2 Marvellous ENSUITES with lazer area IPANEMA
summary: Pretty and perfectky comfortable apartment composing of 2 bedrooms localized in a safe residence in Ipanema, Posto 8. Near Lagoa e Gávea. Lazer area in the building with shower! WIFI, TV, very equipped kitchen, in the building terrace with barbecue, towels, chairs and table, security 24h, etc. Excellent combination quality/price!
space: Peaceful apartment with 2 ensuites at few minutes of Ipanema beach, metropolitan and Lagoa, Posto 8. You can´t dream better in term of localization. Peace, calm, luminosity and security 24h/24h. This little piece of paradise is one of the most safe places of the Rio de Janeiro city. - WIFI unlimited  - CABLE TV - amazing localization : near of Ipanema, Lagoa  - complete kitchen - terrace in the building for barbecue - lazer area with shower - two beautiful ensuites - good quality/price! The apartment is good for 4 people, the bedrooms are configurated in this way :  - Bedroom 1 (ensuite) : 1 double bed, WITH air conditioning + TV + dressing + private bathroom - Bedroom 2 (ensuite) : 1 double bed, WITH fan air + dressing + private bathroom ONE Floor mattress extra. In the kitchen, you will find all the necessary to make good foods : micro-wave, coffee machine, refrigerator, kitchen´s utensis, teakettle, sandwich machine, barbecue grill, oven, etc.

The apartment is good for 4 people, the bedrooms are configurated in this way :  - Bedroom 1 (ensuite) : 1 double bed, WITH air conditioning + TV + dressing + private bathroom
neighborhood_overview: Ipanema turned up a neighborhood very frequented of the Rio de Janeiro city. The wave designs near of the sea and the “calçadão” are a now symbol of the city, relacionated to the pleasure and a life style.  Localized at 7 minutes of the beach, you are in the best place for amazing holidays : bars (pubs), canteens, shops, metro at 5min! Don´t miss also the famous Copacabana beach, the predilection place of local and international surfers.
notes: Intern Settlement : 1. The maximum number of tenants is the number indicated when you do the reservation. It will not be allowed entry of other person, except previous agreement by message on Airbnb site. 2. Switch off the climatisation, the television, and the lights when you leave the apartment. A tax can be exiged in case of excessive utilisation. 3. Switch off the gas when you don´t cook. 4. Don´t make double of the keys. 5. Minimum of noise after 22h. To avoid neighboor problems, the parties and events are forbidden, except previous agreement by message on Airbnb site. 6. If during the stay, a problem (an infiltration, a problem of gas, problem of Internet, etc.) happens, the tenant will have to permit the access to the apartment. 7. Sheets and towels are provided. It isn´t allowed to carry the towels outside of the flat. 8. It is asked to wash the feets before the entry in the building after the beach and to be dried before the entry in the apartment. 9. When you leave, it is exi
transit: About transportes, no problem! The apartment is localized at few minutes walking of the metropolitan station General Osório. From the apartament you can go in simple and fast way in all the touristic places of the city, and a lot more. In this way, you can´t lose nothing, if you are in Rio de Janeiro for Christmas, the Reveillon, the Carnaval, etc. (visit of Pão de Açucar in Urca, Corcovado, beaches, Lapa stairs, mythic Maracana Stadium, etc.). The taxi from the airport to the apartment will cost more or less 100 R$. You have also the possibility to use the Bus Premium 2018 for approximately R$15,00 by people. You will ask the driver to stop at Avenida Vieira Souto, the nearer possible of « Posto 8 ».
access: The entry it is done directly to the apartment between 14h and 21h. Only it can be done before 14h if the apartment is ready and without overview expected in the morning.  The exit of the local will be directly to the apartment between 7h and 12h. It can occur after 12h if there is no entry in the place expected the same day.
interaction: My name is Daniel, I am French and I live Rio since World Cup 2014, after spending all my life in Paris. I will do all what I can for you having an unforgettable stay and wishing to come back soon. I answer to all your questions very quickly, generally less than 1 hour, day and night.  When you do the reservation, I will send you my phone number and my personal email. Also the way to combinate your arrival hour. I speak Portuguese, English, French and Spanish.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Meu nome é Daniel, eu sou francês e moro no Brasil desde 2014. Tenho vários apartamentos que gero por conta de proprietários que também são amigos. 
Antes de me contatar, favor respeitar estes pequenos pontos para eu puder responder a todos da melhor maneira :
1 - Não pedir troca de contato ou vísita antes de reserva confirmada
2 - Favor verificar e atualizar seus dados de pagamento antes de mandar pedido 
3 - Não aceito pagamento por boleto
4 - Os valores são atualizados, favor não pedir desconto, sobretudo para estadia pequena

Por conta própria desde 2017, respondo rápido e tenho contato fácil para discutir com respeito e tentar acertar todas as partes. Podemos conversar em português, inglês, francês e espanhol.

My name is Daniel, I am French and I live in Brazil since 2014. I have few apartments for the account of owners who also are friends. 
In the aim to help people and to avoid confusions, thanks to agree between you before consulting me. In this way, I can help you and others persons better and deal faster :
1 - Don't ask ou give contact or visit before reservation confirmed
2 - Thanks to verify your payment form before to send offer
3 - I don' accept Boleto payment
4 - The prices are actualized, thanks no ask discount,above of all for short period

With own account since 2017, I answer quickly and I have an easy touch to discuss with respect and try to find best solution. We can talk in portuguese, english, french and spannish.

Je m´appelle Daniel, je suis français et je vis au Brésil depuis 2014. Je gère divers appartements pour le compte de propriétaires qui sont aussi des amis. 
Dans un souci d´aider le plus grand nombre et d´éviter confusions, merci de déjà vous accorder entre vous avant. De cette manière, je peux vous aider plus facilement et finaliser sans interférence :
1 - Ne pas demander ou passer de contact avant une réservation confirmée 
2 - Merci de vérifier et d'actualiser vos données bancaires avant d'envoyer une demande
3 - Je n'accepte pas de paiement par "boleto"
4 - Les valeurs sont actualisés, merci de ne pas demander de décompte, surtout pour courte durée

Pour compte propre depuis 2017, je réponds rapidement et j´ai le contact facile pour discuter dans le respect et tenter de répondre à vos demandes. Nous pouvons discuter en portugais, anglais, français et espagnol.

name: Balcony Room in Fun Share House!
summary: Perfect central Sydney location. You will be staying with three guys, all 27-28 years old. We like to socialise and would like to share our house with like minded people. We like listening to music, sharing a beer/wine and having a good time.
space: We love our home and have tried to make the most of it. Don't expect amazing facilities and hotel level cleanliness, our toilet and kitchen need some work but what we lack in facilities we hope we make up for in atmosphere and experience.
description: Perfect central Sydney location. You will be staying with three guys, all 27-28 years old. We like to socialise and would like to share our house with like minded people. We like listening to music, sharing a beer/wine and having a good time. We love our home and have tried to make the most of it. Don't expect amazing facilities and hotel level cleanliness, our toilet and kitchen need some work but what we lack in facilities we hope we make up for in atmosphere and experience. You will have access to a private room, living room, bathroom, kitchen and outdoor area. We are very sociable people and would be happy to share our experiences with you. During the week we often go for dinner or may meet friends at the pub. On a typical weekend we would have friends over for drinks and potentially head to an underground dance music warehouse party. This is the perfect location in Sydney. Right next to Hyde Park on the famous Stanley St. On our Street there are lots of fantastic restaurants and y
neighborhood_overview: This is the perfect location in Sydney. Right next to Hyde Park on the famous Stanley St. On our Street there are lots of fantastic restaurants and you are situated 3min walk to Oxford St, 2min to Hyde Park, 10min to Town Hall, 20min to Darling Harbour, 6min to Museum and 10min to Kings Cross.
transit: There are lots of public transport options. There is a bus from right outside our house to Circular Quay/The Opera House. Across the road a bus leaves for Bondi Beach every 15min. Just a few minutes walk are train stations and lots of other bus routes to take you all over Sydney
access: You will have access to a private room, living room, bathroom, kitchen and outdoor area.
interaction: We are very sociable people and would be happy to share our experiences with you. During the week we often go for dinner or may meet friends at the pub. On a typical weekend we would have friends over for drinks and potentially head to an underground dance music warehouse party.

reviews.comments:
Adrian's house is well located, just few minutes away from Hyde park and Oxford street. Everywhere is walkable and close to train station and bus stands to most of the area. The room is exactly same as the photo, there is a private balcony which I always spent my evening there with some good Aussie wines.
Communication is good before and throughout my stay, his housemate David is very friendly too.
Thanks Adrian!
Location is central to the CBD

立地はとてもいいです｡
ただ､決して綺麗な家とは言えないので女性などにはおすすめできないです｡
ただ､若い女性も住んでいたので､あまり気にならない方は大丈夫かと思います｡

It was a pleasure to be a host at Adrian’s house. The house is located in the city center close to everything, including the opera house by 10 minutes walking. Great public transport. The roomates were very friendly. The room has a great balcony for summer and everything you might need. Thank-you guys for hosting me. I miss you.
Adrian was a very nice host! Very friendly, social and helpful to me and my friend. great location of the apartment!
Comfortable room with great balcony that gets sun all morning. Great location - walking distance to pretty much everything. The guys are all really lovely and helpful. Would recommend!
Great location and group of guys to settle down in Sydney. Made life easy and enjoyable

Super central location, very practical from the airport and close to nice cafes, restaurants and city amenities.
Very good company, Adriano and the rest of the crew made me feel home, sharing meals and engaging in interesting conversations. They were also very flexible for my checkout, much appreciated!
Definitely a good experience!

I can’t quite put in to words how much I loved staying with Adrian and the boys. From start to finish they were welcoming, inclusive, friendly and a dream to live with. From sharing food to being invited on nights out, I feel like they couldn’t have done more. It felt like a home from home and I’d hugely recommend this place to anyone thinking of staying here. The room is great, the local amenities are awesome and everything is walking distance. A lively, friendly house with top notch, wonderful people. I couldn’t have wished for more.
Great place and I Definitly highly recommend and I will came back !
Really chill place in a great location. Pleasant and scenic walk to the harbor and close radius to lots of good bars/restaurants.
Great times, super cool people in the house, calm, respectful, clean, just overall super chill in a great great location. I highly recommend :)

I had such a great time at Adrian’s house !
Very central location with a quiet room and super fun hosts, it s the perfect place to get social, 
Miss you already guys, I ll be back !

The apartment is 15-20mins walking distance to all the major attractions. It’s in the city center but in a quiet neighborhood with a lot of restaurants and coffee shops just downstairs. The guys are very welcoming and I had a great time in Sydney. I would definitely stay here again when I come back (hopefully sometime very soon) :)
I really enjoyed my stay! Very welcoming and inclusive. The house is super central to everything in Sydney. I couldn’t recommend it more
This location is hard to beat, with trendy spots and the main attractions all within easy walking distance. Adrian & crew are super friendly and have great tips for how to get a local experience.

Thanks Adrian and Rhys for an awesome stay! I loved the location - very close to public transport and a 15/20 minute walk to Sydney Opera House. Both guys were super friendly and offered recommendations for the area.
Adrians place is dope!  Lovely chill housemates

My experience here was not good at all.  Expectations were not super high, I was just looking forward to a fun place and people to hang with, but the cleanliness and noise levels were unacceptable. 
The room itself is nice and location is great but major issues were that the roommates came home at 3am two different nights being very loud and it was impossible to sleep because you can hear everything in the house. There was a dead coachroach at the bottom of the steps no one picked up for a day. The kitchen is super messy and disgusting. A roommate broke a glass on the kitchen floor and they just put a towel over some of it, and then kind of picked it the next day but there were shards everywhere still. I was crunching glass for the next 3 days under my shoes. The bathroom did not have a working light which made the other airbnb guest - yes they rent out another room- pee all over the seat because you can't see in the bathroom at night. 
I didn't meet Adrian, he wasn't there. The other 2 roommates are really nice guys, so I hate to leave this bad review, but it just sucked being in a super dirty house and then getting woken up and having to listen to drunk people be loud and obnoxious while you try to sleep in the middle of the night. If you don't care about dirty places, it might be fun to stay there if you are partying with the guys, but my experience was not good.

The small room with the balcony is very nice. In general the house is in a very good area and close to the CBD. 
Staying at Adrian’s House for 6 month was great and a real Australian experience. All housemates (Adrian, Conor, Rhys and Alessandro) integrated me into their circle of friends and took me to cool places. 
Thanks for becoming good friends and for the amazing times. I’ll miss you and visit you soon. :-)

name: Super convenient place in Taikoo Shing, landmark of the Hong Kong Island !
summary: Super convenient place in the center of Taikoo Shing, one of the landmark on Hong Kong Island. Right besides City Plaza shopping mall, where you can get everything you need. 1 minute walking to Taikoo Subway station, one of the major station of the Island Line ( the blue line). Only 4 stations away to Causeway Bay. Many buses available nearby to all the places in Hong Kong. You will love my place because of the location and cozy environment. Swimming pool is open from April to November yearly; a beautiful garden of the apartment is accessible 24/7. Walking distance to Quarry Bay park where a tennis court and Football field are available, from which also lead to a sea park for a breathtaking amazing sea view!
description: Super convenient place in the center of Taikoo Shing, one of the landmark on Hong Kong Island. Right besides City Plaza shopping mall, where you can get everything you need. 1 minute walking to Taikoo Subway station, one of the major station of the Island Line ( the blue line). Only 4 stations away to Causeway Bay. Many buses available nearby to all the places in Hong Kong. You will love my place because of the location and cozy environment. Swimming pool is open from April to November yearly; a beautiful garden of the apartment is accessible 24/7. Walking distance to Quarry Bay park where a tennis court and Football field are available, from which also lead to a sea park for a breathtaking amazing sea view!

host.host_about: I am a traveller keen to explore all the amazing places around the world. Airbnb definitely add on a great experience of my trips, I am a responsible person who will keep your house as clean as it was my own house. :)

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 位置超级的方便 房间小小的 一张双人床 房间整洁 客厅和卫生间也很干净 房东很宽容 让我和女儿很舒适的享受了假期 感谢
交通极为方便,采购也是｡去看海5分钟走到了,还能看见消防博物馆的退休火轮,和早锻炼的居民｡

Valerie is a lovely person and very helpful in communicating information. The flat is big by Hong Kong standards and very well organised. The pool is big but more of a leisure pool. The place is remarkably quiet as there is no through-traffic. MTR entrance and shops literally across the road. The journey to town was around fifteen minutes by MTR. There may be another person in the flat, so best to check that with Valerie. Overall, a great stay.
Valerie's place is excellent and is Home sweet home. The transport is convenient and close to MTR.  She is a nice host and treated me variety of AWG tea. I would highly recommended.

Nice and cozy place to stay.
Much bigger than the small hostels around Hong Kong. Enjoyed my stay there though the wifi connection was a bit unstable at times.

Valerie is a wonderful and carrying host. Her flat is compact and neat, with excellent proximity to public transport and major mall. Highly recommended for short business stays. The building and location are very well kept and secure.
It was so nice staying at Valerie's place. She is such a lovely host and helped us so much even she was busy because of work! Hope to meet her once again in HK.
It really is super-conveniently located, right on top of an MTR-station. For us, being East on HK Island was a plus.
房子很好,有足够的空间办公,地段也很好,交通方便,周边的购物很全 房主人也超级棒

Valerie speaks very fluent English and is easy to communicate. She explains everything clearly and after that, she leaves you alone, but is always there, should there be a need.

It is a clean and coasy place and very quiet at night. It gives travellers the chance, to see Hong Kong life, face to face.
Good location, near to the Subway station
Valerie and her husband are pretty kind and hospitable. The surroundings of her apartment is convenient and comfortable. It was a pleasant experiece to accommodate in her apartment.

Valerie is a great host, my hubby and I checked in around 11pm and she was okay with that. The flat is in a really convenient location opposite the mtr tai koo (north east side of HK Island) and next to/opposite the city plaza mall, supermarket on lower ground of mall. Twenty mins or so to central by metro and probably same in taxi depends on time but convenient. Flat is cozy, room is quite small with lots of cupboard space which is helpful. Bed is a small double and suited to sleeping the night not relaxing and if you are used to king/double size European beds then you may struggle slightly, otherwise fab. Nice kitchen cum lounge area we made and had our breakfast daily. Overall a great place to stay.
Indeed a super convenient place at the center of Hong Kong island. A cozy and quiet house. A pleasant experience.

Cozy and convenient house around restaurant, store, and metro station. If you want to experience honkong pekple residence life, this place might be recommended to you. The room is perfect for one but small for two

Valerie is very quick to reply and help with directions. The apartment is right opposite the MTR which makes traveling in HK a breeze. The room and bathrooms are clean and well stocked. The room has plenty of cupboards and is extremely cozy, even for a couple.
Great host. Convenient location!

Valerie’s apartment is a great spot for exploring HK. The bedroom is small, but has plenty of storage space for suitcases and clothes. It looks put into a lovely courtyard with trees and little pools. Valerie was a great host who made sure to check in about whether we needed anything and she keeps a nice, tidy apartment. Her building is very close to the Tai Koo MTR stop which is great for getting around HK and to/from the airport. We’d definitely recommend this place for anyone visiting HK.
Great place. Very clean and convenient to the subway. Will recommend.
Amazing place, amazing hosts. I will definitely recommend it.
super convenience location , many restaurant , supermarket, shopping mall close to it , all transportation around to the place , I recommend it to everyone , thank you for Host
Valerie is a great host. She was very accommodating. Her place is lovely and she could not have been in a more convenient place. Highly recommended. :)

Valerie is a great host and will make you feel very welcome.  The property is homely and it is easy to settle in.  Location is great, just opposite the MTR and next to a mall, which has a supermarket.  

The room is good for 1-2 people, there is ample wardrobe space.

I would stay again.
Nice location, nice communication, everything ok!

타이쿠역과 가까우며, 콘힐 트램 정류장도 가깝습니다 :) ! 방 침대는 한 명이 자기에 넓으며 캐리어 둘 공간은 조금 협소하므로 옷장도 있고 수납공간과 책상이 있어서 캐리어 접은 상태로 두시는 게 좋아요 ! 
방에서 조금 쾌쾌한 냄새가 나기는 하는데 저는 그래서 샤워 전에 에어컨 틀어놓고 씻었어요 ! 그리고 옷장도 가능하면 자주 열어놓으시는게 좋아요 ! 이 외에는 다 좋았습니다 :)

name: 1min MTR@尖沙咀舒适5人房 Supreme Family Room for 5ppl
summary: 我們房間採用了簡單清新的設計,令房間更有時尚感｡房間里有一個獨立的浴室,讓我們客人住的更舒適｡我們酒店位於尖沙咀的中心,交通方便｡(離地鐵站1分鐘)  Our room is very modern and stylish as it is well-designed by our hotel. The room has a private bathroom in which allows our guests to make themselves comfortable. Our hotel is located in the centre of Tsim Sha Tsui and is easily accessible. (1 minute from subway station)
description: 我們房間採用了簡單清新的設計,令房間更有時尚感｡房間里有一個獨立的浴室,讓我們客人住的更舒適｡我們酒店位於尖沙咀的中心,交通方便｡(離地鐵站1分鐘)  Our room is very modern and stylish as it is well-designed by our hotel. The room has a private bathroom in which allows our guests to make themselves comfortable. Our hotel is located in the centre of Tsim Sha Tsui and is easily accessible. (1 minute from subway station)
house_rules: - - 晚上10點後, 請調低音量 Please turn down the volume after 10pm

reviews.comments:
房子位于尖沙咀地铁口附近,周边购物吃饭非常方便;门锁密码锁非常方便,房子也很整洁干净,基本日用品都配备;入住体验较好｡
其他:入住当天后半夜一直有房客进出其他房间并喧哗,吵到睡觉｡

It was a nice stay! I thought it will be very noisy at night because Jennifer's house is located at the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui but it wasn't noisy at all! 

It is very convenient for everything from this house. Just one minute by walk to MTR Station and nearby many restaurants!!! 

The room was very clean and the staff was really nice and friendly! I will definitely come back again and stay at this house for sure!!! ^^
交通方便,卫生干净,人好,不建议人多租用,性价比不高｡
Very central and calm. We only stayed for a few hours because of an early flight but we highly appreciated our stay!
其实都挺好的,房子真的很容易找,虽然房子有点小,但是挺干净的,晚上也不会吵,地区离海港城挺近的｡房东真的挺好的｡会很有耐心的帮你解决问题,吃的玩的,还会发地址给你告诉你怎么去,下楼就是小吃,地铁站,下次去香港的话还是会订回这里
清潔感があるお部屋｡香港を満喫するには最高の立地で､中心地の尖沙咀(ﾁﾑｻｰﾁｮｲ)から歩いて1,2分のところにある｡ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの時間など柔軟にかつ迅速に対応してもらい満足している｡
地理位置是非常好的,房东态度和善,适合几位朋友结伴出游｡

A good small clean place for a group in a great position in TST. Very helpful staff and good communication. Pretty cosy but we weren't expecting anything else. Provided exactly what we needed- would definitely use again
침사추이역 바로 앞억 위치해서 접근성은 매우 좋았다. 숙소는 깨끗했고 잠만 자고 밖으로 많이 돌아다닐 여행객에게는 최고일듯 하다. 방하나에 2층 3층 침대가 들어서있다. 2~3명 여행객이 적당한 크기이다. 물 치약 칫솔 수건 휴지등이 구비되어있다.
一切都很好!地點方便,附近就是尖沙咀地鐵站,周圍都有好多餐廳,維港亦在附近,而且地方乾淨,人好!十分值得住,會再來 :)

One of the best, if not the best, place to stay if you’re going/want to stay in the city part of HK. Very clean room. Despite the room being small (which they say it’s common in HK), it has all the necessities you need. Plus for being very close to MTR, restaurants (local/fastfood). 

Jennifer replies always and is very pro-active when it comes to accomodating guests.

Very good place to spend the night to! We were 5 people and even if it is a bit small it is very close to the subway, the area is nice and the room was clean. I would recommend it, it is definitely worth it for the price!
Place is very close to MTR stations and different shops.
Good location (very near to TST MTR station), friendly and helpful host, good amenities (ample of power and usb plug), good security (pin-locked door). Overall Excellent!
역이랑 가까운게 최고장점
Comfortable, great location, many food choices nearby, great value, clean. I stay there with whole family including baby. Recommend. Host responsive.

결론만말하자면다시오고싶은마음은생기지 않는것같아요..일단침사추이역이엎어지면코닿을데여서편하긴했습니다.호스트도너무친절히대해주셨고건물주님도참친절하셨습니다.5인실을썼는데한명이캐리어를열면아무도침대에서나올수없을정도로좁은공간에보일러도안되고히터도없고습기만가득차옷가방기념품들이모두축축하게덜마른수건처럼변하는마법.열기도닫기도너무힘든화장실미닫이문.한명이샤워하면아무것도못하는화장실크기.무엇보다도탑오브탑은온수문제.10분간물을데우고나면8분동안온수가나오고그이후로온수공급중지.잠시기다렸다가다시10분간물을데우면또다시8분간온수제공. 물데우는10분간온수를쓰면데워지지않음.8분만에샤워하기정말힘들었습니다.
有需要去海港城附近的不要錯過,一行五人可以住在一起,舒適度還是很好的,房間也算清潔整齊｡中途遇到一些小問題,房東也即時溝通解決,還是很推薦的｡
下次有机会再过来,楼下就是地铁站､购物中心很方便,地方虽小,但五脏俱全｡

Nice place to stay, the room though a bit small but its clean and convenient.
Easy to go anywhere, the location is very strategic : near MTR Tsim Sha Tsui and bus stop. And the host, Jennifer is very friendly and responsive.
意外的干净整洁,位置很好下楼就是地铁站,在弥敦道上非常方便
地点不错,价钱廉价!地铁就在附近蛮值得住的｡厕所偶而会飘出很恶心难闻的臭味但是房东有帮忙清除臭味还算不错!还有一个缺点就是冷气不是很冷｡
Had fun staying at Majesty place. Very convenient and perfect for a family stay
Clean, tiny, near MTR exit, have elevator, nice for backpakers..
打电话找地址没有具体指出,还有收取服务费,没有付出相应的服务
不错,很干净很漂亮
房东超级nice^o^而且住在尖沙咀b1出口左手边,非常噶方便,不过我们入住人数较多,等电梯比较麻烦,总体来讲,非常nice,下次来仲会选择^ _ ^
房间很小,但设施齐备､干净整洁,提出加床得到很快回复和解决,在尖沙咀算是性价比很高的选择｡
位置是挺不错的 香港地段贵 房间比较小但可以接受也是提前想象得到的 就是卫生着方便住了两天 第二天床上用品没换没关系 但是一次性牙刷牙膏都没有更换 还好我们自己带了
Good place to stay. Near in mtr stores and shops. Accommodating host whatever you need. Fast wifi. Everyday new bottled water.
I recommend this place. Will stay here again when i came back to hk

name: CHIC & MODERN APT: CLOSE TO SHOPS AND METRO
summary: Modern and spacious, this elegant 463fs apartment, close to shops and 3 minutes walk from the Snowdon metro, for 2 people.
space: Modern and spacious, this elegant 463fs apartment, close to shops and 3 minutes walk from the Snowdon metro, for 2 people. - ACCOMMODATION –  To ensure maximum comfort during your stay you will be offered the following amenities: • A beautiful living room with an elegant leather sofa, a flat screen TV and a small lounge table. • A kitchen opened on the fully equipped lounge with a bar with 2 high chairs for your meals. It is equipped with a microwave, an oven, a hob, a fridge, a kettle, a toaster, a dishwasher and a coffee maker. • An open bedroom with a comfortable double bed • A modern and well maintained bathroom with a bath, a washbasin and a towel rail. The toilets are also in the bathroom. Plus: a washing machine, a dryer, an iron and an ironing board, a hair dryer and spaces of tidying up. Included: quality towels and linens, vanity kits and of course, free high-speed Wi-Fi access! - GUEST ACCESS –  The accommodation is a half basement. You will be given one set of keys on your
