house_rules: IMPORTANT : check in is between 3pm and 9pm, check out is at last at 11am. You will be asked to provide an official ID upon arrival, in the name of the person who did the reservation. If you have booked in the name of a friend or family member, please tell me the soonest possible and inform the person that an official ID will be asked on arrival. I count on you and your friend/family to take care of my apartment as you would do for yours! The cleaning is included but I kindly ask you to take out the trash and wash your dishes. Thank you for your understanding :slightly_smiling_face: I look forward to welcoming you!

host.host_about:
Chers Futurs Guests, 
Je serai heureux d'accueillir les voyageurs du monde entier !
A très vite, 

Dear Future Guests, 
I will be happy to welcome travelers from around the world!
See you soon,

Ian

reviews.comments: Location!! location!! location!! It is super convenient to take public transportation to basically anywhere in Montreal. It is in a quiet neighborhood. Super market is 10 steps from the apartment. There is street parking. Just ask some locals if you have trouble reading the signs. We had requested late Check-In and Ian was able to accommodate our request. The place is a basement apartment and has all basic stuff plus some goodies. Nice and clean.
really enjoyed the stay was clean and good.
très bon appartement, séjour génial, allez-y les yeux fermés !
Great place to stay

Le logement correspond bien à la description et le sous traitant qui le gère est très sympa, mais attention à deux choses : il était très humide quand nous y étions, alors que ce n'était pas le cas dehors, et il ne faut surtout PAS utiliser les laveuse et sécheuse que le propriétaire met gentiment à disposition de ses clients si vous ne voulez pas retrouver vos affaires pleines de trous. Dans mon cas, deux t shirts neufs sont passés à la poubelle, ce qui est vraiment rageant

Ian was very communicative and the place was accurate to the pictures.  It is perfect if you need a place to "crash" sleep in Montréal.  It is close to a Metro station *and* a grocery store.  Neighborhood was quiet (we stayed early September)

Location is great, steps from supermarket, buses, and metro.
My wife and I enjoyed our stay at this property and we had no issues.
Bueses and metro trains take you anywhere in greater Montreal even to Laval.
Great place. Expected nothing less. Cool location. No hassle. I will definitly come again to Ian's place.

Belle apparentement à proximité des restaurants, transports en communs et à 15 minutes du centre ville. La rapidité du wi-fi un peu lente, il n'y avait pas de fer à repasser et la douche ne fonctionnait pas adéquatement
Nice and quiet place. Close to transportation and commodities.
Excellente location. Excellent service
Ian's place was a really great place to stay while we were in MTL. Very close to the downtown core via Snowdon subway station around the corner. Highly recommended

Absolutely perfect location. A a busy corner with shops restaurants grocery stores and the Metro but yet a quiet apartment which was spotlessly clean. Ian was very responsive to my questions and a small problem with the TV was handled very quickly.

This basement apartment is perfect for a couple.  Great location, walking distance to shops, restaurants and the metro.  Very modern and clean.  Check-in was very easy and the girls helpful.  

The TV only has one cable channel, so you probably want to bring Apple TV or something and there are only 2 very thin pillows.

Parking is on the street!

Overall a great please to stay and will use it again :O)  Thank you!
Bed is not that comfy. Shower needs fixing. But other then that I loved it. Ian was so nice, metro just at the corner (late night snacks). Worth the price !

Super appart dans un quartier émouvant de montreal. J'ai beaucoup aimer l'accueil d , ian est tres sympa, il répond rapidement aux messages , j'ai beaucoup aimer la Tranquillité  du lieu  puis la propriété. Je recommande à 100% et j'espère y retourner éventuellement . 
Merci ian :-)

This was a nice place. It looked newly renovated and was very spacious and comfortable. There were amenities close by. We drove and found that there were parking spaces on the street nearby. We didn't make much use of the subway, but there was one close by. Overall the cost was well worth it.
Ian place is nice, clean and close to everything. He is a great host, i would recommend it !!
Belle  place  est situé  proche  du centre ville
Nice clean place close to shops and transportation.

Interior design was beautiful. I love how everything inside the place was arranged. Food, grocery store, and transit was all walking distance. REMEMBER: Place is behind the building in the basement which was difficult for us to find. I highly recommend everyone to consider staying at this beautiful home. Definitely coming back here in the future!

L'appartement est très bien situé.  
Confortable.  Moderne.
Le point fort la proximité de 2 commerces et du métro.  
Astuce éviter de prendre la voiture car même si il y du parking dans la rue adjacent c pas gratuit.  
Point à améliorer l humidité.  On a laissé là ventilation de la sdb tt le long.
Appartement q ns recommandons

Appartement propre avec une grande baignoire et bien équipé. Tres prochede commerces et du métro 
Par contre l acces par une arriere cours peu accueillante,  a notee que l apt est en soussol : peu de lumiere, ce qui nous a pas gener car nous y etions surtout pour dormir, pour la tele il faut avoir le systeme avec le smart phone
Nous avons beaucoup aime cet apt qui correspondait a nos besoins, tres bon rapport qualite/ prix.

Ran out of hot water during shower

Parking was a bit difficult 

Late check in not available

Very uncomfortable/regrettable stay.  This, in fact, is 1/2 of a basement on the 1/2 ground level. While the interior of the spaces matches the photos, what was not shown is the path that you have to walk thru to get to your basement apt entrance. After spending 10-15 min searching for a parking spot every night, you walk into a dark alley (about 10m), with smelly garbage dumped on both side of the alley. At / end of alley, turn left and you walk into 2 cars semi blocking the entrance to the basement units. There are woods and other dumps and garbage in the vicinity. There are spider webs that you will walk right into your face. You will have to squeeze thru 2 vehicles w/o dirtying your clothes before you get to  Ft dr #1. Unlock  dr #1, you walk into an unfinished hallway w/ woods piling in front of dr #2, which open into the basement apt. Imagine if you are dressed in some nice clothes, walking thru the above 3-4 times a day from the apt to yr car.  The place is very uncomfortable for following facts. 1. There is no bedboard, so you cannot sit up & read in bed. 2. The humidity in the unit is extremely high. There is a Dehumidifier put away in a small closet room, but we were not informed until we found it on the 2nd night. When i say extremely high, I meant you cannot even sit in the room w/o sweating. We use the dehumidifier (did not help much), and every 10 hrs or so, we need to empty a tank of water fr the dehumidifier tank before it overflows. 3. The outdoor temp at night after 9 pm during our stays (Aug 29-Sept 4) is < 20c. But the inside temp is at 28c. With the humidity and heat, we did not sleep for > 4 hrs per night. 4. On the 4th night, we found a fan (dusty and semi-working) in the closet room. It did little help after we have to wash off the dust on the fan. 5. We inform Ian that we are very uncomfortable & his reply was to buy a fan valued up to $40 and he will refund.  My message to Ian: Hi Ian. We are three nights into our stay and each night has been very uncomfortable. Even last night at 3am it was 28.5^C. Too warm, humid and hard to breathe. As we aren’t even able to open a window. Outside was under 20C Is there anything you can do to make or stay more tolerable. In addition to the comfortability issues, I also wanted to note a few things that are broken: The dryer handle The coffee machine ---------- Ian reply : Hello, maybe you can buy a fan up to 40$ that I would refund you? I have photos, videos to support my claim. Message me on F/b if anyone want to see.

Ian's place is great. It has everything you could need, including a washing machine and tumble dryer. It's located very conveniently to the nearby station Snowdon that takes you straight to downtown or Old Montreal. There's also a McDonalds nearby if you fancy breakfast! A nice touch was that the TV has a Chromecast for those nights when you feel like watching silly videos on YouTube. This airbnb definitely made my trip worth it.

Enjoyed our weekend in Montreal. Very clean and spacious room. Great communication with owner and helpers. Good and quite location. Metro is 5 min walk which was a key. NO parking but we got lucky with street parking and had no issues. Recommend and will come back to this place
Its a great little apartment, but it was a bit smaller than i thought, otherwise great stay, owner was helpful and communicated well. Would definitely recommend.

Appartement très bien situé à deux pas des commerces, restaurants station de métro et site touristique. 
Parfait pour une nuit ou 2. Appartement en demi sous sol donc un peu humide et sombre
Appartement bien pour quelques jours mais pas sur du long terme car sombre du fait que les fenêtres donnent à hauteur du sol. Literie confortable.
Cozy space tucked away near the Snowdon Metro Station
Appartement très propre et cosy. Les images reflètent parfaitement la réalité! à 2 min de la station métro et proche d'un supermarché, donc c'est très bien situé
Nice apartment and great value.

name: Modern & Quiet 2 bedroom house, patio&views!

space: New modern just renovated small design house :-) !! please note that I only take ONE reservation at a time. So you will NOT share with other travelers! If you are only 2 people, the second room stays empty!!

house_rules: - Quiet hours between 23:00 h and 8:00 h - Close all windows and doors as soon as you leave the house. - Take your time to write some notes at the guest book and let us know how we can improve next time :)

host.host_about:
Hello & hola!
I am Koen, born in the Netherlands and residence of Barcelona since 2008. My wife is Argentinian and we have two lovely daughters born here but with Dutch, Italian and Argentinian passports :-)! As you can imagine I feel a citizen of the world! 

I work in my own center of Physiotherapy, training and coaching with specialization in Running (RunningBarcelona) where is see people from all over and have a great excuse to travel!

When traveling I frequently used Airbnb. Now I finally can be a host myself!!! I am very happy and proud to receive you and give you a great base in our beautiful Barcelona!

Ocean View, 1 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, 3rd floor, end unit with a full kitchen, complimentary WiFi and parking. Steps to sandy beaches. Relax to the sound of the ocean from your private lanai! King bed and queen sofa sleeper. Sleeps 4.
Please Note: 14.

A Kaha Lani vacation rental condominium is a great spot to watch whales breaching from the months of November to April. If peace & quiet is what you're searching for, this is the place. Take a sunrise walk along this beautiful Kauai coastline or go for a late evening swim. Enjoy one of Kauai's favorite "hidden secrets" at the Kaha Lani Resort!  In Hawaiian, "Kaha Lani" means heavenly place. And that's what you'll find at this Kauai condo oceanfront resort. Stroll along miles of uncrowded white sand beach and lush tropical landscapin

host.host_about: Garden Island Properties is a family owned and operated vacation rental and real estate company on Kauai.  We have been in business for over 25 years and continue to service our guests with the Aloha Spirit.  We look forward to hosting you on our beautiful island of Kauai!

reviews.comments: The apartment is in a good location however you need a car to do some shopping. It is calm and has a good view to the sea. The value what you get for your money is in our opinion not totally worth it, however we enjoyed our stay. Check In and facilities were good, though we had some complaint regarding the condition of the flat.

name: Wyndham Kona Hawaiian Resort - Two Bedroom Condo WVR
summary: Relax in style in a Two-Bedroom, two bath condo that overlooks tropical plants and colorful flowers. The master bedroom features a roomy king bed and whirlpool tub while the second bedroom boasts a comfy king or queen bed. A separate living room beckons with a queen sleeper sofa, cable television, and DVD player. There's also an open air lanai and a fully equipped kitchen where home-cooked Hawaiian meals both large and small can be prepared with fresh, local ingredients. This non-smoking accommodation offers 1156 square feet of space and can accommodate up to six guests.

Resort fees, if applicable, are due at check-in. All properties are non-smoking. Pets are not permitted. If you are planning to arrive at a resort after 9:00PM local time, please contact us at least 24 hours prior to your check in date for assistance. Hey there!  We're VacayHome Connect.  We help property managers connect with guests like you, help answer your inquiries, and otherwise facilitate bookings on popular channels like Airbnb.

Our team will treat you like you want to be treated!  We'll provide answers to your questions just as quickly as possible, and if we don't know the answer, we'll get an answer for you from the local manager.   We've got your back and you can call on us at any time!

reviews.comments: Basic amenities covered, convenient location. Great Lanai to eat on and take in the Hawaii vibes.
Excellent
Great place to stay in Kona

name: Orange Room -Bonjardim Guest House, Downtown Porto
summary: Inserted on a recently refurbished guest house in Porto center, Orange Room, on the third floor of the building, it´s a pleasant bright space with private bathroom and a private terrace included.
space: A pleasant bright room for two with a private bathroom included and privace balcony on the third and last floor of the building.
description: Inserted on a recently refurbished guest house in Porto center, Orange Room, on the third floor of the building, it´s a pleasant bright space with private bathroom and a private terrace included. A pleasant bright room for two with a private bathroom included and privace balcony on the third and last floor of the building. Guests have access to the room and it´s private bathroom and balcony, as well as the common spaces, kitchen, terrace and living room. Upon arrival, we will welcome you, check you in, and share tips on what to do or what and where to eat in the city, as well as answer any other questions you may have. During your stay, we are always on hand to assist you whenever and for whatever reason you deem necessary. The house is situated in a quiet street 100m access to the subway station 'Faria Guimarães', intercepted by shopping streets full of restaurants and cafés. It benefits from a privileged location, really close to the Santa Catarina Street area, the most important sho
neighborhood_overview: The house is situated in a quiet street 100m access to the subway station 'Faria Guimarães', intercepted by shopping streets full of restaurants and cafés. It benefits from a privileged location, really close to the Santa Catarina Street area, the most important shopping street of the city. There are numerous clothing stores, with many of the international companies present, healthily coexisting with old bookstores, exquisite cafes like Café Majestic, as well as appealing pastry shops. Adjacent to this area, it`s the the old town, classified as world heritage site and Ribeira areas, full of old historical buildings like the Porto Cathedral and amazing views to the Douro river and its bridges, of which stands the D. Luis I bridge. Also, a short walk away from the Avenida dos Aliados, Clerigos Tower, probably the most iconic building of the city, and Lello Bookshop, also known as Harry Potter`s Library, classified as the most beautiful library in the world. Finally the vibrant nightlife
transit: The house is located at 1 minute walking from Faria Guimarães Metro Station, which provides connection to Porto Airport in 40 minutes.  Its central location means that it has numerous stops nearby, where you can take buses to all areas of Porto and Matosinhos, especially those that go to areas not covered by the metro network and definitely worth a visit, such as Foz.
access: Guests have access to the room and it´s private bathroom and balcony, as well as the common spaces, kitchen, terrace and living room.
interaction: Upon arrival, we will welcome you, check you in, and share tips on what to do or what and where to eat in the city, as well as answer any other questions you may have. During your stay, we are always on hand to assist you whenever and for whatever reason you deem necessary.
house_rules: Treat the place as if it were your own. Leave all electric appliances turned off (including heating), make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before checking-out. Keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably as possible during all the time of your occupancy. The kitchen is common to all the residents of the Guest House. Please respect the kitchen rules. Take care of the decoration items and furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment, don`t hesitate to call. Keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Thank you in advance. Neighbours appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guests. Please leave the keys inside the room and lock the door from the inside before checking out. In case of damage or loss of the keys, a fine of €50 will be applied. Relax and have fun!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
La habitación es igual que las fotos, es espaciosa, comoda y muy limpia. 
Esta cerca del centro andando como unos 15 minutos  y de la estación principal de Trindade. En transporte esta muy bien comunicado ya que se encuentra cerca de una estación de metro ( Faria de Guimares) que en unos 4 minutos estas en el centro.  Es una zona tranquila, ideal para descansar. Los dueños son muy atentos y estan disponibles para todo lo que necesitamos. Increible.

Amazing room, really clean and comfortable :) we even had our own balcony and bathroom!! 
Only issue with the shower that did not work well but everything else was super! 
Obrigada:)
Cuisine et terras très agréable avec une vue charmant sur des petit jardinier. La chambre orange est propre et est accompagnée par un terras privée.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Porto dans la chambre orange. L'appartement est bien situé, très près des transports et calme. Pedro à été arrangeant pour les horaires et facilement joignable. Les parties communes étaient très bien entretenues et fonctionnelles. Nous avons juste eu des difficultés à faire marcher la douche mais sinon le séjour était très bien!
Eine wirklich sehr gemütliche und gut gelegene Unterkunft :-)

This place is really nice. Cozy, clean, close to metro stations and the center area is 20 mins walking. Manuel/Pedro and his team are quickly responding. The only drawback is that at the time I was there, wi-fi wasn't intense enough to connect from the room, you had to go downstairs to get signal. (For me it wasn't annoying as I try to avoid internet when travelling.)
Personally, I loved the fact that neighbours have roosters that wake you up at like 7 to 7:30 am, it made me feel like in the countryside. In any case, this wasn't disturbing at all.

Ampia disponibilità dell'host e tempo di risposta quasi immediato. Il locale è centrale, situato in una zona tranquilla che dista pochi minuti di canmino dalla fermata della metro (Trinidade). Al centro si può arrivare tranquillamente camminando. La camera è pulita e fornita di tutto l'occorrente ( asciugamani, attaccapanni, phon, scarpiera, cassettiera per i vestiti..). Lo staff è molto ospitale e gentile.

Manuel and his team offered an amazing service when they let us check in early, were perfectly in time for the check-in, gave us lots of information of where to go in Porto and even let me get back in to our room after check-out (on a Sunday!!) when I realized, I forgot something in the room. Thank you for that!! Apart from that, the location is perfect as you can walk to all the sights, central bars an restaurants. The rooms are small but modern, clean and bright. The Orange Room has a cozy private balcony with two chairs, an unspecatcular but authentic view on backyard gardens and some chicken. For breakfast go to Sao Jorge (Rua Dr. Alfredo Magalhães 78), which is right around the corner or to Casa do Evaristo (Rua de Fernandes Tomás 535), which is a litte futher away but on the way to the city center.
Great accomodation, and the host was easy to contact and helpful :)

Très bon séjour dans ce logement très propre ! La terrasse est le petit plus très agréable ! Le lit simple dans la chambre orange grince dès qu'on bouge. Le lit en hauteur est assez dangereux, il ne convient pas à de jeunes enfants. Sinon bon rapport qualité/ prix et bien situé, à 15min du centre de Porto !
The house is clean and near a metro station. Unfortunately wifi doesn’t work inside the room but only in the common space. You have to use a steep staircase to go to the bed: you are warned!!

Hay hormigas en la cocina (cajones, encimera.,,)  y mesa del comedor. Esto pasó los 4 dias que hemos estado. Muy desagradable. 

Han tardado 45minutos en entregarnos las llaves del apartamento. Hemos tenido que estar en la calle esperando. 

Faltan muchos utinsilios para cocinar, es muy justo. La gente no lava sus platos, sartenes,.. y hemos tenido que limipiar las cosas de los demas para poder cocinar. Los armarios estan rotos. 

Hay que ventilar las habitaciones porque huelen a humedad y a cerrado.

No hay luz en la ducha si quieres ducharte por la noche. 

Escalera dificil de subir a la cama.

Habria que actualizar las fotos con el estado actual del apartamento. Está mucho mas deteriorado de lo que se ve en las fotos.

l’appartement situé à 15 minutes à pieds du centre ville et à 1 minute du métro a été parfait pour nous ! avec une chambre privée (lit simple) et un lit double en mezzanine très confortable. 
malgré notre retard à l’arrivée, l’hôte a été joignable, disponible et très arrangeant ! 
les salles communes, salon et cuisine, rien à redire, très bon séjour

엘레베이터 없다는 것을 각오하고 왔지만 힘들긴 했어요. 그런데 처음 체크인할 때 직접 캐리어를 꼭대기까지 올려줘서 감동이었습니다. 주방에는 개미가 많다는 후기가 있는데 정말 그래요,,, 그런데 큰 불편없이 주방 매일 잘 썼습니다. 테라스 뷰가 좋진 않지만 테라스가 있어 공기도 상쾌하고 트인 기분이라 좋아요. 세탁기 관련해서 매일 문의를 했는데 응답도 빠르고 친절해서 감동이었어요! 강과 거리가 걸어서 30분 이상인데 계속 오르막길이라 접근성은 솔직히 떨어져요. 감안해서 조용한 동네, 저렴한 가격 원하시면 초이스하세요. 깔끔합니다 숙소는!

name: NUMBERS two bedroom apartment in the plateau
summary: bright two bedroom ground floor apartment in the heart of the plateau mont royal.  classic plateau apartment with original mouldings, clawfoot tub and exposed brick wall. nestled on a quiet residential street just off of avenue mont royal and between st. denis and st. laurent streets, you're right next to the best restaurants, shopping and nightlife. great for business travellers and small families alike.
space: fully equipped kitchen, great for cooking & eating in, brand new appliances, stainless steel stove and stove, dishwasher, microwave and full sized front loading washer and dryer.
description: bright two bedroom ground floor apartment in the heart of the plateau mont royal.  classic plateau apartment with original mouldings, clawfoot tub and exposed brick wall. nestled on a quiet residential street just off of avenue mont royal and between st. denis and st. laurent streets, you're right next to the best restaurants, shopping and nightlife. great for business travellers and small families alike. fully equipped kitchen, great for cooking & eating in, brand new appliances, stainless steel stove and stove, dishwasher, microwave and full sized front loading washer and dryer. private apartment with two bedrooms, master bedroom has a queen sized bed with pillow top mattress and the attached second bedroom has a single daybed with a second single bed that slides out from underneath.  full kitchen and inner courtyard outdoor space. the apartment is set up for self-check in,  after you make your booking, detailed instructions will be sent to you about how to access the apartment.  if
neighborhood_overview: best neighbourhood to stay in if you want to get the real feel of montreal.  you’ll be located in the very best part of the plateau mont royal right off of avenue mont royal. everything you need is within walking distance, you’ll have the best restaurants, bars, cafes, shops and groceries right at your doorstep. parc lafontaine, parc mont-royal and laurier parc are within close walking distance as well!  not to mention some of our favourite restaurants romados (portuguese grilled chicken, get the 1/4 chicken with salad and fries with spicy sauce & take it to go and picnic in the park!), cafe neve for the best 3rd wave coffee, and green panther for a great healthy vegan meal.
notes: no parties, no excessive noise, please be courteous to the neighbours, they're really nice.
transit: 97 mont-royal bus just up the street, metro mont-royal is 650m/8 minute walk, bixi bike sharing stand nearby as well as many bike paths. 30 drive from the airport (in ideal conditions if there's no traffic), about a $30-40 uber/cab ride  take the 747 airport shuttle all the way to st-laurent and marie anne & you're a 3 minute walk from the apartment, $10 and just over an hour. the plateau is the most densely populated area in montreal, so please be aware that is tricky to find parking if you do decide to bring a car.  there are about 2-3 non permit spots available on the street, as well as a few non-permit parking spots on neighbouring streets as well, just check the signs, twice.
access: private apartment with two bedrooms, master bedroom has a queen sized bed with pillow top mattress and the attached second bedroom has a single daybed with a second single bed that slides out from underneath.  full kitchen and inner courtyard outdoor space.
interaction: the apartment is set up for self-check in,  after you make your booking, detailed instructions will be sent to you about how to access the apartment.  if you have any questions or concerns during your stay, please do not hesitate to ask, we live nearby!
house_rules: - no noise after 11pm please - no shoes in the house

host.host_about:
I love to travel but when I can't, I like bring the journey home instead!  I am a very open person and I am here to help you during your stay in Montreal.  
Sincere greetings, 
Martin

reviews.comments: We had a great time!
Great little spot in a awesome location. Definitely would stay here again.

L'appartement est parfait ! Idéalement situé, correspond exactement à la description d'AirBnB !!!
On s'y est beaucoup plus, on reviendra sans doute ...

It’s a beautiful place in a great location. Since I opened the door it felt like home. When I got there I had a problem with connecting with Wi-Fi and Martin came right away (on Saturday night) to help me resolve it.
The apartment is very clean and confortable. They take care of all the details. I feel like I have a home in Montreal.
Great place to stay! Highly recommend booking with Martin!

L'emplacement est génial. L'appartement est magnifique et très accueillant. Il correspond parfaitement à la description. Idéal pour une escapade à la découverte de Montréal. Martin et Eric sont ultra disponible si besoin. Rien à dire si ce n'est merci.

We had a great stay! The apartment is very spacious, clean, and has cool decor. It's in a great location, close to restaurants, Mont Royal park, and other points of interest! We would absolutely stay here again!
Logement très agréable et proche du métro. Martin s'est montré très disponible sachant que nous avons réservé à la dernière minute. Je recommande
Awesome location !
Logement situé sur le plateau de Montréal, très fonctionnel et décoré avec bcp  à de goût. Tout peut être fait à pied ou en bus.
Super logement, très fonctionnel, magnifiquement décorée qt très bien placé! Je recommande!

Great location, near tons of restaurants, cafes, bakeries. We walked everywhere.  The apartment was perfect and had everything we needed. It is on a quiet side street, so no street noise. Loved the whimsical decor. Check-in was super easy and Martin and Eric are communicative but totally unobtrusive. We got lucky and found parking right on the street. Loved it!

My daughter and I had just 36 hours in Montreal and were very pleased to be so centrally located in this fun, well decorated apartment. 
We loved the proximity to so many great nearby restaurants.  Also we were very close to Fitz and Follwell, the bike shop where we took a fantastic bike tour of several nearby parks and neighborhoods. 
We also utilized the subway system to go downtown. The metro station is just a few blocks away and very easy, affordable and efficient to use.  
We loved eating the delish (St Viateur) famous bagels, the (Romados)Portuguese chicken, the (Swartz's) smoked meats, the (Pizzadelic) pizza and crepes. All within walking distance. 
I highly recommend this as a great way to experience Montreal.

Très bonne 1ère expérience rbnb! J'ai énormément apprécié d'arriver dans l'appartement avec une petite lumière allumée. Cela m'a donné une impression de bien être, de cocooning et je me suis sentie comme chez moi... nous avons merveilleuse bien dormi. La localisation est idéale : calme et pourtant proche de tout. Merci beaucoup
We have had a nice stay in the Numbers. The location was super. The communication was fine and the appartement was nice and clean. I can recommend this place.

Pleasant and convenient apartment. The two bedrooms are actually adjoining with a French door/slider so it's not ideal for those wanting two totally private bedrooms. Well equipped and comfortable apartment. Close to Metro, shopping and restaurants. Host was accommodating and helpful.
Paikka oli erittäin hyvien liikenneyhteyksien päässä. Sisustus oli persoonallinen, upea. Olimme erittäin tyytyväisiä ja voimme suositella asuntoa. Kiitos =)
It was perfect.

Excellent stylish place in the neighborhood we needed to be near to family. Responsive host! He even helped us extend our check out time when our flight time changed. Near to many shops and restaurants. Would stay again!

I honestly had a great stay at Martin's place. He was quick to respond to any of my questions and provided great detail about how to check-in. The apartment was very trendy. I would recommend this place.

Great location, walkable to lots of bars and restaurants. We loved Colonel Moutarde and Le Quartier General (BYO). Also an easy walk to Mont Royal. We didn't use public transit because it was so cold, but could easily walk to a stop. Felt very safe at all hours, and enjoyed hanging out in the cozy living room - should have played some board games!

Great spot to stay in the plateau. Short walk to metro Mont Royal, few minutes to get to Schwartz's, Moishes, Bagel Etc., La Banquis, and Parc Mont Royal. Love home, super cozy and well equipped. Can't wait to stay there again.
Idéalement situé et tres bien décoré ! Agréable, propre, confortable ! Nous avons passé un super séjour.
This is a terrific apartment in a great location. We would definitely stay here again.
Central ... simple access.... easy communication... proximity to many of the city's best resto's... and a deft design touch.  Well worth it if you are visiting Montreal.

Not only was this place gorgeous inside, it was clean, filled with anything and everything i would need during my stay, and it was in a great location in town. walk out the door to the right then left at Mont Royale (yes?) and there’s a market, restaurants, shopping, you name it. i definitely am going to stay here again when i come back!!

Martin and Eric were great hosts and their apartment was in a great location, close to metro and countless bars and restaurants. It had everything we needed for our week stay and Eric and Martin were very quick to attend to a small problem with the heating( a faulty heating control). We would love to stay again.

l'appartement de Martin est exceptionnel, la décoration est soignée et de bon goût. Absolument charmant.
bien placé.
Martin nous a gentiment permis de laisser nos bagages au delà de l'heure de checking out, notre avion étant tard le soir.
je recommande vivement cette adresse

Our family of 4 really enjoyed our stay. It is a great location and a very comfortable space with nice touches. It would be better if the shower could be updated since it is basically a bathtub surrounded by a shower curtain. I really appreciated the few beers in the fridge!
Lovely place, and great location! Would recommend it. Such a neat neighbourhood to stay in. Thanks again!

Martin's apartment was great! Amazing location in the heart of Le Plateau, walking distance from trendy bars, restaurants, shops, cafés, and super market. We even walked to Old Montreal which took us about 35 minutes. The apartment itself was bigger than it looks in the pictures, very well decorated and clean. We got lucky and were able to snag one of the free parking spaces on the street, which was a bonus. Overall, one of my favourite Airbnb experiences in Montreal. Highly recommend!

This place was awesome! Right next to Avenue du Mont-Royal which has a bunch of places to eat, buses, train to get just about anywhere. Bicycle shop is two blocks away and we biked to Vieux Montréal. Apartment was clean, looks just as depicted, definitely a cool, hip space. Great location as well to get to everythinggg you need. Thank you both!! À la prochaine!
Appartement très agréable , bien équipé et très propre. Communication facile avec Eric. Nous recommandons cet appartement.
周边很多餐厅和酒吧,非常便利,能感受到平原区的日常生活｡房东人也很好,非常热情,总之强烈推荐｡

Martin's place was an awesome place to stay while visiting Montreal! The plateau is a beautiful area. There are an abundance of restaurants, bars, and cafes within a ten minute walk. Getting to the mountain is only 10-15 minutes as well. The bike share system in Montreal worked great to head down to the river. The apartment itself is spacious and worked wonderfully. The bed was ridiculously comfy. There is a full kitchen and a nice living room area to hang out. Martin was quick to respond to our messages as well. Overall it was a great experience.
Martin's place was beautiful and exactly as described. The location was awesome and it was easy to get to the metro to get to other parts of the city as well. I would definitely stay here again.
This is a great Airbnb just a half a block away from Mont Royal. There are many restaurants nearby and the Metro is very close as well.

Bel appartement très bien situé, idéal pour vivre "la vie du Plateau".
Pierrot Claire
I've had the pleasure to be hosted by Martin. The place is amazing and has such a great character. The location is very convenient and Martin has been very responsive every time I had a question.

This was the perfect place to stay on our trip to Montreal. There's so much food & sites in walking distance! The place itself was clean, trendy & just as pictured. We felt totally safe & would definitely stay again.

L'appartement, situé au coeur du plateau, est tout à fait  formidable, soigneusement décoré, parfaitement équipé, il est un point de chute idéal pour un séjour montréalais. Martin a été réactif et disponible, rendant notre voyage facile,  je recommande chaudement !

This is a cute, clean, quirkily appointed apartment on the first floor in a GREAT neighborhood.  Lots of ceiling fans keep the heat down and nights comfortable for sleeping.  Shared courtyard with very friendly neighbors.  Fabulous having a washer and dryer right in the unit.  Walk to everything.

We like this nice apartment, it is stylish and well equiped with daily needs. Location is wonderful,  there are many restaurants/coffee/bar  and small shops around, and it is close to the subway. We enjoyed very much the staying. Definately we'll recommend it.

The apartment is in a great location, a quiet neighborhood, and within walking distance of lots of stores and the metro.  The main bedroom is very comfortable. The second has a single bed with a trundle bed underneath which is best suited for the kids. The keyless entry is a nice touch. No losing a key!There is no parking on sight (you definitely can drop your stuff off without a problem) and guests may want to take advantage of the permitted spaces Martin has available. We parked in a parking garage and paid twice as much, but it was very convenient.  All in all, a great place to stay in Montreal!

Martin's place was perfect for our family of four. The space was clean, comfortable, and just as pictured!  The proximity to Mount Royal was incredible!  We were able to walk from Martin's place to the mountain. The location is perfect!  There are several shops and restaurants less than a block from the apartment. We would definitely stay here again!
Great place; stylish and clean and in a great neighbourhood.

My family and I loved staying at this flat in the heart of a thriving neighborhood. There was so many things to do we wished we had stayed longer. We ended up booking two stacked units from Martin which was perfect for our situation. The decor was fun and inviting and felt like home to us. We loved the antique touches and plants scattered throughout.  Checking in and communication was super fast and the apartment had all the necessities for a cozy stay.  Thanks!
The neighborhood where the house is located is really great and accessible to great coffeeshop, restaurants, and parks.  The host is really caring. Highly recommended!
The apartment is great--clean and cozy.  The neighborhood is lively and fun.
Great location in the plateau. Close walk to many bars and restaurants in great trendy neighborhood. Cute place, clean.
Overall good stay at Martins place. Would recommend.
Great place near the action in Montreal.  Host is terrific and very helpful. The place was very clean, great amenities, and stylish. Would def go back!
Very nice place close to lots of dining and entertainment

We had a great time staying here. We had everything we needed and didn’t have any problems trying to find things or figuring out how things work. The place is also in a great location, 5 minute walk away from lots of restaurants and nice stores. The check in was also super easy. And if we had any questions, our hosts were super quick to reply. 
Definitely would recommend staying here!

Nous avions choisi le Quartier du Mont Royal pour sa proximité avec le parc et l'appartement d'un de nos amis. Nous savions donc à quoi nous attendre. Climatisation très appréciée car il a fait très chaud les 2 jours ou nous y étions. Parking à 12$ la journée vraiment pas très loin (car impossible de stationner dans les rues)
Vous pouvez louer sans hésiter ce bel appartement, très bien aménagé et situé
A great comfortable place in an amazing central location in the plateu - would stay again!

Emplacement idéal pour découvrir Montréal! Logement typique montréalais. 
Seul bémol : logement peu adapté pour une famille avec des enfants en bas ages notamment la salle de bain.
Nice place, great location. Parking is a bit hard to find.
Wahouuuu juste parfait ! Le rapport qualité prix est incroyable ! Super emplacement calme mais central, deco parfaite et équipement complet !
Very nice apt! as described. Great location. had a great time there
Séjour agréable chez Martin. Appartement très bien placé

This was a great apartment for our long weekend in Montreal. The hosts were very communicative and answered all of our questions. They were also very kind in letting us arrange to store our bags before and after check-in and check-out. 

The apartment is as stylish as it appears, and very convenient to the Plateau neighborhood. We walked all around the neighborhoods from Old Montreal to Little Italy, and when it was too far to walk, subways and buses were right there. 

The only slight negative would be that, since it is a street-level apartment with the bedrooms facing the street, the noise at night may get a little loud if people are hanging out on the street.
Enjoyed my stay very much, super stylish and comfortable space. Loved the neighbourhood. Would recommend!
Super séjour dans un appartement très confortable, Merci.

Absolutely amazing place-- super close to restaurants, shopping, food markets, etc (I walked everywhere, never got an uber.) The place is really well kept, very tidy and great interior design. I would 5/5 recommend!
Super Lage, sehr schöne Unterkunft

Martin's place is very comfortable and well furnished. It's in a great area of Montreal, close to a lot of restaurants, cafes and the like. It's also within walking distance to the Metro station as well, so getting to other areas of the city are quick. The only down side to the apartment is that it can be noisy at times .  
The building is old and has wooden floors, and the apartment directly above seems to be another rental. We were woken up the first morning by a group of people stomping around at 6AM and then dragging their bags down the iron staircase directly outside the bedroom window, then last night woken up well after midnight by another group arriving.
Overall, the apartment was great, but could be annoying depending on the other tenants.
we enjoyed the location and clean apartment. perfect for a young family.

Appartement très bien placé dans un quartier calme et agréable. Commerces et transports à proximité.
Seule critique : la douche un peu vétuste..
Sinon appartement très propre, je recommande.
Très bel appartement, très bien équipé à la déco super chouette! Emplacement idéal sur le plateau. Grande réactivité des hôtes par mail. Séjour parfait!
Great location & communication.

Martin’s Place was centrally located in a very cute area in Montréal. The parking situation was a little rough but luckily we made due without having to pay for a lot. Overall the apartment was extremely cute and we had a great time staying there! Would recommend
We had a great time staying here.The place has great location, close to Metro statoin. We would definitely stay here again.

Beautiful and stylish apartment in a very cool neighborhood. 
Stay here, you'll love it!!
Appartement très bien situé, extrêmement propre, bon goût, mais salle de bain au confort limité (douche sans baignoire pas très aisée), porte communicante entre 2 chambres pas suffisamment isolante

Martin’s place is very stylish and it feels like a true Montreal apartment. It’s a good size for 3-4 guests, with a large kitchen and a good sized TV room. It was in walking distance to some good shopping, cafes and restaurants. The bed was also very comfortable.
Great location for a great price!

Nice apartment in a great neighbourhood in Montreal. The space was clean and tidy, the beds were comfortable and we appreciated the extra blankets. The entry system was simple and easy to use. We travelled with a two year old, so we appreciated the trundle bed so he could be close to the ground.
Martin is great! The apartment is in an amazing location, stylish and has everything you will need to have a great experience in Montreal!
Appartement très agréable, bien décoré et au centre de Montréal ! Parfait pour visiter et se balader à pied ! Le métro n'est pas loin ( moins de 10 min ) Super appart !
Great spot in a great location

Martin was extremely accommodating. This was my first trip to Montreal and I definitely would love to come back. The location was great and close to public transportation and Mike end. The apartment was very clean and spacious. I highly recommend staying here!
Great and clean place!

Amazing location, literal steps from nice cafes and shops. It's a little bit hectic to find parking but there is some free parking on the street. The apartment is lovely, overall a great place to stay for 3 or 4 people!
Appartement très chaleureux avec une déco typique dans un quartier agréable de Montréal

What a top spot!  If you're keen to have fun in Montreal with fantastic food and entertainment options this might be the place for you.  Wiht a penchant for mid century pieces and quirky styling, this is a vintage lover's treasure trove.  Gracious hosts, organised check-in and out, and excellent communication at all times.

name: Awesome Privat Room+Privat bathroom in Bushwick
summary: Beautiful, sunny room in a brand new renovated apartment, with skylights throughout, modern kitchen, hardwood floors and private roofdeck. Easy on-street parking, or get into the city on no time on the L or J trains on Halsey Stop!
description: Beautiful, sunny room in a brand new renovated apartment, with skylights throughout, modern kitchen, hardwood floors and private roofdeck. Easy on-street parking, or get into the city on no time on the L or J trains on Halsey Stop!

host.host_about: NYC based multimedia Artist!

name: Linda Vista na Reserva, Barra da Tijuca
summary: Apartamento 100% privado e de uso exclusivo dos hóspedes, super arejado e completo, incluindo TV a cabo na sala, internet e ares condicionados nos quartos. Situado no 11º andar, está em excelente localização, no meio da reserva da Barra. A 4 mins de caminhada até a balsa gratuita que leva à praia da reserva (o trajeto total a pé leva cerca de 10 min, incluindo o percurso a pé + percurso de balsa). De fácil acesso, fica em frente a estação do BRT Pontões/Barra Sul. Conta com uma vaga na garagem.
space: Apartamento com sala integrada à cozinha, com TV e sofá cama básico. Possui dois quartos sendo um com ótima cama de casal e outro com duas camas de solteiro (bi-cama). Internet com boa velocidade e WiFi em todo o apartamento. Localizado no 11º andar.
description: Apartamento 100% privado e de uso exclusivo dos hóspedes, super arejado e completo, incluindo TV a cabo na sala, internet e ares condicionados nos quartos. Situado no 11º andar, está em excelente localização, no meio da reserva da Barra. A 4 mins de caminhada até a balsa gratuita que leva à praia da reserva (o trajeto total a pé leva cerca de 10 min, incluindo o percurso a pé + percurso de balsa). De fácil acesso, fica em frente a estação do BRT Pontões/Barra Sul. Conta com uma vaga na garagem. Apartamento com sala integrada à cozinha, com TV e sofá cama básico. Possui dois quartos sendo um com ótima cama de casal e outro com duas camas de solteiro (bi-cama). Internet com boa velocidade e WiFi em todo o apartamento. Localizado no 11º andar. O apartamento inteiro estará disponível aos hóspedes, bem como a piscina e academia do prédio. Moramos em São Paulo, mas podemos auxiliá-los com qualquer dúvida referente ao apartamento ou Rio de Janeiro quando possível. Bairro calmo, silencioso, re
neighborhood_overview: Bairro calmo, silencioso, residencial e seguro, longe de favelas. Bem na entrada do condomínio existe cabeleireiro, lanchonetes, mercado e posto de gasolina, além disso tem padaria e mercado dentro do condomínio, bem próximo ao prédio, dá para fazer tudo a pé tranquilamente. Fica a 10 minutos de carro do Riocentro
notes: A cozinha está equipada com fogão e forno a gás, microondas, geladeira e utensílios diversos como liquidificador, cafeteira e etc.
transit: O apartamento fica a 10 minutos de distância a pé da praia, esse tempo inclui um belo passeio gratuito de balsa (travessia da Lagoa do Marapendi). Chegando na praia e andando um pouco mais, existem diversos quiosques de qualidade, como o famoso "Cavalo Marinho". Possui estação de transporte público bem na frente (BRT), então é muito fácil se locomover a qualquer lugar do Rio de Janeiro. Conta com uma vaga na garagem e rua tranquila e segura em frente para parar outros carros se necessário.
access: O apartamento inteiro estará disponível aos hóspedes, bem como a piscina e academia do prédio.
interaction: Moramos em São Paulo, mas podemos auxiliá-los com qualquer dúvida referente ao apartamento ou Rio de Janeiro quando possível.
house_rules: - Todo hóspede/acompanhantes devem fornecer cópia digital de CPF/RG ou CNH antes da hospedagem. - É proibida a entrada ou permanência de convidados no apartamento - Deve-se fazer silêncio na entrada e saída do condomínio, independente do horário - Deve-se fazer silêncio absoluto após as 22 horas dentro do apartamento - Deve-se parar o carro dentro dos limites da vaga - Ao sair sempre deve-se apagar todas as luzes e desligar todos os ventiladores, televisores e ares condicionados  - Não se deve ter comportamento anti-social nas dependências do condomínio - Ao sair, o apartamento deve ser deixado em ordem: louça lavada, lixo no lixo, etc. - É proibido fumar no apartamento ou dependências do condomínio - Qualquer prejuízo causado ao imóvel por mau uso ou multa recebida do condomínio por não cumprimento das regras citadas acima serão repassadas ao hóspede

host.host_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil

address.street: Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: O apto é bem confortável e tem tudo que precisamos no dia a dia.  Muito organizado, equipado e limpo. Chuveiro excelente, espaçoso, cozinha bem equipada. O bairro é ótimo, vizinhança tranquila (estávamos em 2 carros e um ficou na rua, sem perigo algum), silencioso e com fácil acesso, muito comércio mas residencial. Cassio foi atencioso e apesar de não tê-lo conhecido pessoalmente sempre se preocupou em saber se tudo estava bem.
Apartamento com ótima localização e limpeza excelente.

Gostei muito do apartamento RJ, como fui para ir para um congresso não consegui, usufruir de tudo que tinha direito mas logo logo voltarei para passear com a familia, a vista do apartamento é incrivel.

Reservei o apto para minha cunhada com marido e duas filhas pequenas, ela escreveu o seguinte sobre a estada:

"Ficamos muito satisfeitos com nossa hospedagem no apartamento! Bem organizado, chuveiro maravilhoso, muito bem localizado com tudo que precisávamos ali por perto (mercadinho, padaria, salão) e seguro!
O passeio na reserva foi ótimo e as crianças adoraram tudo!
Sugestão de deixar alguns folhetos de opcões de delivery no apartamento para pessoas que não tem o hábito de usar o ifood.
Obrigada pelo ótimo atentimento! Esperamos poder repetir a experiência em breve! 
Marcus, Josi e família."

O casal Cássio e Etiene foram simpáticos e solícitos desde o primeiro momento que eu os contatei, sempre esclarecendo todas as dúvidas da forma mais clara possível. O apartamento é exatamente igual ao que as fotos mostram, em um lugar bem tranquilo e próximo a mercados, farmácias e em frente a Estação do BRT, que para mim foi super útil pois ficou bem mais fácil para ir para o Rock in Rio...a praia que tem acesso pelo condomínio é super gostosa...super indico o ap e obrigada casal pela estadia prestada!

Excelente localização na Barra da Tijuca. O apartamento tem uma vista linda da praia da Reserva com a possibilidade de chegar a praia de balsa. A balsa é um serviço gratuito do condomínio alem de ser um passeio belíssimo e agradável. 
Apartamento arejado e completo.
Excelente!!
Muito boa nossa estadia. O Cássio e a Etiene são muito solícitos. Adorei a praia próxima do apto. É um caminho realizado de balsa super próximo. Em breve voltarei!
Apartamento conforme anunciado, resposta rápida pelos anfitriões, lugar seguro e ótimo custo benefício.

O Lugar é compatível com as fotos e a vista para a praia da reserva é linda. A facilidade de ter a balsa de transporte para a praia é fantástica. Ideal para quem procurar um período tranquilo no Rio de Janeiro.

Apartamento completo e ótimo, me senti em casa. Acomoda 6 pessoas com conforto. Visão da praia da reserva em todos os cômodos do apartamento. Os anfitriões respondem rápido as mensagens e sempre estão prontos para ajudar. Condomínio com funcionários e moradores bem receptivos. Voltarei mais vezes e indico para todos.
Espaço ótimo, atendimento ótimo, localidade ótima, o apto não deixou a desejar em nada.
Apto super confortável e tranquilo. Recepção mto Boa, principalmente dos porteiros. Acolhe bem pq o apto eh completo!
Tudo excelente, com certeza voltarei!
Indico e a localização é ótima. Anfitrião responde rápido,o apartamento é bem aconchegante e ótimo para famílias

El lugar es muy muy cómodo, está completamente limpio y organizado, es tal cual como aparece en las fotos pero se siente mucho mejor, la vista desde el apartamento es increíble, hay un pequeño mall en la entrada del condominio con todo lo que se requiere, 5 mins caminando y aún así tienen servicio a domicilio. Queda muy cerca de shoppings, de la playa, la reserva es hermosa y el condominio es impecable, las personas son muy amables y te sientes completamente seguro allí.
Sin lugar a dudas, volvería cada vez que pudiese a este lugar y los tiempos de respuesta son muy cortos, son muy amables con todo y me ayudaron muchísimo. No tengo ni una sola queja del lugar, mi estadía fue maravillosa
Muchas gracias!

Tudo foi perfeito, amamos nossa estadia, a Etiane nos ajudou prontamente em tudo que foi necessário,  a localização é em local bem tranquilo e familiar, tudo conforme anunciado, com certeza voltaremos a nós hospedar.

Everything was perfect, we loved our accommodation, Etiane helped us in everything we needed, the place is clean, calm, perfect for families. The place it's according to the photos and descriptions, we will definitely come back.

O apartamento é muito bem cuidado e limpo, fica localizado dentro de um condomínio com todas as amenidades a poucos minutos de caminhada. A comunicação com Etiane foi sempre clara e amistosa.

O espaço é perfeito, seja para viagens em família, seja para um compromisso de negócios.
O apartamento é lindo, tem uma vista incrível os anfitriões sempre atenciosos. A vista é incrível e os quartos são super confortáveis. Foi maravilhoso!
Sensacional!! Foi tudo melhor do que esperávamos! Cássio e Etiane sempre dando dicas e resolvendo qualquer problema em questão de minutos! Só tenho a agradecer!
Foi muito bom ficar no apartamento de Cassio! A vista é excelente e confortavelmente acomoda 6 pessoas. Vale a pena! Indicarei para amigos e voltaria a me hospedar lá.
Atendimento ótimo, local muito bom, tranquilo e seguro. apartamento limpo e organizado.

Nossa estadia no apartamento do Cassio e da Etiane foi maravilhosa. O apto é muito bom, equipado com tudo que você  precisa, perto da praia, do comércio, de restaurantes, muito bem localizado entre a Barra, o Recreio, e as principais vias da cidade, além de ter uma vista maravilhosa da lagoa e da praia. A comunicação com a Etaine sempre foi ótima. Super solícita e com informações simples, rápidas e claras sobre o apartamento, nos deu muita mais segurança na (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos ao apartamento deles e recomendamos a todos que queiram se hospedar na Barra.
O apto é exatamente o que está descrito no perfil, é ótimo e barato, vista linda, tudo limpinho. Essa foi minha primeira de muitas experiências no Airbnb, muito grata por tudo!
Muito bom o Local, maravilhoso, super reservado e super recomendo.
agradeço a hospitalidade, e parabens pelo local, o apartamento está localizado dentro de um conjunto de condominios dando total segurança para sentar no jardim e apreciar o por do sol.
Excelente lugar :) muito atenciosos.
O espaço é bem localizado, com facilidade de acesso a praia da reserva, shoppings, restaurantes e meios de transporte.

superó mis expectativas, la zona es muy segura, tranquila. Cuenta con todos los servicios, hasta Netflix que no lo esperábamos . Etiane realmente es muy detallista y siempre estuvo dispuesta a ayudarnos. Muito obrigado Etiane!

Bom apto, boa localização, excelente condomínio com mercadinho, salão de beleza e restaurantes próximos. muito legal a opção do passeio de balsa gratuito saindo do condomínio. o único ponto de atenção é que o ap possui 2 banheiros, mas apenas um possui chuveiro.
Ótimo custo benefício, apartamento atendeu nossas necessidades. Obrigado pela hospitalidade.

Boas surpresas desde a entrada no apartamento. moderno sistema de trancas que dispensa as chaves, cozinha equipada com todos eletrodomésticos necessários, ar condicionado na sala e quartos, a máquina lava e seca foi super útil. Apesar de ter apenas um chuveiro, esse fato não atrapalha a comodidade do conjunto. TV a cabo e Netflix liberados
Lazer garantido na piscina ou na praia, que tem seu acesso pelas balsas,. que é mais um atrativo. 
O condomínio oferece toda estrutura para estadias longas. local tranquilo, bem arborizado.

Gostei muito da atenção recebida antes e durante a hospedagem. Achei a localização excelente, os funcionários do condomínio atenciosos e prestativos. Tivemos uma grata surpresa em conseguir fazer um lanche no “Espeto” , que fica bem próximo, no pontal, e fomos e voltamos para lá a pé na noite em que chegamos.
O chuveiro e muito bom, as demais acomodações são simples mas proporcionam um excelente custo beneficio.
Experiência maravilhosa, a vista é linda, pertinho da praia!
Ótimo!
Experiência incrível!!! Local muito tranquilo, seguro e organizado.  Pessoas do condomínio extremamente educadas e gentis. Passeio de balsa  é um a mais que me conquistou!!!
Todo excelente!
O condomínio é muito organizado e os funcionários atenciosos. Tudo correu perfeitamente.
Ótimo apartamento, localizado estratégica. O anfitrião tem excelente experiência, mantém tudo bem organizado e todas as informações a disposição. Super recomendo.

Departamento bien ubicado, considerar hablar antes con cassio sobre día de llegada para que sea más expedita la entrada al edificio y no tengan retrasos. Cerca del departamento hay multiples tiendas para comprar, una laguna preciosa que puedes atravesar gratis hacia el mar en barcasa del condominio.

Muito bom!
Voltarei mais vezes.

Excelente, es la palabra que mejor describe al departamento. La ubicación es muy buena, cuanta con BRT frente al condominio, también con ferretería, farmacia, frutería, restaurantes, etc en la entrada al mismo. Se encuentra un supermercado muy grande como a unas 15 cuadras. El barrio es super seguro y la hospitalidad de la gente del lugar es admirable. El tiempo de respuesta de Bárbara es casi inmediato ante cualquier duda. Fuimos entre 4 huéspedes y todos estuvimos muy cómodos. La balsa para ir a la playa es uno de los puntos más beneficiosos a la hora de hospedarse allí, sólo lleva 10 minutos para estar en el mar y por el camino se puede apreciar toda la fauna y flora que rodea a la zona. No tuvimos ningún inconveniente al quedarnos allí. Lo recomiendo al 100%.
O condomínio é  bem localizado e o apartamento bem funcional.

ola ! a experiência foi otima, gostei muito do local excelente para desancar ,a localização muito boa, o condomínio e muito bom para caminhar e relaxar tem tudo perto e a praia e otima ,tem balsa do condomínio que te deixa na praia foi muito bom,valeu a hospedagem.

name: Large, Sunny 2BR/2BA Penthouse, Great Beach
summary: LATEST REMODEL SEPTEMBER 2014 Unit A-412: Sleeps 6 maximum. An airy, open floor plan and a location just steps to Kamaole Beach Park #3.  The spacious residence measures over 1100  square feet (2bd/2ba) and a private lanai (patio).   Your condo is quiet and peaceful; it does not receive street noise or noise from the pool. It is on top floor and has a two story ceiling.  In addition it is an end unit so it has extra windows.  Combined with the ceiling, it make the place large and bright.
space: The condo has two master bedrooms, a large living room and dining room, a new fully equipped kitchen (with granite countertops), a clothes washer and dryer inside, and air conditioning in each room.  The master bedroom bathtub is oversized, you'll love it. We outfit this condo as a second home.  Kitchen is full stocked for cooking, spice drawer too.  There is snorkeling equipment, boogie boards, beach chairs, umbrellas. NEW: 200Mbit internet speed (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ac).  There is digital cable television in the master bedroom and the living room. Second bedroom can be made into a 2nd king bed. name: huge room in trendy Erskineville. 5 mins to city
summary: One huge room in Sydney that totally worth the price! This is my room and I'm going overseas for a month, so I hope to find someone who is respectful and caring to take over the room. I love my room and my house! It's 3 mins away from Erskineville train station, which is 5 mins away from Central station by train. 5 mins to all the nice cafes and bars, and 10 mins to one of the best areas in Sydney, Newtown! My housemate is a nice and chilled Aussie girl and she has a cute cat, Lulu. Welcome!
space: I have a piano and guitar that you can play. A heater and a heating mattress to keep you warm. I love to chill at the terrace with winter sun.

name: Chambre dans bel appartement du plateau Mont Royal
summary: Bonjour, Je loue ma chambre dans une superbe colocation de 4 chambres en plein dans le plateau mont royal, coin gilford et brébeuf. Tout est équipé dans l'appartement il ne manque rien! La chambre est disponible à partir du 14 août jusque la fin du mois donc n'hésitez pas à me contacter pour me donner vos dates. Le quartier est calme, l'appartement est proche de tout, épicerie, parcs, bars, métro, bus, bixi N'hésitez pas à me contacter si vous avez des questions. Merci, Clément

name: Bright and cozy bedroom in Villeray
summary: Cozy bedroom in in charming my apartment located between Villeray and Rosemont neighborhoods. Less that 5-minute walk to Jean Talon metro station, you can be in downtown Montreal in 20 minutes. You can also hop on the blue line if you are heading West.  Very calm street yet close to restaurants, stores, cafés and bars. Convenience and grocery stores are also located a few blocks away. Less than 10 minutes away from Little Italy, St-Laurent street, and the Jean Talon Market.

Gracias Pablo por el hospedaje en una zona tan céntrica.
Great place as usual Pablo!

Pablo's place is just what I needed. Always clean. The location is excelent, a few minutes away from Marche Jean Tallon or the metro station. If you are lucky you might even get to try Pablo's famous banana bread.
Just the right spot to crash at night on a work trip.
Gracias por recibirme con corta anticipación. Agradezco tu flexibilidad.

host.host_about: Comédien de profession; je suis curieux de nature. J'ai élargi mes compétences artistiques en étant aussi mannequin, modèle nu!! J'ai également été chroniqueur culturel en radio! J'ai pour passion le cinéma, les voyages (Cambodge, Vietnam, Australie, Italie, Espagne, Maroc, USA, Caraibes, Jamaique, Mexique, …) Je suis français et habite à Montreal depuis 10 ans! J'aime les langues, découvrir d'autres cultures et suis ouvert à tous sujets de discussion. Je ne peux pas vivre sans musique et les livres occupent une grande place dans ma vie, j ai d'ailleurs déjà écris quelques nouvelles. J'aime tous les plaisirs de la vie! Je suis très sociable, j'ai appris la patience et ne jure que dans les rapports honnêtes et respectueux. Je suis plutôt calme et me suis mis il y a quelques années au yoga et à la médication.  Ma devise serait : Profites de chaque moment que t'offres la vie car elle passe vite!

name: Modern apt - Fully Renovated - Couples or Family
summary: Bienvenue dans notre appartement fraichement rénové!  Idéal pour une famille ou un petit groupe d'ami, vous apprécierez un espace convivial baigné de soleil tout au long de la journée. Quartier calme et proche de toutes commodités, à 15 min du centre-ville en métro et du marché Jean Talon à pied. Cuisine toute équipée, TV + Netflix, ballade au Parc Jarry (Rogers cup)...
space: L'appartement dispose de 2 chambres. Une très grande chambre avec un lit king size très confortable (pas de porte mais toute intimité avec les murs et le couloir). 2e chambre avec un lit simple

neighborhood_overview: L'appartement est situé dans un quartier familial, calme est très sympathique. Vous trouverez tout ce dont vous avez besoin tel que pharmacies, épiceries, boulangeries, le grand parc Jarry qui accueille la coupe Rogers (tennis) ou il y a une piscine ouverte gratuite. Entre 2 stations de métro de la ligne orange, vous serez dans le centre-ville en 15 min.
transit: Parcourir la ville en voiture n’est pas le meilleur moyen, cependant si vous avez besoin de garer la votre, le stationnement dans la rue est facile d’en trouver.  Vous trouverez des bixi (vélos en libre service payant) aux coins de rues alentours. Le métro reste le moyen le plus efficace pour les plus longs trajets.
access: Tous les espaces sont accessibles aux voyageurs sauf la chambre d'enfant si non nécéssaire. L'appartement est fraichement rénové, la cuisine et la salle de bain sont toutes neuves, les planchers de bois francs viennent d'être polis et vernis.  Nous attendons de nos hôtes d'être respectueux de l'environnement que nous leur offrons. Nous serons ravis de vous aider dans la planification de votre voyage et de partager avec vous nos conseils sur la ville et ses alentours.

host.host_about:
Hi,
I'm Sarah, french girl living in Montreal since 3 years!
I'm a graphic designer working in an Architecture agency.
For sure I love travelling and have the time of my life each time I discover new things, new cultures, new people... 
What I love the most in traveling is to get lost, and appropriate the place. My ultimate dream is to live on a boat, dive and observe fish all day long. 
I'm also crazy about local gastronomy, I love discover a country/city by eating all kind of food that I see. 

Most of the time I travel with my boyfriend Pierre-Luc, he is a designer, he creates all kind of things,with metal & wood furniture, he is so brillant. 
Our latest crazy move was to restore an old loft in one of the best Montreal's district. We created all the furniture by ourselves.
Thanks for reading me!

Sarah

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'appartement de Sarah est particulierement agréable. Chaque objet a été choisi avec attention et clairement avec un oeil design avisé. Nous y avons sejourné en famille et nous y sommes tous tres vite senti tres a l'aise. apres une journee explo de montreal, s'y poser le soir etait un vrai plaisir. et sarah et sa belle mere, ont été tres aidantes et acueillantes.
Beautifully designed apartment!  Sarah was very easy to communicate with and it was easy to make arrangements for arrival and departure.  I would definitely recommend this place.

We were surprised that this listing is really a two bedroom! The bed in the second bedroom is a little shorter than normal, but an average height woman fits comfortably. This apartment was super upscale and beautifully decorated, very spacious. I thought it was really incredible value for the cost, and completely exceeded my expectations. Only downside was that it was hot in summer, but the airflow was good and fans were provided so we were comfortable. Came for a family wedding and saw other people's AirBnBs - this one was the best and we paid less than others.

This apartment is so lovely — well designed and decorated. You can tell the hosts put a lot of care into making it sophisticated and cozy. I love the natural light. The open and well-equipped kitchen is perfect for making a meal. The neighborhood is peaceful and quiet and there’s a great yoga studio around the corner. A little hot without an AC unite, but the fans are fine. I’d stay here again. It’s a great place.

Sarah’s place was great for me, my sister and my niece to stay at.  Lots of toys and amenities for a toddler were available. The neighborhood was wonderful for kids, quiet with lots of restaurants available. Overall, great experience!

name: Cozy Apartement in Wan Chai, directly next to MTR
summary: Our flat in Wan Chai is available while we are out of town. So please come enjoy your stay in the bustling heart of Hong Kong. We've made this our home and enjoy sharing it with visitors to this exciting and vibrant city.
space: We are 2 German Girls and are living and working in Hong Kong for 2 years. Our flat is located in Wan Chai, one of the best location you can get in Hong Kong. The MTR Station is directly there and can bring you anywhere very fast. Many fun bars and restaurants are around.  The Shopping paradise Central or Causeway bay are each only 5 minutes away by MTR. And in only 20 minutes you can be at the beach, completely away from rushing Hong Kong. Many buses can take you there from Wan Chai. It is also very easy to start hiking trips from Wan Chai. A hike up to the peak takes you 1 hour. We are both very happy to provide you with many tips, so you will have an amazing stay in Hong Kong.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The apartment is very clean and has everything you need (towels/ showergel/ plates). Elisabeth had perfectly explained everything and it was very easy to communicate with her. It's the perfect place to stay in Hong Kong! :) I definitely recommend it!

Pour visiter Hong Kong en famille (4 adultes), notre priorité était d'avoir une localisation centrale dans la ville avec un budget d'environ 100 euros par nuit. Nous avons donc adoré l'appartement d'Elisabeth, qui est au coeur de Wan Chai et proche de tous les points d'intérêt de la ville. Elisabeth a aussi toujours été disponible par message pour répondre à nos questions. Ces excellents points ont compensé notre déception concernant la propreté de l'appartement, que d'autres voyageurs auraient trouvé inacceptable. Toutefois, nous sommes convaincus qu'Elisabeth peut facilement résoudre ces problèmes. Nous recommandons donc cet appartement à tout le monde!

name: Wan Chai Room in Flat Share (MH2a)
summary: 6-7 mins walk to MTR 4 rooms share living room, kitchen and bathroom - Single bed + Wardrobe - Fully furnished - Washing machine + Dryer - Air-conditioning - Refrigerator, Microwave, Cups & plates, WIFI internet, etc. All you need is a suitcase to move in!
description: 6-7 mins walk to MTR 4 rooms share living room, kitchen and bathroom - Single bed + Wardrobe - Fully furnished - Washing machine + Dryer - Air-conditioning - Refrigerator, Microwave, Cups & plates, WIFI internet, etc. All you need is a suitcase to move in! * a flatshare agreement has to be signed * there is a 500 key deposit refundable when check out * there is a Hong Kong stamp duty tax about 80 * electricity is not included, it is pro-rata shared among all, is about 100-400 per month per person.
interaction: * a flatshare agreement has to be signed * there is a 500 key deposit refundable when check out * there is a Hong Kong stamp duty tax about 80 * electricity is not included, it is pro-rata shared among all, is about 100-400 per month per person.
house_rules: - IMPORTANT: All photos here are for REFERENCE ONLY. Please message me to confirm it the room is available or not. There is NO move in after 7 pm. There is a Flat share agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government stamp duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$100 AND a key Deposit $500 which is refundable when you move out with us. It is mandated by Hong Kong law that a tenant and landlord / principal tenant have to sign a tenancy agreement to make the deal legal. Thank you for your understanding.

host.host_about:
Welcome to Hong Kong.
I am here to help and make sure you have a wonderful stay at my places.

name: Beautiful 1 bedroom in the heart of Montreal
summary: We are steps away from McGill University and provide direct access to an underground shopping center with grocery, pharmacy, liquor store and so much more! With an abundance of parks, European style bakeries, cafés and incredible restaurants and nightlife all within walking distance.

In addition, the building is attached to an underground shopping center, Les Galeries du Parc, where you will find grocery stores, a pharmacy, a liquor store, a post office, restaurants, a cinema and many additional retail stores.
house_rules: All furnished apartments are NON-SMOKING. Should smoke be detected at check-out, a $250 fine will be applied to the final invoice. I, the undersigned, accept the contract for the herein described furnished apartment at the rent set below. I shall be responsible for any loss or damage to the premises or its contents during the term of the contract. Lessee shall have the right to cancel this contract by giving lessor at least 31 nights prior written notice to such effect. In the event that Lessee’s notice is less than 31 nights, Lessee will pay to Lessor the rental amount corresponding to 31 nights from the date of receipt of Lessee’s notice by Lessor. Lessee shall have the option to extend the term of this contract by written notice to Lessor at least 31 nights prior to the expiry date of the contract, failing which any extension requested by Lessee will be subject to availability. The rate charged per night during any extension of the term shall be the then prevailing rate for the apar

reviews.comments: Very beautiful, clean and convenient apartment, great place to stay !!!

We had 2 months in Montreal while visiting McGill and this location was perfect.  A short walk to McGill but also to the Plateau and even downtown. The apartment was very comfortable and well provided for and was pleasantly quiet. The access to shopping, cafes and restaurants in the building was fabulous - particularly in the snow! - and the gym membership was the icing on the cake: pool, sauna, spas, weights etc etc. Just an elevator trip away.  Finally, Vanessa was immediately responsive to questions and queries.  All up, I would recommend this wholeheartedly!  Thanks, Vanessa, for a very memorable stay.

name: Upscale condo on St Hubert & Jarry
summary: My place is a beautiful 2bedroom condo conveniently located near the yellow and blue subway lines. Jean-Talon subway station is a 10minute walk from my condo and the bus stop is right outside the condo. My condo features a spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet beautifully decorated with modern decor for your enjoyment. The second bedroom is smaller but comes with a queen bed as well providing plenty of comfortable space for your enjoyment. The living room is spacious with a cozy couch.
space: My guests will have access to the entire unit with access to a fully furnished  kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and an ensuite washer and dryer for your convenience. The bathroom has a jacuzzi for you to kick back and relax after a long day as well as a separate stand up shower.

Jean-Talon subway station is a 10minute walk from my condo and the bus stop is right outside the condo. My condo features a spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet beautifully decorated with modern decor for your enjoyment. The second bedroom is smaller but comes with a queen bed as well providing plenty of comfortable space for your enjoyment. The living room is spacious with a cozy couch. My guests will have access to the entire unit with access to a fully furnished  kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and an ensuite washer and dryer for your convenience. You don't actually need a car as the bus stop is conveniently located outside our condo while the subway is a 10min walk. There's is a flea market for fresh produce and a variety of shops close by.

interaction: We are available via text or phone call. I will meet with each guest and show them to the unit. He will also be available to come by on short notice if needed.

reviews.comments: Very nice place. It was very clean and was easy to settle in to. We had no complaints this weekend, the metro wasn't a far walk and there are a couple food options within walking distance.
Good

La casa è un ampio e bel sottoscala molto tipico in una zona di Montreal che si sta riqualificando dalla quale non è difficile raggiungere il centro. L'arredamento è moderno e funzionale, con qualche raffinatezza come la vasca idromassaggio. La cucina però non è dotata di attrezzature sufficienti per più di due persone, manca una macchina del caffé, quindi è per chi non ha intenzione di cucinare in casa. La tv è utilizzabile solo come schermo per i computer, non ci sono canali visibili, non c'è una radio. La comunicazione e i servizi possono diventare  difficili perché l'host non abita vicino (com'è avvenuto a noi).
