name: Guest Room;Diamond Head/Kaimuki;Comfortable/clean
summary: Enjoy your time in Hawaii in a favorable, central, local neighborhood, surrounded by many great restaurants and parks. The space is quiet and clean. Enjoy the use of your private bedroom and bathroom and full use of a fully equipped kitchen. Just a short 5-10 minute drive to the secluded Kahala Beaches, diamond head park/hiking trail and beaches/surf spots, famous KCC farmers market, Waikiki, and Kahala Mall. Ala Moana and city center is just a few miles away, easily accessible by public bus.
space: The space is a neatly decorated, spacious bedroom with a full size closet, writing desk, queen size bed and new flat screen TV. There is a bathroom for you that is shared with one other guest. Enjoy the used of a shared living space, including a spacious seating area and dining area.
description: Enjoy your time in Hawaii in a favorable, central, local neighborhood, surrounded by many great restaurants and parks. The space is quiet and clean. Enjoy the use of your private bedroom and bathroom and full use of a fully equipped kitchen. Just a short 5-10 minute drive to the secluded Kahala Beaches, diamond head park/hiking trail and beaches/surf spots, famous KCC farmers market, Waikiki, and Kahala Mall. Ala Moana and city center is just a few miles away, easily accessible by public bus. The space is a neatly decorated, spacious bedroom with a full size closet, writing desk, queen size bed and new flat screen TV. There is a bathroom for you that is shared with one other guest. Enjoy the used of a shared living space, including a spacious seating area and dining area. The bedroom is private but the rest of the house is shared. The bathroom will be shared with just one other guest. There may or may not be another guest at the time. There is a fully equipped kitchen for your cooking
neighborhood_overview: The world famous waikiki is just a couple of miles away. It's best to get there with a quick Uber ride.  Diamond Head park and KCC farmers market is about a 1.5 miles away.  Kahala Mall is about 2.5 miles away.  Kaimuki dining district is about 1.5 miles away with many excellent dining options.  Ala Moana Shopping center is about 3-4 miles away and can be easily reached by public bus, which stops right at the corner of a block.
notes: There are 3 parking stalls for guest use which I will show you during your check in process. Please know that this is first come first serve basis. If there is no parking available when you return home, please find street parking near the house. There is usually parking in front of or  within a block from the house. Please do not park your car in undesignated stalls. Coin laundry is available at $2 a wash and $1.50 for the dryer.
transit: There is a local bus stop just half a block away that can take you to the city center. Getting around by bus or cab is simple and easy.
access: The bedroom is private but the rest of the house is shared. The bathroom will be shared with just one other guest. There may or may not be another guest at the time. There is a fully equipped kitchen for your cooking needs. The living room is spacious and comfy. There is also a nice dining table to enjoy your home cooked meal. Washer and dryer is also available to use for $2 a wash and $1.50 for the dryer, located in the garage (far back to the the left) Laundry soap is provided. Drying rack is also available, located along the wall near the front door.
interaction: I'm available anytime through Airbnb messages and will respond to text messages promptly.
house_rules: Home is in a quite neighborhood, not suitable for loud noise or parties. Excessively loud music and noise during late hours is not acceptable.  Please remove shoes in the house.  Must clean up after yourself in the kitchen and wash/dry dishes promptly.  Food trash must be disposed of in the outside garbage bins.  Candles are not allowed to be lit in the house. No fires.  No smoking. No pets.  No non-registered  guests allowed without prior notice.

reviews.comments: As a travel nurse it's very hard to find a decent place to reside while on assignment. This location was awesome. The place was as advertised. Lost of communication and Ai's mother-in-law was amazing, friendly, very helpful. A+ stay didn't want to leave.

Very clean and well decorated room in a 3 bedroom home (fully equipped). It felt very private and comfortable. I believe Ai's family lives in the adjoining building and were available for tips and help. Although I didn't meet Ai personally, she was very quick to respond to any questions I had.

Ai could not have been a more accommodating host. Although we made the booking the night before our stay, she still allowed us an early check in and had the room ready for us. The room and home were beautiful, clean, and well stocked with supplies for cooking, toiletries etc. Ai made us feel at home and was easily reachable when we had any questions. She went above and beyond as a host, thanks again for your hospitality!

The room at Ai's house was very clean, the bed was comfortable, and it is in a quiet neighborhood away from the street.  Ai was quick to communicate and had very clear check in instructions, complete with pictures.
The shared kitchen wasn't as clean, as Ai leaves it up to the guests to clean up after themselves, and that happened to varying degrees while I was there.  The kitchen is supplied for basic cooking.
Overall, I enjoyed my stay very much at Ai's.

A great place to stay! Walkable distance to Waikiki (20min) and parking option right by the house. It is a 3 bedroom house with guests in each room. The other guests were really nice, we enjoyed the chat and exchanged the travel tips. Ai was easy to reach and forthcoming!

Ai is a perfect host and her place is as well perfect!!!
It was my second time and I will be back again.
A great location. Great host. Great value. Highly recommended

Ai is super friendly and helpful. The entire house was kept clean and the kitchen was very useful for cooking. The rooms were also very nice and clean. If I visit Hawai'i again, Ai's home will definitely be my first choice.

We wanted to have a relaxing staycation before we moved off island and this place was perfect. 
Ai was a wonderful host, she was able to accommodate us on two days notice. She was helpful and communicative before we arrived, which allowed for an easy check in. 
During our stay the other two bedrooms (three bedrooms total in the home) were occupied. The home was large enough for everyone, it never felt crowded and everyone was kind and considerate. 
There is a full kitchen for guests use. In the bedroom there is a fan and air conditioner in the bedroom for the hot stifling days and a TV with Netflix and other streaming capabilities. 
Beautiful space, comfortable bed, and ideal location. Close to bus route 3, Kapiʻolani Community College, all the great restaurants on Waialae Ave, and a short drive to Waikiki and Ala Moana. 
When we return to Hawaii, we would love to stay here again.  Great stay!

We wanted to end our trip on the Hawaiian islands with a central and cheap accommodation. It is just a few minutes away from Waikiki and other sights like the diamond head. We really enjoyed our stay und would highly recommend this room to every person at every age. Thank you.

Good location away from Waikiki with good local shops for breakfasting shopping.
Close to Diamond Head if you want to climb it.

Ai's place is in an excellent location and the apartment was clean. It's walkable to Diamond Head and Waikiki beach (30 min to Waikiki, less to Diamond Head). All three rooms are rented out which gives it a hostel feel and we felt much more free to use the kitchen and living room. She was to quick to respond to messages although we didn't see her. I would recommend this place particularly if you're staying for several days as we did and want a convenient location.

Ai is one of the nicest hosts I’ve ever met. Quick responses and always friendly. The place is very clean. Very spacious living and kitchen which you share with other Airbnb guests. Bedroom comes with fan and air conditioning. The location is great as well. 5-10 minutes away by car from waikiki beach.

I had a real good time. It is a short walk to some restaurants or a supermarket, 30min walk to Waikiki Beach in a calm area. Ai organised well the Check-In and gave some tipps what to see, what was really helpful. 
The only thing, that could bother other people, is that the air conditioning is a bit noisy, so I switched it off during the night but I woke up early in the morning because the room got reheated by the sun. Anyway, a very nice place to stay, I prefer that place to flats in the middle of Waikiki due to its authenticity.
I was received nicely. The room was nice and clean. The location is perfect, only about 10 minutes by car to waikiki. I felt very comfortable there.

This was our first Airbnb experience so my boyfriend and I were a little nervous. Ai made it super easy to check in and her response time to any questions were quick. This location is literally about 10 minutes away from everything most visitors will want to do. It was very clean, organized, and well kept. It felt like home! We had zero issues and had a lot of fun during our stay! Ai was super helpful and very sweet. She has several items at the house like shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer, shaving cream, etc., in case you forget to pack something! We will definitely stay here again when we visit this area again!

Great place to stay!  A home away from home. The house was very clean, comfortable, and convenient, with spacious rooms, comfortable bed, and a well-supplied kitchen. Great location, too. We loved the local neighborhood.  Ai is a super sweet host and super helpful.  She was communicative before we arrived and allowed us to check in early and easily.  She was easy to reach if we had any questions.  Really appreciated her attentiveness. Thanks for your hospitality!
Excellent stay!

Ai's place checks all the boxes: 

-Kaimuki is a really great neighborhood to stay in, close to everything but not bustling
-The place is very clean and right by the bus stop
-Ai is both prompt in communication and non-intrusive

Two thumbs up!

Ai and her husband were amazing hosts! Stayed at their place for 9 nights and would go back anytime! 
1) the location was amazing! Very close to Waikiki and attractions
Tip: there is a bus stop nearby we preferred renting a car after 3 days of being there because the bus is often late/takes time + Ai has free parking on premise! 
2) Ai is the sweetest girl, we were there during Thanksgiving she left us a whole pie in the fridge and offered food! 
3) the bed/room is comfortable, AC works well, shared bathroom is clean. She has soap, shampoo conditioner. 
4) kitchen is clean and has lots of space
5) Ai has the cutest dog, if you’re lucky enough you will see him 
Anyways completely loved my stay! Thank you Ai !

방이 네개 있는 집으로 방을 뺀나머지를 쉐어하는데 요리할수있는공간도 충분해서 너무좋았어요 지퍼백이나 씨리얼 물 샴푸 린스 바디워시 등 비치되어있고 오일 잼 버터등 소스가 구비되어있어 너무 편하고 좋았습니다 또 주인이 빠른 응대로 좋았구요 주택가에 위치하고있어 와이키키시내와는 또다른 분위기와느낌을줍니다! 침대가 엄청편해서 좋았구요 쉐어하는분들이랑 마주칠일없어 불편함이없었습니다! 단지 저희가 렌트를 안하고가서 시내랑조금먼거리여서 불편했지만 집바로앞에 버스정류장이있어 금새시내로갈수있습니다. 한적하고조용하고 쉴수있는 숙소를 찾으신다면 추천해드려요! 더편하게쓰시려면 렌트꼭 추천합니다!!:)
Exactly as described, clean and spacious room. Check in was easy and so was communicating with Ai. Great place to explore Waikiki and surroundings.

Super clean and super quiet room. Lovely area close to some awesome restaurants and was amazing being only a short walk away from Diamond Head. We had a wonderful stay and would recommend this room to anyone going to Honolulu.

name: Cedofeita Light Apartment (N42)
summary: About two years ago the street of Cedofeita began to receive innovative projects, such as an artisan beer bar and several restaurants, have brought (still) more movement to the well-known traditional trade street. They resist centuries-old houses such as the Botnia and Casa Granado, as well as the Aliança and Suave confectioneries, which have been on the streets for over half a century, and which are considered by many to be the places where they eat the best croissants in town.
space: Situated close to downtown Porto, you will find this apartment with a magnificent terrace, just refurbished to receive it. With capacity for 2 people, located near one of the busiest streets of the city, you will be able to go out and enjoy the best that the city has to offer you, right outside your door. Internet WiFi is included at no extra cost. All linen and bath linen is also included. We have another apartment in the same building with capacity for two people (Cedofeita Terrace Apartment).

reviews.comments:
This place was amazing. Porto is beautiful and the location is perfect.
Thanks
Diogo fue muy atento y amable con nosotros. Contestó inmediatamente a nuestros consultas.
Espaço cómodo, acolhedor, funcional e equipado com o necessário para a estadia. Tem bastante luz natural. Fica na proximidade dos pontos a visitar, pelo que dá para fazer o percurso a pé.
O apartamento é muito agradável e moderno, decorado com muito bom gosto, numa localização perfeita (na zoan dos Clérigos). Todo o atendimento foi suave e extremamente eficiente. Recomendado.

Pros:
- Location
- Bright and spacious living room
- Clean
- Working air conditioning (only used for heating)
- Fully equipped with stuff you need
- Comfortable couch
- Extensible table for taking meals

Cons:
- Bathroom extremely small
- Bathroom has several problems (water tap is very loose, toilet lid slides away from its center, drain in shower is almost blocked)
- In general the bathroom deserves an overhaul
- Leaky windows (some can not be closed properly), luckily we are on the 2nd floor and in a lively pedestrian area
- Sometimes noisy because windows are simply glazed

Super location on a flat (a blessing in Porto) street! Commercial street with lots of shops, restaurants and cafes. Just steps to the historic center. Surrounded by excellent restaurants. If you are very large, the bathroom might be a bit too small, but otherwise this is an awesome choice for a stay in Porto. We had one issue with the shower drain and it was fixed within a few hours! Great communication!!

La climatisation était très appréciable. L'appartement est bien décoré, comme prévu sur les photos et bien situé dans Porto.
Le séjour a été agréable dans l'ensemble.
La porte de la terrasse ne s'ouvrait pas lors de notre arrivée dans le logement. Le robinet de l'évier de la salle de bain était cassé (utilisable mais décollé de l'évier donc fuite d'eau) et ce pendant tout le séjour. 
L'hôte (Diogo) était sympathique, il a répondu à nos demandes mais plus ou moins rapidement.

host.host_about:
Amigo de sus huéspedes.
Viajero habitual.
Profundo conocedor de la vida cultural de la ciudad de Barcelona. Facilitador de buena información sobre la Ciudad. Ayudo a "integrar" al viajero en la Ciudad.

reviews.comments:
The location of the flat is perfect, the neighbourhood is very nice. Unfortunately the house was covered with a green net to prevent that parts of the facade hitting someone in the street. So this was kind of disappointing and not mentioned in the ad.
The flat itself was clean, small bathroom and kitchen, ok for 2 persons and a weekend, the price is really ok!

Everything works well in the apartment, besides the noise. Not only has the street heavy traffic, but you can hear everything through the walls - it should not be such a problem, (I actually sleep heavy and can stand traffic) but our neighbour had a real hearing problem and his/her alarm went off everyday at 7am and rung for about 20 minutes... Too bad, because otherwise the location is very central (one can walk everywhere!) and the apartment comfortable. Also, don't be deceived by the word "terraza". The apartment has a terrace but it is more of a "french door" (a large window) rather than a terrace with place to sit. The apartment is on a second floor and in front there is a big building, which blocks the light from noon onward. The building is under renovation, so all windows are partially covered.

Appartement très bien situé et plutôt confortable. Manuel est très disponible. Le lit est ok, le wifi fonctionne très bien. Le bémol : la douche n'est pas très agréable/pratique (située en hauteur, étroite, et pas de tapis de bains) et c'est vrai que la voisine a tendance à oublier d'éteindre son réveil (à 7h).

The location is truly a great aspect of this listing.  It's close to the great restaurants and shopping in L'Eixample and also has good access to metro lines that will take you every where else you would want to see in Barcelona.  Also, there are three excellent cafes on the same street with all of your breakfast, bread, ham, and coffee needs.   

The apartment has a well-furnished living room as pictured and has a decent kitchenette.  The WiFi Connection was pretty good as well.   

Manual was a great host.  He was right on time when we met to obtain the keys and he was able to arrange reasonably priced transport to the airport, that was also very punctual.  

For people who are light sleepers and are staying in the apartment Thursdays through Sundays, I would suggest bringing ear plugs because you do hear some of the bars getting out at night.  But, if you are one of those people out at bars that late, that shouldn't be an issue.  

Overall, this was a good apartment to stay in to get a less touristy and more local experience of Barcelona.

Manuel was very accommodating. The flat was in an incredible location, centrally located and only blocks away from Passeig de Gracia, a main thoroughfare in Barcelona. A great time was had by all. Clean and safe flat.

My mom and I stayed in Manuel's apartment for 2 nights and it was fabulous! The location was fantastic and very close to casa battlo and some great outdoor tapas restaurants and cafés. The apartment was very clean  and Manuel was super nice and accommodating with our check in and check out times. Definitely recommend!

Manuel est un hôte fort sympathique, son appartement est bien agencé.
Wifi haut débit télévision, même si nous n'avons pas allumé cette dernière.

Kitchenette pouvant être utilisée, et frigo.

Très proche de plusieurs ligne de métro, ce qui permet de visité Barcelone en toute facilité.

Petits bar et restaurants dans le quartier. A 10 minutes à pieds de la place Catalunia et du haut de la Rambla.

Rien à redire ...

SI une petite chose, le voisin pense qu'il n'y a personne et laisse parfois (le premier matin) son réveille sonner pendant plus de 20 min. Un bon coup de poing sur la cloison et cela s'arrête.
We had a lovely stay in this flat. The flat is very well located, clean and have everything you need for a short stay.

We enjoyed our short stay at Manuel's apartment in May. It was relatively close to all the major tourist attractions in the city center by foot. On our arrival, we were greeted by Manuel who was very friendly and helpful with various tourist tips. His apartment was clean, very spacious and in a safe neighborhood. The only issue we had, which was out of the control of the host, was the external noise level. Since the apartment is on a major street, the frequent noise from passing vehicles and people may be an issue for light sleepers. Other than that, Manuel's apartment is a great choice and we highly recommend it to those visiting Barcelona!

Pros: 
Manuel was nice and friendly and provided the extras that we asked for ( baby bed, blender and fans)
Excellent location 
Basic essentials available in the apartment
Comfortable bed
Cons:
A little noisy, with a rather busy street below
A better job could be done with the cleaning ( especially the floors)
Suggestions:
A little touch such as providing hand washing soap and maybe a roll of paper towels in the kitchen would go a long way.
Bien situado, un apartamento con encanto. Muy recomendable.

Owner is a landlord with multiple listings. This was my first booking on AIRBNB and thought it was individuals renting a flat, and I thought there would be a welcome, some emails from them and possibly some items left in the flat. The day before we were due to arrive e, I got an email from Manuel and I confirmed we would arrive at 21.30. He told me there was a €35 late check in charge. When we arrived Manuel has sent a lady to meet us who was very helpful. I said we did not expect to pay to check in and the original booking h did not mention this fee and said as it was not agreed when I booked, I had not agreed it. Lucia called Manuel and we didn't have to pay it. We asked for 2 sets of keys, at first we were told no there was only 1 set. Then Manual suggested we make a second set at own expense, which I did not agree to. Then Lucia gave us her set and said that the cleaner had a 3rd set so not a problem for us to have 2 sets.

The apartment is small, bright and smart. The bathroom is cramped and the shower is up several steps ( probably 1 metre above the floor in the bathroom. The shower was hot and worked fine, although easy to get into not as easy to climb down out of.
The flat is on the second floor with a small balcony. It is on a busy street so traffic noise as you would expect, and occasional noise late at night as pepole walk by. 
Great value at the price and located just off Paseig de Gracie,  close to shops and Casa Battle. 
I might not book a flat from Manuel in future, as at no time did we feel welcome, it just felt like a transaction / a contract, and not what Airbnb seems to suggest on their website.... that their renters meet you and make you welcome.  Lucia was welcoming,  even after 2 arguments we had with Manuel.

Might just be easier to check into a hotel, no hassle with keys late check in andore facilities. I have rented apartments in over 10 cities and thus was the first time I used Airbnb, may also be th e last time !

The apartment in Eixample was the perfect location for our (too!) short trip to Barcelona. We loved being able to walk out every morning and grab breakfast at one of many cafes in the neighborhood. The shopping wasn't too bad either! Manuel was a wonderful host. Only hiccup in our trip was that the boiler went out and we had cold water for a day or so. But it was addressed very quickly and we were comfortable for the remainder of our stay.

El departamente es tal como se ve en las fotos, es Chic, en la mejor zona de Barcelona para hospedarse a mi criterio. Lucia su asistente nos recibió de la mejor manera y si bien tuvimos inconveniente con la cerradura del baño al día siguiente a primera hora vinieron a arreglarlo. Muchas toallas y sabanas a nuestra disposición, muy lindo decorado.  A una cuadra de un supermercado grande y dos cuadras de la pedrera y la casa de gaudi. Lo recomiendo sin dudarlo!!

Apartment is quite good, well furnished, however is a bit smaller than looks at the picture. The kitchen is tiny. The absence of conditioning is crucial, because you have to open the windows for the night, and the street is quite noisy during the night and especially early morning. Besides that there is everything you might need in the apartment. Location is quite comfortable too.
Ubicación excelente. Ideal para una semana solo. Es un apartamento turístico, no conocí a Manuel. Todo correcto.

We stayed at this apartment for 3 nights in late September and really enjoyed our stay. The communication was very good with Manuel and we were met on time to be let in and were given a late checkout option which was great. The apartment was clean and set up very nicely. The location is definitely the best thing about this apartment. It is very easy to get to all of the city attractions. The lighting is very dark in the apartment but we liked this anyway so not a big deal. One thing that was slightly annoying was the shower head not having a cradle to sit in. Although this is very minor, it would be good to have sorted in near future as showering while holding the shower head was a little difficult. Also a safe would be great for personal items i.e. passports and money etc but again not a major. We would definitely recommend this apartment to friends if they were traveling to Barcelona.

El apartamento es tal cual las fotografías y la descripción adjunta. Muy limpio, estiloso, super bien situado y, para nosotros, un precio asequible. Por lo que ha cumplido las expectativas creadas. La verdad es que podemos poner pocas pegas, salvo que no anuncian que por hacer el check in después de las 21 hrs hay que pagar 35€ además de los impuestos por persona (son 0,75€ por persona y noche pero creo que hay que dejarlo claro). Uno cree que va con todo pagado y que al llegar surjan estas cosas no es de buen gusto. Ese ha sido el único punto negro. El resto, perfecto. Gracias Lucía y Manuel.

Flat is quite nice and ideally located in the very centre of Barcelona.
However the neighbourhood is quite busy at night during weekends and the windows only have single glazing. You'd better bring earplugs.

Lack of flexibility for the check in. We arrived at 8:30 am in Barcelona airport and were only able to get the keys a 4:00 in the afternoon.

Apart from that Manuel was nice and helpful; he indicated to us a locker room where we were able to leave our luggage.

Sehr schöne und gemütliche Wohnung in zentraler Lage. 
Manuel ist unkompliziert und ein sehr zuvorkommender, hilfsbereiter Gastgeber.

La chica que nos atendio al llegar muy simpatica y puntual, nos explico rapido todo acerca del piso,el lugar es muy agradable y amplio y tiene todo lo necesario y su ubicacion es ideal cerca del metro y trenes, estuvimos muy bien, sin duda repetiriamos la experiencia.
Appartement très bien situe. Accueil sympathique et efficace de la part de Lucia.
Great overall experience. Good location. Cozy place. Recommended!
Like the last time the apartement was very clean. For me it is perfectly located. Though the late arrival no problem with the keys. Totally recommendable.
Superbe appartment, idéalement placé , tout était parfait je recommande sans hésitations !

Bel appartement très bien situé. La rue est toutefois bruyante et certains équipements de cuisine pourrait être avantageusement ajoutés, comme une passoire, des coupes, des couteaux de cuisine, etc. Dans l'ensemble, l'appartement à très bien répondu à nos besoins. Merci !
El piso está muy bien comunicado. Las habitaciones son muy luminosas con la luz natural. La cama es cómoda. Pero el piso está un poco  ruidoso por la noche.

My husband and I stayed in this apartment for 4 nights during our stay in Barcelona on the first leg of our honeymoon trip. The apartment was perfectly placed - just enough off the beaten path to not be swamped in the "touristy" areas and yet close enough to where you can reasonably walk/metro anywhere you want to go within the city. We are a younger couple so this small flat was perfect for us. The host was very accommodating - gave recommendations of local places to eat and shop. Wonderful flat for a romantic evening in (the view from the balcony is amazing) or to be out on the town within Barcelona!

El apartamento es muy agradable y bien situado. Hemos pasado unos días estupendos. No hay mucho ruido del exterior.
Es muy recomendable para parejas. La cama en muy buen estado y los sofás confortables.
Tan solo una observación. Creo que debería informarse de que no es un apartamento no apto para personas con movilidad reducida; sobre todo el baño. Así como del pago de tarifas adicionales.
This apartment and location were perfect! Everything was clean and worked wonderfully. I would definitely stay here again, as well as recommend it to everyone else!

Un apartamento muy bonito y una situación casi inmejorable. La cocina pequeña pero suficiente para una estancia de unos cuantos días. Su única gran deficiencia es el cuarto de baño, terriblemente incómodo.

I honestly can't recommend this flat enough! It made our trip!
It was my first time in Barcelona so I wasn't sure on the where the best location was but the location is fantastic.
It's at the top of the main strip, in a really lovely little street with some great cafes and restaurants. It's walkin distance to everything you could possibly want, but not on top of loads of tourists. The best part of this flat is how truely amazing the location is, I just cannot fault it.
The flat itself is great, it has high ceilings, a balcony big enough to sit on and a really nice block. 
Manuel is great as well, really responsive and helpful. I was worried that the flat had no air con, but fans were provided which we didn't even ask for. 
Thankyou Manuel for letting us stay, having such a great base in Barcelona made our trip even better. This was my first trip using air B and B and I will certainly be returning to this flat when I revisit Barcelona.

My wife and I had a lovely stay at Manuel's. The apartment was clean, and provided the basic necessities one would need in a home base. The kitchen is very small and basic, but we ended up eating out every night so that didn't bother us. It can be a bit loud in the morning during the week due to traffic and construction, but otherwise the bed was very comfortable.
El apartamento es precioso, acogedor y cómodo. La zona inmejorable llena de bares restaurantes y tiendas pero a la vez en una calle donde no hay excesivo ruido.

Manuel was a great host. Quick responses and answered all our questions. Location was ideal as it was literally steps away from the Metro subway station. Great neighbourhood and lots of shops and restaurants closeby. The apartment itself was just as advertised. Clean and modern with lots of natural light. Would definitely recommend if you're looking for a relatively quiet neighbourhood but still only a 10-15min short commute to the core of Barcelona. Just a small note, there is no AC in the unit, only fans. So at night time, it can sometimes get a bit warm although still manageable with the windows open.
Perfecto! Tal cual lo ofrecido

Отличная квартира в одном из самых интересных районов Барны. Рукой подать до площади Каталонии, дома Мила и дома Бальо. С другой стороны, несмотря на близость туристических троп, сама улица очень спокойная. Рядом есть все, что необходимо, супермаркет и минимаркет, станция метро и куча кафе и ресторанов на любой вкус. Мануэль очень доброжелателен в общении, всегда готов помочь, например с трансфером от и до квартиры. Немного огорчает отсутствие кондиционера, но в целом, выбором очень довольны.
Great location. Great flat. Easy access and organization. It was a pleasure to stay here!
El piso muy bien!  Limpieza y ubicación excelente.  Una de las mejores zonas de Barcelona.  Lo recomiendo!
地點位置好的沒話說,附近早上出門,晚回家都算安全｡淋浴間很小,可能超過80公斤的人會很難彎腰,淋浴間與地板高度差60公分,可能不適合行動不方便的朋友｡客廳的木頭百葉門無法上鎖｡吹風機壞了｡房東說會買新的,我沒看過房東,他請一個小姐與我們交接鑰匙,當場收了城市稅｡

Overall I would rate our experience here highly. The location was fantastic, one block away from multiple metro lines. Getting around town was a dream. The apartment was secure and I didn't feel unsafe at all our entire stay, inside or outside.

Manuel was a great host and was easy to communicate with before and during our stay. This is what he does, and it shows that he loves it. He had great suggestions for us as well.

The bathroom and kitchen are very small, and there wasn't much in the way of amenities other than toilet paper and towels. We actually had to sit sideways on the toilet because the washing machine was so close. We also thought a wastebasket would have come in handy in the bathroom (there was only one in the apartment, in the kitchen). Expect to bring or purchase all of your toiletries, including shampoo, soap, etc.

Overall, our experience was great, checking in and out went smoothly, and we had very few complaints.
The apartment was great & in a nice part of town & Manuel was there to greet us on our arrival  and gave us the run down on the place as well as some helpful hints
Manuel was very warm type, helpful and answered any questions. The place was exactly like the photos. The apartment is in a perfect location. We had a great stay! Thank you Manuel :)
Brilliant location on top of all the wonderful and beautiful things to see and near by some fantastic restaurants.

Lo mejor del apartamento es su ubicación, que hace que no tengas que utilizar el metro ni taxi para nada.
El apartamento está bien decorado y la cama es muy cómoda. 
La experiencia ha sido muy recomendable.

Perfect location!  Super cute (mainly local) area with nice restaurants and cafes.  It's a short walk to the touristy areas of the city and near to metro stops.  We also loved the place - clean, cute, amazing little balcony.  Manuel is super responsive and accommodating to various requests/needs.

Manuel è stato disponibile e veloce nelle risposte. La casa è in un buon quartiere, ottimo per visitare la città anche a piedi.
La casa sarebbe perfetta se si curassero di più i dettagli: pulizia discutibile, accessori in bagno inesistenti e servizi di piatti, bicchieri e pentole in cucina spaiati. Il giudizio è comunque positivo.
Excelente departamento, ubicado a 1 cuadra del metro, a 2 cuadras de lugares turísticos y a pasos de tiendas y bares. Seguro, amplio, bien calefaccionado.

Manuel's apartment is in a fantastic location and is very cosy. It is perfect for one or two people. There are a lot of shops, restaurants and bars within walking distance and the transport links are very good. The amenities are very basic so bring your own basics but overall I would highly recommend this place if you're on a short trip to Barcelona.
Great location!
Fabulous place to stay! Great location, very clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend!
I have stayed in better value apartments in Barcelona during earlier MWC events
Place was great! Location is the best part about it.
Great little flat well equipped and in a great location. Walking distance to the shops and restaurants, metro a block away and lovely places for breakfast right below.

Excelente apartamento, bonito, iluminado, de buen tamaño y con una ubicación perfecta, cerca a supermercados y tiendas, restaurantes, transporte público, lugares turísticos, en fin. Muy recomendado, Manuel es muy diligente y se acomoda a horarios de llegada y salida. Todo genial!
La ubicación bien pero el ruido de la calle es insoportable no se puede descansar
Manuel es un gran anfitrión, siempre respondió a mis preguntas muy rápido, estaba todo correcto al llegar, la localización del piso es excelente, volvería a alojarme aquí.

Cuando llegamos, el departamento aún se encontraba sucio de los anteriores huéspedes. Manuel nos mencionó que podíamos dejar las maletas a las 13:00 porque el depto recién estaría listo a las 15hs (llegamos al lugar cerca de las 13hs y no había nadie para dejar las maletas,hablamos con el contacto que nos dejó y nos dijo que Manuel no le había mencionado nada de eso y que no solían hacerlo. Regresamos a las 15hs y si bien esperamos unos minutos y llegó Lucía, el departamento estaba sucio, por lo que tuvimos que esperar 2hs más). Luego debimos colgar las toallas que habían quedado en el lavarropas, de los huéspedes anteriores.
Vimos algunos lugares que le faltaba limpieza, como los bajo mesada y el baño (de varios días). El baño es muy incomodo y tiene desniveles en espacios reducidos que pueden generar un accidente. En el baño también se encuentra el lavarropas que está frente al inodoro. Lo único destacable la ubicación, que estaba a dos calles de la Rambla que es El Centro de Barcelona. Por el mismo precio tienen para elegir muy buenos b&b en la misma zona, de hecho nos cambiamos a uno al finalizar la estadía aquí.

Location, Location, Location !!!

Beautiful neighbourhood, near restaurants, coffee shops, train station etc ; We were able to walk everywhere as the apartment is located in a perfect area; The flat is very spacious and has everything we needed; nice, quiet and very clean building, we felt very safe at all times

We really enjoyed our time in Barcelona and would definitely stay again at Manuel's place.
perfect location but that's about it. apartament is nicely sized but bathroom is quite small and bad - you need to sit sideways on the toilet seat, and shower is horrible!

We spent some wonderful days in Barcelona and the apartment was just great! It's perfectly located and you can reach the best restaurants, bars and shops in town within minutes. The apartment itself was clean, spacious and had everything we needed. We totally loved the balcony!! 
The communication with Manuel was very good and our early check-in and late check-out was no problem.
I can fully recommend this place!

We love the location of the apartment, decor and wonderful balcony where we enjoyed people watching and seeing parents taking their children to school.  Lucia greeted us and was very helpful giving us directions and suggestions.  We only used the kitchen to store basics in the refrigerators as we ate out. Will recommend.
Easy communication, check in, and check out. Overall great stay and would highly recommend!
Great location and easy access to transit.  Manuel was helpful and a good host.
Very nice place at a great location. Manuel was very responsive and great host!

Truly central to the city, with La Pedrera and the shopping district just a couple short blocks away from the apartment.  Although close to many attractions and city life, it is tucked just off the main street (La Cataluyna), just enough for easy access and also for a quiet sleep at night. If you have heavy bags however, be sure to be able to carry them up a couple flights of stairs as there is no elevator (or at least not one that we were aware of).
please note that this place does NOT have AC as listed - and it can get quite hot

I have to start this review talking about the location because is perfect. You will be close to touristic places but far enough to not be in the middle of a bunch of people taking pictures. Actually, I had lived in Barcelona per years and I know that the location is great.
The apartment looks like the picture, it is comfortable and clean and IT HAS AIR CONDITIONER that works really well in the Barcelona's hot summer (I can't thank Manuel enough for having the AA installed on my arrival day). I enjoyed the balcony where you can have a coffee looking at the movement of the city.
The host is very welcoming and polite. He gave me indications about places and some good advices for my stay. He was flexible with my check-in and check-out. I recommend this apartment.

The communication was very good with Manuel and the lady came and met us at the apartment after us waiting only 5 minutes. However the actual apartment is a little overpriced for what it is. It felt dated ( the furniture was not that comfy) and needs a bit of TLC. Also the kitchen and bathroom are tiny, which the pictures do not show. It is in a good location, very close to the metro and some lovely restaurants. Just do not expect a luxury place, which the price may suggest.
Good experience overall, apartment located in central and quiet neighbourhood. Maybe the bathroom need some attention otherwise nice flat for the money.

El departamento de Manuel, luminoso y ambientado con muy buen gusto, se encuentra en una ubicacion privilegiada, en una de las zonas mas elegantes de la ciudad. A pocos metros de las casas Gaudi: La Pedrera y Battlo. Ademas  muy proxima a dos paradas de Metro con las que se llega a todo. Incluso muy comodas y con ascensor para llegar con valijas al aeropuerto. La zona tiene mucha vida y es posible encontrar bares y restaurantes abiertos hasta tarde, al menos en verano. El aire acondicionado funciona muy bien y los cerramientos son muy hermeticos por lo que pudimos descansar muy bien. Pasamos una estadia genial y sin duda lo repetiriamos una proxima vez. Muchas gracias Manuel por todo!
Wonderful location , super clean, and great host! Everything you are looking for in a place

Manuel was really helpful, very easy to communicate with.
The location of the place was the best part.

Location...! This apartment is very well located in the heart of Eixample. Several good restaurants and bakery's are in walking distance. Rambla de Catalunya is just around the corner, so are several metro stops. 
The apartment itself is in a stylish building with high ceilings but can also use some minor improvements.

The location of the flat is fantastic, the front room and bedroom were as expected and as you see in the pictures, there is a balcony off the front room which you can sit on and watch the world go by if you wish. The kitchen is very small so don't expect to do much cooking but the very basics are fine to undertake. The bathroom is adequate but it has been mentioned that your knees can touch the washing machine when you sit on the toilet, our's did and me and my wife are both 5'9" tall, the shower worked fine but could do with a little tidying up maybe but all in all it worked. We both felt the flat for all it's good points was good value for money and we would stay here again for those reasons.

Cool
Endroit
Departamento con inmejorable ubicación. Cerca de todo y en una zona elegante y tranquila. Limpio y equipado

Great apartment!  Even better than the pictures, and perfect location if you are looking for something central but away from La Ramblas.

Communication from Manuel was excellent.

If you are an older person you should be aware that there are a couple of steps in the bathroom and up to the shower.

I would stay there again.
This was my second time staying here, and I loved it! Great location and host.

We recently stayed at Manuel's place for 4 nights at the start of April. The photos are a true reflection of the apartment with a spacious living area, double bed and small balcony. Communication regarding dropping our bags off was a little unclear (we had agreed midday and only ended up being able to leave them with a cleaner at 2.30), but once inside the apartment no issues arose. The location is within a two minute walk of Las Ramblas and two Metro Stations. The outside street is fairly noisy but this wasnt an issue with us and was to be expected with the location. Only minor downsides to the apartment are the small bathroom (which is split level) and small kitchen but everything you would need is there. Would recommend
Appartement très bien situé et très agréable à vivre

Nos recibió Lucia, muy simpática y con los mejores tips para recorrer Barcelona.  El apartamento esta en una excelente ubicación, inmejorable. Es muy espacioso y cómodo para 2 personas, en un segundo piso por escalera, con vista y balcón hacia la calle. Calefaccionado, por si viajas en otoño / invierno, y con todo lo necesario para pasar uno días en la ciudad.
Manuel siempre respondió a nuestros mensajes rápidamente, luego del check-out nos permitió dejar las maletas dentro del apartamento para poder seguir recorriendo.

First, this is a very cool, tastefully decorated and comfortable space with a responsive owner. Second, and this cannot be over-emphasized, this apartment is in a great location. We were able to walk to all of the sites and experiences we wanted in Barcelona.  This stay was the highlight of our two-week vacation in Spain.

This is a beautiful apartment in a great area. It is spacious with a great balcony for people watching. Lucia greeted us, helped us with our baggage, gave us lots of helpful tips and answered all of our questions. A French rail strike made us arrive after 9 pm and they were very accommodating. Good value for the money.

The location and communication with host were both excellent. This is in a prime location for good restaurants and Gaudi designs (2 blocks from La Pedrera or Casa Milà, 20 minute walk to La Sagrada Familia). The biggest issues were paying 50 Euros when we first arrived (for a late check-in and city taxes; we knew we'd have to pay but it still felt like an attempt to get extra cash from us) and the poor cleanliness of the apartment. The pictures online are not accurate. Our room was on the principal floor, and we think there are other, better units managed by the host in the same building. The bathroom is incredibly small with the clothes washer positioned right at your feet if you are seated on the toilet (a tall person's knees will touch the washer). The bedroom is small and bare. There were no plants, no clothes dryer except a drying rack, almost no toiletries provided except hand soap, and some information on the listing is inaccurate (e.g., check-out time, self check-in is NOT possible). We would not stay here again, but we would look in the same neighborhood.
Manuel’s place is in the perfect location. Walkable distance to all the main central attractions. Good space for a couple and amazing information and communication with him. 100% recommendable

This apartment is centrally located and within walking distance to shopping and sights. The metro is close. There is a super market just down the street. My husband and I stayed three nights and it was perfect!
The host canceled this reservation 219 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Super bien y super centrico... a cuadra y media de la pedrera.. recomendable al 100%
Small shower (To be expected in Europe). Great location and good communication from our host.

Manuel and Dani were great hosts.  From the time I began inquiring and making the reservation, they were always very quick to respond and answer questions.  Dani gave excellent directions on getting to the flat from the airport, which would have been a bit of a challenge due to a taxi strike that had just begun (and would have not been aware of without Dani’s communication); however, Dani’s directions made it as easy as possible given the situation.

Also, given the taxi strike that was in progress the entire time I was there, this was a perfect location!  I was able to walk almost everywhere I wanted to go without any problems at all.  The flat was in the center of everything and very well appointed also.  Perfect for one or two people for sure.

Thanks again, Dani and Manuel!
Dave
Great place. Great location. Would stay again in a heartbeat.
Location, location, location.

Rapida risposta ai messaggi. Preciso. Disponibile. Flessibilità nell orario di check-out. La presenza di pepe, zucchero etc. (ho trovato solo sale e olio) avrebbe reso più godibile e confortevole il soggiorno.

A wonderful location in this up scale area of Barcelona. There are many positives to this apartment: the living room is just as pictured and very comfortable; the balcony is great; the bed is good; the kitchen small but adequate. The bathroom may be a problem for some-four different levels/steps in this closet-size space with a small step out of the shower. Accident waiting to happen,

Manuels place was in a central spot within a walking distance to all the main attractions in Barcelona. There are also metro stations nearby. Manuel and Dani responded to my messages quickly and were really approachable. Dani gave me great tips and told me a bit about the different areas in Bcn. I found the apartment beautiful and loved the balcony!

Квартира в отличном районе и находится рядом с хорошей транспортной развязкой. Множество вариантов поесть на любой бюджет и посетить достопримечательности. Шопинг. Квартира оборудована всем необходимым для жизни- все есть в описании. Вселила ночным заездом, по нашей просьбе, помощница Мануэля-Даниэла. Без привязки к расчетному времени- это большой плюс.  Она быстро выходила на связь  при  необходимости.   Хороший бесплатный wi-fi. Квартира требует небольшого ремонта- это немного расстроило. Это компенсируется местоположением, инфраструктурой, размером и ценой. Я бы сделала ремонт, навела порядок и сдавала дороже. При устранении недостатков, я бы сняла эту квартиру ещё и рекомендовала бы ее своим друзьям.
Le logement est très bien situé en plein centre

Manuel's apartment is very well located -- just steps from Passeig de Gracia and the Casa Mila. Great restaurants and bars nearby. And Manuel was very helpful and a good host. The apartment is a little austere but comfortable enough. Pretty good value for the centre of Barcelona. If you are driving to Barcelona there is secure underground parking nearby but it is expensive at 30 euros per day.

name: Manly apartment 30 meters from the beach
summary: Beach side apartment only 30 meters from Manly beach.  Located across the road from the north end of Manly beach there are activity options to suit everyone. Manly beach, Manly lagoon, children's playground, skatepark, cafes, restaurants, and bars all within a 10 minute walk along Pittwater Rd or 15mins along the beach board walk.   Easy access to the city via ferry or express bus for anyone keen to explore further afield.
description: Beach side apartment only 30 meters from Manly beach.  Located across the road from the north end of Manly beach there are activity options to suit everyone. Manly beach, Manly lagoon, children's playground, skatepark, cafes, restaurants, and bars all within a 10 minute walk along Pittwater Rd or 15mins along the beach board walk.   Easy access to the city via ferry or express bus for anyone keen to explore further afield.

host.host_about: new zealander living Manly who likes to travel and host.

reviews.comments:
Our stay in Manly was really great, the location of the apartment was ideal, just across the street from the beach. The apartment is perfect for the location with great space and a homely feel. Would definitely recommend.
The hosting was great with awesome local tips.

name: Cozy Appartement
summary: L'appartement est situé dans le quartier Rosemont-La Petite Patrie, à 15 minutes de marche du Marché Jean-Talon. Près des commodités (épicerie, pharmacie, stations de métro Fabre et Beaubien, restaurants et bars de quartiers, parc Jarry, boutiques, etc.). L'appartement a beaucoup de cachet, très lumineux et comprend deux balcons dont celui à l'arrière avec la vue sur le Mont Royal.
space: - lave vaisselle  - laveuse/sécheuse - machine espresso - wifi
description: L'appartement est situé dans le quartier Rosemont-La Petite Patrie, à 15 minutes de marche du Marché Jean-Talon. Près des commodités (épicerie, pharmacie, stations de métro Fabre et Beaubien, restaurants et bars de quartiers, parc Jarry, boutiques, etc.). L'appartement a beaucoup de cachet, très lumineux et comprend deux balcons dont celui à l'arrière avec la vue sur le Mont Royal. - lave vaisselle  - laveuse/sécheuse - machine espresso - wifi - Une chambre privée avec lit double - Bureau - Cuisine - Salon - Texto - Courriel - Rosemont Petite Patrie - Épicerie metro - Pharmacie Jean Coutu - Café (paquebot, pista, la rue et fils, st-henri, berri café) - Restos (Santa barbara, super qualité, Montréal plaza, la récolte) - bars (île de garde, jockey, le pourvoyeur, saint Édouard, notre dame des quilles, cul sec) - Parc Jarry  - métro beaubien - métro fabre - Marché Jean-Talon - Quartier familial et calme -bixi -metro beaubien -metro fabre -bus 45

interaction: - Texto - Courriel
house_rules: - Visiteurs respectueux et calmes seulement. - Pas de bruit après 22h00.

reviews.comments: L'appartement est confortable, très agréable et beau. Un grand merci à Laurence pour sa gentillesse.

Laurence's place is super cute in photos, but even better in person! It's super spacious, with two porches, a *huge* bedroom, tons of natural light, Netflix (!),  and total private access. The washer/dryer in unit came in handy too when I needed to clean up a shirt for a night out. My boyfriend and I completely fell in love with the apartment, and because its a bit out of the downtown area, gave us a chance to see another part of Montreal -- a city we've come to love together as New Yorkers. It really only took about 10 minutes via uber to get anywhere we needed or wanted to go, so don't let the location deter you!

Nous avons passé un super séjour chez Laurence. L'appartement est super confortable et il y avait tout le nécessaire pour se faire à manger. Très près du métro ainsi que de l'épicerie. Je recommande fortement!
Laurence a été un hôte exceptionnelle ! D’une gentillesse et d’une serviabilité remarquable. L’appartement est adorable et décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Je recommande vivement !
The place was fantastic, would stay there again in a heartbeat. Close to the metro, and super cozy. Thanks again!

Laurence’s place was an amazing little hideaway on our visit to Montreal. Fun neighbourhood close to transit, parking behind the building, two decks, very cute and cozy space brimming with amenities and lots of natural light. We would gladly stay there again!

This place is so much bigger than the pictures do it justice and the bed is super comfy. It’s easy to walk to the metro to get Into town but there’s also a few shops, restaurants and bars locally that you can pop to. Great place to stay.
Appartement très bien situé et très propre
A beautiful Montreal apartment with lots of sun and space in each room. The subway was close and the neighbourhood had a lot of charm. We had a great stay and would definitely come back!
This was one of the best airbnb's I have stayed in. It made me want to live in Montreal.
Good place, I enjoyed my stay there. Just be careful with the stairs in winter!

name: Awesome 2-storey home Bronte Beach next to Bondi!
summary: Prestige full time holiday stay in North Bronte, only 5 min stroll to Bronte Beach & close to Bondi, Tamarama, Clovelly & Coogee! * Brand new 2018 furniture * Master bedroom with desk & baby cot * 2nd bedroom as king or 2 singles * 3rd bedroom double sofa bed (optional) * 4th bedroom studio with ensuite (optional) * Dining table up to 10 seated * Kitchen open plan island & seats  * Lounge full height bi-fold opening doors * Deck with seating, BBQ & leafy outlook * Parking on street is free!
space: * Master quarters over sized room with plush queen bed, opening to private sundrenched deck, private leafy outlook and distant ocean views, desk with ergo ball, full height glazing with blackout motorised roller blinds, baby crib, footstool, 55" LCD wall hung screen, built in robes, side tables with reading lamps, USB charge points. * Second bedroom extra large room with plush king bed or 2 singles configuration, additional ottoman single pull out sofa bed, full height glazing, blackout roller blinds, built in robes, side tables with reading lamps. * Third bedroom with double sofa bed, side table, reading lamps, small desk & chair (optional on request subject to number of guests) * Fourth bedroom private studio with plush queen bed and additional ensuite (optional on request subject to number of guests) * Dining oversized bespoke solid live edge timber table for 6 to 10 seated + baby high chair, quiet corner arm chair with footstool and reading lamp adjacent library wall * Kitchen mode
description: Prestige full time holiday stay in North Bronte, only 5 min stroll to Bronte Beach & close to Bondi, Tamarama, Clovelly & Coogee! * Brand new 2018 furniture * Master bedroom with desk & baby cot * 2nd bedroom as king or 2 singles * 3rd bedroom double sofa bed (optional) * 4th bedroom studio with ensuite (optional) * Dining table up to 10 seated * Kitchen open plan island & seats  * Lounge full height bi-fold opening doors * Deck with seating, BBQ & leafy outlook * Parking on street is free! * Master quarters over sized room with plush queen bed, opening to private sundrenched deck, private leafy outlook and distant ocean views, desk with ergo ball, full height glazing with blackout motorised roller blinds, baby crib, footstool, 55" LCD wall hung screen, built in robes, side tables with reading lamps, USB charge points. * Second bedroom extra large room with plush king bed or 2 singles configuration, additional ottoman single pull out sofa bed, full height glazing, blackout roller blind
neighborhood_overview: Favaloso great cafe around the corner Famous coastal walk linking Bondi-Tamarama-Bronte-Clovelly-Gordon'sBay-Coogee Bondi Beach! Bondi Road local shops Bondi Junction shopping district
notes: Quiet neighbourhood, no events or parties allowed
transit: Walking Uber or Taxi Bus stop 1-2min walk
access: Entire place as described
interaction: On text or call as required
house_rules: House Rules please be responsible for all guests; * Pets allowed by prior agreement. ** Please treat better than your home, take great care of all items and finishes, make use of shoe rack and shoes off to go upstairs. Note well kitchen benchtops must be immediately wiped with a cloth & water only (no chemicals or scrubbing) as it stains very easily with all food/drink spills. *** Smoking strictly prohibited, only permitted outside on the street footpath. **** No parties or events are permitted, maximum numbers of occupants being 12 people. Local laws require ambient noise to be restricted by 10pm weekdays and 12am midnight weekends/public holidays, please respect the quiet neighbourhood. Small gatherings are fine, but evidence of parties will lose security bond for any unreasonable wear and tear or damages. ***** Any lost house keys will result in AUD 120 expense due to locksmith having to change 4 keyed alike locks in the house Thank you

host.host_about: Love to travel, love to host!

reviews.comments: Great little place in a quiet street in Bronte. William was a great host, emjoyed our stay!
Great position

Lovely renovated home with separate studio downstairs. We stayed as a family group and enjoyed visiting local beaches and cafes. Walk to beach (although the walk home is tricky for little legs). On street parking is free and easy. Thanks for having us, we would stay again.

We had a great stay at Will's place in Bronte! The house was super clean, spacious and had really comfortable beds. The location was also brilliant, with a short 10 minute walk to Bronte beach. We would definitely stay here again and thanks again to Will for being a great host - also for the late checkout due to our night flight, which was really appreciated!
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Exceptional place and great stay! Amazing location to walk to beaches, host was great help as well, thanks

The place is really nice and clean! It kept 7 of us warmed at night And there’s a good number of amenities available from kitchen appliances to laundry and shower amenities. Comfy beds too!

Upon arrival, Sacha was quick to respond with check-in details and kindly guided us virtually through the house. 

Highly recommended!

Sacha's place is in a great Bronte location, a short walk to both Tamarama and Bronte beaches. The house was well equipped for self-catering, and the host was quick to respond to any queries we had during our stay. Recommended!

Fabulous house in great location, easy check,host very quick with enquiries, had all that we needed!!
Our party of 6 adults and 3 children fitted perfectly into 4 bedroom two bathroom house, just make sure that is what you are getting!!

Deb
Highly recommend, very comfortable space in walking proximity to beach, cafes and stones throw to city. Host was very accommodating and communication was very easy.

Sacha’s place was easily the best AirBnB that I have had the pleasure of staying at in Sydney. 

Sparkling clean, stylish interior, excellent location (5min walk from the beach); this AirBnB has it all.

Sacha himself was also the best AirBnB host that I have had in Australia. Incredibly accomodating, instant responses and just a very friendly guy overall.

Highly recommend the place to anyone going to Sydney!
非常好的位置,走路到邦迪海滩或者波特郎海滩15-25分钟,房间里面各种炊具和调料很齐全,不过如果是晚上到的话建议先吃完饭再过来,离最近的超市和餐馆也要走路15分钟｡做饭很方便,房东小帅哥很帅!
The apartment was very nice, we had everything we need to spend a great weekend. Sacha was very kind and handy host, helping with everything we need to enjoy our stay.
Great location to explore eastern Sydney. We did loads of walking including the Bondi to Coogee coastal walk. Favaloro cafe just round the corner is a great spot for coffee and the house was great.

Tolles Haus mit großer Terasse und schönen hellen Räumen im Obergeschoss in einem netten Stadtviertel, das sich sehr gut eignet, wenn man ein bisschen Ruhe sucht in Sydney und in Strandnähe wohnen möchte. Am Bronte Beach gibt es einen großartigen öffentlichen Pool mit Meerwasser direkt am Strand. William war immer erreichbar und sehr hilfsbereit.

Great place, great location, great host! 
The place was incredibly comfortable and very well positioned to get to beaches! The host was helpful with any questions and really quick to reply. Would stay again in a heart beat!
Stylish home with Ana amazing main bedroom. Sunlight and trees and blue sky form the main bedroom. Very comfortable home and a lovely host!

Great modern house a short walk to Bronte beach with great coffee shop one street away.  Super spacious and loads of amenities, perfect for our group. Would stay again and recommend for larger groups or families
Sacha's place was great. Perfect location as it's close to just about everything you want on the eastern beaches.
perfect house. great interiors, location fantastic. communication from host was ideal. highly recommended
Definitely recommend this place- perfect beach pad and we didn’t want to leave :) very comfortable and hospitable.

Amazing location - walking distance to Bronte and Tamarama! 
Great space for a weekend away with friends.

Sacha’s place was amazing, it is in great location only 8 minutes away from the beach. He was a great host and gave us tips to get around the neighborhood. The house is beautiful and very comfortable, it is by far the best airbnb I’ve stayed in, my family and I didn’t want to leave!

What an amazing place! Would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay near the beach. Excellent proximity to Bronte, Bondi and Coogee. Stylish house with excellent furnishings. Sacha was also very easy to communicate with. Looking forward to staying again.
great place and host

Sacha’s house in Bronte is a great place to stay and visit Sydney. Modern design style and comfortable.
Bronte beach walking distance through a nice park, Bondi beach really close. Do not miss a run by the sea either north or south (down to Cogee).
Sacha was a great host, answering messages in Christmas!
I strongly recommend this host and house!
Great location and great host! Communication was easy and the house was extremely comfortable and great for a large group.

We had a great stay in the house and it’s in a great location. We had a car and found parking on the street easy and the house is just a short 5min walk to the beach. Our 17 month old loved the park by the beach and the playground. The house itself is very modern and the bedrooms are filled with light but they also have good blackout blinds which we appreciated. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a beachside escape in Sydney.
Everything you want out of an Airbnb. Great spot, quiet street, clean, awesome main bedroom, easy to check in and light and airy. Really helpful touches if you’re traveling with the family.

Perfect house for our Sydney stay. Great location - easy walk to Bronte beach; baby friendly - stair gates and baby cot and high chair and generally a great space - well equipped kitchen and bbq. We enjoyed ourselves so much we stayed here for an extra few nights. Thanks Will for being so responsive before and during our stay!

Our weekend trip at Sacha’s place in Bronte was great. Super modern, clean and spacious inside and only a very short stroll down to the beach. If only the weather was better!!
Sacha was great a host, easy to deal with and was really flexible throughout our stay

Sacha is very responsive and a great host. The house is very clean with everything we needed. House is less than 10 minutes walk to the beach  and Sacha gave us great local tips. Would def recommend anyone travelling to Sydney and want to be close to the beach and coastline.

It was very nice to have met Sacha in person. The house is a very lovely place that I have always dreamt to have! It was the perfect place for us to have a family gathering this weekend! The place was stylish, spotless and had lots of space for each of us to relax.
Amazing house in a beautiful area of Sydney - thanks so much

We loved the place, it has everything.
The walk to the beach was 10 minutes and we didn’t have a problem with that except that it was hard going up the hill for my mother on the way back to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) mother just turned 90 and it would help if we knew about this in advance. We got a car from a relative and we solved the problem.
Thank you Sacha, you were a great host and we enjoyed our stay very much
Wonderful place. Ideal for a group. Host contacted us as soon as we landed. Warm welcome with all the information.

name: Chambre dans grand appartement- (3 roommates)
summary: La chambre est de taille relativement petite mais la décoration est très épurée donc la place ne manque pas! Beaucoup de luminaires pour masquer l'absence de fenêtre et les couleurs claires égaient la pièce. C'est une petite pièce très calme, isolée du bruit extérieur. La chambre comprend 1 grande commode et une penderie, un lit 2 places et un grand bureau (table de chevet, miroir,chaise). L'appartement est très grand et spacieux . Très chaleureux, convivial et particulièrement lumineux.
description: La chambre est de taille relativement petite mais la décoration est très épurée donc la place ne manque pas! Beaucoup de luminaires pour masquer l'absence de fenêtre et les couleurs claires égaient la pièce. C'est une petite pièce très calme, isolée du bruit extérieur. La chambre comprend 1 grande commode et une penderie, un lit 2 places et un grand bureau (table de chevet, miroir,chaise). L'appartement est très grand et spacieux . Très chaleureux, convivial et particulièrement lumineux. Je ne serais pas présente lors de votre séjour mais vous serez accueillis par mes 3 colocataires très sympathiques! Le logement est à moins de 5 minutes de la station Beaubien qui est très bien située dans le centre de Montréal. Mes 3 colocataires ( Julien, Russ et Matteo) partagerons l'appartement avec vous , ils sont très sympathiques et respectueux et partagerons leurs bonnes adresses et bon plans avec vous ;)
notes: Mes 3 colocataires ( Julien, Russ et Matteo) partagerons l'appartement avec vous , ils sont très sympathiques et respectueux et partagerons leurs bonnes adresses et bon plans avec vous ;)
transit: Le logement est à moins de 5 minutes de la station Beaubien qui est très bien située dans le centre de Montréal.
interaction: Je ne serais pas présente lors de votre séjour mais vous serez accueillis par mes 3 colocataires très sympathiques!

name: Real GEM : Unbeatable location in DT
summary: The apartment is located in the best area of Montreal :  All on foot :  1min - Rue Ste Catherine 2min - Place des arts (Place des festival) 2min - Boulevard Saint Laurent (plenty of restaurants, bars and clubs) 2min - China Town 5min - Palais des congres 5min - Rue Saint Denis 7min - Gay Village 10min - Old Port 15-20 min to Bell Center 3 Metro stations to Jean Drapeau (Osheaga, Piknik Electronic, La ronde) 3 Metro Station to Crescent Street You Cannot find better!!
description: The apartment is located in the best area of Montreal :  All on foot :  1min - Rue Ste Catherine 2min - Place des arts (Place des festival) 2min - Boulevard Saint Laurent (plenty of restaurants, bars and clubs) 2min - China Town 5min - Palais des congres 5min - Rue Saint Denis 7min - Gay Village 10min - Old Port 15-20 min to Bell Center 3 Metro stations to Jean Drapeau (Osheaga, Piknik Electronic, La ronde) 3 Metro Station to Crescent Street You Cannot find better!! 1min - Rue Ste Catherine 2min - Place des arts (Place des festival) 2min - Boulevard Saint Laurent (plenty of restaurants, bars and clubs) 2min - China Town 5min - Palais des congres 5min - Rue Saint Denis 7min - Gay Village 10min - Old Port 15-20 min to Bell Center 1min to metro saint laurent 3 Metro stations to Jean Drapeau (Osheaga, Piknik Electronic, La ronde) 3 Metro Station to Crescent Street
neighborhood_overview: 1min - Rue Ste Catherine 2min - Place des arts (Place des festival) 2min - Boulevard Saint Laurent (plenty of restaurants, bars and clubs) 2min - China Town 5min - Palais des congres 5min - Rue Saint Denis 7min - Gay Village 10min - Old Port 15-20 min to Bell Center
transit: 1min to metro saint laurent 3 Metro stations to Jean Drapeau (Osheaga, Piknik Electronic, La ronde) 3 Metro Station to Crescent Street
house_rules: - Extra people not added in the booking will be asked to leave the apartment.  - No noise after 10pm  - Wash your dishes  - Keep the kitchen clean (no food uncovered)  - Use a sheet to sleep on the sofa   - Leave your shoes on the carpet at the entry  - Do not eat on the bed

host.host_about: J'ai 28 ans et je vis à Montréal depuis maintenant 6 ans. J'ai eu ma maitrise à Polytechnique de Montréal et depuis je travaille en tant qu'ingénieur dans des entreprises internationales. Je suis quelqu'un de très extraverti, sérieux quand il le faut et à l'écoute. Je me suis inscris à Airbnb car je sais que Montréal est une ville magique et qui fascine plus d'une personne. Je voudrai donc donner la chance a d'autres personnes de visiter cette charmante ville en offrant un très beau loft, super bien situé et avec tout ce que cherche un voyageur. je suis aussi quelqu'un qui voyage beaucoup, donc je me met a votre place, et je vous offre ce que j'aimerai qu'on m'offre!!

reviews.comments: Ish was such a great host! He was very good at communicating with me before I arrived, explaining exactly where to go and how to reach the apartment. The location is very close to the metro and bus stations as well as many of the main areas to visit while in Montreal. It was very easy to navigate on foot from the apartment to Old Port, Place Jacques Cartier, Saint Catherine St, and the metro station. I would definitely stay here again!
Great place- very clean and neat. A little further from the heart of the city than I expected but still very easy to get around.

We had a great time staying in Ish's place and would definitely recommend. Location was amazing and we were able to walk to tons of restaurants and bars. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed.
I will recommend the appartment a lot. Ish is a great person who helps in whatever we need and try that our stay be better. The appartment is located in an excellent place.

L'appartement est parfait pour un séjour à Montréal. Il est très bien situé !
Tout était parfait ! Merci beaucoup !

Great location to pretty much everything downtown. Chinatown, st-catherines, Notre-Dame church etc. Everything is pretty much walking distance. Very clean, WiFi & Netflix available. Very safe neighbourhood - right next to a police station. Definitely would stay here again. 

If you are driving, there's not much parking downtown so beware.

The apartment was very welcoming and cozy. Very close to restaurants and bars and coffee shops. Only about 15 minute walk to Old Montreal, and a shopping mall very close by. Awesome stay clean place five stars

Très bon séjour ! Appartement proche des restaurants et tout le nécessaire pour un bon séjour à Montreal. Il est très facile de communiquer avec l'hôte en cas d'interrogations. Les points negatifs sont l'absence de parking gratuit à proximité, et des rideaux pas suffisamment opaques pour la lumière du jour le matin à mon goût.  (mais ce n'est que mon avis). J'y reviendrais tout de même avec plaisir !

Nous sommes restés 2 semaines dans ce studio et nous avons passé un agréable séjour. Super bien situé, à proximité du quartier chinois, du complexe Desjardins et du métro. A 15 - 20 min à pied du quartier du vieux port.
Excellent communication and location. Exactly what was expected.

Appartement conforme à la description. Internet très haut débit, bien situé et accès facile. 
Le lit un peu trop mou et un manque d’accessoires pour cuisiner. 
Je n’ai pas eu la chance de rencontrer Ish.

Great appartement with a very good connection to public transport. 
Ish is a kind host and replied fast to our questions. He was even flexible with the check out, which was really great for us!
The appartement is quite and clean. 
We would stay there again and recommend it.
Close walk to China Town and main metro station (Berri UQAM).  Coffee shops and restaurants are around the corner and Old Montreal is only a few more minutes past China Town.

In a prime and super convenient location! Wasn’t enough toilet paper for the 3 nights we stayed there and the kitchen doesn’t have any baking sheets or anything to put in the oven if you’re planning on using the oven. Other than that prime location! Cozy and warm.

Ish's place is great! Located very close to the convention center and china town, I was able to walk home for quick breaks. The bed was also very comfortable, so it was easy to fall asleep at night. This place was everything I needed.

Ish's place was pretty awesome! The listing is very accurate - a cute bachelor suite with a spacious bathroom, and lots of natural light. Ish was also very accommodating, and we definitely appreciated that! The best thing about the apartment was the location - minutes to EVERYTHING! It's nestled between the four vstly different neighbourhoods of downtown, gay village, old Montreal and St-Denis/St-Laurent strips. We couldn't have asked for a better spot. IGA is a couple of blocks away too, as well as a number of major bus routes, so it was super easy to get around!! I would totally book this place again, SO worth it. (internet was super slow, but no biggie since we spent most of our time out and about).
Place was great, exactly as described. The place was very stylish and in an excellent location.
Place was perfect for me, it was a walking distance to restaurant and shopping center. Great location.
Great location. Close to metro stops, bust stops and restaurants. The place was very clean and cozy. Would definitely  recommend staying here while in Montreal!

This appartment is very comfortable, clean and very well located. The description is really accurate, you are minutes on foot to anywhere downtown. Ish is very communicative and responses nearly instantly. This was especially useful in my case as I had trouble with the access card. Make extra caution not to place the card near a magnetic field (magnet, phone...) or you will not be able to get in ;-) Ish however was very helpful and solved this for me very quickly. Also, a new door access system will be put in place in the upcoming weeks in the building so this issue will probably disappear with it. To summarise I stayed there for 3 weeks for work and I would highly recommend it! Great place for the price range!
Très bon accueil et excellente communication. L'appartement est propre et bien conçu et proche de la place des arts.

Cannot say enough good things about this host and flat in Old Montreal. Ish got back to us immediately if we had any concerns and the place was exactly as described if not better. the location is great, right in the heart of all the action and walking distance to whatever you need. would highly recommend staying here
Convenient location. Quiet and secure. View consists of apartment block across the street. Soft bed. Clean, spacious bath. Large functional kitchen. Good value for money.

This place is perfect for anyone just wanting to chill and see Montreal it’s in the perfect location, safe ,clean and walking distance to so much stuff to do and see no need for cabs or bus. The place itself was super clean and just had a home vibe to it I will be coming back for sure next year and I would recommend anyone to stay here!!!

Place was clean and a great location. Walking distance from everything you needed and Ish provided details before hand on where everything was which was helpful. One downside, which host could not control, door to get into building was broken. Would have to wait for someone to show up to get in. Also bed wasn’t the most comfortable other then that it was a great stay would stay again.
Great location with easy check in, clean and a great host! Will definitely stay here again.

This past weekend August 24-26 was my first time staying at an Airbnb. Based on the information provided and the reviews it was a good stay but could be improved (3.7 out of 5 star). The place was clean. The location was good; about 10-20 minutes walk from most things. Check-in was easy although in my opinion could be improved in ways that I won't address. There are toiletries and the daily basic home stuff you could use. There is NO onsite parking but there are some lots for about 15 dollars/night that took me some time to find; an exact address of a parking lot would've been very helpful after a long 7 hours drive. The biggest concern for my boyfriend and I was the bed. The bed was too soft and sunk in (the middle of the bed) for our liking. It made our sleep very uncomfortable to the point we kept trying to move to the side to get the flat surface but would eventually end up back in the middle sunk in. I understand that it could've been due to the uses of it overtime. I think that it could easily be fixed by investing in a new mattress. Another thing that I noticed was all the bedding stuff and towels smelt like the febreze that was in the washroom. I'm not sure if the detergent used to wash has the same smell but that was what I noticed. Overall, it was a good first stay. Thank you Ish!

Ish, was an amazing host. Everything was spotless. He left towels, a few dishes, bathroom essential, TV (with Netflix available) all to be used by the guest. It was close to shopping centers (supermarket, cinema, SAQ, metro...etc). The pictures do not lie, exactly what is photographed is what you will enjoy. If all these suit your desires of a trip in Montreal, Ish’s apartment is the one for you.
Ish's place was perfect for our long weekend in Mtl - great place and fantastic location!
This apartment is as it appears in the photos. The location is excellent for a tourist.

I had a great experience at Ish’s place. It was very clean and spacious with a very functional kitchen. Location is great too as it is walking distance to the old town, down town,  gay village and Metro stations. There are also plenty of cafes and restaurants withing walking distance. I had a great time.
Ok stay
Great location, secure building, fast communication with host, lots to do near the residence and great value. Would highly recommend. Thank you
Very nice apartment, very convenient and very easy arrival and departure
Location is great

l'appartement de Ish est très bien situé et pratique.  Bémol :
la literie est trop souple.
Excellente location

Bonito departamento, excelente ubicación, seguro y bonito, todo funcionando bien, esta muy cerca de todo 100%recomendable.

Todas las instrucciones que nos dio fueron buenas.
we asked hair dryer and Ish responded very quickly. bed was uncomfortable and overall place was not super clean.
Ish was very helpful in ensuring my stay was very comfortable. The unit is spacious and at a great location

Great location, near public transportation/restaurants, and what even appears to be a police station next door, felt very safe.  A good place for a few days. However, as some people have said, the bed is uncomfortable and sinks quite a lot in the middle. It would be good for a single person, but as a couple, it felt like we were falling in towards each other and made it difficult to sleep with our backs twisted.
