Eixample area is built 100 years ago in the modernistic years. There are many modernistic beautiful buildings, La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, smart clothes shops, Paseo de Grá
house_rules: There is LATE ARRIVAL FEE:  - 30 euros from 9 to 11pm,  - 40 euros from 11pm to 2am Council tourist tax: 0,72 eur/person/night (1-7 nights). Not applicable for children under 16 years old.

host.host_about:
I am from Barcelona. I love to travel and I work for the hospitality industry in Barcelona. I am passionate about hospitality industry and the service I provide as it involves three sectors I like (travel, e-commerce, real estate).

I like to read, play some sports (football, running, swimming), going out with friends and organize lunch and dinners at home.

reviews.comments:
Appartement très calme et agréable, bien équipé, au centre de Barcelone et disposant d'une magnifique terrasse. Belle vue sur les toits. 
Lluis est un hôte très agréable. 
Parfait pour un séjour à Barcelone !
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This apartment is in the perfect area. 5 minutes walk from La Rumbla and has everything you need. The private rooftop terrace is a real treat. I recommend it completely.

Location is THE BEST i would say, 2 minutes far from Catalonia square :) Venue is clean and well furnished :)
Small minuses are rather small bathroom and showerplace, and bad smell on the terrace at the evening, I considered it from sewer system or smth.

We stayed here for a long weekend in Barcelona and the location of the apartment was amazing! It was a short walk to a lot of sites and it was easy to access public transportation. We particularly enjoyed the outdoor terrace, its just as spacious as in the pictures. The apartment is also just as it is pictured, however its posted as a 2 bedroom but the room with the bigger bed does not have a door, it was not a problem for us but depending on who you're staying with you may want more privacy. Overall, Luis was fantastic and easy to communicate with and his apartment was clean, central and beautiful. If we are ever in Barcelona again, we would stay here.

Luis arranged a flexible checkin and checkout. The apartment is in the very heart of Barcelona with easy walking distance in gothic, Raval and born area. Everything was clean and in good stand, terrace is just amazing! Pictures are quite spot on what's this apartment have to offer. Highly recommend! Thanks for a great stay Luis!

This apartment was just as expected! The roof terrace is a winner, its huge - the views over the city rooftops are amazing - most places we looked at just had small balconies.  Its right in the centre of all the places we wanted to visit - and being only 4 mins walk from the airport bus stop was great after traveling.  The bakery next door was wonderful for breakfast and all the shops you could ever want to visit are on the doorstep. Its very modern inside and fairly well equipped -  enough utensils so that we could cook on a couple of evenings.  Having a lift was also a huge bonus being on the 5th floor! We had 3 sets of keys which was great, so we could go our separate ways is we wanted.The only slight problems were the size of the bathroom, but we managed and we were a party of 4 females! and the main bedroom which leads straight into the kitchen, no doors, but you get used to it!  Just one word of warning - be quiet in the apartment as the neighbours may have a moan! Overall we all had a fantastic time here, would love to return and would recommend it to anyone wanting to be in the thick of Barri Gotic. Thanks Luis

Not too great. Not enough toilet paper. Not very clean. Tiny toilet not lockable and clogged couldn't turn on the shower even to 50 percent blast we had to take out the filter in the shower to clean it. Very gross. Blood stains on sheets. Ikea cups were broken and glued on, when we tried to wash it it broke and cut the someone's  finger. Also no kettle. The mattress for the twin bed extremely thin the other couple had to take the ikea sofa bed (which was smaller) to put on the existing bed. No door on the master bedroom. This is a one bedroom. hazardous steps. To fit sufficient beds and dining table the owner squashed the dining room table so it was on the ledge. This is not very safe. Also we tripped on the internal stairs since there were bit's hanging out . Insufficient hot water for even 2 people (we had 4 staying luckily they prefer to shower in the morning). When we arrived the lady said a few mins this turned into 20 mins which is quite exhausting when you just arrived. And she didn't know how to use the utilities. She also didn't tell us how to take out the trash which was outside on streets. The clothes which were washed and hanging from you previous ppl fell on the ground and the lady said oh just leave it.
Also there was no battery for the air conditioning remotes. Lack of covers for the bed I had to use the blood stained covers.

However great balcony and location and nice of the owner to put our luggage into their commercial office.

The appart is nice, clean et light. The space looks smaller than in photos but still good. the master bedroom doesn't have a door to lock between living room and the bedroom. It should be announce in the description. The terrace is great !

Apartment is super central (nice bakery directly next to the entrance door) but calm. The big sun terrace above the rooftops of Barcelona is just amazing and invites for having breakfast in the morning or a glass of wine or two before going out at night. We really enjoyed our time there.
Our meet up process went pretty smoothly, the apartment was exactly as pictured, and the location was great! I would definitely recommend staying here.

We had difficulty contacting Louis because we had limited WiFi access while we were aboard a cruise ship 3 weeks prior to our arrival in Barcelona. We were met by another person at the apartment who let us leave our luggage there while it was being cleaned from the previous guests. We also left our luggage there after we checked out for a few hours.

Not the best. Though the location was perfect for our trip agenda, there were a few issues with the apartment. On AirBNB, the apartment was advertised to sleep 5 people, however since the futon was inoperable - one of the guests had to sleep on the floor for all three nights. Moreover, there was a strong unpleasant odor in the apartment - not proven but just based on our own experience we thought could be mold since All 5 guests got sick while staying here. The strong odors coming from the apartment were obvious the moment we walked in until the time that we left. The apartment did not seem clean, and there was physical mold in the freezer. There were clothes hanging on the balcony from a previous persons stay. Also in the air bnb ad it does not note this is the top floor of a 5 floor walk up. There is an elevator but it is quite small. Overall, we wished for a clean stay and many of us became sick after staying in this apartment.

No recomendamos en absoluto este apartamento por las siguientes razones:

- En primer lugar, pensábamos que el piso lo alquilaba Luis (un particular), pero la realidad es que Luis es el dueño de la agencia que alquila el apartamento (Aparteasy). No logramos hablar con él hasta el último día (y solo por teléfono). Nos decepcionó bastante el servicio de dicha agencia.

- Desde que entramos en el piso, notamos olores nauseabundos procedentes de las tuberías. Además, el aire que sale del aparato de aire acondicionado huele muy mal, hasta tal punto que no pudimos ponerlo. Además, estaba roto y salía agua, por lo que tuvimos que poner un cubo, con apenas espacio para sentarnos en la mesa.

- Al llegar al piso nos encontramos sin papel higiénico, bolsas de basura ni papel de cocina (algo que consideramos básico a la hora de alquilar un piso). Tuvimos que comprar todo nosotros ya que no recibimos respuesta de la agencia hasta el día siguiente. No entiendo para qué pagamos servicio de limpieza si a nuestra llegada no hay nada de lo necesario y además nos encontramos con toallas sucias tendidas en la terraza (que en la agencia nos dicen que usemos) y manchas en los cojines y las paredes (incluso una huella de perro).

- Cuando nos recibieron en el piso, no nos mostraron cómo funcionaba nada. Tardamos media hora en averiguar como se abría el sofá-cama; casi tiramos la toalla al pensar que estaba roto.

- La cerradura de la puerta está rota y no podemos cerrar desde fuera ni desde dentro. Esto no nos hace ninguna gracia, ya que dejamos nuestras pertenencias en el piso. La puerta del baño tampoco cerraba.

- La chica que nos dio las llaves nos pidió 20 euros en concepto de tasas de turismo. Aunque esta tasa aparece marcada en AirBnb, no nos parece profesional de su parte el no avisar, ya que es la agencia la que cobra esta tasa y no AirBnb, y es una tasa propia de Cataluña, no impuesta por AirBnb.

- Las fotos que aparecen en la web son muy engañosas, ya que el piso parece muchísimo más grande de lo que realmente es. No nos parece en ningún caso un piso para 5 adultos, como mucho para una pareja con niños.

- Solo hay un baño y es diminuto. Me parece vergonzoso que en la página anuncien este piso como una vivienda para cinco personas.

- Las vistas desde la terraza son penosas (solo antenas y terrazas en mal estado), mientras que en las fotos de la agencia aparecía una vista desde arriba, como si fuera desde la terraza, de la Plaza de Cataluña.

Hemos estado ya en varias ocasiones en pisos alquilados con AirBnb y siempre hemos tenido gratas experiencias y nuestras expectativas se han visto superadas. Consideramos que el piso, tal como nos lo han presentado, no vale el precio que hemos pagado. 

Para terminar, los problemas causados han perjudicado en gran medida nuestra estancia en Barcelona.

Malgré des difficultés à joindre notre hôte, une personne est venue nous ouvrir la porte de l'appartement. Le ménage était fait et le lavage séchait sur la terrasse. Nous avons été enchanté de la localisation de l'appartement, idéale, à deux pas de la place Catalunya et de la cathédrale. L'appartement entièrement rénové était conforme à la description et la petite terrasse s'est avérée idéale pour la prise de repas, le matin et en soirée. Pour améliorer l'expérience, notre hôte aurait intérêt à faire un petit document explicatif : mot de passe du wi-fi (le routeur était dissimulé sous le sofa et le mot de passe sous le routeur!), gestion des vidanges, sacs de poubelles en surplus, literie plus complète, liste des accomodations près de l'appartement, un deuxième set de clés pour l'autonomie des chacun des visiteurs, etc.

name: Single Room Near the City Centre
summary: This is a single room in a sharehouse. We have more rooms in the same house, which may suit large groups.  Conveniently located near metro station (10-minute walk), shops, cafés and 20 minutes to Matosinhos (beach) by bus (stop is 200 metres from the house). There is a large outdoor area where guests can relax. The area is quiet and safe. Unlike the rest of Porto, our suburb is mostly flat, which makes walking more pleasant.
space: -We have more rooms in the house so groups of friends can stay together in the same house (in separate rooms).
description: This is a single room in a sharehouse. We have more rooms in the same house, which may suit large groups.  Conveniently located near metro station (10-minute walk), shops, cafés and 20 minutes to Matosinhos (beach) by bus (stop is 200 metres from the house). There is a large outdoor area where guests can relax. The area is quiet and safe. Unlike the rest of Porto, our suburb is mostly flat, which makes walking more pleasant. -We have more rooms in the house so groups of friends can stay together in the same house (in separate rooms). kitchen, outdoor space You will share the house with other airbnb guests. We live downstairs and we are always around to make sure guests are comfortable. We live downstairs and will be available when needed. The area is quiet and safe. Unlike the rest of Porto, our suburb is mostly flat, which makes walking more pleasant. There are buses nearby (going to the city and Matosinhos Beach) and metro stations (Hospital São João and IPO are both a ten-minute wal
neighborhood_overview: The area is quiet and safe. Unlike the rest of Porto, our suburb is mostly flat, which makes walking more pleasant.
notes: If you're on a budget, I can add an extra single bed or mattress for an extra person for an extra 5 euros a night (but please note it's a small room).
transit: There are buses nearby (going to the city and Matosinhos Beach) and metro stations (Hospital São João and IPO are both a ten-minute walk from the house)
access: kitchen, outdoor space
interaction: You will share the house with other airbnb guests. We live downstairs and we are always around to make sure guests are comfortable. We live downstairs and will be available when needed.
house_rules: - Smoking outside only -Don't slam doors please -Clean after yourself; this especially pertains to the bathroom. If hair shedding (hair falling out) happens to you, please sweep/pick up any hairs left on the floor before you leave.

host.host_about:
I'm Rafael. My wife is Pamela.
I was born and raised in Brazil but left when I was 19. I've lived in Canada,  Australia and Portugal and have been to a dozen other countries. Pamela is also from Brazil.

reviews.comments:
Pamela and Rafael are really nice hosts. They are friendly, courteous and helpful. The private room, the kitchen  and the bathrooms were tidy. 
Most important: The Bed was really comfy. 
I was satisfied!

This place is an amazing deal! The bed was very very comfortable. 4 min walk from a bus that drops you off in the center of town. It's about a 15 min ride and well worth it for the private space and lower rate. Rafael was very helpful. Place was clean. I recommend it.
very good stay, very nice and accomodating
Very nice hosts and very nice flat.  We liked it a lot and recommend it.

Good location to Metro(guranteed seats), proximate to shopping malls, tranquil living environment. Although it is a shared house with other Airbnb residents, the sound-proof was exceptionally good. For solo travelers, the host provides basic hygiene product like shampoo, toothpaste and towel, which is perfectly considerate. Definitely would recommend anyone who visit Porto to accomodate here.
J'ai adoré vivre dans cette maison avec mes colocataires d'une semaine. Ils ont été très accueillants et chaleureux sans être envahissants.

Uma área sossegada sem grandes barulhos à noite, a 2 minutos da paragem de autocarro que vos leva à baixa do Porto. Perto de um supermercado, multibanco e vários cafés, restaurantes e pastelarias. Cama bem confortável. A hospitalidade, a preocupação e a simpatia fez-nos sentir em casa. Um espaço que vale a pena ficar :)

Christina doesn't speak English, but she is very sweet and other house mates helped me a lot.  The location was bit far from downtown and beach(about 20-30min by bus. It was sometime late.) although there was the best local bakery, some grocery stores, cafes, and very quiet and safe area.  The house is very clean , and there is a nice backyard.  I had a great time in the area.
Chambre conforme à la description. Nous avons passé de bonnes nuits avec un matelas confortable et pas de bruit
Nice room, good atmosphere of the shared house, all required equipments!
Great host very friendly and helpful. No issues.

The contact with the hosts is very quick and brief. 
The house is big enough, there you can find the space for laundry, cooking and even terrace. Our stay at Ribeira Grande was nice and safe.
Todo perfecto, amabilidad y buena comunicación. Nos explicaron con detalle y nos dieron recomendaciones acerca de transporte y puntos de interés.
Très bon accueil. Je recommande.

Bonjour ,

Nous sommes un jeune couple ayant l'habitude de voyager et de prendre des AirBNB. 

Nous déconseillons fortement les chambres proposées par Cristina. C'est un vrai bordel!! 

Le logement était sale et la chambre étouffante. Nous sommes restés seulement pour dormir , mais impossible de se reposer!

L'isolation est inexistante et nulle! Et il y a environ 8 chambres collées qui sont louées malgré l’absence d’isolation. Personne ne respecte rien, les chambres sont laissées ouvertes, le son de la musique fort, les rires a haute voix,etc. Et cela même à 1h du matin!!!
C'est vrai que ce n’est pas un 5*, mais un minimum d'éducation serait fortement apprécié ! Nous avons été facturé 63€ pour deux nuits et c'est inadmissible car les chambres ne valent pas plus de 10€ la nuit (et encore on est gentil). Nous allons demander à AirBNB d'être remboursé  en partie, car c'est de la pure arnaque et on devrait pas autoriser ces personnes louer des chambres sans aucun contrôle ! Il y a des limites!! Ou alors il faut noter que c'est une sorte d'auberge de jeunesse!

Un conseil: dormir dehors c'est mieux que  ce logement où les hôtes se baladent en nuisette dans les couloirs.
Christina is very nice and helpful person. Room is clean and comfortable. House is located close to metro and buses and it's take around 15-20 min to get to centrum.
I had a good stay at Pamela's place. The room was part of a shared flat who is rent by lovely Brazilians. I could also use the washing machine right after my arrival. Obrigado por tudo!

name: Private Bedroom w River View in Downtown Manhattan
summary: Fully furnished bedroom in a luxury building with doorman, elevator, laundry room, gym, and swimming pool. The room has a gorgeous view of the Hudson river. The bathroom and kitchen are shared with me. I am clean, quiet, and friendly.
space: Room includes a queen sized bed with washed sheets, comforter, bath towel, desk, and tv.
description: Fully furnished bedroom in a luxury building with doorman, elevator, laundry room, gym, and swimming pool. The room has a gorgeous view of the Hudson river. The bathroom and kitchen are shared with me. I am clean, quiet, and friendly. Room includes a queen sized bed with washed sheets, comforter, bath towel, desk, and tv. Located right next to Brookfield Place, which is connected to the Oculus. 5-10 minutes away from subway lines 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, A, C, J, Z, R, E, and PATH This is a flex room, which is a room made by splitting the living room in half with a wooden wall, professionally installed. In New York there are laws around flex rooms, the wall has to have a one foot space on the ceiling. This means that you might be able to hear somebody in the kitchen or living room, but usually I don't use those areas much when I'm home.
neighborhood_overview: Located right next to Brookfield Place, which is connected to the Oculus.
notes: This is a flex room, which is a room made by splitting the living room in half with a wooden wall, professionally installed. In New York there are laws around flex rooms, the wall has to have a one foot space on the ceiling. This means that you might be able to hear somebody in the kitchen or living room, but usually I don't use those areas much when I'm home.
transit: 5-10 minutes away from subway lines 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, A, C, J, Z, R, E, and PATH

reviews.comments: Perfect location, chill host, and great room. Thanks Xiaomin!
Great host!
The location is amazing. My stay was very comfortable. Very simple but perfect when in NYC. I would highly recommend staying with Roly.

name: Duo· Sleeps 9! 4Bedroom/2Bath/2Kitchen/2Parking
summary: Aloha! This listing is a way for a large group of travelers to book both of my apartments at the convenience of staying on the same property.  The remodeled apartment building is walking distance from Leonard's, Waikiki , Honolulu Zoo, dining options, freeway entrances & exits, Safeway, and Starbucks. You’ll love its central location to local spots, the breathtaking view of Diamond Head from the rooftop, and private balcony.  Each apartment will have a complimentary bottle of wine and coffee.
space: **UPDATE FEBRUARY 2018: You spoke, and we listened! Soundproof, sliding windows were installed to significantly reduce traffic noise** Signing up for Airbnb for the first time? Follow this link to get $40 off your first booking! https://abnb.me/e/ZE3DGiXwTG The owners of the building placed importance on guests' safety. There are iron gates securing each stairwell, and they are in the process of installing security cameras.  The building went through an EXTENSIVE renovation, so a majority of the appliances and flooring are brand new. The entire interior and exterior of the building were repainted and the floors were stripped and reinstalled. The current "street view" is outdated and doesn’t do the building any justice.  See for yourself, and take a look at the photos!  The Diamond Head Emerald is ready to book for your Hawaiian vacation! Passwords for Wifi will be given upon payment.  There is a coin-operated laundry room on the first floor for guests to use. Each load takes 8 quarters
