neighborhood_overview: Kapahulu is a gem to live in due to the array of food options and central location.  The building is a 15-20 minute walk away from Honolulu Zoo and about a 30 minute walk away from Waikiki Beach.  Safeway is located about 5 minutes away for grocery needs.
notes: Waikiki is full of activities, so expect neighborhood noise. Please no smoking or burning incense indoors.  Lost key fee is $50, Lockout fee is $20. TA Tax(10.25%) and Hawaii GE Tax(4.16%) and an extra tax for Oahu locations (0.5%) are all included in the room rate.
transit: This vacation rental comes with 2 FREE reserved parking stalls for preferably compact or full-sized sedans. Jeeps, trucks, SUVs, and vans might have difficulty. ($100/day value. Parking in Waikiki is expensive.) Bikeshare Hawaii is launching its bike-sharing program (BIKI) at the end of June 2017. Check out the station right across the street by Safeway! Be sure to check out the bus routes that pass right in front of the building!  Bus stop #4129 travelling EAST bound: #13, #14, #24 Bus stop #4014 travelling WEST bound: #13, #14, #24
access: The whole suite and open air balcony is available for the guests to enjoy.
interaction: I am available via text/phone/email. I check my phone regularly and will respond as soon as I can.
house_rules: - Turn off all lights and appliances when leaving the unit - Guests under the age of 18 need to be accompanied by parents or guardians - Take your shoes off at the entrance

host.host_about:
Hello! 

I was born and raised in Oahu, and I left for a few years to graduate from a mainland university. But during my years away, Hawaii has always called me home. I returned to Honolulu, Hawaii in 2013 and graduated from the University of Hawaii with my Master's degree.

My mom and I welcome travelers and families to our cozy apartment because we know that booking hotels can be expensive, stressful, and impersonal. We hope to make our guests’ stay in Hawaii memorable--whether it be for a quick getaway or for a few, relaxing weeks. 

Guests will have the opportunity to try different dining options, or shop at the local farmers’ market or grocery store and cook a private meal in the stocked kitchen. 

I check my phone and email throughout the day, so feel free to contact me whichever way is more convenient.

reviews.comments: I typically struggle to find safe, clean, and affordable rentals that can accommodate our groups of boarding school students and field trip chaperones so I was thrilled to find this property in Honolulu! Having three apartments to spread our group of 11 across was a lifesaver! Emerald was courteous, responsive, and dedicated to creating an enjoyable guest experience. It is apparent that she is an experienced and competent property manager. On our second day we requested additional bedding and Emerald had her fiancee run them by before bedtime that night. The bathrooms were stocked with toiletries, towels, laundry detergent, and sunscreen. The bedrooms were clean with plenty of mirrors, which is a huge perk when you have seven teenage girls trying to get ready all at once. We occasionally felt a bit cramped in the sleeping spaces but that was due to our policy that students can't share beds. Large families, couples, and groups of friends would sleep very comfortably if some folks shared beds. The TVs and provided DVDs in the living rooms were awesome when the kids were winding down at night. There is no AC but the fans were super effective and we stayed cool and comfortable in the 80* heat.  The neighborhood is vibrant and active, and it is a short walk to a Safeway grocery store. There are tons of yummy and surprisingly affordable restaurants close to the listing. We recommend Konos, Da Ono, and Leonards (of course). We originally on using "The Bus" for transportation but we were stoked that Waikiki was a safe, easy, and quick (10-15 minute) walk from the apartments. The provided parking spots were a lifesaver when we rented a Jeep for a trip to Kailua. There are also a multitude of Lyfts available in this neighborhood so you could easily skip renting a car. The apartments are next to a main artery of the city and there is a bar across the street that was busy Thursday-Monday but Emerald prepped us about the possibility of neighborhood noise if we chose to sleep with the windows open. Between the earplugs we packed and the fans that Emerald provided noise was a non-issue, and we got a kick out of listening to the fun bands and karaoke singers while we relaxed on the balcony. Thank you Emerald!
Emeralds place was exactly as described.  Clean and in a great location, you couldn’t ask for a better host than her!
Emerald’s place is great we had a group of 9 stay across 3 of Emerald’s appartments. The location is really convenient with a supermarket across the road and lots of great food places in the area.
Very nice apartment. Easy check in checkout process. We can walk 20 mins to the beach. House has almost all stuff you need for cooking.

Amazing stay at Emerald, location was great everything was 15-20 minutes away. Communication was good as well! Very detailed with the instructions for the place! Overall, definitely recommend staying here!

what a great what a great place to stay! It was about a 20-minute walk to the beach, great restaurants nearby, Safeway was a five minute walk, designated parking, locked Gates made you feel safe. The apartments were the perfect size and they were clean. We had a group of 11 people, and we all enjoyed our stay at Emerald's!

For our group of twelve, Emerald’s apartments were A+. Every apartment is cozy without feeling crowded. Each room was fully stocked and ready for use! The location was ideal - a short walk to Waikiki beach, close to great brunch spots, and it never felt far from a great place to souvenir shop. Overall, a great experience.

This is a great location, close to eating places and the beach. Emerald had great communication and was quick to respond to any inquiries that I had. I wish it had air conditioning but other than that I enjoyed my stay.
Great place and great hospitality, Emerald was amazing and always quick to respond and have suggestions!
host is kind  and good respond
Nice

The visit to Hawaii (Oahu) and the use of AirBnB was the first for my family, and Emerald’s place and hospitality was ideal for the occasion. We very much appreciated its location (central to many attractions), cleanliness, and prompt communication offered to us during our first visit to Hawaii.
Ok

name: Sagrada Familia-auditorium. FREE WI-FI.
summary: Cheap apartment, 45 m2 with a license from the City of Barcelona, 2 bedrooms for a maximum of 4 people with TV, air conditioning and Wi-Fi.  Perfect for enjoying your stay in Barcelona. Close to the Sagrada Familia, well connected to the Beach, with the Ramblas just 2200m away.
space: The apartment is located in front of the Auditorium and Teatro Nacional of Catalunya (Catalonia's National Theatre), close to the Monumental Line 2 and Glories Line 1 metro stations. And at short walk from the Sagrada Familia. It opens onto a spacious exterior patio, typical of the Eixample neighborhood, quiet, and without noise from vehicles. There are two bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with two comfortable single bunks, 190 cm by 90 cm, and a sofa-bed in the dining room. The living room has TV, HIFI, personal computer and functional decorations. Free Wi-Fi. The apartment is just at a 5-10 minute walking distance from Gaudi's Sagrada Familia, and a 15 minute walking distance from the Villa Olímpica beach or 20 minutes from the Plaza Catalunya.  The Monumental metro station is 2 stops from the Paseo de Gracia, and the Marina station is 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. There is a tranvia stop 50 m away that connects you to the beach in just 4 stops. There are
description: Cheap apartment, 45 m2 with a license from the City of Barcelona, 2 bedrooms for a maximum of 4 people with TV, air conditioning and Wi-Fi.  Perfect for enjoying your stay in Barcelona. Close to the Sagrada Familia, well connected to the Beach, with the Ramblas just 2200m away. The apartment is located in front of the Auditorium and Teatro Nacional of Catalunya (Catalonia's National Theatre), close to the Monumental Line 2 and Glories Line 1 metro stations. And at short walk from the Sagrada Familia. It opens onto a spacious exterior patio, typical of the Eixample neighborhood, quiet, and without noise from vehicles. There are two bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with two comfortable single bunks, 190 cm by 90 cm, and a sofa-bed in the dining room. The living room has TV, HIFI, personal computer and functional decorations. Free Wi-Fi. The apartment is just at a 5-10 minute walking distance from Gaudi's Sagrada Familia, and a 15 minute walking distance from the Villa Olímpi
neighborhood_overview: Good for families, couples, etc. It is an old building, typical of the era when it was built. The area is very quiet and safe, in the historic Eixample neighborhood, a very well-lit and safe area 24 hours a day. The apartment is right next to a hotel and in front of the Auditorio de Barcelona (Barcelona Auditorium) and the Teatro Nacional de Catalunya (Catalonia's National Theatre). A police station is nearby, and a walk-in clinic, drugstores, hospitals nearby, shopping centers, markets, supermarkets, dollar stores, restaurants, bars, and a very, very safe area. In the area you can find bars where you can eat a fixed price menu for 9 or 10 Euros, Spanish tapas bars or a restaurant with a Michelin star.
notes: You can live in the center of Barcelona, 2000 meters from Las Ramblas, but without the annoyances and the buildup of the historic center. You will live like a true Barcelona native, at a good price, without paying more just because you are a tourist, much cheaper than a hotel and with the independence and privacy of your own apartment. It is very well connected, with the train and bus stations at a 8 minute walking distance (you can take day trips to the Costa Brava, Sitges, Museu Dali de Figueres, Montserrat, etc.), and buses, metro and tranvia nearby. If you need information about getting to and from the airport, just ask.
transit: There is a metro 300 meters away with 2 different lines, Line 1 at Glorias Station and Line 2 at Monumental Station, the tranvia is 100 meters away from Playa de la Villa Olimpica, there are buses right outside the door including the night bus at Plaza Catalunya, Ramblas, and at a 15 minute walking distance from Paseo de Gracia or the Borne, the bohemian neighborhood of Barcelona. Las Ramblas and the fuente de Canaletes are just 2200 meters away.
access: Fully-equipped detached kitchen so that you can prepare your own food and save money, fully-equipped with combined refrigerator, microwave, capsule expresso maker, kettle, toaster, and full tableware for 4 people. 32 inch TV with more than 70 channels, including international channels, musicals, movies, documentaries, etc.  Bathroom with toilet, shower with hot water, sink, soap and shampoo, towels, hairdryer, etc. Washing machine and iron. I can also offer transportation services to the airport, and anything else you may need. You can also reserve car parking for an additional price.
interaction: I will receive you; I live very near the apartment, so if you need information I am fully at your disposal, to advise you about your stay in Barcelona.
house_rules: Respetar el descanso de los otros  vecinos y comportarse con normalidad y sentido común,no es un hotel, es un edificio de vecinos,ninguna norma  más, son sus vacaciones¡¡¡. No fiestas, no música muy alta a partir de las 22 h. Animales autorizados bajo consulta previa. Acordarse de sacar la basura a los containers de la calle de color gris.

host.host_about:
Me llamo Miguel, y tengo un  apartamento de alquiler económico que se encuentra a cinco minutos a pie de mi propia casa. En consecuencia, estoy disponible casi en todo momento para ayudarle durante su estancia.

Mi propiedad está asegurada,autorizada y registrada oficialmente en la "Direcció General de Turisme de Catalunya ' y en el Ayuntamiento de Barcelona.

También puedo organizar otras actividades, como, transportes al aeropuerto y desde el aeropuerto, y todo lo que necesiten y les interese para ahorrar dinero y tener una feliz estancia en Barcelona, por nombrar sólo unos pocos. Si necesita algo especial, sólo hay que preguntar y si puedo organizarlo para ti lo haré.

Si usted está buscando un lugar en Barcelona que se encuentra en el centro de la ciudad, y muy bien comunicado, pruebe mi apartamento y espero convencerlos.

reviews.comments:
Hi,

Miguel is perfect host. He waited for us at the apartment, with fridge stuffed with all the basic things we might need from day one.  Apartment has all you might need during the stay: equipped kitchen, bathroom, Internet, elevator in the builidng. Also, hi printed out few maps of local shops and restaurants, for us to enjoy the neighborhood. 
Place was clean and as shown in pictures. Location is excellent: not in the crowded and noisy Rambla, but in a walking distance of it. There are 2 metro lines near by, as well as some other public transport options. If you like walking, you can reach all major tourist attraction on foot.

Five stars for Miguel.

We really enjoyed staying at Miguel's apartment! It is really clean and cosy. Miguel is very helpful, showed us where to go and how to get there and always responded very fast. We would definitely recommend this apartment and its host :-) we hope to come back here!
Sander & Fleur

I choose Airbnb apartments over hotels when I travel because when I visit a city, I want to feel like I live there: shop at the local supermarket, ride the metro, stay in a mostly-local area, greet your 'neighbours' in the hallway in broken, awkward Spanish. I also want to have my own kitchen to cook breakfast, a washing machine to do laundry (especially if you travel light - I don't!). Miguel's apartment met these expectations perfectly. It was comfortable (the bed especially), clean and looks like it does in the photos. The free Wifi was excellent and fast (and very useful).

Its location is close enough to Barcelona city centre (La Rambla, Plaça de Catalunya) and being on Metro Line 1, you're no more than 4-5 stops away from any major sight, including the beach; and actually it's within walking distance of the Sagrada Familia, Torre Agbor and Glories shopping centre.

What sealed it for me was the personal welcome gift from Miguel: some authentic Spanish chorizo (delicious), a couple of cold beers (again, very useful) and a bottle of Spanish bubbly. It's these personal touches that make staying in a place like Miguel's worth it. 

Highly recommended. Thanks Miguel (and to your sister)!

Nice comfortable house, in a quiet beautiful neighborhood. 15 mins walking distance to port olimpic, 15 minutes walk to plaza catalunya and very close to metro, tram and bus stops. 
Miguel is a very friendly guy, he prepared our stay with clean towels, had a laptop for us and even beers, and a bottle of wine! 
Great place!

Great place with a fantastic location away from the busy tourist areas. Walking never took us more then 25 mins to reach the important attractions. Miguel was great and extremely helpful with recommendations of where to eat and how to get around. Even had a 12 pack of local beer nice and cold waiting for us in the fridge. Highly recommend if planning to go to Barcelona.

Very kind owner, offered us milk juice and wine...
Good location for tourists, you can get beach and  church easily

Apartment is comfortable and clean. It includes all what you may need.
Location is perfect: not noizy neighborhood, but in walking distance of center (Rambla, Gracia and Catalunia sqare are in 10 minutes walking).

Miguel is a very friendly host, it's a pleasure to met him.

O Miguel foi fantastico, o seu apartamento nao podia estar melhor localizado, esta perto do centro, mas com uma calma e silencio maravilhoso.
O seu excelente ar condicionado funciona muito bem.
A simpatia do Miguel superou todas as nossas expectativas. Aconcelho vivamente.

Miguel's hospitality cannot be overestimated. He gave us all necessary information about local transportation, nearby shops, pharmacies, etc. All facilities in the apartment were shown and explained. Moreover, he left us with six-pack of local beer in the fridge!
Description of the apartment is very accurate, with no tricks or marketing lies. It looks exactly as on website pictures. In my opinion price/quality relationship is excellent.

This is our first bnb apartment and Miguel has definitely set a high standard for us. He was very friendly, professional and made us feel welcome. The apartment is clean, compact, fully functional and conveniently located. Miguel has kindly provided all the essentials such as coffee, milk, sugar, cooking oil, toiletries etc. The aparment is close to cafes, bars, mini markets and a metro station (monumental). Only 10 - 15 min walk to sagrada familia. The shower cubicle is smaller than normal - larger people might find it a challenge to get in. But we understand that small shower cubicles is normal for central city apartments in europe. Oh, and Miguel also provides a laptop and the wifi is amazing. Overall we had a great stay at Miguel's apartment and we couldnt ask for more.

Our stay at Miguel’s apartment was very pleasent and he is an exceptionally accommodating and easy-going host. Prior to my arrival I emailed him so many times because of booking hassle, then flight delay etc, but he always got back to my emails immediately and is very helpful, stocked the fridge with juice, milk and beer, and welcomed me with some Spanish treats. We stayed at the apartment with two people at first, one in the two bedrooms each, but even with someone sleeping in the living room it is easy to do. The apartment and rooms are small, but have everything you need, clean and quiet (and thus great to sleep in). There is air-condition which I at first thought we wouldn’t need, but without it it got really warm and humid during the rests of the Barcelonean summer, so I was happy we had it.

All in all I can only recommend staying at Miguel’s apartment. It is easy to reach by public transport, and we had a great week in Barcelona!

Miguel made us feel extremely welcome. He had a plate of delicious chorizo for us on arrival, and the fridge was stocked with water, milk, juice, soft drink and beer. Miguel is also very well prepared for visitors with a file folder containing useful information and maps, as well as providing a laptop for our use.
The apartment is exactly as described and as the photos show. It is quite spacious with more than enough room for two people. The shower stall is smaller than we're used to in Australia and larger people may have trouble getting in and out.
The location is quite good being within 5 minutes walk to a metro station, about 15 minutes walk to Sagrada Familia and about 20 minutes walk to the beach. There is a supermarket on the same street and numerous restaurants and cafés nearby.
We would definitely recommend Miguel's apartment.

Miguel ist ein sehr symphatischer und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber.  Die Wohnung ist zwar keine Luxusunterkunft, bietet aber alles, was 2-4 Gäste benötigen. Besonders hervorzuheben ist die Lage der Wohnung in einem ruhigen, aber verkehrsgünstigen Viertel. Metro, Tram und Bus sind 5 Minuten entfernt. Viele Sehenswürdigkeiten sind in 15-30 Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen. Vor dem Haus befindet sich auch eine Fahrradverleih-Station. Für Gäste, deren Flüge in Gerona landen und starten, ist es ein großer Vorteil, dass der Busbahnhof Nord nur 5-8 Minuten entfernt ist, sodass kein Taxitransport erforderlich ist. Supermärkte und preisgünstige Restaurants befinden sich nahebei. 
Alles in allem sehr empfehlenswert.

El apartamento de Miguel es muy acogedor, y con todo lujo de detalles, desde poder prepararte un rico desayunito con café rico, puntos de luz preciosos para dar calidez a la estancia e internet :) . La situación es estupenda, pues a pie o en metro te puedes mover facilmente. Y un 10 a su amabilidad. Altamente recomendable!

Miguel is a fantastic host who will help you in anyway he can to make both your stay in his apartment, and your visit to Barcelona comfortable, safe and fun.  The apartment is clean and quiet and in great neighborhood where you can either walk or take the nearby metro.  I would most definitely recommend staying here.  Thank you Miguel.

The apartment was really nice and clean and is exactly like shown in the photos. The apartment is also good for older people (I was here with my mom), because there is an elevator in the building.
Miguel was a perfect host, he provided us with everything we needed and even got us a map as well as some milk, beer, coffee and water.
There are two subway stations near the apartment and both are only a few minutes away and Sacrada Familia is located in walking distance.
I highly recommend Miguel's apartment if you want to explore the city.
Thank you very much Miguel, we had a great time!

We really enjoyed our 4 night stay  in Miguel’s Sagrada Familia Auditori apartment in Barcelona– our first experience with AirBnB and a great introduction to the system.  Miguel is an excellent host, our pre-arrival communications were efficient and prompt. He also gave us lots of info and maps to plan our stay.The apartment is comfortable and exactly as described. We just found the shower a little narrow to get into, it would definitely be a challenge if you were not slim! There was orange juice, milk and cold beers in the fridge, plus all basic provisions such as tea, coffee, condiments, oil etc. WiFi was fast and reliable and TV and sound system worked well. 
The location is fantastic, a lovely quiet neighbourhood and close to metro, many small cafes, supermarkets and shops nearby. We felt like locals, not tourists when we participated in  the Palm Sunday celebrations at a lovely Parish church around the corner. We highly recommend this apartment and its genial host Miguel.

Miguel est un hôte formidable, il nous a acceptés à quelque jour de notre arrivé (désistement d'un autre hôte), il a répondu très vite à notre demande. 
Il est venu nous accueillir à mi chemin, nous a fourni le plan de la ville et il nous a expliqués comment se rendre à un endroit.
L'appartement quand a lui est magnifique très bien équipé et propre.
Nous vous recommandons cette appartement car il est super 
De plus Miguel nous a offert un saucisson du lait et de la bière et un paquet de biscuit

Miguel was a good host. He was unable to receive us personally, but let us know ahead of time his sister Carolina would be waiting for us instead. Carolina was very welcoming. The apartment was clean and well-taken care of, as pictured. The location was great, central, near tourist locations,  and in a safe neighborhood. We would recommend this apartment, which could comfortably fit a family of four.

Miguel est un hôte trés agréable! Il est disponible et à l'écoute du moindre de nos besoins!
Grâce à lui et à ses conseils nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Barcelone! 
L'appartement est en tout point conforme à la description. Il est trés bien situé (à proximité du métro, des commerces et même de la vieille ville qui est accessible à pieds) et trés agréable! On y trouve tout le nécessaire pour passer un agréable séjour! (y compris des produits de première nécessité : lait, eau, café, thé, bière, biscuits, gel douche, shampoing, ...)
Merci beaucoup Miguel pour votre accueil trés chaleureux, pour vos conseils et votre disponibilité!
Si nous repassons par Barcelone, nous retournerons chez Miguel sans crainte! :)

Miguel was a great host. Met us at the apartment and even supplied us with some beer, juice and milk. The apartment is in a really nice location and Miguel gave us some helpful hints about the surrounding area. It is walking distance to some attractions and easy access to public transport. Barcelona is a great city and we will try and stay here when we return again!

Мигель очень отзывчивый арендодатель. Он всегда на связи и готов помочь не только в вопросах квартиры, но и рассказать о городе и достопримечательностях, помочь в других вопросах. Очень удобно, как будто приехал к родственникам, даже не ожидали. А какой нас ждал прием - его сестра приготовила нам сюрприз в холодильнике и так радушно нас встретила, все показала и объяснила. Квартира отличная! Расположена очень удачно, почти в центре города, 20 минут пешком до пляжа, все достопримечательности близко, ветка метро L1 тоже очень удобна. Несколько комнат, балкон, вся необходимая техника, в том числе стиральная машина, что очень важно когда едешь на пляж (мне не хватало посудомойки, но это не страшно, мы просто лентяи, привыкшие к ней). На полках было много информации о Барселоне и достопримечательностях, подробная карта города и др. Также в квартире мы нашли справочник со всей необходимой информацией о квартире, технике в ней (включая инструкции), паролем от wi-fi и др. Видно, что хозяин заботится о гостях, что очень приятно. У нас остались только положительные впечатления, рекомендуем!

Appart très sympa et propre dans un quartier plutôt calme mais bien situé (la Sagrada Familia est à 10-15min à pied, le vieux centre et la plage sont faciles d'accès). Miguel nous a vraiment très bien accueillies (spécialité locale à l'arrivée, quelques courses pour commencer le séjour, accès à un ordinateur...) et s'est mis en quatre pour nous en nous donnant plein de conseils et en restant disponible pour toutes nos questions. Il nous a même aidées à garer notre voiture ! :)
Nous avons passé un super séjour à Barcelone et n'hésiterons pas à recommander cet appartement.
Muchas gracias Miguel !!
Miguel,s place is in a good location close to some major attractions.

I had a nice short stay at Miguel's place. Miguel is a great host and provides good information. The area is pretty quiet, wifi was reliable, the hot water was out the first day then fixed that same day when I contacted Miguel. Nice for a short stay, but there are more lively neighborhoods to stay in in Barcelona. Not bad if you don't mind walking 10-30min to get to places. Definite caution as The shower is quite small if you are a bigger person. And lastly, the bed in the main bedroom was not comfortable. Overall I would recommend for a short stay, or overnight or just a waiting pad until you move to your next stay.

Nous avons bien apprécié notre séjour.  L'appartement  est bien situé pour accéder aux différents points d'intérêts, propre et bien organisé. Nous avons aussi grandement apprécié la gentillesse et la disponibilité de Miguel.

Miguel was an amazing host.  He was extremely helpful and went out of his way to accomadate us. The apartment is within a 5 minute walk to la sagrada familia and 2 minute walk to the metro.  I would absolutely recommend this place and Miguel as a host to anyone staying in Barcelona. He also lives really close if you need help with anything.

Miguel est sympathique et disponible. Le logement est bien situé, propre et correspond à la description faite dans l'annonce. Il a bien répondu à nos besoins (2 frères).
Barcelone est une très belle ville.
Séjour très agréable.
Paul

Miguel nous a très bien reçu et nous a rendu de nombreux services (bagages, heures d'arrivée et de départ, chauffe eau, ...) Toujours disponible pour nous répondre si on avait une question, serviable, sympatique, efficace. Parfait !
L'appartement était très propre, conforme aux photos, près du métro Gloriès et Monumental qui sont pratique pour aller dans différents endroits de Barcelone.
Miguel est super, il nous a tout de suite mis à l'aise. Il prend le temps d'expliquer les points fort de l'appart et aussi le fonctionnement de la vie Barcelonaise. Je recommande vraiment.

Miguel is a great host, very helpful and attentive. He left us breakfast for the first day and gave us tips for things to do and eat. He was very quick to reply always and there when we needed help.
The apartment is exactly as described. Very clean and a great place for up to for friends or a family.
Very well situated, in fact we barely used public transport as it is easy to walk everywhere!
It made our trip to Barcelona a great experience and we truly felt at home!

I didn't get to meet Miguel, but it was a pleasure to stay at this apartment. We communicated through Airbnb; he was extremely helpful and went out of his way to welcome us – when we arrive late at night. Apartment is as described – wifi was reliable, kitchen fully equipped. We stayed there for 4 nights – and never had to use any public transportation; we walked everywhere.

Miguel was a lovely host. The apartment is great.  It had everything you need.  Miguel met us early, and we really didn't realize how early 9am on a Saturday is in Barcelona.  The sun was just up and nothing was open.   His directions to the apartment from the airport were detailed and helpful.  The apartment is literally across the street from the national theatre and is a nice walk from the Sagrada Familia and from downtown.  The bed is very comfortable.  We'd stay again for sure.

Miguels apartment was in a great location, walkable distance to every main area including clubs (we were 2 Aussie tourists so that was a big plus - walks no longer then 30 mins). An even bigger plus was Miguel himself, very nice guy, left food and beers for us to start, waited outside for us in the cold between 7.30-8.30pm because of our flight which goes over and beyond what you'd expect. Apartment was very clean as well. That being said however, we wouldn't stay here again - only because the beds weren't comfortable and the Internet (for us anyway) was unreliable and we didn't have any other way of contacting the outside world without wifi. If these problems were fixed, the apartment would have been perfect. Side note: walls are pretty thin, you can hear everything in the apartment and everything outside. Wasn't too much of a bother, but just FYI
Todo ha estado muy bien, Miguel es muy amable y ha estado muy atento. El apartamento estaba muy bien equipado y nos ha dejado algunas cosillas en la nevera para recibirnos.
Accueil sympathique, bonne situation dans la ville (métro à proximité), appartement propre et bien entretenu, quartier calme et très bon rapport qualité-prix.
Piso perfecto para pasar una buena estancia en Barcelona: limpio, bien ubicado y con detalles de bienvenida. Miguel es un anfitrión muy atento y que se preocupa para que todo vaya bien.
L'appartement  de Miguel est juste parfait. Super  bien  situé  et très  bien équipé. Merci beaucoup  Miguel  et à  la prochaine.

The apartment was good for a short stay in Barcelona. Miguel even left us breakfast items to welcome us to Spain. Only a few minutes from Sagrada Familia and we enjoyed walking the 20 minutes to city center.

Miguel was a good host and extremely helpful! in kitchen you will find everything you need - breakfast , milk , koffee, juice, and beer !haha.It is also convenient to make meals for the baby.wifi was reliable, I would absolutely recommend this place.

Miguel es un genio super amable y es una persona interesada en que los turistas conozcan bien su querida ciudad. El departamento muy comodo la cocina esta bien equipada. Lo super recomiendo. Gracias por todo Miguel

We had a very nice experience staying at Miguel's place. Though Miguel wasn't able to welcome us personally his sister Carolina was very kind offering us with juice, beer and croissants. We had really good communication before and during our stay in Barcelona. He was very helpful sending us all the directions and responding to our questions. The apartment is nice and well equipped. The district is quiet, you can easy access the most important places in the city and it is well-connected with the center.

Miguel's place is fantastico. It's a few hundred meters from the metro. The surrounding neighborhood is nice, with shops and cafes. The apartment itself is clean, spacious, and very comfortable. The kitchen and bathroom are great, as are the bedrooms. The living room is comfortable and has a nice little window to enjoy the sights of nearby Barcelona :-) I would highly recommend this place. Great host, great apartment, super great experience.

Tanto la casa como el propietario muy bien.
Todo limpio y ordenado, con algunos básicos en la nevera para ahorrarte un primer paseo.
Volvería seguro.

Miguel is a very gracious host. At first we could not figure out what button to press when entering the apartment but luckily a very kind young lady helped us to get in and find it. Miguel's sister was there cleaning the apartment and we had to come back 30min later. Turns out that the apartment had been double booked by two people of the same name and we were not expected until the following day. We were able to stay one night and the apartment is great very spacious and clean with everything you need to cook and do your laundry. We were supposed to stay a second night but as the apartment had been double booked Miguel got us a room at the hotel next door which was very nice. So things did not go as planned but we were very happy with the apartment and Miguel overall was very apologetic and helpful.
3명이서 사용했는데 집이 굉장히 넓고 좋았어요 침대도 편하구요 조리도 마음대로 가능하고 도구도 다있고, 세탁기 사용도 자유라 세탁도 편하게 했구요 너무 편하게 잘있다왔네요 그리고 주인분이 되게 친절하셔요! 한가지 아쉬운점이 있다면 배수시설이 약하다는게 좀 불편했습니다.
Miguel is very kind person. Location is great, apartments are clean and very good. Thank you, Miguel.

Miguel es un gran afitrion, preocupado por la llegada y esperaba con el departamento impecable, nos dio recomendaciones para recorrer la ciudad y lo mas importante mucha información en el mismo departamento sobre Barcelona.
Presto a que lo llames en cualquier momento si es que tienes algún problema y poderte ayudar de ser necesario.
Great experience with our short stay in Barcelona!

A great apartment in Barcelona. Miguel provided clear instructions on how to get there and was easily contactable via the Airbnb app.

The apartment itself is close to a couple of tourist sites and also to public transport.

Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona.

I had a convention at the hub which is 5 minutes walk from the apartment which was great. The smaller room beds are good for children not for adults. overall good place, clean on the small side, no dinning room small living room

The location of the apartment was great. Close to Sagrada Familia and 2 different metro stops. The apartment was great and Miguel's communication was great. We'd definitely stay here again when we return to Barcelona. Thanks for everything Miguel.

Miguel is a fantastic host, super helpful, kind and generous. He made us feel very welcome and provided a great deal of information about Barcelona. The flat is in a great location and short metro ride or walk to many attractions.
Super l'appartement de Miguel pour visiter Barcelone, on s'y sent vraiment bien! Merci. À la prochaine.
Excelente apartamento y ubicación. Tanto Miguel como Carolina (su hermana) tuvieron una excelente predisposición.
Very nice apartment with a comfortable bed. Our host was informative as well as a friendly person. I would recommend this apartment.
Miguel's place is in walking distance of La Sagrada Familia and Glories Metro Station. Clean, comfortable and great kitchen.
Miguel is a responsive and attentive host. The apartment was very clean and met my expectations from the listing -- was great for stay in Barcelona
La descripción del dpto es (Website hidden by Airbnb) limpio.comodo.ventilado .cocina muy bien equipada.cama muy cómoda . El barrio es tranquilo,com muchos súper cerca..y a un paso de todos lados

Miguel was great and very helpful. You can ask him everything about city and he gives you tips/hints how to get there or some recommendations.
The flat was clean and same as on photos.
Miguel was very helpful and flexible on our arrival. Flat as described. Basic and lovely place to sleep. We ran during the days, so perfect for us.

Super clean flat with everything you need. Located in a lovely area where all amenities and access to transportation are close. We definitely enjoyed our stay and will gladly return there.  I didn't get to meet Miguel in person but his sister Carolina took care of everything and welcomed us warmly. Recommended!

집이 깨끗하고 조용한 주택가였습니다
친구랑 둘이서 편안하게 지내다왔습니다
전철역도 가까웠고아웃렛가는 버스가 도보 5분거리의 정류장에서 탈수 있었습니다
It was a nice place. We really enjoyed the stay. Highly recommended.

Miguel is a very kind host...waited for our arrival until midnight and was very cool and friendly. One word: muchas gracias para su hospitalidad :)
Very nice apartment and location is quite good next to la Sagrada familia and 10mns walking from downtown. Everything is functional and ok 

Highly recommended

Merci à Miguel pour sa patience alors que notre vol avait un retard de 2 h, sa disponibilité et ses petites attentions lors de notre arrivée.
L'appartement est conforme à la description, propre, au calme, et très bien situé dans Barcelone : près de 3 stations de métro ( la plus près est Glories ), tram et bus. Idéal pour les marcheurs car le centre (el Born , la Ribera et el Barri Gotic) n'est pas très loin tout comme la Sadraga Familia et le quartier de l'Eixample. J'y retournerai c'est sûr !
Die Sterne sprechen für sich!

It is a good apartmenet -central to the main attraction, by walking. The kitchen is vey good. The apartment is in central neighbourhood which is safe.  Miguel is a wonderful person !
We recommand it !

I spent 4 days in Barcellona and I stayed 3 nights in Miguel apartment with my spouse and our 4 years old child.
When We arrived at 12.30 we met Carolina (Miguel’s sister) who showed us the apartment and was so nice to explain us everything about the house and the neighbourhood.
The apartment was exactly as described and perfectly equipped with everything (fresh and perfumed sheets and towels, all cleaning supplies, shampoo and shower cream, basic food necessities as oil and salt.... they even left for us milk, orange juice and croissants!!!).
In the house you can find also tourist guides, maps and everything you might need to visit Barcellona, you can set the temperature you want with the climate control, beds are comfortable .
The apartment is far from the confusion of town centre but is really near 3 metro station (Monumental L2 and Glories and Marina L1), moreover there’s a wonderful tram line that in few minutes goes directly to villa olimpica (on the see)
At last,  when we had to leave yesterday, Miguel wrote me not to worry about the cleaning .. so we could enjoyed a little bit more this wonderful city.
I's surely sugget to everyone visiting barcellona to rent this apartment.
En casa de Miguel hemos estado muy a gusto, bien situado , Lo recomendaría a gente que quiera venir a visitar la ciudad de Barcelona.

Our stay at Miguel's was great, the apartment is in a great location and everything was very clean and comfortable. Communication was wonderful and very helpful. I would definitely recommend staying here
Riktigt trevlig lägenhet någorlunda centralt. Miguel var oerhört angelägen och hjälpsam, vilket var ett stort plus.

S'agissant du service proposé par Miguel, nous avons été très satisfaits. Miguel est très réactif et a répondu à toutes nos questions lors de la réservation. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Caroline, la sœur de Miguel, qui s'occupe du ménage et l'appartement était très propre. Nous avons particulièrement apprécié que l'on nous ait mis à disposition de préparer un petit déjeuner le lendemain matin de notre arrivée.
Le point fort de l'appartement est sa situation dans Barcelone, près de la station "Gloriès" où tous les transports en commun sont accessibles (Métro, tramway, bus) et à 1/4h à pied de la Sagrada Familia. L'appartement était très propre et la superficie est idéale pour 2 personnes + 2ème chambre avec 2 lits superposés.
Apartamento dotado con lo necesario para estar como en casa. Anfitrion muy especial
Miguel was very quick to respond and pleasant to coordinate with. A cozy apartment with great access into the city, it is in a good, quiet area.

Nous sommes venus passés Avec mon compagnon un week end en avril c'était absolument super, l'appartement nous a parfaitement convenu et il est assez proche à pied si on aime marcher des grands sites.Merci beaucoup Miguel

Ótima localização, próximo a Estação Glories e Monumental, dá para ir a pé à Sagrada Família, Praça da Catalunya, Arco do Triunfo...andamos muito e nos divertimos bastante. Cozinha básica...falta algumas vasilhas para leite, por exemplo; suporte para filtro de café, mas nos viramos bem. vale a pena, sim.
Logement bien situé pour visiter Barcelone.Miguel nous a tres bien reçu Tout etait parfait.

Appartement propre et bien situé. Cependant, assez bruyant du aux travaux de l'appartement voisin et de la cage d'escalier. Une isolation faible, appartement à conseiller mais avec des boules quies pour la nuit. Rapport qualité prix correct, cependant, pas de café pour le matin, on aurait apprécié un vrai petit déjeuner pour le lendemain de notre arrivée. Miguel nous a bien aiguillé, par le site airbnb exclusivement, et cet appartement est situé à 10 minutes de la station monumental, un très bon compromis pour visiter Barcelone sur quelques jours
Todas informações do site são absolutamente corretas e Miguel é um excelente anfitrião.

Miguel was an excellent host we had a late flight and he was there waiting for us when we reached. He ran through everything in the house and gave us a great explanation of where we were staying. The flat itself if lovely, it has everything you need and we were not disappointed. Miguel was also helpful via mail if we needed anything or any help.
el departamento comodo, limpio, excelente ubicacion, los anfitriones geniales, todo perfecto, lo recomiendo a toda persona que tenga que viajar a barcelona

The apartment is located in a quiet place, which allowed undisturbed sleep at night. All of the most popular forms of transport - metro, tram and bus is located close to the apartment and they can quickly go on foot.
Did not know that so close to the bus stop, from which you can get to the beach with a V21 bus. It is found only in the last few days and a pity that did not know at the beginning, to be bathed in the sea every day. Recommendation - the description of the apartment to include this statement.
We, as a northerner, confused window layout inside the ventilation shaft, which was unusual, but just like the built Casa Battlo and Casa Mila, which we visited, and we gained the understanding that, in Spain, that building construction is common.
We want to join the recommendation on the size of the shower from previous visitors Miguel apartment - next bought a little more :)

Thanks for admission
Best regards
Ilmars

A great flat in Barcelona, well located and easy to get around by bus or metro. Miguel was waiting for us late in the evening, due to our late flight and explained everything we needed to know about the flat and kindly left us some things for breakfast in the morning! The flat was quiet with effective air conditioning and plenty of hot water. The shower was a little bit small but this is typical in Spain, I've found. 
Overall, a fantastic host - highly recommended!

Es un apartamento muy cómodo, bien equipado, limpio y fresco, ya que da a un patio interior muy amplio, de manera que también es luminoso. Tiene aire acondicionado, una cocina totalmente equipada, un baño nuevo y muy limpio y un saloncito pequeño pero agradable. Casa tranquila sin demasiados ruidos. Lo recomiendo totalmente.

Miguel was very helpful as was his lovely sister Carolina.  Modern and clean apartment.  Central location within walking distance of everything needed and attractions. We would stay here again for sure.
Very good appartment !
Edificio medio viejo pero el Dpto está bueno y cómodo.
Petit appartement très bien situé et bien équipé. Quartier agréable avec tous les services à proximité.

We were greeted by Miguel's very friendly sister who made sure we were comfortable. There was milk, juice and croissants provided for breakfast. We also liked the binder with information about the apartment and the city. Short distance to Sagrada familia.
위치가 중심가와 가까운 곳은 아니었습니다.

Nos gustó mucho el piso de Miguel. Es amplio, cómodo, limpio, acogedor. La ubicación es buena, centrica y es un barrio muy tranquilo. Los dos aires acondicionados te salvan del calor húmedo de Barcelona. Miguel fue muy atento con nosotros y hasta nos dejó aperitivos y el desayuno!

Miguel was fantastic. He gave us great directions to get to the apartment once we landed in Barcelona, great recommendations for restaurants and left very detailed documentation about getting around the city so we could plan our days out in advance! The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. It was in a central location- we could get everywhere quickly and were able to see La Sagrada Familia on our morning walk to the (very nearby) train station. Would stay here again!
Miguel was great at communicating with us. We very much enjoyed our stay! Thank you!
Merci pour l accueil de Miguel très disponible et prévenant. Appartement idéalement placé pour visiter Barcelone dans un quartier calme. Très propre et appartement très fonctionnel.

Miguel es un buen anfitrión, lamentablemente no lo pudimos conocer pero conocimos a Carolina, quien fue muy amable, respondió a todas nuestras preguntas e incluso nos dejó cervezas y mini croissants en la cocina. El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, se encuentra muy cerca de la estación de metro y a unas cuadras hay un centro comercial (glories) en el cual hay un supermercado. El apartamento es exactamente como se ve en las fotos, además a pesar de estar cerca al centro, es muy tranquilo y silencioso. El apartamento cuenta con dos aires acondicionados lo cual viene muy bien para los calurosos días de verano. Lo recomiendo mucho!

Le logement est vraiment très bien. L'accueil a été chaleureux et la soeur à Miguel a su être patiente et est de bon conseils :)

Je conseille vivement :)

O apartamento de Miguel é perfeito. Muito bem localizado, limpo, confortável. Miguel e sua irmã sempre foram muito atenciosos, gentis e precisos em suas informações. Fomos recebidas com um lanche maravilhoso e todas as informações para aproveitar o melhor de Barcelona. Recomendo a todos este imóvel. Um grande abraço!

2명이서 집을 사용했는데 넓고 쾌적했다.
사진과 같이 거실, 큰 사이즈 침대방, 이층침대방 모두 사용 가능했고 욕실도 깨끗하고 기본적인 샤워도구가 갖춰져있었다.(샴푸, 바디) 그리고 세탁기 및 건조대도 있어서 빨래도 할 수 있다. 에어컨도 작동이 잘 되서 시원하게 지낼 수 있었다.
(아파트 사람들도 친절하다.)
 주변에는 아파트, 호텔, 마켓이 있고 시끄럽지않아서 좋았다.(위험하지도 않았다)
 해변, 레이알광장은 도보로 이동가능하다. 까탈루냐 광장도 마찬가지이다.
 또 가까운 곳에 버스정류장과 지하철역이 있다.

 호스트는 우린 위해서 간단한 아침식사와 우유, 주스, 맥주 등을 준비해 놓았다. 그리고 주방이 좁지않고 잘 되어 있어서 요리도 해 먹을 수 있었다.
Everything is perfect! I really recommend to everyone

Small but quaint apartment in a quiet, residential area. Easy to find (and next to a hotel in case you need to ride a taxi, just say the hotel name). Clean and comfortable. Miguel is a wonderful host. He has a guide book on the coffee table and is easy to communicate with. He also left a tray full of Spanish bread for us and water which was really thoughtful. If ever, the shower was a bit small, which was no problem for me as I'm a small, Asian girl but some others might find it a bit cramped. All in all, would recommend to friends.
Had a great stay in Barcelona at Miguel's, the flat was very clean and in a great location. Miguel was a great host. Would stay here again if ever in Barcelona
Miguel est l'hôte exquis et son appartement est bien situé et confortable.

We were greeted by Carolina (Miguel's sister) who was really lovely and friendly. There were some croissants, juice, water and beers left for us which was a really thoughtful gesture from the hosts. The  cosy apartment is in a great location around 10mins walk from the metro. We managed to find some lovely bars/restaurants around the area too. Overall the apartment was great for a short stay in Barcelona - the only drawback for us was the small shower but is manageable for a few days. ¡Muchas gracias Miguel y Carolina!
The location is pretty close to Sagrada Familia, it's also not far from a metro station, many supermarkets around. The host and his sister were nice and friendly. Comfortable place for staying.
Todo funcionaba perfecto, aire acondicionado y un recibimiento perfecto.
Miguel's place is pretty awesome. There is a lot to do around that is walkable or a short taxi ride. This was a great Air BNB experience and surely will be the same for you.
A cosy quiet apartment just right for 2 on the edge of town. Walking distance to sagrada but you need transport for anything else but you can walk to that too.

El departamento estaba en perfectas condiciones. Miguel y su hermana Carolina fueron muy amables con nosotras y nos ayudaron en todo lo que necesitaramos para que nuestra estadía en Barcelona fuera buena.

Amazing host, sweet, caring. Amazing location, near subway stations, bus stops, restaurants, stores. Amazing place, cozy, clean, comfortable, silent. Our stay in Barcelona couldn't be better. Worth every cent.

Miguel is an excellent host, who is ready to answer all your questions in no time. The apartment is small, but it has everything you may need. The kitchen is well equipped and includes a kettle, a coffee machine and a microwave. The location is also very good.
A wonderful home away from home.  Quiet but near the city attractions.
Great spot, central to many locations.

Genial! Un piso muy cómodo en el centro de Barcelona. Miguel y Carolina son muy amables y nos han ayudado y dado muchas facilidades. 
La situación es inmejorable! Así que un piso perfecto para pasar unos días en Barcelona!

A fantastic place for its value. Photos are exactly what the apartment looks like. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay and the place is impeccably clean. Everyone I was in contact with was very quick to respond. The place itself, while not in the heart of the older city, is in a quiet and beautiful neighbourhood. It is walking distance to all the main attractions. Only thing was accessing public transportation with luggage, but otherwise, the metro stops while not just around the corner, are but a 10 minute walk.
Great apartment!

Miguel's apartment is well-appointed, and located in a pleasant neighbourhood that is 20 to 30 minutes' walk to several attractions.  Our stay was pleasant, not least because Miguel is a wonderful host, responding very promptly to our requests for information at various times of the day. He was also very kind to allow us to check out of the apartment in the evening as our flight was in the night. We also appreciate that he welcomed us with croissants, milk, juice and beer and stocked up the apartment with all the sauces and condiments that we might need to cook up a decent meal.
Séjour agréable. Carolina est tres gentille. Je recommande fortement!!

Adoramos o apartamento do Miguel. Não tivemos nenhum problema, adoramos os mimos que ele deixou...cerveja super gelada foi um deles, entre outros! Recomendo e ficaria novamente, sem dúvidas!!!Localização ótima!
AMAZING hospitality and all the little amenities really made it feel like home. Super quiet area close to the metro and some great restaurants. Would definitely come back!!
Recomendable!

初めてのｽﾍﾟｲﾝ&Airbnb利用です｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝは､ﾎｽﾄの妹さんが家の前で待っていてくださり､拙い英語ですが暖かく迎え入れてくれました｡
ﾋﾞｰﾙもｻｰﾋﾞｽで用意してくださってました｡

ﾀｵﾙ､ｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰ､ﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｰｿｰﾌﾟなどのｱﾒﾆﾃｨｰも充実しています｡

ﾍﾞｯﾄは2段ﾍﾞｯﾄ､ﾀﾞﾌﾞﾙﾍﾞｯﾄ､ｿﾌｧｰﾍﾞｯﾄの三つでどれも清潔でした｡

ｼｬﾜｰは､初めてのｽﾍﾟｲﾝと言うこともあり使い方に非常に手惑い､水しか出なかったこともありましたが親切に対応して下さりなんとか使えるようになりました｡ただし､日本と違いかなりｽﾍﾟｰｽはせまめでした｡

ｻｸﾗﾀﾞﾌｧﾐﾘｱまで徒歩で10分弱､ﾒﾄﾛの駅までも5〜10分圏内に2つ駅があり大変観光に便利かと思います｡
お陰でｽﾍﾟｲﾝで家のように過ごすことが出来ました｡

Excelente ubicacion y detalles muy atentos sobre todo porque habia cosas para comer y beber que al llegar de un largo viaje se agradecen ya que por el cansancio es dificil salir a buscar. Muy comodo y muy buena comunicacion con el anfitrión.

Miguel was a wonderful and polite host who offered us a clean and comfortable place to stay. The location was central to the main tourist attractions and was walking distance from the Sagrada de Familia. Would definitely recommend his place for anyone to stay.
Lindo departamento y detalles de comida y bebidas ya que llegamos tarde y cansados! Muy buena la atención y la ubicación. Gracias por todo Carolina y Miguel!

Miguel and his family are simply amazing, beautiful house, near Sagrada Familia, perfect not to be crowded like in La Rambla.
Miguel’s niece showed me the house, and they did even get me breakfast for my staying.
There were nice, giving me info to get to the house.
Everything is perfectly working in the house, clean.
I would come back next week if possible.
Thank you for everything!

A friend and I stayed at Miguel's place for a long weekend and loved it. Public transportation was very accessible, which we used frequently with the Barcelona Pass. The apartment itself was very nice, and clean, with plenty of room to relax.
A great great great place !
Excelente localização!

We chose this place because is in a walking distance from the north bus station. We had an early flight from Girona and needed to take a bus at 5 am to get there. For our surprise the place was really nice, with 2 private rooms and a living room. Carolina, Miguel’s sister waited for us for the checkin, she was very nice as our flight was delayed and we arrived around midnight to the place. She received us with some juice, milk and bread for our first breakfast in Barcelona. Thanks so much , we had a great stay in Barcelona.

My (picky family) and I loved Miguels place! I searched for places to stay on Airbnb on 5 separate occasions before finding and almost immediately booking with him. The apartment was clean and exactly as described, supermarket right around the corner and just a few mins from Metro stops and more! Will be staying again!!!

Miguel’s place is in a wonderful quiet neighborhood within easy walking distance of Sagrada Familia, and a lovely 20-25 minute walk or 7-8 euro trip to Plaça Catalunya, el born etc. There was orange juice, milk and croissants in the kitchen, which was a very thoughtful welcome. We had a slight hiccup upon check-in as the previous guests checked out late and the room was not quite ready at 2pm - however, this was well worth knowing that we had a clean and tidy room for our stay. As a whole the apartment was a perfect cozy fit for a 4 night stay: we enjoyed watching the Copa del Rey on the TV in the living room, the bathroom had a nice shower that had hot water that lasted for at least two consecutive people, and the kitchen seemed like it would hold up if we had decided to cook in. The building itself had a small amount of noise from neighbors but quited down by the time we were preparing for bed. I would recommend this apartment to friends planning to travel to Barcelona.

We liked the location very much. Close to different attractions. The apartment was clean and the hosts were very thoughtful. Good for a family of four.  The hosts kept in touch with reminders and information about check in. They even said we could check in early.
Je vous le conseil, Miguel est une personne  soucieuse de la qualité de vie pour ses hôtes !! Merci

Miguel has a great place only a few blocks from the metro. It was easy to find. It looked exactly like the photos. There are all these cute little touches added around the apt. The apt building has an elevator so if your feet are killing you and your luggage is heavy have no fear. We really liked staying here, the WiFi was great, the washing machine was very helpful, it was a smooth check in. I would definitely stay here again when in Barcelona.

We had a great stay at Miguel’s place. It was clean and comfortable, and the location was convenient for walking or a short taxi ride to most tourist attractions. It should be noted that the space is pretty small, particularly the size of the shower. However, Miguel was a great host and even left us croissants, juice and milk for our breakfasts.
buena ubicación del departamento, muy bien amoblado, tal cual se muestra en las fotos, siempre en contacto, recomendable 100%

We stayed 3 nights at Miguel’s and Carolina’s place. The communication was very smooth and Carolina was waiting us when we arrived, she was very friendly and explained us everything about the flat and the neighborhood 
The location is (Website hidden by Airbnb) is 3min walking from the metro so you can be in the center very quickly
The flat is very clean as well

Highly recommended !
Great place and great location! Highly recommended!

Мы семьёй из трех человек и нашим питомцем (Чихуахуа) в июне 2018 посещая Барселону останавливались в апартаментах Mигеля. Это прекрасная квартира в очень тихом районе в 10 минутах ходьбы до Саграда Фамилия. Рядом станция метро, но можно передвигаться и пешком. Общение и прием на высоте. Mигель постарался обеспечить нас всем необходимым. Апартаменты очень чистые и удобные, в реалии лучше чем выглядят на фотографиях. Рекомендуем всем. Большое спасибо Мигелю за предоставленное гостеприимство.
Miguel’s place was a good place to stay for two nights in Barcelona
Ottimo appartamento, curato nei dettagli, in un'ottima posizione. Da apprezzare i numerosi confort. Carolina, la sorella di Miguel, è davvero gentile e disponibile.
Très bon logement, hôte agréable. Je recommande

O apartamento está bem equipado, a localização é maravilhosa. Pode-se visitar varias atrações à pé tais como a Sagrada Família, Casa Milà e Gótico. A recepção no check in foi ótima. Para melhorar sugestão para instalar suporte para a ducha e substituir travesseiros, mas nada que compremeta a estadia. O box é bem pequeno, pode ser um problema para pessoas obesas, mas a ducha é ótima.

Miguel was an outstanding host. The place is easy to find, it is very close to some of the sites. There are amenities and restaurants just a few steps away. 
Miguel left everything clean for us. He also had some refreshments and snacks which was great since we arrived a bit late and didn’t have a chance to get any groceries. 
I totally recommend his place.
Fun.  In the center of the city
Buen alojamiento y buena comunicacion con los anfitriones. Nos sentimos cómodas.  Gracias!!!

El hospedaje es excelente, muy cerca de la sagrada familia y sitios de interés, muy buena ubicación, el apartamento muy limpio y Carolina una excelente anfitriona, nos esperó hasta tarde en la noche. Muy recomendado y regresaría nuevamente
The apartment is very clean with 2 rooms. Close to the metro station. The location is quiet. It is a 5 stars apartment.

We enjoyed our stay at Miguel’s flat. Appreciated the fast communication and flexibility. There is a parking garage very nearby that offers affordable multiple-day passes.  Be aware that the shower is very tiny and the rooms are both quite small as well. But it was workable for four people. Overall, we enjoyed our stay!

This small apartment is in a great location next to the metro and the  tram stop and very close to a well priced and very friendly cafe/bar and also a small supermarket.  We could walk to the metro in less than 10 minutes. A great space to stay and easy to find. We stayed 4 days and it was everything we had hoped for!

Miguel’s place was great, we had an issue due to a delayed flight and Miguel went out of his way to find us when we were little lost and check us in himself. We can’t express how grateful we were! The location is awesome and we walked everywhere. Be mindful, if you are very tall as one of our travel companions was the shower is a little small (European style). I would definitely recommend this rental.

Although we did not interact directly with Miguel, he smoothly coordinated our check in with his sister, Carolina, and accommodated our request to check in early. A little bit of a walk to the beach, but good location for walking to various neighborhoods/attractions. We were happy with the place and really appreciated the recommendations Carolina had provided us with.

This apartment is in a great location for exploring the city, with many bus and metro stops nearby.   A Condis market is steps away.  The place is small, but spotlessly clean.  Miguel and his sister, Carolina, worked together to make sure our stay went well, including calling a taxi for our departure.

Miguel's place was clean and spacious with living room, kitchen, and 2 bedrooms. Carolina, Miguel's sister, was very pleasant and helped us leave our luggage earlier so that we can sightsee. She also left us breakfast items which was really helpful for the rushed morning to sightsee. We had no problems with Miguel's place given metro and bus stops were within 5 minutes of walk. However, if you want to stay within tourist hub (Barri Gotic area), then you may find this place a little further than expected. We didn't have issues with it because public transit was very readily available. Thanks Miguel and Carolina! :)

L’appartement n’est pas vraiment conforme aux photos présentées qui datent probablement de quelques années. Nous avons apprécié l’emplacement. Nous étions contents de trouver bières, lait, jus et mini croissants dans le frigo. C’est propre et tranquille.
Its near the bus stop.. so you can go everywhere easier..

Miguel and Carolina truly went above and beyond as Airbnb hosts. When we arrived at 2pm on the day of check-in, the previous guests had checked out late so poor Carolina did not have enough time to clean. She let us into the apartment and explained that, but let us know we were welcome to stay and nap as planned. She also took the time to get out a map to show us where we were and explained the commute to Sagrada Familia. She then quietly finished up cleaning over the next 30 mins and left. The apartment was conveniently located, very clean and had an extra pull out bed! The shower is very small but other than that, it was a true pleasure staying here. Our hosts even left us juice and croissants as an extra convenience. Thank you Miguel and Carolina for a fabulous stay in beautiful Barcelona!

A great base to explore the city, excellent transport links, nearby cafes, bars & supermarkets.  Super clean, well-equipped kitchen, good wi-fi connection, plenty of hot water, although the shower is rather small.
Carolina met us and explained all the necessaries + left us some beers and breakfast things - much appreciated! We had a great time ; Thank You Both
Very nice place. Good location and an excellent bit of accomodation

The apartment is in a good location, but it was not so clean and has an old aspect.
PROS: - Location is very good.
- Internet connection was very good.
- Reception included beers, breads, milk, juice and a bottle of water.
CONS: - Cleaning (a lot of items were not properly cleaned, including kitchen utensils and bed sheets (for sure it was used). I talked to the host about the cleaning problems and the answer was "sorry for that". When I arrived in Barcelona I came from another Airbnb, which was extremely clean, so it was shocking for me to see the cleanliness of the apartment.
- Apartment with an old aspect.
- Shower space is tiny. Depending how tall you are, it might be impossible to take a shower.

To sum up, the cost-benefit relation was not good for me. I would not come back.
Miguel and Carolina were very hospitable, even giving us croissants drinks for our first breakfast in Barcelona. Overall a great stay
Excellent place. Spacious and cozy
A great base to discover a wonderful city!

The apartment is extremely clean and bigger than the photos suggest.  It is a 5 minute walk to the metro and walking distance to Sagrada Família. There is a Condis grocery store right around the corner that you can buy anything you would need during your stay. The area is also safe and quiet at night. Carolina was lovely and Miguel reached out to us to make sure we were okay. If I ever have the opportunity to visit Barcelona again, I will stay at this Airbnb again.
Todo está como en las fotos. La comunicación muy buena, el departamento limpio y ubicado cerca del transporte público. Todo muy bien en general.
Carolina es una anfitriona excelente, muy detallista y amable. Sus instrucciones y consejos fueron muy valiosos para movernos por Barcelona. El apartamento excelente. Super cómodo. Gracias por todo!

Gracias por todo Carolina y Miguel!.  En especial a la amable Carolina a quien pudimos conocer, y que  en todo momento dió respuesta rápida a las inquietudes que surgieron.  Estuvimos cómodos en el departamento , bien ubicado en una linda zona y con una línea del metro cerca que nos facilitó el llegar a los lugares por conocer.

Al inicio, tuvimos complicaciones porque nos retrasamos con nuestro vuelo para llegar a Barcelona. Carolina, quien es host con Miguel, no podía esperarnos para entregarnos la llave a la hora que nosotros llegaríamos. Sin embargo al final, ella resolvió y no tuvimos más inconvenientes. El apartamento está bien ubicado, cerca de La Sagrada Familia, es acogedor y muy cómodo. Tiene televisión por cable y lavadora. Carolina incluso nos había dejado un detalle para desayunar, un lindo gesto!  Lo recomendamos!

La casa di Miguel è in una posizione eccezionale per conoscere Barcellona, vicina a diverse fermate metro e a 10 minuti a piedi dalla Sagrada Familia. L'appartamento è comodo e confortevole, c'è tutto quello di cui si può aver bisogno per qualche giorno di vacanza. Miguel e la sua famiglia sono stati gentili e disponibili.

Appartement parfait, situé proche de La Sagrada famillia et proche du métro permettant de rejoindre l’ensemble de la ville. 
Je conseille sans problème le logement.
The apartment is small but cozy. Location is good. There are supermarkets and restaurants around here,so very convenient. And close to sagrada famillia. That's important.
Great location and clean space!
What a great place! Spotless, close to everything, very warm in winter and even has a heating mattress;) would stay again!

space: FACTS 事实 - located in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most bustling places is Causeway Bay * 位于铜锣湾,香港最繁华的区域之一的正中心 - perfectly well-located in Hennessy Road * 地处轩尼诗道黄金路段 - MTR Causeway Bay Station is not even 2 minutes walking distance * 步行两分钟不到即是铜锣湾地铁站 - 28 minutes ride to Hong Kong Disneyland * 28分钟车程可达香港迪士尼乐园 - 10 minutes ride Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre * 10分钟车程可达香港会展中心 - HYSAN Place Mall, Time Square and Lee Garden are just downstairs * 希慎商场, 时代广场 和 利园就在楼下 - 4 minutes walk to Jardine's Crescent Street Market * 步行4分钟可达渣甸坊街市 - 4 minutes walk to VICTORIA PARK * 步行4分钟可达维多利亚公园 - 10 minutes ride to Wan Chai Ferry Pier and North Point Ferry Pier * 10分钟车程可达湾仔码头及将军澳码头北角站 - 12 minutes ride to Hong Kong Macau Ferry Terminal * 12分钟车程可达港澳码头 - building is modern with well-functioning lift * 大楼为现代设计,电梯状况良好｡ - SAFE AND SECURE PROPERTY, 24-hour CCTV / SECURITY GUARDS * 物业安全可靠,监控管理｡ - Child-friendly, wheelchair accessible * 儿童及轮椅通道,便利且人性化｡ Pining for family vacation time in the very h

FACTS 事实 - located in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most bustling places is Causeway Bay * 位于铜锣湾,香港最繁华的区域之一的正中心 - perfectly well-located in Hennessy Road * 地处轩尼诗道黄金路段 - MTR Causeway Bay Station is not even 2 minutes walking distance * 步行两分钟不到即是铜锣湾地铁站 - 28 minutes ride to Hong Kong Disneyland * 28分钟车程可达香港迪士尼乐园 - 10 minutes ride Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre * 10分钟车程可达香港会展中心 - HYSAN Place Mall, Time Square and Lee Garden are just downstairs * 希慎商场, 时代广场 和 利园就在楼下 - 4 minutes walk to Jardin
neighborhood_overview: This enigmatic city of skyscrapers, ancient traditions and heavenly food will fascinate, whether it's your first visit or your 50th. Culture Beyond the glass and steel of Hong Kong’s commercial persona, the city also boasts a vibrant cultural scene that features the eclectic influences of its Chinese roots, colonial connections and a wondrous pool of homegrown talent. Here, you’re just as likely to find yourself applauding at Asia’s top film festival as joining in dawn taichi or reading the couplets of a local poet to the drumbeat of a dragon boat. Culture could also mean indie music under the stars, a classy art walk, your first Cantonese opera – not to mention the exhibitions and events staged year-round at the many museums and concert halls. Why I Love Hong Kong I love Hong Kong because it has a complexity that eludes definition, sometimes even by its own people. I can be soul-searching near the Chinese border, lunching with Sikhs at a Sikh temple, splurging on a set of kitchen kniv
notes: Please note that not every neighbor is happy about the New Sharing Economy. If we want them to understand the 21st century :-) we should respect normal house rules like:  -no party after 10pm -be quiet in the staircase/hallway -don't ring at neighbours bell because you cannot find the key in your handbag -don't throw things out of the window   Although the apartment is on a very high standard and equipped like a serviced apartment - I am still a private host but not a Hotel with fully employed staff and a front desk. Me and my team are always happy to assist - but if can take time to follow your not urgent request (like 1 more towel). Well, in case that shiny Hotel style entrances and hallways are more important to you than an Airbnb Hong Kong LOCAL apartment in a Hong Kong usual residential style apartment - you might want to look elsewhere. There is 24/7 video surveillance and the lifts are operating 24/7.  Just keep in mind it's NOT a new building but the building and environment is
transit: HOW TO GET TO CAUSEWAY BAY: By Public transport: MTR: Island Line: Tin Hau and Causeway Bay stations Tram: To Kennedy Town, Happy Valley, or Whitty Street BY BUS: New World First Bus: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Citybus: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) BY MINIBUS: Green minibus: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Red minibus: Sai Wan - Causeway Bay, Causeway Bay - Shau Kei Wan, Temple Hill (Tsz Wan Shan) - Causeway Bay
access: The entire apartment with all amenities is accessible for my guests. All closets are empty but full of hangers, you will find toiletries and hair dryers in the bathrooms. the kitchen is fully equipped with pots, pans, china, glasses and cutlery. Basics like tea, coffee, water, milk, and capsules for the Nespresso Machine are provided to make sure your arrival will be relaxed. Detergents for washing machine and dish washer are provided for a stay of 3 nights. My stand-by guest manager will happily provide more supplies on request for small additional costs.
interaction: I will respond to your questions within very short notice. My reservation team is online 24/7 and will always be able to assist in case I wouldn't be online.  I am online while using the following tools: airbnb thread, e-mail, phone, we chat, viber, line etc. Let me know your preferred communication tool.
house_rules: Please guys... no party without acknowledgment and confirmation, no smoking but only on the balcony/ garden, no drugs, eg. Besides the risk of losing your deposit (apartment gets checked after your check-out), it would be sad to lose the apartment due to inappropriate behaviour. Again - please use your common sense. Although my apartment is well designed and complete - I want to set a clear expectation!    -streets in the area might be dirty -the area might be crowded -integrated into the residential building are shops and restaurants - complaints about smell of food in that building area won't be accepted. (my apartment is on the 4th floor and higher - you won't smell anything from a restaurant on ground floor).  - In HK it's allowed to start refurbishments at any time without informing neighbors. Any noise complaints based on neighbours work in their apartment adjacent won't be accepted.)  - In case a lift would be out of order we cannot do more but informing and chasing the building

좋았어요  모든것이~~
这个公寓的地理位置优越,交通便利,离地铁站很近,大概有一两分钟的路程,周围的餐厅很多,就餐方便,公寓整洁干净,而且房东很热情,能提供很好的服务,公寓里的设施健全,这使我们的旅程更加的美好｡
Best location, 2min to Time Square and 2min to causeway bay MTR.
公寓位置一流,绝对的黄金地带,楼下就是超大购物中心,还有网红奶茶店,每天都超热闹,超多人排队~公寓管理严谨,有门卫大叔巡逻,也很热心很nice,房间非常干净,生活用品一应俱全,kris很耐心滴讲解,总之很舒适很方便,大推荐哦~~~~

This is the worst experience that I have ever had with Airbnb! First of all, the guest manager wasn’t there when we arrived, so he asked his assistant to open the door for us! The lady wasn’t nice at all, she was different in a bad mood, we didn’t feel welcomed at all!  The apartment building is like the oldest building ever, I have not seen anything like that, so old and so poor! I don’t even know how to describe the hallway, smells and sticks! Once we enter the apartment, OMG, the smell was even worse! It’s a very strong bad perfume smell that made all of us headache! I asked the lady and she said they cleaned the apartment right before we arrive, the smell will be gone soon and we believed her so we went out to dinner! When we came back in two hours, the disgusting smell is Still there! We have opened all the windows and still couldn’t get rid off the smell! This is not the worst part! The apartment was not clean at all, got spots on the bed sheets, the sofa was so dirty and don’t get me start with the kitchenware and dishes! It took me one hour to wash them before I can even touch them! There were so dirty! I didn’t pay this amount of money to come clean your apartment for you! When we try the use the shower, the water is so blocked that dirty water will not go down! And the bathrooms are the smallest bathrooms that I have ever seen, and the picture showed on airbnb is a fake picture! We checked out the very first thing in the morning, and with all my heart, even a three stars hotel would have a better experience than this!
Great apartment great location. Really nice host!
Nice place to stay, best location!
很好
位置不错,房间也不错｡

This is an amazing apartment especially the location. The host is very kind and trying hard to make our trip comfortable and smooth.

Great stay and experience.
地理位置极佳!楼老旧一些,但干净卫生!公寓除了小些(香港,你们懂的),五脏俱全!带孩子出行只能选择这样的房子,总之,还不错!

Shan’s apartment is really located in the heart of Hongkong(Causeway Bay). It’s very convenient for family group to stay. Shopping malls, restaurants, apple store..etc, is just few steps away. The apartment is clean and cozy. I will recommend to people who come to visit Hongkong.
房子的基本用品房东都备齐了,房间里卫生干净,位于铜锣湾最核心区域,吃穿用度及交通一应俱全,方便极了!很开心在我英语不是很好的情况下,Kris能认真听完我的要求并讲解明白｡这次旅行体验很棒!

name: SydneyCBD/CentralAircon/TwoStory/FamilyHome
summary: Location: Sydney Central and very short stroll to local amenities. Restaurants just downstairs, very close to Central Park , Funky Kensington Street and Spice Alley, Short Cut to Central Station, China Town or Market City, with Cafes, Pubs, Restaurants, Supermarket and Galleries around. Central Duct Air-conditioning Free Wifi Double story apartment with bedrooms upstairs,  big living room, second toilet and kitchen downstairs. 1.5 bathroom.
space: This apartment is ideal for a group of business people, travel families, a group of friends up to 10 members. There are three absolute separate spaces for three families throughout the apartment. Long stays and special occasions are welcome! Three beds in a big Family space separated by a interior solid wall.   The queen bed next to the entrance and the twin single beds are next to the window. There is a very cozy and private double bed room located at the end of the upstairs corridor, it is perfect for a couple, it is private,  quiet and comfortable. There is a daytime bed and two double sofa beds in the downstairs living room, as well as a crib for 5 people to sleep comfortably. Big balcony opposite Mercure Hotel's entrance. Urban life style. Comfortable and Artistic finish:)
description: Location: Sydney Central and very short stroll to local amenities. Restaurants just downstairs, very close to Central Park , Funky Kensington Street and Spice Alley, Short Cut to Central Station, China Town or Market City, with Cafes, Pubs, Restaurants, Supermarket and Galleries around. Central Duct Air-conditioning Free Wifi Double story apartment with bedrooms upstairs,  big living room, second toilet and kitchen downstairs. 1.5 bathroom. This apartment is ideal for a group of business people, travel families, a group of friends up to 10 members. There are three absolute separate spaces for three families throughout the apartment.
