The queen bed next to the entrance and the twin single beds are next to the window. There is a very cozy and private double bed room located at the end of the upstairs corridor, it is perfect for a couple, it is private,  quiet and comfortabl
neighborhood_overview: Pub, cafe, restaurants, supermarket, universities, museums and galleries are nearby
notes: Sometimes the apartment has tight control on the time for early checking in and late checking out, because we need enough time for preparation. Please ask for the flexibility, I would always try my best to help you if it's available. Thanks for your understanding.
transit: 12 minutes walk to Darling Harbour 15 minutes walk to QVB  3 minutes walk to Woolworth Supermarket 5 minutes walk to Central train station and bus stops 20 minutes walk to Fish Market 10 minutes walk to Broadway Shopping Centre 3 minutes walk to Central Park Plaza 5 minutes walk to White Rabbit Gallery 8 minutes walk to PowerHouse Museum 10 minutes walk to Market City/China Town 25 minutes walk to Opera House and Harbour Bridge
access: Balcony, lifts
interaction: This is a private apartment, so you get the whole apartment to yourself. If you need help with anything or if any emergency pops up, message me and I'll do my best to help.
house_rules: In order to keep a reasonable freshness for future guests, please understand that Heavy Cooking is strictly not permitted in this short stay rental apartment.  Please help maintain the floor in a dry condition as wetness may damage the floor. Please understand that only paid guests are allowed to enter this apartment.  Please clean the utensils you have used before checking out and keep the furniture as originally located. Thanks for your understanding and I appreciate your care and respect, enjoy your stay.

host.host_about:
A poet and an emerging artist, curious about life and enjoy my freedom
I found my freedom through art, music, reading philosophical books like Also Sprach Zarathustra from Nietzsche. I enjoy great conversation and stimulate my mind and soul. I’m open minded, enjoy meeting new people and keep learning. 
My life journey includes a long professional career within the contemporary art and education. I have traveled to America, England, France, Germany, Holland, Switzerland, and some of South Asia countries. I wish to continue my travel, explore new cultures, art and of course write about my life journey

I’m looking forward to meet you and make your stay in Sydney pleasant.

reviews.comments: Phan went out of her way to meet us at her place and had plenty of information about the neighbourhood, etc.  The apartment was clean and well equipped.  It was a great place for a good price and close to everything we needed.
Very convenient for a short stay.
Great location, could get anywhere easily & it was really nice.
We enjoyed our stay in Chippendale, it's very central and the apartment is quite large. Phans communication was also great and the place is excellent value for money.

Thankyou so much for having us! The place was beautiful and clean! Also, the host was so lovely and friendly :) This apartment was also so close to everything you need. I will definitely be staying here everything I come to Sydney!

Phan's place is in an excellent location and good for a few people. The bedrooms upstairs are not necessarily separate - with a half wall in the middle but if you're happy to share, it is definitely very central to all of the things. 
Phan was very nice and met us at the place to check in and was very responsive to communications during he stay.
The apartment is good value and in a great place, Phan is also a good host
房子位于中央火车站旁,地理位置优越,靠近悉尼科技大学, (Hidden by Airbnb) 都很方便,公寓是复式两层的,简洁实用,适合无烟煮食｡
地点绝对一级棒

Phan's premise is as per the pictures, clean with new furniture. Location wise, it's very convenient as it's near to food stores, grocery, and Central train station, all within 5-10 minutes walking distance.Thanks Phan for being great host, she answered my queries promptly and patiently. Will definitely recommend friends and families to stay over.
Amazing place and Phan was so friendly and sweet!
Good location

Great location, was a little bit noisy traffic wise, shops, pubs and public transport all very close. Home was clean, furnishings at a minimum, but comfortable enough. Strange burn’t plastic smell, host explained that heavy cooking/burning had happened previous. However even with doors opened for fresh air and a smelly candle, the smell would not go. In saying that I would stay again, as the location was fantastic and we could sleep 8.
Love the location and the apartment so much!! Nice beds, near city !!

Great location! Very clean double story apartment , full furnished, very comfortable. It’s so convenient to go anywhere in Sydney CBD with walking.  Woolworth just 3 minutes away. The host is very friendly and helpful. All good!Phan very responsive to any questions you may have about the place. I will definitely stay again
Great place, great host

Phan was a great host, always responding quickly and answering any questions. Stayed with a group of 7 people and there was plenty of room for all of us. Location is great, everything we needed was within walking distance.
Phan was very helpful and great on the communication. A very good air bnb host.
Phan was a great host - she from time to time would message me and check how things went.  It was very kind of her to also get us fruits and wine in advance!
Ideal location and lovely host who kept us fully informed
Great location, very close to Central station/transport hub & amenities. Great host, super fast communication. It is central city location so can be a bit noisy at times

The apartment was in a great location, cheap parking only a 5 minute walk away, close to broadway shopping centre and central train station. The whole apartment was clean, tidy and had everything you needed including the little extras such as shampoo, body wash, linens etc. I couldn’t fault this apartment at all and the host was extremely good at communicating and ensuring that you were having a good experience.
Great location! Great host!
Nice clean apartment. Was nice and central to everything we needed. We had a great stay.

Phan is such a great host who is very friendly and helpful. Her place is clean and everything is handy. The location is very convenient which is just next to the central station. Highly recommend this place for families and friends!
The place is close to everything you need and it’s a great size to fit quite a few people!
Great place to stay with air con! Location and value was great. Definitely recommend!
Good location...
Great space! So close to public transport, night life and shops and restaurants! Amazing host - replying almost immediately to all my questions.

Phan was very responsive, friendly and accommodative. We had a walking tour booked before check in time, and I thought we would have to miss the tour. However she was kind enough to offer early check in for us! The place is close to Chinatown and train station is just 5 mins away. Will definitely stay again during our next visit :)

This location is great. Walking distance from the Central railway station as well as close to food and shops. Phan is an excellent host. We arrived in Sydney at 630 am and Phan allowed us to drop our bags off around 10 am so we could get started on our day . The apartment is very clean and secure. It was perfect for a group of 4 .
與Phan溝通十分順利,也願意在check out 後讓我們寄放行李,房子離車站近,設備齊全,滿適合家庭入住

Enjoyed our stay at Phan's place. Good location and friendly host with great communication.
We had a good stay.

Located in the heart of Sydney, this beautiful apartment is perfect for a family or friends getaway! Phan answers all questions almost instantly and is an overall amazing host! Thank you for making our trip memorable!
A very nice place, very clean and nice location. The host is nice too. Me and my family have had a very good time ^^
Great location.
Good location. Cozy and Warm house.
Pham was quick to respond to requests and did her best to make us comfortable during our stay. The apartment is spacious, tastefully decorated and in a excellent location.
The location is excellent, the place is clean, modern and had everything you could need. Phan was an absolute pleasure to deal with. 100% recommend!
我是帮朋友定的,因为要开车过去,房东很nice,很早就帮我预留了车位!对这个房子的感受就是位置太好了,central station旁边,到China town走路几分钟｡而且房东热情周到,房间里面干净利落,布置得非常舒适｡以后还会推荐朋友住｡

Great location - stayed a week for a family holiday! Easy walk to train/bus stations and plenty of good restaurants around. The apartment was clean, cozy and right for what we needed. We even had extra guests come and go, Phan was more than helpful with that! Would highly recommend :)
Phan responses quickly. The location is close to Central station (only 5 min walk), Woolworth supermarket (only 3 min) and China town (only 8 min). It is very convenient and we enjoy our stay.
Phan's place was very comfortable for our group of 5. The apartment was clean and was convenient and easy to locate. Phan was great at responding and was always happy to help. A great stay overall!
There’s a short cut to walk from Central Station. Will be good to find the way thru the tunnel of the station
Great location. Perfect place for a group of friends. Close to restaurants/bars. Very clean. Great amenities. Enjoyed our stay.
超级好的房子 位置超级好 房东人也超级好 最好的选择~

房主凡姐恰如其分的热情,有问必答｡我们到的早,12点不到就到了,应该是下午3点才可以入住,凡姐提前让我们摆放行李｡小黑也特别可爱,大家都抢着要抱他,来了就可以看到可爱的小黑啦!! (Website hidden by Airbnb) 房子的地理位置特别好,去达令港,歌剧院,皮特街都可以步行过去｡想买药妆的话,150米处就有一个,买蜂蜜和羊奶粉要开门就去｡这里的店关门都比较早,需要早点规划好｡想自己吃海鲜可以去鱼市场买了自己做,也可以直接在那里吃｡ 离悉尼大学很近,如果想托运什么到国内的话那边就有快递 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 屋子收拾的整洁干净,在悉尼这个寸土寸金的地方,有这么大的地方,交通便利,价格还这么优惠,真的太难得了!! (Website hidden by Airbnb) 谢谢凡姐请的冰淇淋,太好吃啦!!!

Phan was a delightful and wonderful host who was truly helpful in making sure we had a great time. She was accommodating and went above and beyond, even setting up a comfortable extra bed to make sure we slept well. The apartment itself was spacious, extremely clean and in an excellent location. We really couldn’t have wanted anything more. Would highly recommend to anyone!!
Phan is super accomodating, providing all the essentials that we needed. It was a pleasure to stay as guests at her's house, I would defenitely recommend this place to anybody staying near central.
Great location, exceptional and very accommodating hosts which was a real benefit as we were a group of 7 people.
凡姐的房子地理位置非常好,去任何地方步行即可到达,附近就有一家大超市,买东西吃饭都很方便!最赞的是凡姐个人的魅力,给了我们很大的帮助,真的是由衷的感谢!以后会再来入住,也会推荐朋友来入住!

As soon as you walked in everything was absolutely spotless. Quick responses by Phan. A lot of space which I was presently surprised about. Great stay overall. Will definitely be back if we are in that area again.
Adequate but be careful if travelling with people who don't want to sleep in same room.

Phan provides great hospitality to those that are staying over. She is quick to answer calls and makes you feel very welcome and that you are an important guest staying over. The apartment itself felt very homey, had cute little decorations and touches that makes the place stand out.
Clean and comfortable location close to transport and restaurants. Very helpful and friendly host.
Very central unit, clean and spacious for seven adults.  Phan was an excellent host with great communication.
Fabulous location - less than 5 mins from Central station and just round the corner from Spice Alley and all that Chippendale has to offer
Excellent central location close to the city.  Apartment was very nice and we all had a good stay.
A good experience in Sydney. The house is clean and the location is outstanding.

A nice apartment in a convenient location. Host was not flexible with check in and check out Time and even entered the apartment at around 10 in the morning until we left the apartment. However, she was easy to communicate with and responded really quickly to any questions.

Great location. Clean apartment
Phan is an awesome host and was very responsive to queries throughout our trip.
房东很热情,给我们很多建议,搭车还帮我砍价~房间很干净,离市中心真的很近,全城走路去哪里都很方便,离woolworths也特别近｡很感谢房东的热情款待｡下次一定会推荐朋友再来｡
Phan was accomodating in every request. Place was clean and location is fantastic. Will stay again in future
Great location, excellent communication. We enjoyed our family stay here.
房东实在太好了,不光给了我们各种当地的出行建议,还配合我们的行程给予了不少方便,让我们可以放心去玩,不需要担心行李问题,特别友好贴心｡更给力的是,当天晚上我们离开,叫不到的士,房东二话不说帮我们沟通并让我们成功顺利坐上了的士｡感激不尽,在异国他乡,有这么乐于助人,友好的同胞｡下次如果再去悉尼,也会选择这里｡
Phan 非常的nice,带着她的小狗狗迎接我们入住｡房子交通非常便利,走到中央车站南广场只要三分钟｡去任何地方都很方便｡厨房设施比较齐全,唯一不足的是我们一行九个人,入住还是有点挤,五六个人比较合适｡在市中心算是性价比比较高的地方｡

房间也非常的干净,设施都齐全｡
Phan was a very nice host. She was always concern in making us to feel at home. Everything was clean an tidy. The apartment is perfect for a big family or group. The location is very good.
Great space in a great location

reviews.comments: I always love staying here! Tony is an outstanding host that goes above and beyond to make sure my stay is 5*. Thanks again :)

Tony was very friendly and welcoming! Flexible with the check in time.  received us at the door and took the time to show us the appartment and made sure that we communicate to him anything we needed. He left juices and snacks and told to feel free to eat them. The appartment was very comfortable and clean. The appartment is in a very nice and quiet neighborhood called LaSalle, 13 mins away from the airport in car, close to universitè Concordia . I will definitely go back and stay again.

We spent the Thanksgiving long weekend at Tony's place and felt like home. Tony was very accommodating with the check-in, the place was very clean and the fridge stacked with all necessary ingredients to have a nice breakfast. The apartment has all the essentials you need and it's very practical and quiet if you have your car. Thank you so much Tony for being a great host!
Place was as advertised. Everything worked out good.
Great place to stay
Tony let us stay even with such a short notice as due to airbnb problems our other place was cancelled the day we were arriving montreal. No complains at all. I would definatelly recommend.

Great compact accommodation for my family of 4. We needed a place to stay overnight before catching a plane from Montreal Airport and accommodation in the city was so expensive. Tony was so fast with answering questions and advising us places to eat which was very welcomed. He also provided us with bread, drinks and breakfast provisions which was so good as we arrived late in the afternoon and left very early the next morning. This small touch was so appreciated. We comfortably fit myself, husband and 2 older daughters in the space and although we were only there for a brief time we enjoyed it. Thanks Tony.
Tony was a great host- and this is an excellent spot to stay while visiting Montreal.  As a runner I loved how accessible many bike paths were.  You could run for miles on them.

Great place. Good location, friendly host, some extra amenies we were not expecting (Netflix, premium channels...), and some munchies for late snacks and breakfast. Tony was very accommodating with the check-in time. Thanks for a great stay!
Tony was a great host. Very nice plachine for the price. Netflix was a nice touch.

Tony and Emilia are excellent hosts, treat you like family, absolutely. I recomend this place to stay!! There is Netflix available and Tony let some bread, milk , eggs and juice for breakfast. Nice touch!!
Appartement très agréable merci

Tony was amazing! Place was very clean. Tony was very helpful and professional. He had fruit and juice in the fridge and told us to help ourselves. He was very quick at responding back. Definitely will come back.

Tony’s place is exactly as advertised. Great value for a solo traveller or couple. The neighbourhood is quiet and has some nice surrounding walking  trails with a good view of the water. Tony even filled the fridge with some breakfast food which was a very nice touch!
Great place!
Nice place, easy to find, fully equipped kitchen. Of all great value.
The large apartment was spotless clean.  Easy parking.  Tony and Mike are great people.  Many thanks.  Very easy parking on the street.  Close to the river and biking trail.  Awesome!
Tony’s place was perfect for four of us, very comfortable, clean and Tony provided an unexpected breakfast! Will definitely be back again
J'ai loué l'appartement de Tony pour un collègue et tout a très bien été, conforme à la description.
The communication/check-in and check-out was very easy. Tony is a pleasant person and a great host.
Great place. Perfect for our short stay in the Montral area. He left us bacon, eggs, bread and bottles of water!

I was happily impressed by Tony's Place.  From start-to-finish it was a positive experience with a comfortable and inviting living room featuring a large flat screen TV, two sofas and coffee table.  The bedroom boasted a comfortable queen size bed, nice linen and comfortable pillows and plenty of closet space and cupboards if they're necessary.  The kitchen was very clean and I appreciated the availability of eggs, butter, milk, water, bread and more, that was available for me.  There was even a washer and dryer available!   The bathroom was bright and airy and overall, I  had a very restful time and would happily return to Tony's Place and recommend the apartment to others.
It really good clean place
Great spot, location and super easy to communicate with.
Chaleur, attentions et bel accueil. Merci!

name: *CNY OFFER* Spacious Central Apt 4-6ppl
summary: ---THE LOCATION--- This spacious and recently renovated apartment is centred in the heart of HK Island, located adjacent to the famous Mid-Level Escalators. This recently renovated apartment is within walking distance to Central CBD & shopping district as well as Soho and the famous Lan Kwai Fong. Being located just above Caine Road and SOHO this area is renowned for being close to the famous bars, clubs and restaurants of the famous Soho and LKF whilst being in a quiet neighbourhood.

neighborhood_overview: Bruno's home is located in Central, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong. Central (also Central District; Chinese: 中環) is the central business district of Hong Kong. It is located in Central and Western District, on the north shore of Hong Kong Island, across Victoria Harbour from Tsim Sha Tsui, the southernmost point of Kowloon Peninsula.  As the central business district of Hong Kong, it is the area where many multinational companies have their Asian headquarters. Consulates general and consulates of many countries are also located in this area, as is Government Hill, the site of the government headquarters. The area, with its proximity to Victoria Harbour, has served as the centre of trade and financial activities from the earliest days of the British colonial era in 1841, and continues to flourish and serve as the place of administration after the transfer of sovereignty to China in 1997. The Soho (Chinese: 蘇豪; also 荷南 and 荷南美食區; formally 中環蘇豪區) district in Hong Kong is an entertainment zon
transit: In Soho on Staunton Street, Elgin Street and the artsy Hollywood road you will find plenty of restaurants, cafes and bars to hang out at.  On Caine Road and Hollywood Road you can find minibuses and buses to anywhere in Hong Kong - or you can hail one of Hong Kong's inexpensive taxis. If you wish to take the MTR, you can descend down through Hong Kong's older streets to the well conneced Central MTR, which will bring you to anywhere on the extensive MTR network. It's a 10 minute walk from the apartment.
access: The apartment is located 7 minutes from Central Station exit D2 next to HK's famous Mid-Level Escalators (known as the world's longest) and you will have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: My housemate and I will be easily reachable through AirBnb messenger. We are happy to assist you with any queries you may have and give you advice on the best places HK has to offer.
house_rules: We hope this apartment will be your home-away-from-home during your time in Hong Kong. We would also appreciate if guests could treat the apartment with love and respect (that you would normally show your own home!) - here are some additional simple house rules. * Keep the flat clean and tidy * No smoking is allowed in the apartment. Breaking of this rule (cigarette smell and butts in the house) will lead to a forfeit of the entire deposit. * Kindly refrain from wearing shoes in the house * Switch off water heater every time after you take a shower - otherwise it may blow the fuse and break down! * Switch off all lights, A/Cs, and electrical appliances before you leave the house - be kind to planet earth! * Be mindful of neighbours and refrain from playing loud music (or having loud parties!) late in the evening * Damage, Breakages, Theft and Loss are the tenants' responsibility during their stay. *  A replacement fee will be charged for towels stained by hair dyes, tanning, make up or

Josefina (and cats!) made us feel very welcome in hee home from the moment we arrived right up until check out time.  Her home lived up to what was advertised and then some! Would book again.  Great location, value for money! :)

host.host_about:
I am a housewife, living in Hawaii, hoping to rent my hotel-style apartment to help with family income. I like the clean, clean room, clean supplies, hope my heart you can feel it. To Hawaii Tourism Raiders can be found online, you are welcome to Hawaii!
我是一位家庭妇女,生活在夏威夷,希望通过出租我的酒店式公寓,帮助家庭收入｡我喜欢干净,干净的房间,干净的用品,希望我的用心你能感觉得到｡来夏威夷旅游攻略在网上可以查到,欢迎你来夏威夷!

reviews.comments: The space is smaller than shown in the pictures and the overall condo is run down (dingy lighting, old design, old building). No space to put cloths, the two queen size beds you see are covering up any form of closet. No Dresser. On the plus, the air conditioning works. The beds are decent. The room was clean and sheets and towels nice. You are in Hawaii!  Parking is 25 a night in addition to the room cost. There is no other way to park so take that into account. The host seems like a very nice lady but only speaks Chinese so communication is tough. My check in was not smooth wasting 45 minutes to get in as she did not provide lock box # and no english. She also promised me 13 days refund but only refunded half of it.  Just observe she has a strict cancelation policy with AirBNB so she technically cannot give you a refund. And my advise is do not accept her word if she tells you she will because she broke her promise to me.

Yuk was amazing I got the opportunity to talk with Yuk husband and daughter all of them are nice, Yuk left some gifts for us and always responded to me nicely, the room was great located and everything you need is located in the lobby from booking tours, car rental, chairs, snorkeling gear coolers, coffee shop grocery store, restaurants, bar, nightclub I mean everything. The only problem is the price of the parking $25 dollars per night extra and that's nothing you can do unless you can find a parking on the streets near by but you have to make sure you read the signs and understand them. Other places usually charge $30+ for parking so $25 that's actually cheap. Other than the parking everything is amazing and I'll recommend Yuk's place to friends and family and next time I visit Waikiki definitely I will stay again here. Thanks Yuk and family!

Thank you so much 
英語ができないﾎｽﾄです｡
Suis satisfait de mon séjour chez  Yuk Ping. Le studio est assez confortable  pour 2 personnes avec 2 grands lits et une belle vue panoramique, vue côté  montagne et les alentours.
Coolplace to stay

The location is absolutely amazing as it it close to many great locations. The view is amazing from high above overseeing the mountains. The room is on the smaller side for 4 people but for 2, it is perfect. The place have all the things you need, car rental, laundry, swimming pool, restaurants, 7-Eleven, Food Pantry, and Ala Moana Mall. Overall, we are happy but would like to see some updates to the place next time if we do book again. Thanks Yuk Ping!

This host and her place are absolutely AMAZING.
Its location is very convinient to both Ala Moana center and Waikiki beach. Walking distance.
The view from a room is great as well.
And this host is friendly and also she responds a message real quick. Once I forgot to bring the room key, but she helped me immediately. 
Would stay here again soon.
Highly recommended!

Its a relatively old apartment, There was no hair dryer so I had to buy one for my own. The toilet often doesn't flash properly, the pressure of the shower is not strong.  
However, the apartment is perfectly located for the beach and the main shopping center so I feel the value for what I paid for. Also, Yuk Ping is always very responsive to my messages. it didnt take long to write back even if its during new years period. 
Thank you for hosting us.
Nice place with a good location not too far of a walk from main areas of waikiki

Great location, walking distance to ala Moana center and Waikiki. Bus stops right outside so it was very convenient to take the bus. The WiFi didn’t work for the first three days of my stay. However after the technician came in, it was up and running.
Not a great place if you’re expecting an up-kept unit.
Nice unit with cool mountain views. Great location and very secure building with terrific French brunch restaurant downstairs.

This was a dirty, poorly maintained unit. I would not recommend anyone stay there. It was decorated in chintzy, dollar-store décor. The doors were peeling, Fans and filters caked in dust, and a tub with mold in every corner that was recently caulked over with obvious water damage causing bounce when you stood in it. The pictures were deceiving as the bed to the left is butting against the only closet, which you'll have to stand on to use the closet in any way. 
The only saving grace was in the proximity to Waikiki (10-15 min walk).  I would not stay in this unit ever again!

This room is very small, which was expected. It was clean just a little run down looking. Nice clean towels, but the sheets seem very old, and the beds were kinda uncomfortable but not the worst. She had plenty of kitchen tools and had everything you needed.  
If you don’t mind the most fancy place this was a great stay
The most important thing to me about this place was it was QUIET. Which is hard to come by in a town like Waikiki.  Just the way the rooms are build we barely heard our neighbors and it was on a high enough level that you couldn’t hear any street noise. 
To me that is the most priceless aspect of a stay. If you value your quiet for sleeping and don’t care about updates furniture, you would enjoy your stay here.

name: Bright, clean, 1BD apt near Metro
summary: Full kitchen, double bed and living room, 4 min from Fabre  Metro station (subway). Near park and Bixi (public bicycle rental station), and  min away from famous Jean-Talon outdoor market. Second floor apt. Typical Montreal neighborhood.
space: The apartment is located near a boulevard adjoining a region known as Little Italy.  The neighborhood retains many of the characteristics of the post-war period when the population of Montreal doubled and multiplex dwellings were constructed.  The apartment is in one such building, with a residential street on one side, and a typical "ruelle" (back alley) on the other side. The apartment is fully equipped with a kitchen (utensils, dishes, soap, fridge, stove, etc.) which, typical in Quebec, is very roomy living up to its role as the gathering space of the family.  A balcony on the back allows you to enjoy a coffee while watching the neighbors tend to their vegetable gardens.   The bedroom is simple, with a double bed and a desk on which some paperwork can be completed. An old laptop is available for email and web browsing.  WiFi with 30 megabits download bandwidth is provided. The living room is equipped with a pull-out-couch which can accomodate two guests (double bed).  A TV is conne

neighborhood_overview: This is a residential neighborhood mostly consisting of two-six family dwellings. People who live here are of all ages, with a predominantly french population, but also with English and some Italian.  The apartment is two streets away from a major avenue (rue Jean Talon) where a number of stores, pharmacies, cafe's, etc. can be found.  A 10min walk away is Jean-Talon farmers market, the biggest one in Montreal with many stalls and shops.
transit: The apartment is within a 4 min walk of the metro (subway) system.  There is also a bus line that runs two streets away, and a bixi station (bicycle rental) a street away.
interaction: ---- Normally I (or my son) will meet you at the apartment to give you the keys and answer questions.  As we work during the day, the arrival time will have to be coordinated in advance.
house_rules: Please treat this place as your home in Montreal.  (Regrettably, we cannot allow smoking or pets).  For extended stays, you will be asked to keep the plants watered.

host.host_about:
We are avid travelors and enjoy staying at vacation rentals, like the one we have created here. We enjoy the experience because staying at a vacation rental gives one a sense of the character of the city and people you are visiting -- something you don't get from the "sterility" of the hotel stay.  In that light, we are proud to be able to offer our guests an opportunity to stay in an apartment that is typical of the sort built after the war to accomodate the returning service men and their families.  The neighborhood is very much residential and varied in population age wise and linguistically.  It is only a block away from a major commerical artery and very close to the metro system.

 About myself, I am a biologist who now works in education at a College in downtown montreal.  While I am very much anchored in the scientific mind set, my reading pleasure invariably centers around history -- mostly western civilization -- and art.   We enjoy living in Montreal because of its cultural richness, and benefit from all the opportunites ranging from theatre productions to museum exhibits, etc.  We also enjoy hiking through the Laurentians and the richness of the environment that surrounds Montreal, which is not that far away.

Whether you come to stay here or not, I think you will enjoy visiting this unique city in the North America.  Montreal is sure to satisfy you at many levels, and we wish you a pleasant stay.

Ray

reviews.comments: Appartement très fonctionnel dans un quartier très agréable et idéalement situé à moins de 10 minutes du métro, et proche du marché Jean Talon. Ray nous a très bien accueilli et s'est montré très disponible et compréhensif.
Ray is a nice host. Location of the apt is great. Amenities bit basic but sufficient for any short stay. Overall, a pleasant stay.

Le logement à bien été décrit et ma mère et moi avons passé un agréable séjour.  
Ray a su être disponible et réactif.

Nous le conseillons
superbe location

Ray is a great guest, he's kind and gentle. The apartment had all I needed for my stay. The neighborhood is really quiet and peaceful, and it is really easy to take the subway and buses to go Montreal downtown, the Plateau and the Old Port. I definitely recommend this place.

Apartamento super agradável ideal para solteiros ou casais sem crianças.
Vizinhança boa mas se incomoda com certos barulhos. Ray é atencioso e comunicativo.

I stayed in Ray's apartment for 30 days and had a great stay in Montreal. There are many nearby facilities such as markets, restaurants, hospitals, drugstores and others. It is also close to two subway stations, within 5-10 minutes walking distance. Highly recommend this place to all my friends.

Ray et son fils ont aidés de parfaits hôtes. Toujours présents pour répondre à nos attentes, à nous accommoder et à nous aider,. Le logement a été occupé par mon père pendant 2 mois et il a grandement apprécié son séjour. Merci à Ray!
Appartement spacieux lumineux et bien agencé idéal pour un couple

name: Authentic Stay, Breiner GreenHouse
summary: Our beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Porto, with all landmarks at walking distance. Enjoy the charm and quietness of Porto's art district and confortably relax in a classic downtown building. It's the perfect location!
space: This 80m2 two bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Porto, with several landmarks and Porto's most iconic streets just one step away. It's part of a recently renovated 2 storey building. If you have a big family make sure to check our other apartment as well! Its location merges Porto's art district with the lively city center. With very high ceilings and spacious rooms, you will have all the confort you need to relax after the long days cruising the city. And a different twist when you get in - we furnished and decorated the apartment with products made by young Portuguese designers and artists. But with no fuss. We just want to offer you the possibility to experience what is done best in Portugal while supporting small scale entrepreneurs.
description: Our beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Porto, with all landmarks at walking distance. Enjoy the charm and quietness of Porto's art district and confortably relax in a classic downtown building. It's the perfect location! This 80m2 two bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Porto, with several landmarks and Porto's most iconic streets just one step away. It's part of a recently renovated 2 storey building. If you have a big family make sure to check our other apartment as well! Its location merges Porto's art district with the lively city center. With very high ceilings and spacious rooms, you will have all the confort you need to relax after the long days cruising the city. And a different twist when you get in - we furnished and decorated the apartment with products made by young Portuguese designers and artists. But with no fuss. We just want to offer you the possibility to experience what is done best in Portugal while supporting small scale entrepreneurs. The apar
neighborhood_overview: Well, this is quintessential Porto downtown. You will be in the heart of Porto’s art district, where you'll find great galleries, young artist ateliers and shops, and can basically walk to all pins in the map. Jog by the river Douro in the morning, stroll by Aliados in the afternoon and hit Galerias de Paris for nightlife! No matter how busy the city looks, quietness is waiting for you when you return home after a long day exploring Porto’s secrets!
notes: The apartment is only the entry door... Porto is to be lived hitting the streets and getting lost in its secrets. Each of us experiences a city in different ways. Tell us what you are looking for and we’ll make sure you get the best recommendations.  Send us your questions/requests so that all you need to worry during your stay is whether you should extend your vacations for a couple of days more...
access: The apartment accommodates up to 4 people and has all amenities needed for you to feel at home.  It has two spacious bedrooms for 2 persons each. We can provide a baby cot upon request.
interaction: As much as you want. We are equally happy to take you around and show you off the beaten track treasures or just leave you to discover the city by yourself.
house_rules: We only have 3 rules:  1. Treat the apartment as if it's your home 2. After 22.00 is time to party outdoors (unless you can drink in silence!)  3. Smoking is not allowed

host.host_about:
We are 4 friends that love to travel, just like you. We are all born and raised in Porto. Even though, we travel constantly, for work or fun..., Porto is where home is! 

Our hosts across the world have made our journeys memorable - that hidden square, that restaurant with no english menus, unexpected block parties or that book left on the bedside table. Come visit us in Porto and we will return the favour! 

Most of the times, Filipe will be your host, but whenever possible João, Nuno & Melo will come to meet you too!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Accueil chaleureux,  Filipe est un hôte très organisé,  dès notre arrivée, un plan et un guide papier regroupant les principales attractions de la ville nous ont été remis.
L'appartement est très agréable et confortable. Nous tenons à féliciter Filipe pour avoir aménagé cet appartement des années 40/50 avec un mobilier "vintage scandinave".  Excellente literie, tout le nécessaire est prévu,  et propreté irréprochable.  Bien situé, et de nombreux commerces à proximités.

The host:
Very responsive and easy to communicate with, with flexibility in check-in time even though we booked with short notice (booking in the morning). 

Sara checked us in and gave us some great customized / tailored tips and advice based on our interests, really friendly and professional interaction. 

The property:
Very comfortable and neat apartment, with good quality and trendy furnishings. Located in the arts district, a short (10min) walk to most attractions and the best local restaurants/bars, and a 25min walk to the Ribeira (which is a bit more touristic). 

Beds were comfortable and kitchen was stocked with necessary cooking utensils. Welcoming drinks were a lovely touch. 

Overall:
We had a lovely time and would certainly come back next time we are in Porto!
Lovely apartment very clean and Felipe and Sara very good hosts with great communication. Road was very noisy

Apartment is just beautiful, nicely decorated, very good atmosphere, totally clean and tidy, plenty of space and in good location of Porto. Hosts are extremely friendly and helpful, patient and sharing lots of holiday tipps. It was very nice meeting Sara in person and Filipe via email. Thanks a lot for a great time and being perfect hosts!

Filipe's place was great, very clean and spacious.
The welcome gift upon check in was appreciated along with all of Sara's recommendations! Some street noise at night (but you are in the centre of a city so to be expected). Would stay here again!

O apartamento é muito bem localizado próximo à área histórica da cidade.
É possível ir caminhando a todos os pontos de interesse do Porto.
O ponto alto do apartamento é o Décor do apartamento que é perfeito.
A comunicação foi muito fácil e as dicas enviadas pelo Filipe e pela Sara foram preciosas. 
Espero poder hospedar novamente no apartamento!

Logement conforme aux photos et bien placé.
Propriétaire très sympathique et très accueillant qui a pris le temps pour nous donner des conseils de visites. Je recommande.

Our stay in the apartment was wonderfull. It was nicely decorated, comfortable and very clean. Everything we used was almost as new and tastefully chosen.
The location was just fine, near the center, but not in the busy, touristic part. Around the corner we found everything we needed. Restaurants, wine bar, supermarket and shops. Together with Filipe’s advice and suggestions ware to go, we enjoyed our stay in Porto very much.
Filipe is a perfect host, enthusiastic and well informed; our introduction to Porto could not have been better.

The apartment is cozy, spatious and convenient. And very clean. We travelled with a baby and it was perfect for that. The location is right in the centre, everything you need is within walking distance. And the best of it all was Filipe who is an excellent host and gave us some great tips on what to do and see in Porto including where to find nice restaurants and bars. We definitely recommend this place!

El apartamento está muy bien, de limpieza impecable, muy estiloso en su decoración y muy bien ubicado ya que estás cerca andando de los principales sitios turísticos de la ciudad.
Y Porto una ciudad de belleza sorprendente, muy recomendable.
Los anfitriones Filipe y Sara muy atentos.

Filipes apartment is a very lovely space with beautiful furniture and 2 super comfy bedrooms. its central and check in and communication is very easy. We enjoyed the welcome present a bottle of wine on the very cozy couch. Only thing is its a little cold in the winter even though you have portable heaters. But we felt at home anyways.
Beautiful place, excellent location, very comfortable. Perfect

We had a great stay at Filipe's place. Location was good and the house was correct. Filipe always responded to my messages within an hour or two. He was absent the day we arrived but his friend was waiting for us at home.
My son loved the place so much that he keep asking me to return to Filipe's house.
Thank you Filipe for our stay.
Best Kristine

Had a wonderful stay at Filipe's, Before we arrived, Filipe had mailed a whole lot of useful tips which were really helpful. He was always available and though we did not meet, promptly answered any queries that made our stay even more comfortable.

The apartment is very nice, it is as described and everything was in place. 

Definetely looking forward to the next trip to Porto and hopefully would like to stay at Filipe's place again. Thanks Filipe.

The apartment was perfect for our group of 3 staying in Porto for the weekend. It was spacious, clean and with everything we needed. It is located in a great neighbourhood from which we walked everywhere, into the old town and down to the water. Filipe was easy to communicate with and provided some great local tips. We would have no hesitation staying again!

The perfect place to stay in Porto! Really close to the main central area without being too noisy or overcrowded. Stylish apartment, comfy beds and safe local vicinity. Fab hosts - lots of useful info about what to see/do/eat and communication before and during our stay couldn’t have been better. We will be back! Thank you Filipe and Sara!!

I have stayed at a lot of Airbnb’s. This is one of the best, practical, everything works perfectly, clean, comfortable and clean bedding.

Would even stay again! 

Sara and Filip were great and they were available every time.
Nice neighborhood. Clean and comfortabel appartement. Next visit to Porto and we will come back.
Great well furnished apartment in perfect central location.

We gladly recommend this superb house, and Filipe!

Excellent house, tastefully furnished and decorated. Felt like the city house you would always want, facing a hidden back yard.

The location is super, and Filipe is great! Superb recommendations, each one was spot on.

It may get a bit noisy on a Saturday night outside the bedroom windows, with happy people returning from local bars, but the street is fairly quiet the rest of the days.

We will gladly recommend both the house and our host Filipe!

Really lovely apartment with nice personal touches and everything you could need. Easy to walk to local restaurants and into town. About 40mins walk across to the port houses. Quiet street during the day, worth noting both bedrooms are at the front of the property and it was noisy at night on the weekend, if you are a light sleeper bring earplugs. Super place though, would recommend.
Fantastic artsy neighborhood within walking distance of everything in Porto!  A great find!!!
A fine appartement clean, enough living space and an inspired check in. Pillipe give us great information of the city and best restaurants he recommended. Marvelous city!
Gute lage, tolle wohnung, schöne möbel. Vermieter sehr freundlich und stets erreichbar. Auch mit kindern empfehlenswert.

Das Aparment ist wirklich ein kleines Schmuckstück und die Freundlichkeit und Professionalität unserer Gastgeber war toll! Die Tipps für Restaurants und schnelle Wege zu Fuß in der Umgebung waren Gold wert und die kulinarische Ausstattung (Kaffee, Tee, Bier, Wein, Gastgebergeschenk mit Obst und Portwein) hat das gemütliche Ankommen sehr versüßt. Auch die Kommunikation während unseres Aufenthalts war sehr nett und davon geprägt, uns eine tolle Zeit in Porto zu ermöglichen. Wir würden jederzeit wieder Filipe als Gastgeber wählen!
We had a lovely stay and would recommend to anyone

Filipe’s place is just like what’s in the pictures, very nice, clean and convenient to all the shops and restaurants, we walked to everywhere we needed to go. Filipe provided a lot of written guide, Sarah his colleague who greeted us gave us a lot of useful information to get around town. Really enjoyable stay, highly recommend!

Great location and very stylish and clean apartment.   Hosts gave great info and recommendations which really made for a brilliant stay in Porto.  Welcome Port and small touches really helped.  Would definitely recommend this apartment.  Hosts could not have been more helpful.  I would suggest bringing some ear plugs as there is some building works on the road in the early week day mornings.   Otherwise a perfect base for exploring Porto.
appartement impeccable, deco douce et soignée et surtout un emplacement idéal dans le plus beau quartier de la ville pour tout faire à pied, parfait pour une famille avec deux enfants

great, clean, goid location
just no climatisation and no elevator
Prima woning op fijne lokatie in het centrum van Porto. Inrichting is heel stijlvol en schoon. Huis is enigszins gehorig. ‘s Nacht hoor je het verkeer en de voorbijgangers goed.
amazing stay - great hosts

Superbe appartement, nous avons séjourné 5 jours avec ma maman, la literie est incroyable, l'appartement possède un style scandinave très design, le centre historique est à 15 mn à pieds, la situation est bonne et Filipe a été très accueillant. Très bon séjour.

The apartment is what you expect from the photos and description. Lovely decor, spacious, great location and two bathrooms which is certainly a luxury. Very good quality linen and towels and a fully equipped kitchen. Lovely green space to look out at from the living room. Would definitely highly recommend this place!
great communication. very fast WiFi 100mbps. stylish place. sparkling clean. perfect!
Es increíble! Acogedor y tranquilo!

A group of four friends had an amazing stay at Filipes apartment. It is in the perfect location, just out of the Center in a great arty area but close enough to everything. The space is super clean and tidy, with lots of lovely additional touches. It can get a little loud at night in the street outside the bedroom windows but other than that you cannot fault it. The greatest part of staying here though is the hospitality. Filipes friend Joao welcomed us with a smile and a whole range of really great information - but went over and above when I realised I had left my passport in the taxi - ringing the taxi company and airport police and dealing with them for me until it was found. The excellent communication and support from both Joao and Filipe before, during and after our stay was second to none. I can highly recommend staying here.

Excellent - we would happily recommend this apartment for a very pleasant stay in Porto.
Thank you Felipe & Sara.

I love this apartment! It's light, airy and tastefully decorated and is extremely well-equipped. It's spotlessly clean and the beds are very comfortable.
Sara checked me in and provided a very useful map (better than the airport ones!) and marked various places of interest on it - she was so friendly and helpful.
There was a 'welcome pack' of fruit and port, and essentials like tea, coffee and oil were provided. There's even an 'honesty bar', with good-quality wine and craft beers.
The only slight negative is that the street can be a little noisy at times, but I'm not a light sleeper, fortunately!
The apartment was so chic and the hosts were thoughtful and attentive. Would definitely stay again! Thanks Filipe!!

Great apartment. Spacious, beautifully decorated and very clean. Filipe ensures that you have a great stay by providing ample suggestions for food and entertainment around. Also very responsive, and even offered early check-in without us asked for it. Highly recommended to stay here!

Filipe’s apartment was a home away from home. Clean, comfortable and complete with everything you will need during your stay, including a complimentary bottle of port which was delicious! 
Great location! Would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in Porto. Can’t wait to return!
I do not tell your anything about this awesome place, this is my super secret for my next trip to Porto

Excellent choice for both location and spotless comfortable apartment. Check-in was warm, friendly and informative about local attractions and restaurant tips. I would recommend the apartment without hesitation.

Alojamiento perfecto, puedes recorrer a pie toda la ciudad. Muy acogedor y tiene todo lo que se puede necesitar y mas.  Todo lo necesario para el bebé, muchos detalles. Tiene escaleras para subir, pero incluso yendo con un bebe no cuesta nada subirlas.

hôte très acceuillant et pleins de bons conseils.
Emplacement top, appartement propre et agréable.
super plan!

This space is exactly what it looks like. I enjoyed morning coffee in the patio. The two bedrooms were great for my daughter and myself.  Lots of amenities; coffee, tea, olive oil, dish soap, my daughter commented there was even a first aid kit. The location is nice, it's not in the middle of everything, but very close. The bedrooms are in the front of the building so street noise is heard. The space above this one is an airbnb rental also and, due to the beautiful wood floors there isn't much insulation between the two floors. If you don't know how to use outside European window shades for the bedrooms, ask, they are wonderful.
This place was amazing. Would definitely recommend!

name: DOWNTOWN VIP MONTREAL ,HIGH END DECOR,GOOD VALUE..
summary: With your booking you gain full PRIVATE use of the entire Condo.  This centrally located property offers clean, cozy, quality comfort at an affordable price. Hassle free check in/out, pick up and return your keys from a lock box, no time wasted.
space: About 12 to 15 minutes drive into the heart of DOWNTOWN Montreal  This listing is very big and has lots of room its very good for family's or friends that come in to town for weddings , reunion's or for any special occasions that requires a big space for lots of people  This spacious apartment has 4 bedrooms, 2 kitchens, 2 dining rooms, 2 living rooms and 2 full bathrooms. The property is listed as able to accommodate 18 people, however the unit is ideally suited for up to 12 people for maximum comfort.  Bedding is always fresh and clean, bed sizes are as follows:  Master bedroom1 :Queen size bed Master bedroom2 :Queen size bed  bedroom3 :Large double bed bedroom4 :Large double bed ,Living room1 :Super comfortable double size sofa bed ,Living room2 :Super comfortable double size sofa bed , Living room 2 : Second Good quality double size sofa bed,  In master bedroom :Good quality double size sofa bed , Guest room 2  :Good quality sofa bed ,if requested we can provide air mattress on ava

Hassle free check in/out, pick up and return your keys from a lock box, no time wasted. About 12 to 15 minutes drive into the heart of DOWNTOWN Montreal  This listing is very big and has lots of room its very good for family's or friends that come in to town for weddings , reunion's or for any special occasions that requires a big space for lots of people  This spacious apartment has 4 bedrooms, 2 kitchens, 2 dining rooms, 2 living rooms and 2 full bathrooms. The property is listed as able to accommodate 18 people, however the unit is ideally suited for up to 12 people for maximum comfort.  Bedding is always fresh and clean, bed sizes are as follows:  Master bedroom1 :Queen size bed Master bedroom2 :Queen size bed  bedroom3 :Large double bed bedroom4 :Large double bed ,Living room1 :Super comfortable double size sofa bed ,Living r
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to NDG. It's one of the trendiest neighborhood's in Montreal. This area is a fully bilingual area. Feel free to speak English or French. Monkland village is a very trendy and friendly area to meet friends or make new ones. Lots of café's, restaurants, & drinking establishments. Their are many festivals that occur on Monkland street during summer NDG is a very family oriented neighborhood.
notes: This listing is 2 condos side by side from each other that connects making it in to one very big and spacious place
transit: Great Location. Very easy to access to get around the city. Walking distance to Cote-Saint-Luc Mall or to Monkland village. The Bus stop is located on the corner of the street which takes you directly to the metro station which leads you Downtown in minutes. Easy access to the highway which allowing you to get down town between 7 to 10 minutes.
access: With your booking you gain full PRIVATE use of the entire Condo.
interaction: If you are not familiar with Montreal or you want to explore certain areas just let us know. We're a message away and we can provide you with any information you may need in order to make your stay fun, exciting and easy.
house_rules: - NO SMOKING OF ANY KIND INCLUDING E-CIGARETTES AND NO PARTIES. IF YOU SMOKE INSIDE THE CONDO OR HAVE PARTIES YOU AGREE TO FORFEIT YOUR DEPOSIT IN FULL AND THAT’S NOT NEGOTIABLE, BY RENTING THIS APARTMENT YOU AGREE AND GIVE CONSENT TO THIS CONDITION TO FORFEIT YOUR SECURITY DEPOSIT.  NO SHOES ALLOWED IN THE HOUSE YOU MUST TAKE OF YOUR SHOES IN THE ENTRANCE WHEN YOU WALK IN.  HOUSE RULES: We worked hard on making this house beautiful and comfortable for you to enjoy, please take extra care of the condo, leave the condo clean at all time and treat it like your own. The number of guests must match the number specified when booking no guests allowed beyond the amount agreed upon in the booking. A copy of a government issued ID, consistent with the identity of the person on the reservation may be requested prior to arrival or at check-in DON'T BE A SAVAGE AND BREAK THINGS, if you break anything you will be charged the full amount to replace and to fix/install it, and if the house is not ren

host.host_about: I like to meet new ppl.

reviews.comments: This place was great for my big Group , lots of free parking outside  was very helpful and is not easy to find in Montreal , Stewie was a great host very easy to communicate with , check-in checkout was a breeze , and very fast to answer to any ? We had ,  I would highly recommend it to anyone else coming to montreal with a big Group , he was generous enough to give us a late checkout , and it was a short drive to downtown , all in all exactly like advertised

What a great stay! 
We were amazingly accommodated!
Simon was fast at answering any questions we had. Very helpful. Check in and check out was easy due to the convenience of the lock box. Centrally located & highly recommended. Thanks!

What a great host and the place was great for our big  group it had a full kitchen which is good so we were able to cook and eat in , the proximity to downtown was great I would highly recommended to anyone coming to visit montreal one of my best experiences in a Airbnb

Simon was great to accomodate such a large group of us so last minute after our original accommodation plans fell through. He was very understanding and thorough with details and ensured a smooth check-in and check-out process. The apartment was awesome and very clean, it had everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again next time we're in Montreal!
Great place to stay! Check in and out was quick and easy. We had some issues with the place, but the host was quick to fix any issue we had! Would definitely stay here again. Great experience!

The house was extremely clean when we got there and Simon is very quick with his responses. He made check-in quite easy and the space was just what we needed. The location of the house is perfect. It is outside of downtown Montreal so it is nice and quiet when you want to relax, but only a short drive to go sight seeing. I would absolutely stay at this place again.

To be honest I wasn't really happy about this stay at all. We were jerked around from the start about properties that were available and then told we weren't allowed to stay there, told we had to move properties three weeks before our stay, and were told that the second location was downtown when it very, very clearly was not. We were charged for part of a second day stay despite no information on the listing about a minimum stay and also charged extra because of the 'holiday weekend' when Memorial Day is not celebrated in Canada. I would not recommend the property I stayed in or liaising with Stewie to anyone I know. Perhaps if we had been able to stay in our initial, actually downtown property we would have had a better experience, but frankly I wish we had stayed in a downtown hotel instead.
Thanks for being so attentive to me and my family! The 2 apartments were very stylish, clean and comfortable. Our family (with a big age range) really enjoyed our weekend stay here.
Simon was a super host! Attentive, responded quickly, and checked in with us when we arrived to make sure we were comfortable. We enjoyed our stay in Montreal. Thank you Simon!!

Couldn't have asked for more. The place was great, the hosts were accommodating, everything was in order. They even came to check on us and gave us places to check out. Great hosts. We had an amazing time would 100,000% rent again!
Endroit bien pour un grand groupe. Il manquait des draps mais nous nous sommes arrangés. Recommandé pour un court séjour.

Simon was an outstanding host in every way.  The living space was clean, organized, and it was very easy to check in.  Additionally, whenever there were any questions, Simon responded immediately.  I would recommend Simon's place to anyone looking to stay in a great place while visiting Montreal.

Place was good, just little smaller as we though but we enjoyed at stay there. Very clean and nice decorated 
Just the parking on the street was very hard to find. Communication was little mix up... sometimes is Simon sometimes is Stewie. So was little confused
Muy buena opción para hospedaje en Montreal. El espacio es sumamente amplio, fácilmente caben de 10 a 12 personas. Estuvieron muy atentos a todo. Sin duda podría volver a considerarlo.

I would 10/10 recommend Simon as an air bnb host! He replied in a timely manner and was also available for any help we needed. His location is right outside of downtown Montreal, maybe a 15 minute uber ride to where most of the restaurants and bars are. The interior of the apartment was decorated very nicely and fit our group comfortably. We had a great New Years trip all thanks to Stewie.

name: My House in Porto
summary: Alojamento ideal para duas pessoas (cama de casal e sofá-cama) Decoração confortável com bastantes plantas e luz natural Cozinha equipada com fogão, frigorífico, máquina de lavar, micro-ondas e mini-forno; Casa equipada com wifi e televisão; Muito próximo da baixa do Porto (5 minutos a pé); Estação de metro Carolina Michaelis (5 minutos a pé); Vários restaurantes e minimercados nas proximidades; Zona cultural e de comércio local e de autor a 5 minutos a pé (Rua Miguel Bombarda);
