address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Definitely stay at Marcos flat! It's in a great spot in town close to the centre, galleries, bars all a walk away. Plus the flat itself is lovely - cool interior, super clean, and with a great roof terrace for catching the sun. Marco was a wonderful host so helpful with great recommendations for places to eat and go out in Porto and always easy to contact. He made our stay in Porto even better than we had hoped!
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Appt proche du centre, marco très gentil , j'ai bu ses bière "lager" j'espere qu'il ne me tiendra pas rigeur...

Marco has been very helpful before and during our stay. He's offered us information and tips about Porto, and offered to assist whenever necessary. He's flat is just as shown in the pictures, very nice and a walk away to the city center. A very good stay!

Marco es muy simpático y estuvo pendiente durante la estancia de que estuviésemos a gusto.
El apartamento es acogedor, cómodo y práctico.
Marco's house is perfect. I stayed there so comfortable. He set up everything guests want. I do want to stay his place when I visit to Porto again.

Marco is one of the best host's I have had! He was always contactable and kindly accommodated our late check out. His house is perfect for a couple with all the necessary amenities. The apartment is light filled and comfortable, with an amazing terrace offering beautiful views of the surrounding neighbourhood. His house is a short walk to the city centre, the supermarket, local cafes, shops and restaurants. We stayed here for five nights but could have stayed forever! Thank you Marco

Marco's place is very nice. Clean, comfortable, in a calm area, we have spent very nice moments there. The terrasse is wonderful, especially when it is sunny like last weekend. We loved how the flat is decorated, so many plants !!! The communication with Marco and the welcoming of his parents was well organised. The flat is at 15 min walk from the main touristic places so it is easly reachable. Thank you Marco !

name: Lovely Big Room in Center of Porto
summary: Hi, welcome to the Mansion of Heroes! I am Bruno and this is a beautiful, restored, old house of Porto that is now a Guesthouse/Restaurant with amazing homemade food and special drinks! The house has 7 cozy rooms very pleasant to stay for some nights, relaxing, or having fun. Come to meet us! :)
space: The rooms and the house itself are very cozy and confrotable. The house it's in front of the Metro and Bus station (Heroismo) that goes directly to the beach, or the airport, and 15min walking to downtown our 5min by public transportation.
description: Hi, welcome to the Mansion of Heroes! I am Bruno and this is a beautiful, restored, old house of Porto that is now a Guesthouse/Restaurant with amazing homemade food and special drinks! The house has 7 cozy rooms very pleasant to stay for some nights, relaxing, or having fun. Come to meet us! :) The rooms and the house itself are very cozy and confrotable. The house it's in front of the Metro and Bus station (Heroismo) that goes directly to the beach, or the airport, and 15min walking to downtown our 5min by public transportation. The restaurant it's only open from 12 to 15 and from 19 to 22.30 The Restaurant/Bar area it's a area to enjoy our services and to try our great cuisine of our awesome chefs! Just try it ;) There are supermarkets nearby and almost everything that is needed. It's a Cultural area, called Bonfim (Good End) and lot's of people are coming to here to live and to enjoy the area. Direct Metro line from the Airport or Campanhã (Train Station) to Heroísmo (Metro Station
neighborhood_overview: There are supermarkets nearby and almost everything that is needed. It's a Cultural area, called Bonfim (Good End) and lot's of people are coming to here to live and to enjoy the area.
notes: It's only allowed to eat vegetarian meals :) (no meat or fish are allowed in the house)
transit: Direct Metro line from the Airport or Campanhã (Train Station) to Heroísmo (Metro Station in front of the house)
access: The restaurant it's only open from 12 to 15 and from 19 to 22.30
interaction: The Restaurant/Bar area it's a area to enjoy our services and to try our great cuisine of our awesome chefs! Just try it ;)
house_rules: It's only allowed to prepare vegetarian meals :) (no meat nor fish is allowed in the house) LATE CHECK-IN POLICY: We have a late check-in policy where we call a friend to recieve people who needs to enter the house after the check-in hours for an extra payment in the moment of the check-in 15e from 10P.M to 2A.M, by previous request  Sometimes we have dinners with friends and guests on the patio and we socialize there

reviews.comments: Tudo ok. O quarto que ficamos tinha as janelas voltadas para a rua e logo cedo havia bastante barulho dos ônibus de transporte público. O hostel é muito bem localizado. Anfitriões simpáticos. Estávamos em 3 adultos e 2 crianças e o quarto era amplo e nos acomodou confortavelmente.

This was a great place to stay on short notice. We fit 7 people into the room with space to spare. It is right a across from the metro which is very convenient. Underneath the apartment was a quaint and tasty bakery, which was a nice place to have breakfast. The street that the apartment is on however, gets very loud at night. 
But other than that it was a very nice place.

La chambre est grande et nickel pour 5 personnes. Comme il fait frais à Porto le soir, la nuit était très agréable pour dormir en plein mois d'août. L'hébergeur Dan est sympathique et nous a fait visiter les lieux de l'appartement à notre arrivée.
Perfect place to stay and really good value! Everything was super easy and we can not recommend this place enough - thank you!!
The hosts gave us a warm welcolme and many helpful tips, the house is amazing, I definitly recommand it!
Good place to stay, near metro station, cafes and shops. Creative atmospher, equipped kitchen, clean and positive stuff.
Beautiful place near the center with subway station in front of you, Restaurants around and really friendly people, highly recommend!
Great place and experience. Clean, not far from the city center, good neighborhood and nice people. It lets you take the most of Porto!!!! We loved it.

Fabulous place to stay, couldn't recommend it more! Management are a fantastic group of people who take pride in their accomodation and want to make it the best stay for their guests. Great bedrooms and communal area/kitchen, exceptionally clean at all times! Will be returning for sure.
Sentimos uma ótima energia em nesse espaço. Pena ter ficado tão pouco tempo. Aconchegante, limpo, amplo, com jeito de lar.
the accomodation was really nice, clean and well-organized. we were received very friendly and enjoyed our stay in the accomodation!
The suite was very spacious and comfortable. The place has a very cool vibe with really nice hosts. I also enjoyed the close proximity to the center of Porto.
The room is nice, maybe the street is too noisy if you are sensitive to the noise of traffic. But this place is nice and there is a good mood. Thanks you!

The place was lovely. It was perfect for my 3 friends and I who were travelling around Porto. It is situated directly opposite to the metro which takes you directly to the airport. The place was clean and as described.

very easy and uncomplicated stay in that beautiful place! 

cheers guys
Espaço muito agradável, com pessoas super acessiveis e simpáticas.

Pessoas disponíveis, bem localizado, muita limpeza e boas instalações! Boa onda!
Um bom sítio para ficar e se apaixonar pela Invicta

We enjoyed staying at this house in Porto. There are many rooms in the house and many people were staying for the weekend. Overall, clean and comfortable. The only problem we had is there were not enough bed linens for the first night. I sent a message to the hosts, and the room was well equipped by the time we returned the next day
Stanza molto economica in zona comoda (fermata metro di fronte). Host simpatici. Ambiente giovanile e divertente.
Location is perfect just 5meters away from metro station. Host gave us a lot of tips about city and parking place. overall highly recommended..

Deberian poner mantas o edredon y cambiar la ubicacion de la cama poner almohadas en el sentido contrario ya que de la puerta entra mucho frio. Y en mi opinion a las 12 se deberia de apaga la luz de la entrada la tuvimos encendida toda la noche nos entraba la luz en la habitacion y no pudimos descansar bien y no nos quedamos la segunda noche porque hace muchísimo frío.

Great place. We stayed with family of four with two kids 5 and 6. Apartment big enough, clean, nicely equiped. Parking for free in the neighbouring street, metro in front of the place and on foot barely 15min. to the historical center. The landlords were really nice people, friendly, young, easygoing. Nothing but recommend!

This a great place because of the people who run it. They are all such nice and calm people, available to help you with anything. They were ok with me leaving my bag there for a few hours after the check out which was very helpful.
The house is super clean and good location.
El anfitrión estaba atento a nuestra llegada. Una casa muy bonita, acojedora, y completa.
Excelente em termos de comunicação e hospitalidade! Tem a estação de metro mesmo em frente o que facilidade a mobilidade

Esta bien ubicado porque enfrente esta la estación del metro, esta a unas cuadras del centro, amplias habitaciones. Aunque el contactar con el anfitrión era un poco complejo, debido a que le cuesta hablar Español, y en su sitio web menciona que domina el Español.
Adoramos tudo perfeito bruno e sua esposa são maravilhosos local perfeito limpeza otima e muito obrigada por tudo.
El alojamiento y la habitación son muy acogedores

Abbiamo prenotato solo una notte ed è stato più che sufficiente. Cose positive: vicinissimo alla metro fermata Heroismo (attraversi la strada e c'è la fermata della metro, passano molte linee che portano a Trindad dove puoi cambiare per andare in centro), stanza per 5 economica, poi si trova sopra a una pasticceria-panificio molto buona e con buoni prezzi, infine abbiamo potuto lasciare la camera all'orario che volevamo. Cose negative: non c'è il citofono e il campanello sulla strada non funziona per cui per contattare l'host bisogna solo inviare i messaggi per farsi aprire. Entrando c'è un "profumino" di cucinato 24 ore su 24, la camera non è per niente profumata, anzi..., così anche le lenzuola e le asciugamani. I letti non sono fatti, c'è solo il lenzuolo di sotto mentre quello di sopra e le coperte (piuttosto vecchie e polverose, una sporca) sono appoggiati. C'è solo un asciugamano a testa. In bagno non c'è sapone per le mani, bagnoschiuma e shampoo lasciati probabilmente degli ospiti precedenti. La cosa più grave è che la porta della nostra stanza non si poteva chiudere a chiave perché non c'era la chiave. L'host (di poche parole) non aveva neanche una cartina da darci. Gli infissi sono scorrevoli e fanno entrare aria. Ultima cosa: il WiFi non era sufficientemente potente da funzionare.

Hicimos una reserva en esta habitación para alojarnos el mismo día. 

Tuvimos un problema de comunicación y no fueron nada accesibles con la hora de llegada, por lo que no pudimos alojarnos en la habitación aún cuando estaba todo pago.

Very nice place to stay, a good value for your money. The location is about a 20 minute walk to the center which is not bad at all. There's good restaurants near by and the hosts are very kind and accommodating. My only issues were that the wifi was slow and did not reach our room well, but Bruno said they were fixing that so it should be resolved soon. Cool looking rooms with various card games and toys which were fun to play around with!
방이 넓고 깨끗했으며 교통이 편리하고 근처에 큰 마트를 이용하는 것이 편리했습니다. 그러나 제가 지냈던 방에는 열쇠가 없어서 불편했습니다.

The place is marvellous! Big bedrooms with double bunk beds, big windows and funky bed linen. 25 minute walk from the centre but right oposite a metro stop and plenty of free parking if you have a car. Lovely bakery just below for breakfast!!
It was great, we spent there 2 night and everything was just ok

Repetiría sin duda. Sitio bien comunicado por metro, no muy lejos del centro. Precio inmejorable. La habitación bien cuidada, limpia, amplia y luminosa. El dueño (Bruno) fue muy atento, divertido y proactivo en cuanto actividades. En general, experiencia óptima.
입구가 바뀌어있어서 조금 헤맸지만, 숙소에 들어가는 순간부터 좋았어요. 방도 사진과 정말 똑같아서 놀랐고 화장실도 한개가 아니라서 기다릴 걱정은 없었어요. 숙소에서 머문 시간이 짧아서 아쉬워요.

Very comfortable house with a well equipped kitchen if one wants to cook :) the neighborhood is calm and easily reachable from the airport / the inner city. 

Bruno was very helpful and friendly even recommended us a place to eat. 

We would definitely come back :)
The room was huge and beautiful! Not far from the center  (20-25min walk) and 1min from the metro station! The hosts were so helpful and kind! I would recommend it !
Ca roule
Super ambiance l hôte est très attentif et adorable maison atypique comme lui et nous. Je recommande

Bruno's place is great! It may not be what you expect (good or bad), but the rooms are very nice with cool common spaces. If you like hostels this is a great place for you! The staff are very friendly, especially Bruno! He is very welcoming and a nice person. They welcomed us with open arms, gave us tips, and even welcomed us to a get-together! Concerning the place: the beds were comfortable, the rooms can get very warm, the showers were very hot too :), vegetarians will love the kitchen, it is right next to a metro stop, and not a too far walk from main sights. We had a great time and would recommend this place to others.
We (four college students) had a lovely stay at Bruno's place.  Good location, huge room, and incredibly friendly house.  I'd definitely stay here again!

The room is very comfortable and very big, we spent 3 days there and it was great. What was so appreciated is the kitchen so clean and how it was nice to cook as there are many supermarket in the area, everything cooking thing is available.  The atmosphere of the house was very nice. It is so close to the centre and to a adorable pastry shop with home made food (in the same street). Getting and leaving was simple as we were received by a very nice lady who explained it all and we could leave our luggage after checking out. We had only some trouble with the WiFi and the room was quite cold but the rest makes up for it! 
Thank you so much, I recommend it.
We had a great time here with my friends. We had everything we needed and the centre wasn’t far either. Everything was nice and clean, we would recommend it so thanks Bruno!:)
Lugar bien comunidmcado con el resto de lugares turísticos. Habitación acogedora y sobre todo muy cómoda y sin ruidos. Excelente lugar.
Gostamos muito do espaço, super tranquilo e confortável. Será sempre um espaço a ter conta se precisar de voltar com um grupo de 3 ou mais pessoas.
We really enjoyed our short stay in the apartment!
Logement bien situé pour visiter porto
The room was clean and cozy, aslo the common kitchen and bathroom were clean. We really loved it and recommened to everyone.
I truly recomend Bruno and his flat. We stay with 3 bikes and it was a lot of problem with them but Bruno help with everything! Thank You really much! :)

Świetna lokalizacja — 10 minut spaceru od dworca, pół godziny spaceru od centrum miasta, ponadto bezpośrednio pod wyjściem z mieszkania znajduje się stacja metra. W bezpośredniej okolicy znajdują się kawiarnie i lokalne restauracje, gdzie zjedliśmy naprawdę smaczne jedzenie. Niedaleko pralnia i supermarket dla osób, które wolą opcje budżetowe. Pokój i całość mieszkania utrzymana w nienagannej czystości, wszystkie podstawowe rzeczy takie jak ręczniki, szampony itp. zapewnione. Obsługa bardzo miła i komunikatywna. I to wszystko w bardzo niskiej cenie! Naprawdę polecam!!!

The place is right in front of the Heroísmo metro station. The room was spacious, clean, and enough for four people. Bathroom is shared with other guests, hostel style. It can be quite noisy at night because of the traffic. However, it’s still a good place to stay.
Excelentes anfitriones. Limpieza y cordialidad.

Bruno is such a nice host and was very accommodating. It was a bit disappointing and unnerving that we couldn't lock our room and didn't have a safe to put valuables but Bruno was very reassuring and it sounded like they are working on getting a lock. The room itself is nice, it was just quite loud next to the road and the stairway next to the room is loud with the other guests going up and down the stairs. It's great that there's a metro stop right across the street, very convenient!

Lieu bien situé (on fait tout à pieds dans Porto, et le métro est en face), avec de quoi cuisiner et un Lidl à 300m. Chambre spacieuse pour 4, très haute de plafond. Supers lieux communs : baignoire, patio, lorgne avec échiquier... et pas du tout bruyant le soir si on veut dormir.
Bruno and his team run a great place. We were comfortable and it was within 15 min walking of downtown Porto. We would stay here again!

We booked the large room which is very comfortable. The apartment is spacious, with several kitchens and bathrooms. We were welcomed by Sara who was very kind and helpful. Just around the corner, there is a lovely bakery where you will certainly enjoy having breakfast every day.
We spent a great night a Bruno's, the place is super friendly and very welcoming ! Thanks for having us ! I 100% recommend it !

Nous serons où dormir lorsque nous reviendrons passer quelques jours à Porto. 
Juste en face métro et bus. 
Rapport qualité/prix Nickel.

I really enjoyed staying at Bruno's place. If you don't mind walking 15 minutes to the center or taking metro for 2 stops and prefer to interact with locals and not live in touristic area, this is perfect spot for you. Quick response time and earlier check-in time made it for us very easy.
If you stay here, I recommend getting a room without a window to the street, it was pretty noisy during the whole day.
My only complain is Wi-Fi signal didn't reach our room without leaving our door open and even than it was very weak.
We had the suite room whice could fit 8 person, there was 3 double bed plus sofa bed. And the room so spacious, clean and nice. And there is also vegetarian kitchen, which is perfect for vegetarians!

Ótima localização e atendimento...tudo estava como descrito no anuncio e as respostas as minhas mensagens foram muito rápidas!
O único de salientar é que tem poucos duches para o numero de pessoas que consegue ter a casa, mas com um pouco de consideração entre os hospedes nas horas pico de tomar banho tudo corre de maravilha :D
Com certeza um lugar a considerar sempre para ficar!
The room was really big and comfortable, the house is really cool and the host are super nice and helped me to find the bag I  ve lost! I recommend it!
Wonderful place :)
This place is great, funky, clean and central enough for an interesting and easy walk into town centre.  Super cheap and lovely cafe next door.  We wished we could stay longer.
Returned for a second time, we like this place.
bonne ambiance style auberge de jeunesse et proche metro,
métro en bas du logement et accueil excellent. Convient parfaitement pour un court séjour.
Great place, nice people! We definitely enjoyed our stay there
Ce logement est parfait pour une virée à Porto!

Local excelente, ambiente ótimo
 Voltaria a me hospedar lá.
Très belle et grande maison. Sara nous a accueillis chaleureusement. Nous avons adoré le concept de cet "auberge" ! Je recommande.

Excelente ambiente, informal, sem o ser em demasia. Casa com uma decoração com muito bom gosto, com peças antigas, bem recuperadas. Talvez menos aconselhável a pessoas com mobilidade reduzida, não obstante existirem também quartos no piso térreo. Ótima relação preço/qualidade. Simpatia inexcedível de ambos anfitriões.
nice department, great people!
Résidence atypique, sympa pour un sejour à Porto.  Un peux distant du centre 20mn à pied. Mais sortie métro en face.
Très bon endroit, je recommande vivement !
This was cheap, clean and a t a great location. The age and character of the building made it very charmful and very hard to dislike. A very good place

Familia con tres niñas, pasamos una noche. Fácil de localizar. Ubicación ideal, con boca de metro al lado y 25 min andando al centro. La habitación con tres camas muy grandes. Baños a compartir limpios. Fácil aparcamiento fuera de zona azul, en calle paralela. Si tengo que decir un pero, para la gente que le moleste, se oye mucho el ruido de los coches en la calle, al menos en la habitación que ocupamos .
Lovely place, in a lovely place! Highly recommended!
Very beautiful space and nice rooms. Right next to a subway stop which is handy but also very close to the center. Easy to walk everywhere

Забронировали за 30 минут до прибытия и нам досталась огромная комната для двоих, все чисто, без излишеств. Встретила доброжелательная девушка, все показала. До центра пешком 15 минут. Кухня у них веганская.

We spend 3 perfect days in Porto. 
The best in this room: the subway station in front of the flat, the bakery just next door, the very big room for 4 people. 
The less: the street is a little noisy.
We recommend this nice place.
Thanks for all !
Very nice big room, with great localization in the center of Porto (15 minutes walking), very friendly hosts.  I would definitely recommend this place! :)
Accueil très sympa et hôtes sensibles à l environnement ça fait plaisir! Nous recommandons vivement!

We had a very lovely stay, a nice room and a warm welcome from the staff ! 
The room is well located, 20 minutes away from the center by feet and very close to a nice bakery where you can take your breakfast. The tapas bar had a very nice deco and the veggie food is really good! I recommend this place!
Thanks for all BrunoAlexandre. I enjoy being at your place as well as my mom and my aunt.  I loved the vegan - veggie concept of the house. Perfect location and relatively calm and quiet place.
Was pleasant stay♥️ and restaurant downstairs was amazing thank you very much

Es un alojamiento lindo y cómodo (si te toca el cuarto grande) a un buen precio. La cocina es bonita y siempre estuvo limpia y ordenada. En general la limpieza es buena. 
Los únicos inconvenientes son el frío (en invierno) porque había pocas cobijas para el frío que hacía en las noches, y la falta de baños para la cantidad de huéspedes porque los baños y las duchas están juntos y algunas veces tuvimos que esperar bastante para ducharnos o para ir al baño.
Es un buen lugar sobre todo para jóvenes. Para familias no está tan mal pero no es un lugar ideal. El ruido de la gente que come y bebe en la cocina en la madrugada puede ser bastante molesto, ya que la cocina se encuentra al lado de los cuartos del piso de arriba.
Espaço muito acolhedor, O Bruno é uma pessoa muito simpática e comunicativa. Recomendado.
Muy recomendable, trato estupendo.
It is a very nice room with comfortable beds in a cozy hostel. City center is easy to get to by foot (20 min) or metro.
Excelente localização , além de muito limpo e prestativos

name: Enjoy hotel services and facilities. MTR nearby
summary: Room size from 18-23 sqm. Equipped with all bathroom amenities, cold / hot water, air conditioning, TV, free wifi and free coffee & tea bags. In room safety box and minibar are provided.
description: Room size from 18-23 sqm. Equipped with all bathroom amenities, cold / hot water, air conditioning, TV, free wifi and free coffee & tea bags. In room safety box and minibar are provided.
house_rules: - No visitor after 11pm

host.host_name: Best Western Plus Hotel Hong Kong

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: Poipu Beach i, A/C, deck, no x fees,WIFI, plus tax
summary: Our air conditioned suite, easy walk to beach, is spacious and bright with lots of windows and glass doors to let in the sun, trade winds and tropical views. One bedroom suite includes Queen in bedroom, bathroom with shower, living room, dining area, full kitchen and deck. Features such as ceiling fans, wood floors, high ceiling, tropical décor, island art and more. Rate includes housekeeping on departure (no fee), private Wireless and parking. Rate is plus 14.96% Hawaii Tax paid upon arrival.
space: Great for a honeymoon or just getting away with your significant other for some Aloha! Great location for easy walks along our small ocean front street to Brennecke's and Poipu Beaches in this quiet established neighborhood of Poipu Beach.For up to two adults.
description: Our air conditioned suite, easy walk to beach, is spacious and bright with lots of windows and glass doors to let in the sun, trade winds and tropical views. One bedroom suite includes Queen in bedroom, bathroom with shower, living room, dining area, full kitchen and deck. Features such as ceiling fans, wood floors, high ceiling, tropical décor, island art and more. Rate includes housekeeping on departure (no fee), private Wireless and parking. Rate is plus 14.96% Hawaii Tax paid upon arrival. Great for a honeymoon or just getting away with your significant other for some Aloha! Great location for easy walks along our small ocean front street to Brennecke's and Poipu Beaches in this quiet established neighborhood of Poipu Beach.For up to two adults. The suite is situated with eight others in three cottage style buildings surrounding an acre of gardens for you to enjoy. There is a guest barbeque on a spacious deck with additional tables and chairs. The reception office is always open fo
neighborhood_overview: We are on the small ocean front street with quick walk to Brennecke's Beach, Poipu Beach Park and the Poipu Beach with county Lifeguard station. Eateries are nearby up to 15 minute walk or quick drive. This is a quiet neighborhood, ideal for walks to the beach and in the evening to see the sunsets and bright stars.
notes: *14.96% Hawaii State tax is required and payable after arrival by credit card, traveler check or cash.  *After 11AM checkout, you are welcome to use our beach towels / chairs and park for the day  *Beach towels, chairs, coolers, trail guides and our help here for you everyday
transit: We encourage guests to have a rental car while on Kauai. We have discounts for all islands, airport pickup and payment. Public transportation is limited on this rural island.
access: The suite is situated with eight others in three cottage style buildings surrounding an acre of gardens for you to enjoy. There is a guest barbeque on a spacious deck with additional tables and chairs. The reception office is always open for you to borrow beach towels and chairs, island and activity books, reading books and more. There is also a coin laundry for guests with three washers and dryers.
interaction: We are in the office every morning to help with where to go, what to do, review the map, talk about hikes and make the most of your time.  Our manager on duty is available 24/7 for urgent requests after hours.
house_rules: -Check in and payment of 14.96% State tax is required upon arrival or next morning. -Standard Cleaning, parking, WIFI and resort fee already included in the rate.   -Quiet hours are 10PM to 7AM here on Kauai  -Check-in is 2 PM, Check-out is 11 AM. Feel free to come before 2, check-in and take towels to the beach while waiting. Late check out is not offered due to pre-scheduled housekeepers and occupancy. -Guests are asked to close all windows and doors when using air conditioning.  -Guests are asked to turn off air conditioning whenever leaving. Management will do so when guests forget. Oil generates the majority of Kauai electricity at this time. We strive to be environmentally conscientious using solar hot water, available biodegradable products, recycling program and conservation of water and electricity.  -Please remove trash daily to our convenient area on way out. -Be sure to show the accurate number of persons in your party.  Limits are enforced. -Guests are responsible for addi

host.host_about: General manager

reviews.comments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Super friendly staff. The place was exactly as described and for the price I would say it was a steal.  The ocean is right across the street!  So much to do in Kauai, the 4 days we had here were not enough.  We did have one day of rain and Javed was extremely helpful in giving us ideas of things to do when our original plans were canceled due to the weather. Highly recommend.
Everything was as advertised, staff polite and helpful.

Staying here was wonderful. Check in was very easy. The place was very private. Poipu Beach is a block away. Everything was very clean. It was great having a kitchen. Also a big help was being able to borrow beach towels, chairs and even a cooler. Totally recommend this place.

Great value place. Nice touch with fresh local flowers in the room. We were missing our blender and when I asked at the front office they immediately brought out a brand new one. They have beach towels and chairs to borrow - which was nice for beach days, although it rained hard for a lot of our stay. Staff could not have been any friendlier. So kind and hospitable. Think it would be hard to find a better bargain right on the coast - literally a stone's throw from the beach!
Great space in a prime location. We walked to the beach every day, and the supply of beach gear like towels, chairs, and coolers was an excellent touch. Would definitely stay here again.
Great service and rapid response time to everything. The only draw back is a long Walt tot the swimming part of the beach

This place was very accurate to the description in the posting. Our favorite part was how walk-able the location was to the beach and the neighborhood the condo was located in. It was also convenient that the main office had towels, coolers, beach chairs etc. Everything you would need for the beach!

This place was great to stay! Clean, good amenities, great location.  There is a mangoe tree near the office and we go to have fresh picked mangoes every day! Its super close to two main beaches with a couple other nice beaches a short drive away. Its close to town for some good food. Javed was a great host!

Outstanding!  Poipu Plantation is quiet, the room very spacious, and the fresh flowers in our room smelled wonderful.  Javed had great information on things to do.  The office is fully stocked with many resources to plan trips, along with towels, chairs and sunscreen for going to the beach.  The location is very convenient from the airport and for many activities.

Poipu Plantation is located within walking distance to Poipu Beach. Late check-in was not an issue. Our key was waiting for us when we arrived. The rental is stocked with essential cooking equipment, including a coffee grinder, blender, toaster, and utensils. This was very important to us since we are vegan and enjoy preparing our own meals. Large doors with screens make taking in the breeze easy (Orchid unit). The a/c was a key feature, making sleeping at night fantastic. Javed and Maddy are incredibly friendly, answering questions and offering suggestions. It was also wonderful to have access to beach towels, chairs, an umbrella, and an ice chest!
We enjoyed our stay in the Ilima Suite.  From fresh mangos, ocean breezes, garden setting to walkability to the beach-a great place to stay! Thanks for the great local hiking tips too

Our stay at Poipu Plantation was fantastic. The price was incredible for being one or two blocks from the beach! The place was nice and clean, and the clubhouse office had supplies you could borrow for your adventures on Kauai. When I came back sunburned, Javed even hooked me up with some aloe spray that really helped ease my pain. Quiet area, great space. Can't recommend enough.

Comfortable 1-bed/1-bath room with a very Hawaiian feel, about a 10 minute walk from Poip'u Beach Park with it's excellent snorkeling protected by a man-made jetty. Lot's of fish, but bring water shoes to walk on the rocks past the edge of the sand in the water for the best experience. Javed was very accommodating and responded to emails right away, and very knowledgeable about the area and friendly. Clean, quiet, very pretty, comfy bed, and a great location to visit the rest of the Kauai.
Great stay! Was a little confused as to which kind of room we’d be staying at, but quickly figured it out once we got there. Great location, 5 min from Poipu beach!

Great place to lodge while you enjoy Kauai.  Accommodations were very comfortable with all the needed amenities and more (beach chairs, ice cooler, etc.). Staff were extremely kind and helpful. We would recommend "Javed's place" to everyone.
Air conditioning and the bathroom shower in Javeds place are good. Also from his place, the poipu beach is a short walk which is absolutely great!

We really enjoyed our stay at the Poipu Plantation. It’s a 5 minute walk to the beach and a great location to access activities on the western side of the island such as Waimea Canyon. Poipu Beach is a great area with a beautiful beach to snorkel at. 

Javed was an excellent host and has some great recommendations of things/places to check out. Just ask! 

Check-in was made super easy and communication was excellent. Place was clean, equipped with AC and had a lovely touch with some flowers on the table for us. Would def recommend and stay here again.

Thank you so much Javed! Wonderful stay. Wish we didn’t have to go. Check in was a piece of cake with warm touches and beautiful flowers about the place when we entered. We were a walk away from the beautiful ocean. Javed, the other staff and his beautiful sweet Irish setters were always warm and helpful.
This was a great place to stay and would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great location and great value!

The best place to stay in Poipu! Just steps away from the Poipu beach park, Javed’s place offers everything you need for a fabulous vacation. The facility is super quiet, beautifully adorned by plumeria trees and other fruit trees, and overall very nicely maintained. Maddy and Javed at the office gave us great local trips and what we could do in town based on our preferences. The office is kept open all the times and it is stocked with beach chairs, coolers, beach towels and bottled water to help yourselves. The kitchen inside our apartment was also stocked with basic supply of spices, pots and pans. The apartment itself was very nice and compact for the two of us. We used the AC only for a couple of hours at night, otherwise the ceiling fans were enough to keep the place ventilated during our trip in October. We will definitely come back to Poipu plantation on our next trip to Kauai! Mahalo!

Wonderful location, Staff is very accommodating, we Highly recommend Poipu Plantation!  
We enjoyed using the barbecue, access to beach chairs & coolers, and the quick walk to the beach!
It is a nice one bedroom suite with necessary utilities for a vacation stay.
Great apartment close to our favorite beach in Kauai. The area is much less rainy than the rest of the island which we also appreciated. Recommended!
Great location!

Great hosts and excellent location a few minutes walk from Poipu Beach. Our place had everything we needed... including air conditioning, coffee grinder, all the cooking supplies, beach towels, beach chairs, guidebooks, coolers, fast wifi and local knowledge. Bed was very comfortable and the resort itself was pretty quiet which we appreciated. There's also a bbq available for use. We will for sure stay here again when we return.
Fantastic stays

My husband and I spent 4 days at Poipu Plantation. The accommodations were very comfortable and very clean. The office staff is very friendly and willing to help with suggestions on what to do in the area. The office is always open and is stocked with all sorts of beach equipment for the guest’s use. They also have travel books on Kauai available and sunscreen if you need it. The location is great. Only a five minute drive to Shipwreck Beach where you can watch sunrise in the morning. The rates are very affordable for the area.

Javed is a wonderful and friendly host. We stayed at Ilima garden view but the location is a perfect location to the Poipu Beach that we walked over to enjoy the ocean view all the time.  It’s a great location for us to explore the west and east side of Kauai. It’s a location that is close to a shopping area and restaurant and other attractions area such as horning hole and shipwreck beach.  We would definitely recommend the location and stay there again.
This place is excellent!

Javed’s place was very clean and comfortable.  The staff at the resort are very knowledgeable and friendly.  This place is excellently located, with the beach in walking distance and all the shops you will need very close by.  We will stay here again!

Prime location! It was within walking distance to Poipu Beach Park and a short drive to everything else! The plumerias in the room made the arrival experience much more welcoming and inviting. We loved it and would stay again!

My wife and I were coming to Kauai and this place was a great option for us. It is within a quick walk to the beach and a nice beachfront restaurant as well as beach toys for rent. The staff were very helpful in providing options and recommendations for the things we wanted to do. They helped to make the overall experience even better. We will definitely try to stay here again when we visit next time.

Our stay at Poipu Plantation was exactly as advertised (and even a little better!) Javed is super accessible and excited to share with you his knowledge of Kauai. The space is very well stocked - we could have easily cooked every day with the basics and kitchen equipment supplied. The area is lovely, very close walking distance to the beach and swimming areas. Make sure you head to Poipu Beach Park to see the sunset! The two dogs in the office daily were a plus for us. We would love to stay at Javed’s place again!

If you are looking for peaceful, clean and confortable place to spend  your holidays in Kauai, Javed's apartment is the best choice. You will be close to the ocean (I could hear the sound of waves during the night) and Javed will give all the informations/suggestions you need to have a wonderful time in Kauai!
Javed was an exceptional host. Be sure to inquire about all of the awesome things to do in the area. He pointed us towards a few cool events/hikes in the area that we would have otherwise missed.

This place was absolutely amazing! From the time of booking, Javed was in contact with detailed information on what to expect, drive time from airport, check in details and also key tips for a successful stay. We also had access to beach towels, coolers, chairs, and all the essentials for our hike and beach filled stay. My friend and I stayed in the Ilana room. It was spacious, clean, cute, and well stocked with everything we needed for our 4 days in Kauai. The location itself was perfect! We were able to access the entire island by car (except for north shore since it was closed due to flood repairs). I highly recommend this gem in Kauai! The icing on the cake were all the great insider tips we got from Javed about excursions! I can’t wait to return! Thank you Javed & entire staff!

While I didn’t meet with Javed in person, I received timely check in information along with helpful directions. I arrived after dark, so had a little difficulty finding the key but a helpful neighbor directed me to the spot where the keys are kept. The grounds are lush and lovely. Very quiet at night and filled with tropical bird calls in the morning. The location is wonderful...steps to a wonderful beach, known for snorkeling, surfing, and sea turtles! Very comfortable in the one bedroom villa that I stayed in for four nights. Enjoyed the kitchen for breakfasts and packing picnics. Nice to have cool drinks and snacks to return to, after an adventurous day. Woman at the check in desk was friendly and helpful. Appreciated the suggestion to borrow a beach chair and towel to keep in the car along with a small cooler while I toured the island. Will return!

name: 2021 Kapalua Ridge. Platinum level villa with sweeping ocean views and elegant remodeled interiors.
summary: Breathtaking ocean/Molokai views surrounded by island style elegance & comfort in this brand new One Bedroom remodeled Kapalua Ridge villa. This is THE spot for whale watching or relaxing in luxurious Maui sumptuousness with all the comforts of home
space: Property Highlights: • Five minute walk to three world-class beaches, including Kapalua® Bay, rated the #1 beach in the US by Conde Nast • Platinum level, custom remodeled villa with elegant interiors • Stunning ocean, island and coastal views • High-end remodeled kitchen and bathrooms • Large lanai off the living room offers optimal outdoor living space • Spacious, 1150 square foot floor plan with two full bathrooms, plus washer and dryer • Starter supply of coffee, paper towels, soap/shampoos, laundry/dish detergent • Beach towels, Tommy Bahama beach chairs, beach umbrella and cooler provided • Discounted Kapalua® Golf The Ridge Highlights: • Two heated swimming pool complexes complete with lounge chairs, BBQs, showers, bathrooms, eating area and a full kitchen • Free reserved, covered parking • Free Wi-Fi • In walking distance to all amenities at the Kapalua® Resort • Best views and landscapes on Maui Resort Highlights: • Access to a complimentary door-to-door Kapalua® Resort Shuttl
description: Breathtaking ocean/Molokai views surrounded by island style elegance & comfort in this brand new One Bedroom remodeled Kapalua Ridge villa. This is THE spot for whale watching or relaxing in luxurious Maui sumptuousness with all the comforts of home Property Highlights: • Five minute walk to three world-class beaches, including Kapalua® Bay, rated the #1 beach in the US by Conde Nast • Platinum level, custom remodeled villa with elegant interiors • Stunning ocean, island and coastal views • High-end remodeled kitchen and bathrooms • Large lanai off the living room offers optimal outdoor living space • Spacious, 1150 square foot floor plan with two full bathrooms, plus washer and dryer • Starter supply of coffee, paper towels, soap/shampoos, laundry/dish detergent • Beach towels, Tommy Bahama beach chairs, beach umbrella and cooler provided • Discounted Kapalua® Golf The Ridge Highlights: • Two heated swimming pool complexes complete with lounge chairs, BBQs, showers, bathrooms, eating
neighborhood_overview: Resort Highlights: • Access to a complimentary door-to-door Kapalua® Resort Shuttle • The resort is home to four award-winning beaches/bays: Kapalua Bay, Oneloa Bay, D.T. Flemings Beach and Honolua Bay • Two championship golf courses – the PGA’s Plantation Course and The Bay Course • Twenty tennis courts • Numerous award winning restaurants, from casual to high-end • Two world-class spas – Spa Montage and The Ritz Spa • Kapalua® Coastal Trail and other hiking trails • Low impact resort Description: There are many reasons why visitors choose The Ridge as their vacation destination. One of these is that Kapalua® Resort is a “low impact” resort; thus, guests staying at The Ridge find that they have the luxury of near endless activities available to them, but, without the large crowds, the traffic and noise.    The Kapalua® Resort features three of the top State of Hawaii beaches, and these you will find just a short walk from your villa. One of these beaches, Kapalua Bay, has won numerous
transit: As a bonus, there is a free shuttle available. The driver will pick you up at your door and deliver you anywhere you care to go on the Resort grounds. Give them a call!
access: The Ridge features two beautiful, heated swimming pools. Both pool areas feature gas grills, lounge chairs, a location for eating, with tables and chairs, a shower, a soda machine and restrooms. Pool “One” has an additional full kitchen and large covered gathering area, making this a perfect space for large parties and entertaining. If fresh herbs may be just what you are after, these can be found surrounding each pool.
interaction: Please feel free to contact us for any further questions. Ridge owners manage this villa and are the ONLY licensed onsite property managers. We go above and beyond to make sure your stay with us is above the best!
house_rules: We kindly ask that guest take out the trash upon departure and leave all unwanted and unopened nonperishable goods in the villa. At Ridge Realty Rentals we will happily donate all unused and unopened items to the Maui Food Bank.

host.host_about:
Ridge Realty/Rentals LLC is the oldest, family owned real estate brokerage which specializes in properties at The Kapalua® Resort. For over thirty years we have maintained a solid track record, generating a customer loyalty that is second to none.  

When planning your next Maui dream vacation, do not make the mistake of staying in a hotel, most of which are small, overcrowded and overpriced. Start your vacation off right, and book your stay in one of our affordable spacious properties. All our properties come fully furnished and offer free high speed wireless internet, fully stocked kitchens, a starter supply of towels, soap/shampoo and laundry detergent, plus linens and all the other comforts of home.

Our clientele enjoy personal, around-the-clock service; staff are on-site, 24 hours a day.  Clients deserve the best and we deliver.  Allow our team to enhance your vacation with special touches; we will stock your pantry, arrange a limo service from the airport, or even create that perfect romantic atmosphere, just for your arrival – no matter the request, it is our pleasure the be there for you. We go the extra mile to ensure that your stay with Ridge Realty/Rentals is nothing short of extraordinary. Our number one priority is to accommodate you in creating a personalized, dream vacation that is as much stress free as it is memorable.

Kapalua® is fortunate to be able to claim three, world-class beaches. Kapalua Bay (rated the “number one beach in the world," by Conde Nast), Oneloa Bay and D.T. Fleming Beach are just a quick walk from all of our properties. Do not worry about parking or long drives; the best beaches in the world are just out your door!
All Kapalua® Resort activities and amenities are conveniently located within walking distance from all of our properties.  You do not feel like walking? No problem! The resort's complimentary shuttle will pick you up at your door, and then transport you to anywhere on the resort grounds.

At Ridge Realty/Rentals we feel fortunate to call Maui our home, and want nothing more than to share this beautiful paradise with you. With the warm sand between your toes, the sun upon your face and the soft trade winds at your back, you will discover an island way of living, offering the peaceful simplicity you have been searching for. We take pride in serving each and every one of our clients with the warmth of the Aloha Spirit.
 
Mahalo for your interest and we look forward to seeing you soon!

reviews.comments:
Kapalua was a great area for an extended family vacation.  We explored several
Beaches close by and found favorites !  Restaurants were also close as well as a trip to Lahaina 
Our villa was beautiful and newly remodeled, patio view is amazing.  We will be planning more family trips and we might just make this a recurring destination

Breathtaking views and a short walk to a several beautiful beaches! This vacation was just what the doctor ordered and having this Condo as home base was simply dreamy. If we find ourselves back in Maui we would love to stay again!
Great property

Great one bed room unit centrally located in the entire resort.  Great view looking down the beach.  It was also very pleasant to see a short hole of the Bay course to our right from the lanai.   Very well equipped in terms of kitchenware etc.  We made full use of washing machine and dryer during our stay, which was very helpful.  Many high quality grocery store options on the island is also a plus.  All in all I really recommend this property to other travelers who love Kapalua and stay there as if they live locally.

This unit is even better in person than in the pictures. Everything you need is in the unit then some (towels, beach towels, beach chairs, small coolers, etc.). The view is truly stunning and the location is really close to the beach - 5 min walk, trails and other local attractions. We really enjoyed our stay and the staff was so responsive to our questions. We would recommend this unit without reservation.

Loved having a washer and dryer and two bathrooms.  It was a great view on the balcony of the beach.  It’s very nice to have a kitchen and they provided lots of towels and extra linens.  Check in and checkout was super easy and didn’t have to talk to anyone.  Beautiful space!

Breathtaking views, immaculate interiors, perfect location, spacious, and felt like home. 

An additional plus was that it was away from the hustle and bustle of Main Street Maui, but yet close enough to great restaurants. 

We saw whale spouts, tails and breaches  almost everyday from the Lanai. The hospitality was perfect - clear instructions, sparkling clean interiors and just the right amount of communication during the stay. 

We will surely be back here very soon. 

Thank you Kimberly & Ridge Realty for helping make our vacation a perfect one!

name: Comfortable and Accesible For Groups (H1+H2)
summary: AMAZING LOCATION & COMFORTABLE FLAT.  The flat is on Eixample neighborhood on Calle Balmes, one block from Las Ramblas and two blocks from Passeig de Gracia.  Barceloneta beach & main clubs 25 min or 3  metro stops. FREE WIFI & Amenities. Rooms with keys, no curfew.
space: The apartment is large and comfortable, and has an amazing terrace.
description: AMAZING LOCATION & COMFORTABLE FLAT.  The flat is on Eixample neighborhood on Calle Balmes, one block from Las Ramblas and two blocks from Passeig de Gracia.  Barceloneta beach & main clubs 25 min or 3  metro stops. FREE WIFI & Amenities. Rooms with keys, no curfew. The apartment is large and comfortable, and has an amazing terrace. You have a private room, everything else in the flat is shared, living room, kitchen , two bathrooms and the amazing terrace. I really love this city and I hope to get your stay here memorable. Just let me know if you need something I will be glad to give you advice and tips about restaurants, bars, clubs and touristic attractions. Gaudi's masterpieces are really near, Casa Mila and Casa Battlo about 5 minutes away, in 10 - 15 min you are in Sagrada Familia. The Ciutad Vella (Gothic, Borne and Raval neighborhoods) starts at Plaza Catalunya (8 min) and just to name some touristic and cultural there: Las Ramblas, La Boqueria, Plaza Real, Plaza Sant Jaume, the
neighborhood_overview: Gaudi's masterpieces are really near, Casa Mila and Casa Battlo about 5 minutes away, in 10 - 15 min you are in Sagrada Familia. The Ciutad Vella (Gothic, Borne and Raval neighborhoods) starts at Plaza Catalunya (8 min) and just to name some touristic and cultural there: Las Ramblas, La Boqueria, Plaza Real, Plaza Sant Jaume, the Cathedral, the Roman Wall, Picasso Museum, Ciutadella Park with its amazing fountain, Picasso Museum and many more. The Park Guell is 3 metro stations away (and an unavoidable little walk from the metro stop). Besides the touristic attractions nearby everything you need is on our doorsteps, shops, supermarkets, transportation and so on.
notes: Check-In is flexible, we can arrange the convenient time for BOTH of us, otherwise check-in from 3pm and check-out before 11am. After check in you will have keys so you can come to the flat any time you want. The kitchen is meant for chilling your beverages and make some sandwiches, pizzas, it is not meant for cooking.
transit: The flat is perfectly connected with all the public transportation in Barcelona (metro, buses, railway and Aerobus airport shuttle). Metro station Plaza Catalunya 7 min walk, it is the main transportation station where the shuttle bus to the airport arrives plus metro, train and buses. To get around you have three main metro lines nearby: Metro Plaza Catalunya – 7 min – Red and Green Lines + Train + Shuttle bus to the airports El Prat - BCN y Girona - GRO Metro Passeig de Gracia– 5 min – Green Line, Yellow Line and Purple Line + Train and AVE (high speed train). Metro Diagonal– 5 min – Yellow Line and Blue Line + Train You can arrive anywhere in Barcelona with the metro. The individual fare costs 2€, however buy the multiple ticket named T-10, which is a ticket valid for 10 trips for less than 10€ ! And it is multi-personal, it means you can use the same card with your travel companion. Taxis are everywhere and it is cheap. You can go almost everywhere for less than 10€. From the airpo
access: You have a private room, everything else in the flat is shared, living room, kitchen , two bathrooms and the amazing terrace.
interaction: I really love this city and I hope to get your stay here memorable. Just let me know if you need something I will be glad to give you advice and tips about restaurants, bars, clubs and touristic attractions.
house_rules: Good vibes! The kitchen is meant for chilling your beverages and make some sandwiches, pizzas, it is not meant for cooking. Smoking is allowed only in the terrace.

host.host_about: I live in Barcelona for more than 10 years, I really love the city and its vibe! I hope to share this passion with you.

Meu nome e Simone sou casada mae de 3 filhos,formada em decoração e design.
Atualmente moradora da Barra da Tijuca.
Meus destinos favoritos sao Miami, New York, Londres.
O ultimo livro que li  foi A MENINA QUE ROUBAVA LIVROS fantastico  e o ultimo filme que assisti foi 12 ANOS DE ESCRAVIDÃO.   
Os shows foram sem duvida os do ROCK IN RIO
Comida este e meu fraco vivo em busca de novos sabores.
Uma das melhores coisas da vida e conhecer novas culturas,
paisagens e sabores.

name: Fantastic Single Room
summary: Come stay in my converted townhome in the heart of Bedford-Stuyvesant. Close to great restaurants, coffeeshops and juice bars, a great place to lay your head after a day or night out on the town.
space: You will have a private room on the middle floor with a full sized bed and clean sheets and towels.
description: Come stay in my converted townhome in the heart of Bedford-Stuyvesant. Close to great restaurants, coffeeshops and juice bars, a great place to lay your head after a day or night out on the town. You will have a private room on the middle floor with a full sized bed and clean sheets and towels. There are 4 bathrooms, one on each floor, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen to use. I live on site and will be available to help with anything that you may need or neighborhood suggestions. A great mix of the hip and gentrified new Brooklyn, and the old 'real' Brooklyn. Im just a stones throw form great Jamaican food, cold brew coffee and juice shops. Just a 7 min walk to the G or AC trains and just 30 minutes into downtown manhattan.
neighborhood_overview: A great mix of the hip and gentrified new Brooklyn, and the old 'real' Brooklyn. Im just a stones throw form great Jamaican food, cold brew coffee and juice shops.
transit: Just a 7 min walk to the G or AC trains and just 30 minutes into downtown manhattan.
access: There are 4 bathrooms, one on each floor, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen to use.
interaction: I live on site and will be available to help with anything that you may need or neighborhood suggestions.
house_rules: Please respect other travelers, no parties or events

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Apparently right now Laura is between houses so she does not live in the town house that is completely rented out to guests. This is a bit of a drawback for gentrification issues in the neighborhood and in general because if problems arise with other guests there is nobody there to directly solve them. That said, the contact (messaging) with Laura was very fast and uncomplicated both before and during my stay, so although we met only once (and only briefly) in person, I consider Laura as a very reliable and accommodating host. The room I was given was very small, but clean and with a good mattress. I was very happy with my choice. The common rooms – kitchen, bathrooms and living room – are cleaned daily. Wifi access is only in kitchen and living room, not in the upstairs rooms. The neighborhood is stunning and the house is at short walking distance to different subways. I'd be happy to stay again at Laura's place.
Simple. As the pictures depict. Host was very helpful. Enjoyable stay. A few minutes walk to the subway station.
The place is about 8mins walk to the subway. Quite and clean enough.
Proprietario cortese e disponibile, l'appartamento è centrale a Brooklyn e servizio bene dalla metro per arrivare a Manhattan, inoltre nelle vicinanze ci sono molti negozi di ogni tipo..

The accommodation is very simple but covers your basic needs. Communication with lay was great! Specific and very fast.
In the house you'll live with other travelers and the cleanliness of the shared rooms mostly relies on everyone cleaning up after himself. Which unfortunately not everyone does. Our bathroom during the stay was covered with long hair and someone didn't know how to use a toilet properly. The kitchen though was always clean.
The room itself was little but quite ok. The floors needed some vacuuming and although the bed smelled fresh, we found multiple hairs, that didn't belong to us. All by myself I couldn't have looked the room door, because it was not hanging straight. My boyfriend had to lift it, so the lock would snap. Underneath the doors is a hand wide gap to the floor. Didn't give us a feel of privacy and you have to expect to hear your fellow floor mates' conversations or Netflix shows.

My girlfriend and I stayed at this place for 8 nights and we would definitely recommend it. The room is quite small, but when visiting NYC you won't spend much time in your room, anyways. Compared to other New York apartments this one is modern and quite spacious, cause you have full access to a living room and the kitchen. A big plus for me was the fact that this apartment has got 4 bathrooms, so at least one was always available. Besides you always get to know other people, because all of the rooms (I guess it was 8 or 9 in total) are rented out. If you want a nice little room for a good value, book this one!

Room was clean and bathroom was tidy. Didn't take advantage of other rooms, doors squeak bad so I felt terrible opening and closing late or early as it was loud and may have bothered other guests but it was pleasant over all
Great place at great price range if you want to stay close to and enjoy Brooklyn!

Perfect place to stay if you’re looking for a bed to rest after a long day of exploring in NY. Although bathrooms are shared they are cleaned regularly. Nice connections to public transport and the airport!
great place in a hip location! decently close to the subway and nice sized room. the place is very clean and as described.
Great stay. Super responsive and accommodating. Perfect place for a place to rest your head and venture back out in to the city!
Good

+problemloser Checkin
+Subway ca. 10min Fußweg (gute 40min bis Manhatten)
+geimeinsame Küche, sehr gut ausgestattet 
+ruhiges Umfeld

-Zimmer etwas klein für 2 Personen
-hellhöriges Haus durch hölzerne Treppen
Place was great, had everything we needed and Lay was very helpful and kind.

The communication was perfect and the neighborhood is very quiet! The kitchen is nice too! The bedroom is very very small, and we were there during the winter storm, so it was very cold inside... But for the price and location it's worth it!

Great stay and great communication! The room was a little small for our liking but everything else was convenient and reflected the price. Trash was taken out daily and the bathroom as well as common areas were cleaned too. There were a number of travelers coming in and out but we never really cross paths. Overall I’d definitely stay here again.

Great location, close to many a Deli. Walking distance to two subway stops and bus stops with frequent service.

Host was very nice and made us feel welcome. 

Would recommend for visitors!

This place is very budget, so be forewarned. Location is not great, 10 minute walk from closest subway station. Some oddities: only two power outlets in the room, no trash can in the room. Very cheap though, so this is what you get.

Beautiful townhome is neutral colors I loved. Everything was clean and simplistic. Other travelers stayed in the other numbered rooms and shared kitchen, bathrooms, living area. It reminded me of a boarding house set up in that sense, which is a nice way to meet people. Plenty of space and several nice sized bathrooms so sharing was never a problem. I would caution that the water gets extremely hot really fast, so be careful not to burn yourself! I didn’t interact with Lay much, but when we did see her she was friendly and helpful. Great value for the price. The subway was only a short walk away so we were able to get to manhattan and elsewhere very easily and quickly. There were also several nice restaurants and cafes nearby, as well as a healthy grocery corner store that was convenient and cute. Eugene and Company was a restaurant we really enjoyed. Overall, very satisfactory experience and would definitely stay there again.

For $35/night, this room works well. It feels like you are staying in a private room in a hostel because all of the other rooms in the building are also rented out, and you share bathrooms/the kitchen and living room, but I didn't have any problems with that (it's just good to know ahead of time--glad I brought flip flops for indoors). The room is quite small but I was pleasantly surprised by how quiet the street was at night and never felt unsafe in the area (as a young woman alone). The walk to the subway is easy and there are a lot of cute cafes nearby. When I said I was having trouble closing the window in the room, someone came to help me within an hour (which was impressive, in my opinion). Overall, it met my expectations — not fancy by any means, but a solid place to stay!
Good place to crush. Good price
It was okay.
Great place to stay, only a few minutes from two subway lines.
If anyone is looking for a place nice, clean, convenient place to stay in the city. Lay’s is my first recommendation.

A good bedroom in a town home, near to cheap eateries, shops and the subway station. Lay was very perceptive and always wanting to make our stay a good one. We could have early check in, something we appreciate a lot. The bedroom pictures in Airbnb were accurate and the description was also. We will return again
This location was very accessible to the train and the house was amazing. Didn’t get bothered much and we had our privacy. Loved it!
Excellent!

The host is nice and reply very fast. However, we saw a rat in our room and found it ate our snacks... And our body wash, shampoo, face cleaner etc. were all threw away by the cleaning lady accidentally. Thanks the host dealing with problems immediately or it would be a terrible experience of Airbnb.
Ok.

We really enjoyed the space, and the bed was actually a bit bigger than we expected.  Lay communicated quickly and we loved that we could just check in ourselves.  If you have mobility issues, just be aware that the subway is a 12 minute walk, which isn't really bad otherwise.  Overall, highly recommended and we'll stay again!

I loved encountering and meeting the different kinds of people who walked through or stayed for a while! Everyone tended to be friendly or to themselves, and it made my NY experience much more interesting! the room space is small and cozy and the kitchen is easy to use and amazing. I loved being able to sit at a dining table some nights and just read/ hangout! the AC did wonders on our first few days, and everything tended to work itself out! If there were any issues Lay was easy to reach, but I never had any! thank you so much for the stay and the amazing experience!

Good value place for the cheap pricing. Location is a fairly short walk to nearest subway but not a very safe place to walk around later at night. Very small bedroom-had to scoot the bed over to one side so we could lay our suitcases down without blocking the doorway. Bedroom door is very loud to open and close. Bed was pretty stiff, pillows were flat, and blanket was thin and small. Not to mention the bed bug bites I woke up to each morning. Thought it was just acne at first but I kept discovering more and they were extreme itchy, covering me head to toe. Bathroom was pretty nice, though you do have to share with 3 other bedrooms on your floor. Kitchen on the first floor is extremely modern and nice.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great host 
Comfortable space 
excellent price
Bien situé, facile d'accès. Très bien pour passer la nuit.
Bon logement rapport qualité prix. À 30 minutes de Madison square garden en métro. facile d'accès. Chambre simple mais suffisant pour un séjour à New-york.
家はとても綺麗ですが少し駅から歩かなくてはなりません｡

name: Flats4Rent Ribeira Historic Apartment 31
summary: This apartment is located in  Porto Downtown, namely in the historic centre, classified World Heritage by UNESCO. You will be  amazed at the walking distances to get to Ribeira, Douro River, restaurants, shops, entertainment and nightlife. This charming apartment provides you comfort and surely an amazing stay in a rehabilitated historical building. Its natural light, high ceilings and peculiar details will surprise you as you enter this incredible open space..
space: Welcome to Flats4Rent Ribeira Historic Apartment 31 This great open space apartment has got different defined areas: a sleeping area with a double bed, a living room area with a sofa and a dining area to enjoy your meals or just a drink. It also has a fully equipped kitchenette where you can cook your own meals. A hob, a fridge, a microwave and all the essential kitchen utensils are available. The wooden floor is original and be amazed by its big and high windows that let the natural light invade the apartment. Open the high balcony, take a look outside and feel what is happening in downtown. You will be surprised by the natural light in the apartment and its unique details. namely by the different modern and functional toilet. With a modern design but very cosy, our flats are meant to make you feel at home. We truly believe that details can make the difference and that is why our apartments are full of them. This apartment is placed in a totally refurbished historical building located

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

name: Guaranteed the best location in city of Hong Kong
summary: 銅鑼灣是香港最繁華的高級地區,本公寓位處銅鑼灣優越的核心地段,10秒直達地鐵站,四面環繞各大地標､毗鄰眾多大型商場､米芝蓮餐廳､超過100間熱門名店及食肆｡真正四通八達,方便你的出行,最大化地為你節省不必要的時間,適合不論是旅遊､商務或是休閒的客人｡ 公寓約三百呎,全新裝潢,設計簡約,環境寧靜舒適,房間設備完善｡ 為了你最優質的住宿質素,公寓內的設施､床品全是專誠採購的產品,若你是一個有要求的人,你會愛上這裡生活品質｡
space: Our one-bedroom apartment is conveniently located in the heart of the hustle & bustle of Causeway Bay, indisputably the most vibrant yet upscale prime district in Hong Kong. Just seconds away from public transportation (MTR-Exit C, bus stops, tram stops, taxi stations), 24-hour supermarket, 24/7 convenient stores, pharmacies, and hundreds of restaurants, the apartment is surrounded by a plethora of important landmarks of Hong Kong, including prime malls (Sogo, Times Square, Hysan, World Trade Centre, Lee Gardens, Fashion Walk) and Victoria Park/Harbour.  The apartment is newly renovated, clean, and contemporary. Amidst its central location it is quiet and private, perfect for your end-of-day rest after enjoying the food and shopping paradise or a long-day’s work. Suitable for couples and business travellers, it is modestly sized (approx. 300 sq. ft.) with a private bedroom, living room, and a large bathroom with a standing shower.  It is fully equipped with premium furnishings, toiletr

Just seconds away from public transportation (MTR-Exit C, bus stops, tram stops, taxi stations), 24-hour supermarket, 24/7 convenient stores, pharmacies, and hundreds of restaurants, the apartment is surrounded by a plethora of important landmarks of Hong Kong, including prime malls (Sogo, Times Square, Hysan, World Trade Centre, Lee Gardens, Fashion Walk) and Victoria Park/Harbour.
