notes: No smoking  No pets No gathering and parties
access: Refurbished and in good condition. Modern amenities include: Bathroom with: - Toilet, shower  - Shower gel and shampoo - Hair dryer - Towels Bed room with: -Double bed -Air conditioning -Wardrobe  -Towels and bedding Living room with - Samsung 48-inch 4k UHD Curved Smart TV - Sofa - High speed wifi (fibre) - Air conditioning - Possible to add a mattress for a third guest - Small refrigerator - Water boiler We wish to provide you a delightful and comfortable living experience while enjoying Hong Kong's convenience and bustling atmosphere.
interaction: We will be available prior to and during their stay to answer as best any questions or concerns. We are happy to make suggestions and help plan your stay in Hong Kong. Please don’t hesitate to contact us via Airbnb/Email/Mobile and we will make ourselves available immediately to answer any questions and resolve any issue you may encounter. We wish you an enjoyable stay and welcome to Hong Kong!
house_rules: - 保持地毯清潔 -keep the carpet in a clean condition

host.host_about: Collect moments, not things

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Excellent location, surrounded by several shopping malls and nice restaurants. 
Very nice hosts, always promptly respond in Airbnb. 
The apt was clean when checked in and comfortable to stay for a week. 
RECOMMENDED!!
十分好, 下次會再來的! 感謝房東十分高的配合度, 謝謝!

I have travel to HK quite often and have stay in many different hotel and few Airbnb . It was great experience to stay in this flat . The  communicated with Oscars was perfect and smoothly ,always quick respond my message.  The location is two mins walk from MTR Causeway bay station exit C which is very convenience . Inside of the flat is clean ,cozy and new remodel. You will have pretty much everything you need in the flat. Overall , my partner and I have enjoy this place.

I was hosted by co-host, Oscar. Very friendly and helpful. He was willing to help carry luggage up to apartment unit. He gave me clear answers to any questions I had.
Everything inside the unit was well organized, neat and tidy. This unit is just perfect for one person or party of two. The bathroom is fairly spacious, much larger than an average unit in Hong Kong. The bed sheet was very clean and the bed was just fine. The pillows were too soft to my liking but that is just personal preference. Many of hangers in the closet available. Hong Kong is known for high humidity and hot weather but I had no trouble sleeping at night with AC on (there are two inside the unit; one in living room). 
Location of this apartment is fantastic! Everything closely available within walking distance and lots of transit options within the area. Many restaurants open late night so there was nothing I needed to worry about.
Price wise per night is reasonable but could be better. Overall, I would recommend this to anyone looking for a place to stay Hong Kong for one week or less.

The apartment is as pictured- new, clean, modern, and comfortable. The location is as promised- extremely convenient right next to the MTR station and surrounded by restaurants and shops. The hosts were extremely responsive and helpful and went above and beyond to ensure a seamless check-in and great stay.

It’s a pretty nice apartment with clean rooms.! Which is very near by the shopping area. Fast WiFi and smart HD Samsung TV. Never worry about the hot weather with the helpful air controller .  Very convenient!

Perfect room, great place for stay. Love the early check in time.
I'm a lazy person and this place is really convenient that almost teleport me to anywhere in causeway bay. MTR is just few steps downstairs. Simply awesome!
The room cozy, classy, got everything guaranteed, wonderful place for both work and relaxing. I'm happy that all the items are tidy as new which didn't trigger my little obsession problems.
As our helping host, Oscar is very kind and responsive, settle everything to ensured we have a comfortable staying. Thank you Oscar!
Anyway I spend a wonderful night here and i will come again definitely for a longer stay.
Highly recommend this lovely apartment to you all!

Though a short stay, I was extremely impressed with Jacky's apartment and Oscar's hospitality. This is the perfect apartment for business travel or couples. From beginning to end I was well-accommodated with quick responses. The apartment is truly VERY centrally-located as described, with everything at the tip of your fingers within seconds. The interior was modern and cozy, with newly decorated finishes that exceeded my expectations, much more stylish than the photos present. It was also spotless clean and very well-lit. Oscar went the extra mile to make sure I had everything I needed during my stay. I would definitely come back for a longer trip. Thank you for the wonderful experience!

Central location, 2mins from MTR, within walking distance to restaurants and malls, well connected by public transport. Easy check-in, the space is tidy and clean, good for two people. Bed is very comfortable and appreciate the amenities provided. Host is responsive and helpful, highly recommended
Great location, comfortable and beautiful
非常完美的香港之旅,其中最重要的因素是住了这个房间｡位置超级正点,在铜锣湾地铁出口,1分钟就到!房间装修很新而且没有异味,使用起来感觉舒适和方便,卫生情况也很好!三星的曲面屏电视和MUJI的懒人沙发,使用起来很享受!房东很细心和周到,很多事情都提前想到和准备好,沟通顺畅,所以一切顺利,十分感谢!总之下次还会再来!太赞了!

Jacky and Oscar are absolutely one of the best host! They made my first Airbnb experience easy and super accommodating! Great communications, and flexible! This location of the apartment is very convenient, it’s close to transportations, shops, and all types of restaurants! Great place to stay and the apartment is modern cleaned as described!

Where can I start? Jacky and Oscar were extremely helpful to me throughout the whole process. My flight was delayed and they accommodated me for a very late check in. The location is indeed perfect - right next to everything and easy access to the metro. While it is small for two people, it was very nicely designed and decorated. Plus I really liked that the bed was right by the window. Perfect  myself to Hong Kong. I will be back!

This place is true to what it says it is. Super super convenient to everything!!! And if you do want to visit other districts in HK, it's super easy too. MTR, buses, mini buses, taxis are all just downstairs. 
Causeway Bay is the most popular shopping area in HK with good dining spots too!
The place is also very clean and the hosts are very good with responding and giving me tips! Will definitely book again.

Was looking for a conveniently located apartment and this is just perfect. Close to convenient store, loads of restaurants, and the MTR station right next to the building. Appreciate the decor and amenities by the host, it's very helpful and responsive. Very good experience overall and will definitely come back again.
超级方便!!!房东超级好!!房间整洁干净 这个位置这个价位不要犹豫啦!!离地铁近  反正离哪都近!!

Jacky’s place ticks all the boxes. It is clean, close to public commutes and value for money. The host is prompt in responding any questions and very pleasant to deal with. In fact, he is the nicest host I have ever dealt with.I would highly recommend Jacky’s place to anyone.

The host is very responsible and reply quickly to guest questions! Very considerate and helpful. The house is rarely good in hongkong with perfect and convenient location. this house is very cozy, really good place to relax,because the house is stylish. PS: the bed is so comfortable!

The place looks just like the pictures, it's very comfortable and good for 1-2 people. It's very central and it's easy to get around from the apartment, the metro is literally just around the corner, and there's plenty of shops, malls and restaurants just a few steps away. 
The hosts are quick to answer any questions you might have and are always willing to help !

very clean and cozy, comfortable, good location.
Next Hongkong trip, I will choose this house.
The host was responsive. The apartment was clean and tidy.
Great use of space for individuals or couples (especially in HK).  Location is key - steps to MTR and close to all main shopping areas.  Highly recommended!
Easy location in a slightly quieter residential district. Shopping and some food nearby, easy access to MTR. Enormous bathroom, clean and well provisioned rooms.
绝佳的地理位置 超赞的装修风格!交通和饮食都超方便 很愉快的一次入住经历!
Very good place to stay. And enjoyed it. Very good bed, very good Shower, very well located. and the host was so kind !
It's good house. very very very clean :)

This is definitely a great place in terms of value. The location is superb as it is in the middle of the main shopping areas and restaurants on the island. The MTR entrance is located just across the street which makes it very convenient. Although located on a main street, the apartment itself is pretty quiet being located on a upper floor. The apartment is moderately sized and has a tasteful personal touch. The host met us on arrival and was very reachable during the period of the stay. Absolutely recommend especially if you want to be in the middle of the action and are looking for value.
*Excellent* location. Tons of stuff right around the apartment and the MTR is as close as can be

Jacky's place is central, close to mtr, tram, buses and a taxi stand just round the corner. Viola, the co-host is super nice and really pleasant to communicate with. The place is stylish, very clean with comfy bed and strong shower pressure. 24hrs convenient store and popular snake soup store is right downstairs. Wouldn't hesitate to rebook again!
We had very comfortable stay in jacky's place. Very central. Easy to find. We love the location around have a lot of nice local food.  Thanks
Just 1 min walk from the metro station. Super convenient location. Highly recommended.

Amazing apartment in a fantastic location. There are restaurants, shopping galore downstairs and just around the corner from an MTR station. Best part is, it is very quiet inside so you can recharge and rest up to explore more of HK.
The place was in a great location and was pretty clean! Jacky was extremely helpful and responsive in fixing some minor issues that arose on the trip!
The place is cozy and clean. Location is perfect and the shower is wonderful. It would be great however if there was a remote for the TV and also heater or thicker blanket for the cold weather.

This is a really great Airbnb. It felt like a big space and has been nicely decorated so it feels very stylish. It's in a great part of the city with lots of restaurants and shops nearby and is really easy to access from the MTR. Check in was easy and the hosts are super-responsive and kind. If you are looking for a good value place in the city you won't be disappointed.

This is the best airbnb we've stayed in here in HK! Best locatiom, very accomodating hosts, very very clean, mordern and cosy apartment, and their bed is really comfortable! Thank you for meeting with us and always checking up on us!
Great hospitality, and superb location!!!! Very impressive interior design as well! Enjoyed my stay very much, will definitely recommend my friends.

Nice and cozy space. The apartment is considered big by Hong Kong’s standard. Location is perfect, almost right at the doorstep of one of the causeway Bay exits and a stone’s throw away from the bustling streets. Will consider staying here again in future.
Great location, so close to the MTR and a lovely space.
房间特别干净,出门就是铜锣湾地铁站,周围有很多吃的,十分方便｡有电视有wifi｡房东特别热情,很多事情问他都很快就能给我回应｡来的时候香港是最冷的时候,然后屋子特别冷跟房东反应,第二天就给我们添置了取暖设备｡

Best location, and the apartment is clean and comfy. A lot of details are thoughtfully added such as air quality control machine, functional heater and power boards everywhere! Special thanks to Jacky for the heart warming hospitality!

Jacky’s place is perfectly located, easy to get to, clean and cozy. Great value in Hong Kong, especially compared to expensive hotels with smaller rooms and less comfortable beds. Would definitely stay here again!
Superb location ! Close to shopping dining public transport. Clean and cozy
Jacky的房源非常棒,位置离地铁站很近,而且很干净,装修风格也是我喜欢的,价格在香港而言性价比很高了｡而且房主超级好,每次问问题回复都很及时,给我们解决了很多事情,所以如果选择他的房源可以放一万个心,下次有机会去香港肯定还会再住的!
Super stylish and awesome hosts with quick response! Thanks!

Jackys place was easy to locate, and literally a 15 second walk to the station. You couldnt get a better location! Really nice apartment layout/design, style and well equiped overall with great smart tv. Very clean and just like the pictures provided on air bnb. Jacky was a great host, super quick replies and really helpful. He even accomodated for us to leave our bags in the appartment past check out time for the afternoon. Very hospitable! Would definitely stay again if in HK island. Thanks again!! :)
地理位置真的是好到哭,旁边就是地铁站,超赞的!房子也十分干净整齐,十分满意!
Jacky was responsive to mesaages and very considerate. The place is at a very convenient location yet it's quiet enough for a good night's sleep. Clean and of great value too!

Cozy, modern  suite in great and lively location!
Ideal for a few days up to a week.
Responsive hosts answered all questions fast.
Thank you for making it a memorable stay in Hong Kong
관광하기좋은 위치 입니다.3월날씨에는 난방기구가 있어도 추워요.긴바지와 긴팔을 입고 주무시길 ..
Location, location, location! Jacky and Viola were fantastic hosts! This is in the heart of the action and a stones throw from public transportation. I highly recommend!
非常好的住宿体验,干净､卫生､便捷,房东也非常热情｡下了楼周边都是购物和吃东西的地方,真的是太舒服了,如果下次再来,我一定还会选择这里｡
非常不错的一次体验
Tiny but nice and in an area that is more the original HK then other. Very close to MTR and tramway. Great hosts attentive to all requests. Ask in advance to have shower towels

This is one of the best Airbnbs I have ever lived in!Jack and Viola are very thoughtful.The location is perfect!We can go to the place we want to just by walk.The apartment is well-decorated and really warm.Highly recommend!!
房東很熱心,回復很及時｡大樓很安全,樓下大叔人很好｡房間很乾淨,離地鐵站也近,挺好的｡
The location is incredible with so many shops and restaurants around. I will definitely return.
Simply the best airbnb in HK!!! Really worth the price. Jack is very responsive and helpful. Best airbnb so far! :)

Great location as it is located steps from the MTR entrance. Place was spacious when comparing to other HK properties in the neighborhood. The convenience was well worth the money spent as there is a Circle K next to the entrance as well as restaurants open 24/7. Would definitely stay here again next time!

Jack's place has many advantages and few disadvantages.
Like other reviews have stated, the location to the MTR and shops/amenities is fantastic! It's really a 2 minutes walk from Causeway Bay Exit C.

The key lock box is a bit tricky to open so make sure you follow the instructions carefully etc. I messed up by not following the instructions Jack sent and was quite frustrated at first but Jack was on it even though we checked in late (midnight). He was so concerned about our experience that he offered a discount - I never asked but was grateful.

Keep in mind there is ZERO kitchen facilities except for a tea kettle and a small fridge. All of the bed linens and towels were clean and new looking. There's no utensils, bottle/wine opener- nothing but glasses/mugs.

The flat is very small. The bathroom is amazing. The mattress is semi-soft but there's an additional floor matt that we put on the bed that helped to make the mattress more suitable for my needs.

The place is newly renovated and has the look and feel of a modern space.
The flat is very quiet considering it's located on the 7th floor and right at a busy intersection. The building guards are helpful and did guide us to how to use the access codes to the main door.

Jack was attentive and always replied to messages within a time span that was helpful.

I am not sure I will stay again, only because I prefer to be closer to SOHO. But I do recommend Jack's place - BUT it's very small BUT bigger than most HK hotel rooms within the same price point.
Nice arrangement and quick response from host

This place is very cosy and very near to the MTR and surrounded by many eateries and shops. Jack is more than a superhost. He will take additional steps to ensure that you have a memorable stay and holiday.

Jack and his co-host Adrian are exemplary superhosts, responding very quickly to messages and are incredibly accommodating to requests to their utmost ability. 

W place is a very cozy well furnished apartment situated in an incredibly convenient location, only a few steps away from the closest railway/underground station.

I would highly recommend anyone looking for a convenient and cozy well kept living space on Hong Kong island to definitly try this place!
Amazing host... highly recommended
A compact but comfy flat right in the thick of things. Very handy taxi rank almost right outside the door. Fast and helpful comms at all times. Loved the toothbrushes! Thanks for a great stay.
Beautiful apartment, tastefully decorated and surprisingly spacious, with excellent AC. Steps from MTR and lots of food to eat nearby. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend!
Lovely apartment, in an excellent location. It worked as a great base for our 3 night/4 day, allowing us to access all the key spots in HK. Adrian was particularly helpful throughout our stay.

Jack's place was perfect for what we needed. Super easy to get to from the airport, in a great location with plenty of restaurants and shops, and a clean, tidy, minimalist space. 

As a host, Jack was really helpful. He allowed us to check-in early - a big win after the long flight from New Zealand - and he let us securely store our luggage on the last day. 

Would most definitely stay here again if we return to Hong Kong!

Jack's place was in an amazing location and I loved the decor -- reminds me of Northern Europe. The place was spotless; the soil bathmat was a huge plus. Check in and communication went without a hitch as well. Highly recommend this place for everyone who's staying in HK.
位置真的超赞!而且房主回复很及时,非常nice!
想来香港购物的朋友一定要选这里,真的超方便!没有之一!

This is without a doubt the best place to stay when visiting HK. The very centrally located unit is right outside the MTA and close to many great eateries and shops. The space itself is clean, modern, and very comfortable. Jack and Adrian were very quick to answer questions and check in instructions very clear and concise. A great place all around!

We recently stayed in Hong Kong and were thrilled with this place!!! It was a GREAT location and lived up to its previous reviews. It was clean and comfortable, we felt very welcomed in Jack & Adrian’s apartment. It’s location to the MTR makes for getting around HK very easy! We would recommend this flat to anyone looking for a convenient location in Hong Kong!!!
地理位置一流,逛街吃饭都很经典｡香港的老楼,换气扇噪音有点大,卫生间洗澡挺大,房间内有很宽的台阶样门槛,大件行李不是很方便,作为体验来讲很不错,性价比就一般般
Great location, very thoughtful host, cozy atmosphere in the apartment, clean and stylish. Definitely worth of visiting again!!!

Super Convenient location at the heart of Causeway station; Bedroom is quite spacious, better than expected. The host and co-host replied to questions very quickly. I would definitely recommend this apartment to other guests.
Jack and Adrian’s place was clean, stylish, and located in a great location in HK. Would stay here again next time we are in town!
Awesome!
Outstanding service provided and a great place to stay at! Very clean, good location, and a very helpful host! Highly recommended.

The host was very hospitable and provided us with lots of information. The location is central and the MTR - local metro - is just opposite the building. A bit noisy at night but if you walk and enjoy the city throughout the day you’ll sleep well.

We truly enjoyed the stay at Jack's place. The location is great -- close to many restaurants, shops, and the MTR station. We took a taxi from the airport (just over 400 HK dollar) and had no problem finding the place. The room is very clean and comfortable. The communication is great. The room is bit small, but is fine for two persons. I would recommend this place.

Jack's place is stylish, trendy, and such a convenient location in Hong Kong! Jack and Adrian respond very quickly, and overall were amazing hosts. Perfect place for a couple or two best friends to stay at!
设施完善;转换器,充电线,棉花棒,很多没有想到的物品,都一应俱全!回应很迅速!

Jack and his co-hosts are incredibly responsive with any questions you may have. His place was very thoughtfully and carefully prepared with all the amenities that a traveler may need (including multiple local USB adapters!). There isn't a washer or dryer in the apartment but this should not be an issue as there are multiple inexpensive laundry services within minutes from the apartment. Jack's place is truly in the heart of Causeway Bay where MTR, restaurants, and shops are just outside the door.
地段非常好,购物非常方便,性价比很高,卫生也很干净,去香港值得入住
房子位置超级好,但像我这种很晚入住的可能会因为大厦名字不明显而找非常久哈哈哈,而且千万不能问路人,路人把我指路转了铜锣湾两大圈真的拖着一大堆行李欲哭无泪,房子麻雀虽小五脏俱全,行李多的话可能要搬上进门的大台阶穿过客厅放去卧室才行,大楼空调很足,房间空调效果也不错,房子好看还非常干净,房主也很热心,下楼就能购物逛街,住的很开心
駅近でとても便利です｡
位置非常方便 房子非常好 推荐
地理位置真的太好 非常方便购物
Great place, definitely the first choice for next time in HK
Great location! Would stay again for sure!
We love staying here every time we are in Hong Kong.
Very clean and cozy place!
good

Nice cozy and clean flat on Hong Kong island . The flat is close to the subway that you can reach everything very quickly. Jack is very nice and still keep contact with you during our stay. Although check out was at 11 o clock we can stay longer because of the Taifun . 
Thank u for the nice stay.

Jack and team were very responsive and helpful in answering our questions. The check-in process was seamless. The apartment was updated, clean and in a great location right next to an MTR exit. Overall, we had no issues and recommend this place to others.
Very cosy and well-designed apartment, and the location of Jack’s place is amazing.

小而精致,装修很棒,MUJI风,床也很舒服,不是特别软的那种｡生活用品很齐全｡交通非常非常便利,住宿处离地铁口就100m左右,且楼下附近都是非常地道的餐馆｡离sogo崇光和希慎广场都是300m左右距离,购物完了随时可以放回家!唯一小缺憾,就是房间通风差了一点,即使开了空调也觉得很闷｡瑕不掩瑜,非常喜欢,如果下次再来香港,还是会考虑选择的一家住宿!PS:开始订的三天,后来行程有变取消了一天,房东也非常理解非常爽快的予以变更,非常好的人,谢谢!
位置超级好,铜锣湾地铁c出口30秒就到达,大厦管理挺好的,密码门自助入住,很方便,房子在香港已经比酒店大不少了,尤其是厕所,床品很舒服,还有个小客厅,电视也很好,可惜不会用,要注意的是临街边会有一点吵,还有牙刷早自备,十一这个价格性价比挺高的

Everything you seen in the profile, and pretty much everything you would need for travelling can be found in the flat. Convenient location (exit C of CWB station is right at the corner.) There’s circle K right downstairs, and surrounded by shops/banks/restaurants. There are construction site right outside the window, but the noise was minimal (can bring a pair of earplugs if unsure.)
This is a good location in Causeway Bay. The host was extremely responsive and helpful.
Best place you can get in causeway bay
Excelent location and cozy apartment. The check in and check out were very convinient!

Great place, convenient and quiet.  Jack and Vicky were very helpful with my requests, giving useful info on getting there from airport, and letting us leave luggage at the apartment to pick up later on the day we left.

Jack is a fantastic host with super quick communication and a wonderful apartment in the heart of Causeway Bay with access to the Metro 100m down the street.  The apartment is very comfortable with a separate bedroom, living area and a refreshed modern bathroom.   I had a great stay and would highly recommend!
地理位置可以说非常好了,五分钟就是崇光,正好遇到店庆,很方便!周围交通也便利,唯一需要提醒的就是最好戴个眼罩睡觉
Absolutely amazing host. If you travel to Hong Kong I would most definitely recommend staying with Jack.
地理位置真的超便捷,铜锣湾C口地铁站就在楼下,一兰就在旁边,走三分钟左右就能到达崇光百货､希慎广场,一条线路过去就到达时代广场,想买的的东西附近都能购买到,太完美了;卫生间很大,有个小客厅,装修很简洁,让人感到很舒适,五星好评名副其实!
地理位置非常好,楼下就是各种吃饭的地方,距离崇光百货就只有100米左右的距离,周围有各类网红美食,麦当劳就在楼下,一蘭拉面距离不过50米,sasa和楼上都在100米的距离内｡买东西超级方便｡房间干净卫生,设施非常齐全,房主还有贴心的各类转换插头,进房间时候温水都已经帮我们准备好了｡下次去香港还住你家

the apartment's location was fantastic, right in the heart of the Causeway Bay district. Apartment looks just like what you see in pictures. Great place to stay for short stay as there are no kitchen amenities, but no issue as there are tonnes of food options downstairs. Supermarket is 2min walk away. MTR station is just downstairs. Apartment building had a security post - apartment felt safe. Lovely place! :)
Great place to stay in CWB and the hosts Jack and Vicky were extremely responsive with all questions I had. Really enjoyed the stay in such a cosy apartment!

Nice cosy apartment. The apartment is well equipped with all necessary amenities, such as heating, bathroom and tv. The bed is comfortable.  The apartment is slightly on the smaller side but that’s probably the case with most apartments in HK. The location is excellent, right next to the station and lots of places to eat, etc. The building is on the older side with a lobby and corridors a bit run down but don’t let that fool you. The interiors of the unit are modern and enjoyable. Also special mention to the TV which is enormous and  very nice. Lastly, the host is incredible. We asked him quite a few questions for recommendations etc in the area and he was most obliging and prompt. Overall - three Michelin stars.
Perfect location right off the MTR exit. It’s located to a couple 24 hour convenience stores and everything around is walkable including shopping and restaurants. I would stay here again!

房間一切都很好!
最適合兩人居住!
謝謝Jack
很不错
Very convenient location and a great layout

Super location, in the center of it all but still quiet in the apartment. Would definitely recommend this for a couple looking to experience HK, easy to get to by train/MTR from the airport, clean, secure and good communication, thanks Jack and Vicky!
是个很棒的地方,在香港这来说可以说性价比很高了,喜欢房间里的小细节｡希望下次来香港还能住到!

The place is in a perfect location, in the middle of everything but the apartment is quiet.
 the apartment is stylish, new, clean and it felt good to stay in. 
The hostess were nice, thoughtful and responded very fast.
Defenetly staying there on our next trip as well!

Location location location! Jack's place was right across Causeway Bay MTR station Exit C, where you have easy access to tons of restaurants, shopping malls, and convenience stores that opened till late. Self-check in couldn't be easier. The flat was sparkling clean,  with a stylish interior design. The bed was comfy, and we had a great night staying in. Highly recommended!

Jack's place is a tiny and perfectly situated apartment. It is very clean and comfortable with life going on all around it. I really recommend it if you like to be in the centre of the city. We had a wonderful time and would definitely recommend it.
